user_reviews: [{"Name":"Jay Ram","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZkA1ehrIA4VnNy0PIxLOt0BXpiMfZdoXQo11n2kz7ZZx0ww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I used to go to this place all the time when I lived in the area. I stopped by the other day for the first time in a year and the first thing I noticed was the sky high prices. $20 for a large bowl of pho is unacceptable with the amount of meat that was supplied is completely unacceptable. The overall portions have gotten smaller as well. I ended up spending $51 one large house special, one small meatball pho, and one order of spring rolls. I get that inflation is a real thing, but there are other pho options out there with the same, if not better quality, at a more affordable price. I don’t think I’ll ever come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTI8GwxOHdZLbG3qDKV924E_r5hll7-dApLXG0\u0026fid=0x0:0xd3b2509383ba609d"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"70s Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLpFEkMFgbYDe4BGpd7FdUKJSZCGFJjct_f3_FcWBpZ1Qx4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little Vietnamese restaurant across from the courthouse in Port Coquitlam.  Owners and staff are very friendly and attentive.  Food was tasty and prepared quickly.  I enjoyed a vermicelli bowl with grilled chicken and spring roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-GSLwny-1Nf4ZhT2KPb5F0ahiLUwRtavL1tDm\u0026fid=0x0:0xd3b2509383ba609d"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Rayant Yeo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUaSGd8rGguK-MzK7O72I-ocdHyBHvKJG59MOmI710XLPYz1DeB_w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Friendly \u0026 Excellence service; served us with drinks immediately once we gotten a seat. The dishes were delicious especially the Pho; simply authentic.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHKqK78B6cDzzuiNC10G-fo8KdwReZ3wOrBlom\u0026fid=0x0:0xd3b2509383ba609d"],"When":"2023-12-24"},{"Name":"Autumn_Kiko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1zcZdU411-b8f5Fcx7HImynMifJ7qg-_yzjSJzTLgmhJaggW_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cute little inconspicuous Vietnamese Pho diner that has some Parisian vibes and your basic necessities for soup and vermicelli and rice dishes.  I tried the small sized No. 27 Pho with a side of extra jalapeños since they didn’t have the little red chili peppers.  It was a rainy day and we were hungry after our drive out to Tartan Town nearby and found this place in Google Maps.  For me rainy days and soup make the best pairing.  Especially when it’s a wee bit chilly outside.  I found the soup broth had slightly sweet notes and for a small size I had plenty of meats to go with the sprouts and chili peppers.  Perfectly sized for me and the price was affordable.  Also ordered up some spring rolls that came out hot and fresh and tasty.  No wonder this place is popular with the locals.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzpbGk7esuvzRZC5gD3wjkp6AnnQHUenGP-f9x\u0026fid=0x0:0xd3b2509383ba609d"],"When":"2024-1-24"},{"Name":"Adrian W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkC00uJkJsFbk_OdOD9rrYTPpj8QZN9D-8L5mx-4-sXG1BIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food was perfect and the service was as good as it could be. My only reason for 4 stars is because it was pretty busy and the restaurant was definitely understaffed which resulted in a big bottleneck of service. Management, please hire more staff during busy dinner timeframes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfglg0dhmsWeP2dhUZn-lsNEIIblpWun2WWJQx\u0026fid=0x0:0xd3b2509383ba609d"],"When":"2022-6-14"},{"Name":"Discovering V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIw0nwNgIa5O9CwW_XBE-aYX1t3_wGZTSaPfaYP36jNTmtocw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hello, i am vegetarian and the Veg Pho was just awesome :P The broth was flavour full and full of veggies and Tofu with a very good presentation. My BF took the beef pho and we both loved it. We also ordered the spring rolls - which were to die for. The chilli oil was the highlight of it all with a lemon grass flavour. We would definitely go again. The service was top-notch.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jason","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCPn6z0JFTIZPgh1pE-4V1VNSKncUjzbuIqQfQ-OA3rQoJavMZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious!! Great portion and perfect flavor. Everything was spot on.\nDefinitely recommend this place. 💯","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rob Mckenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKYMc54aGeQ2e0cqU4irUfWRI9HTjwHqMkkeRPSw0YLWi54uo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you like a spicy broth this is your spot. Always fast and super friendly service. POCO has a couple great spots for Pho and this team is the top of that list! I am here almost weekly.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Patrick Wilkinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXYakHcvOGD9AcOA-_R-KQPKBzO69i7w3xLbLsb1CP3UOPDU9LogQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place consistently leaves pizza by the slice out all night. It’s completely unsanitary. The only reason they would do this is to serve it to customers for the day. This picture is taken at 8:11 AM, they open at 10:30 AM… I finally decided to take a picture and post to hopefully show people who might feel sick after eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnfm-AN_QSoXJnXdnYD0yChLqltvHr7Vtzh7xV\u0026fid=0x0:0x81c9e28d94d62c40"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Neda G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcXBADLi2CMhn5hf9f-JdbOlYYM_LHhdjb9JmX03VjxzMph4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Unfortunately I had to change my review from 5 to 1. I used to drive from the plateau down to get their pizza but in the last year the quality has really suffered. I came today to pick up a 3 topping XL, I paid $5 more for extra cheese and it was barely their regular cheese, they don’t give free dip anymore, and she wouldn’t accept my 10% coupon because  of a promotion for pick up!?? 10% on a $30 pizza is only $3 but it makes a difference to the customer because they don’t hear NO or random excuses. Another thing I noticed was lack of cleanliness of the location…and as someone who worked in the food industry, it would be nice for the owners working there to be wearing uniforms and aprons, instead of dirty tshirts.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bunnyinahat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQHLzerVRSGAH6pGt0gm4tK7D-Rc3CkoygNpSCU69lzYeMeAIO=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A culinary masterpiece! Truly deserves its reputation as one of the best restaurants in town. While the price tag might be a bit steep, the exquisite flavors and impeccable service make it a truly unforgettable experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKXEHae2N8h6n5hdnzC2i11qZsDBI3vxcqThm1I5vmrkeooDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best pizza in town—by far! They’re always punctual and offer a wide variety of options. The staff is very friendly and genuinely cares about their customers. A must-try!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Tremblay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLtDdFg1zZ8HL5LZ9-u1xXUovn9Ymgxd8_VwGFxI1z73ttuNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Musa is absolutely awesome always friendly and fast service above and beyond the food is always incredible, I always get the pizza by the slice and it is ALWAYS fresh. Thanks yall for being the best pizza joint and Musa deserves a raise the man cares about his job and customers will always recommend others to come and experience it for themselves!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Tite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDIMc556UvdeCdK2q0SIDelAc_HJzjyapBYqP0A0CPBdyeWUex=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've ordered here several times for pick up and it's always great! Fresh ingredients, a solid dough (not too thick/thin/greasy) and the crust is covered in sesame seeds. Customer service here is fantastic as well - thanks Mike!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPXacHY-2iyeG0p6M6G60yiZSWiwkfDpMoGHZH\u0026fid=0x0:0x81c9e28d94d62c40"],"When":"2021-5-17"},{"Name":"Mehran Chitsaz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ2eXiwmsvuerngQsIbRw16JrFLn8D6itLCFtlmeWvwvAhI0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a good pizza place for take out. Not much seating space but they have great food and friendly staff.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Poole","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocID3bg98bqWLZ3EFFjnOgPi3dpbN8ZzpZ8HSIYD88q4sx5qFg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"great variety of by-the-slice- pizzas and great homemade dips. Maria will always serve you with a smile. Thanks Maria!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nestor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFvze7V4tsQsqLo396XnxfI0QbFsmSn6_l7O8Hv386BxDWEzoN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super cozy spot for casual food! Came here for lunch, happy hour and dinner! The food here is amazing! All the food is really good and the lunch sets were perfect if you cannot decide what to get as it comes with a bunch of really tasty sides! Happy hour is great value! Service is amazing as always! Definitely better than their original Austin location!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMZrgb8nkBfx3q9a6LLAn4a33kCVc8ylvJ4WPY&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIV6jvas1B0Z6XQk1R-VtBTSMtaFi_LbOwHskdbQ4kyPutgw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"a fantastic spot for authentic and affordable Italian food! I tried their linguine soul bianco, and it was absolutely delicious-perfectly cooked pasta with a generous portion of fresh shrimp and scallops. The garlic bread was the perfect complement, crisp and buttery.
The service was friendly and quick, even though the restaurant was quite busy. The cozy and casual atmosphere made it a great place to enjoy a relaxed meal with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpsq4YTu4ivkuGsCDt4D3kpUni4tLXnJJTZDv6&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Tim Cho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlAeRGbdix5pzSJ294H4Xr78Nd64DzEa5cdHefPrVDxRdp4rOfSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an incredible dining experience at Jimoco! The seafood risotto and truffle fries I ordered were absolutely delicious – packed with flavor and cooked to perfection. A special shoutout to the manager, Jessica, for her outstanding service. She was attentive, friendly, and made sure everything was perfect. I left with a great impression of the food and service and will definitely be coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNC3tBpJxJuqxwHlK8VADsEVUfJZr1UY8lxk1__&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Mei Louis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgXRRaGeGHZwDQ3Cd4BP54rgwmhE9FWdhKccUqwHk97sb73g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy interior with warm lighting. We ordered seafood linguine and shrimp saffron spaghetti. Seafood linguine was so tasty.  Shrimp saffron spaghetti was mild and creamy but delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMU2BuJDja3AMX8kL_4BWSstCTPxry1q6mUZlJF&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Toyomi Ito","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnHT9hDBL07ssEAY0cDHGtuqcXk582q7qgw7ilC32d_pL0EQaF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is place is a gem! Loved everything from service, decor, and atmosphere to the food 😍
Portions were reasonable as well as the price, especially their lunch menu! Each dish was flavorful and was not overpowering or over salty.
I felt welcomed and at east with their friendly and genuine service and attitude.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpkF0_ft2xTh9nJfLPKphM7a228eRGRU-qC_s4&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Michael Fierro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGxPiXz4VjAC2xy7rVHkMhqRHuzRHqAbOMz5r7KH0luLvvpF8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From the moment I stepped into this restaurant every detail—from the ambient lighting to the attentive service—set the stage for a meal I’ll be dreaming about for years.

I started with the truffle fries. Oh. My. Goodness. These weren’t just fries—they were a transcendental experience. Golden, crispy, and kissed by the divine essence of truffle oil, they practically melted in my mouth. Each fry was a little piece of heaven, perfectly seasoned and dangerously addictive.

Then came the seafood risotto, and let me tell you, it was nothing short of perfection. Each grain of rice was tender, infused with a rich, oceanic symphony of flavors. The seafood? Plump, fresh, and cooked to absolute perfection—like it had been caught that very morning. Every bite was a revelation, a crescendo of tastes that danced on my palate.

And then came the pièce de résistance: the blueberry cheesecake. If angels bake, this is what their desserts taste like. The cheesecake was impossibly creamy, with a luscious texture that felt like silk on my tongue. The blueberries, bursting with freshness, added a vibrant sweetness that complemented the tangy richness of the cake. It wasn’t just a dessert—it was a masterpiece.

I can’t recommend this restaurant enough. Every dish was a love letter to flavor, every bite a testament to culinary brilliance. If you haven’t been yet, drop everything and go—you’re in for the meal of a lifetime!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM58BQjrKJtJ5ufQrfKYQ6aYKuCmRpHzR64I1YM&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Serena Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9dCXJiXkT2Yw03SJdaNBPt4M_g0YqE6WK4iltbPxjJjyx6Z3vBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cozy, peaceful restaurant with a lovely atmosphere! The pasta and risotto were amazing, especially the seafood risotto and mushroom risotto, which were outstanding! The friendly staff made the whole experience even better.✨🎄","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7K-XPHQAfDvqnQVfPaCONvx1yxJpMFT68uVhh&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Daiane zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJbTyILgsCGvUsIB6Mf4Jq2jitpvq5ZkuY2CWHmnknophF745t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went there for lunch on a Sunday and It's safe to say we'll definitely be going back because we fell in love with it. The staff are super friendly and professional.  The food has great quality and amazing taste. The restaurant has a cute, bright atmosphere. And the best part is it's quite affordable. We had the lunch box and it had little bits of everything.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVhgAYwoXb6cpGVF1HsHLb4m1MSUKG3UaP8cZo&fid=0x0:0x7c8e5688b857cfe7"],"When":"2024-6-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute little Thai spot with very attentive service. They actually take the time to pack your food. Delicious and good portions.
- Spring rolls were jam packed with ingredients and incredibly crispy.
- Chicken wings had such a unique lemon/spicy and lemongrass taste
- Seadoo red Thai curry - sweet and spicy with coconut flavour. Served with rice.
- Pad Thai - large portion, well made.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhf4jj_ordOfTlpBgCG1HHhBJm9h8cccQ4XSUU&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Swapnil Kambli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdhhWN0KCMgQl8JxSlRxuwT7oQItuYRCMRTco9Mv-DKvRQLHe2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We’ve dined here twice, and have found the dishes to be excellent, in terms of taste, quality and portions.
I’d easily highly recommend this Thai place, over many, cause of their authenticity and flavours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPee8MUlEDDmW6qpcpri4m-4XLuD0d4IJYlg0Er&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Liz Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIuViSUslkGybLwzF5hJuKnwuKDgGhdfdvpLRCkLln5KJ6Gw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We discovered this hidden gem of a restaurant today and it was a hit!! We ordered veggie red curry, and rice and basil, and regular and coconut thai iced tea, and coconut shrimps. As you can see, their portion was more than enough and our tastebuds were satisfied! Our belly was satisfied, and we look forward to tasting more food from the menu in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgNn7gSB3UeOhmTbslc6I5LlGvGVY3roArCks2&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Tara Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafp5-DbmdXd42lrIMIaPpUa4TG8IACFTFef3W9rqO44JjPcQgRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first visit to this charming spot. The Thai food was exceptional. In particular, we loved the pineapple fried rice (chicken in there, too). We also really enjoyed the veggie spring rolls, and though it was very mild, we found the red curry tasty, too. Our only disappointment was there was no yellow curry. Our server was lovely and attentive without being too  intrusive. The decor was delightfully retro (see pic of 70s phone).  All in all, though it is tucked out of the way down Westwood Street, it is well worth a visit. The two of us ate for $50, including tip. It is hard to beat those prices. The restaurant closes daily at 8:30 so lots of time for a little later dinner hour(we like that)!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3MkAuBqkfQID1HZL5cIqkSx2hcvXrZgyPvGE_&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2024-5-22"},{"Name":"Jade Chin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLJWSVoZW1CCY-_xhdgdeWOnL28P_e39FAE_t38PKZ_hYo17g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered take out: chicken pad Thai and green curry with chicken. Personally, I'm not a fan of Thai food, but my husband chose tonight's dinner plan. Of all Thai places, this place did an outstanding job. The pad Thai was not too sweet, not too sour, not too salty, and smelt incredible. Good amount of chicken, big portion of noodles, good amount of tofu with bean sprout and the crushed peanuts on top was perfect. The curry was spicy despite mild, but manageable. Again, very tasty. Chicken was excellent, not dry and it was just right.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would say Thai Coco is the biggest highlight of Coquitlam. The decor was so nice and it was cozy and the food was so great while dining in and even better as leftovers. Also this was the first time I ever experienced pasta or noodles that stay surprisingly nice and HOT because they were served on a hot plate! Loved the interesting menu too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhBe8YpmOUQfEqReIlDxMZtW7WFTShOKLL4Fgy&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Shweta Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXtnc5g-DhlNFKBuVm-Ri3EJhNR7eysyJfm0HrPZFoOOsluh9pj=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cute thai restaurant with great food, prices, and customer service! I read a couple reviews about the portions being a bit smaller, so my husband and I order 3 dishes. But we we're surprised by the quantity and the quality!! We had plenty. The portions were great. Our waitress was kind and quick to help. We were famished at arrival but left super full and with leftovers. We will definitely be coming back and be recommending to others.
We had the drunken chicken noodles, chilli chicken, and pineapple fried rice. All of them hot, fresh, and yummy. Try this place out if you're hesitant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmH3fPnITUAyOsmQwjgPlxztjt0Yy5IV34PKKy&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2024-10-8"},{"Name":"Jhk 727","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRlpzpCG0lmTiswrjxl92nKs9mapw2VnKHEXcy00upiXVnodNCJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing Tom Gha! Deep rich flavours that opens up your appetite perfectly. Red curry was flavourful while being not heavy - I could have had another bowl on its own.  Friendly staff with cozy modern atmosphere was a plus. Only knock I have was the portions - all dishes ordered were medium to small portioned. I would increase the portions by 10~15% and perhaps raise cost slightly to compensate - but that’s up to the owner’s business strategy:)
Overall, I’m glad to have found this place. Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSunyzuHZ8vtGGAmGtgFvTcTEv07fpipni41Kq&fid=0x0:0xa680fed803c187a1"],"When":"2023-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Marissa McKinnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBtcJLgdPMQpgMt2XQrlMeQ9B_SDnMecxrkflkfI6-e9ON270=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"sucks that there are such mixed reviews!!! i had the salt and pepper wings with a side of hot sauce and they absolutely hit the spot. the wings were crispy but not too breaded and had lots of meat on them!! tasted so delicious as well as the fries (u might think how can fries be bad) but i have very high fry standards and these were crispy, hot fresh and delicious…not too salty!! They had a delicious garlic dipping sauce that paired perfectly i definitely recommend trying these out!! The space is so gorgeous. It is quite a fancy atmosphere which was a little unexpected for the location, i’d love to come back for drinks as well!! The server was very kind and accommodating :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3lN4DT_Iycz4TIRz_nUw4Y8sS2jJWKbtd1FJy&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"tru klass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJULljo2CZpIBgCzW01ZQWqWOBp8nxIDLyMxp6UUoq4toUJ6Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My mum and I had lunch there on Saturday and everything was perfect. The drinks were delicious, and so were our meals. I had the prawn power bowl and it was so well balanced and I'd definitely recommend. The service was also great.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlyjqXTgBKhX_ls-QU-rYod3bwan86mGUNs6eh&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Grace B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUYzRmU5pRggounfGFdNhaCgFB1i2Hk7bErahU4qwNuN7tYIZyf=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Had read good reviews but this was a disappointing and mediocre experience. Hostess was lovely and the server was trying but had no idea about the food or drink and couldn’t answer any basic questions and didn’t really seem to be trained at all. If craft beer is on the menu either have the details on a board or train your servers to know a bit about your beer and wines.

My heritage is Portuguese and I cannot see how this is in any way Portuguese influenced food. Chicken was clearly reheated with sauce poured over it, grilled veggies and mashed potatoes were ok.  Chicken was extremely dry and rubbery. Arrived way too quickly to be fresh.  We only had two mains;a chicken bowl and grilled chicken meal.  Weren’t compelled to try anything else. Underwhelming. Prices ok but quality not there. Not a good value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_28xVzDr6ampMPh-VrxFTVBo9NkMFOOXoOsxE&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-6-8"},{"Name":"Andrew J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVVmNa6jisgEJLsGMynHFW0Nb2To-ki1W8gv-mWfe16waRH8-6p=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not bad! Enjoyed the atmosphere & service here immensely. Food is fine. Wish it was a bit more impressive for thr price. Don't bother with the cesar salad.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjAwxz4vmvDkzHTbjJ79xAPH5Hv2gweELvkjqP&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Kevin Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWJMxLZr-3YvPOYEYkCwOqoRgX8yyWGLPYZ19IJEKzgIUssXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Health food deluxe! I stopped by to grab a quick bite, and I was impressed by its ambience. I had the prawn power bowl, and it was delicious and extremely healthy. The flavour of the fresh vegetables and quinoa is very well balanced by the creamy sauce and shrimp. I'm just not sure how Portuguese it is though. Overall a delightful experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi9dwa8kkM4BNbDBwDwSuoJTW9Xh-nRrWgwOaX&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-3-12"},{"Name":"Adam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXvBO_gAscD4jQgf7WwLgwSNvcd9hd0WZ5uykstCAcxi1lOdl4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! I was so surprised that the quality and portion size were spot on the for the price. the food was very tasty and I was happy with everything we got.

The restaurant is also extremely well decorated and comfortable.  They do play music but at a volume that is easy to still have a conversation.

The staff were very friendly and helpful. They had a good knowledge of what they were second and what went into it. Also the different courses are well spaced and seem to appear at just the right time.

I will definitely be going back soon and would recommend to friends and family without hesitation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfbzsmuipmh58Tlxh-nSzNEZH3rRQbrO-pzxRa&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2021-7-31"},{"Name":"Adele Watson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmg9O9eJVdKcgQE9EcLI7KacahS0x1nMw1eZrnJFYsRp_QwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The restaurant was dead, only 2 groups of 4 people. The server did not come to greet us. 15 mins goes by and I had to flag her over. After the food was served she didn’t come by to see how everything was. Again we had to flag her down to get the bill. They did surprise me with a piece of cheese cake saying Happy Mother’s Day. To which I was surprised. That was nice! I think if the staff was more tentative and had more training it could be a better place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6paIURZCtNemTEJJFNJXiMLROrf43REDF9D_Y&fid=0x0:0xa2bd7aba18e32bb6"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Ryan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW45IYuhuQceepraBGwk75o-s6TtuC_5_eWJedl6juhh8_2uy_gyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent value! Good food, big portions, attentive service, good drinks and craft beers. There is what looks like a lounge side that is visible from outside and a restaurant side with huge booths that is hidden, so even though it looks empty there may be people sitting in the restaurant side, they should probably be sitting people in the lounge instead as nobody likes going into an empty restaurant and I think seeing people inside would cause more people to come in. So even if it looks empty go in and try it.","Images":null,"When":""}]

title: Miu Japanese Cuisine

descriptions: Modest bistro serving typical & creative sushi combos, plus hot entrees such as teriyaki & tempura.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jenna Mae Francisco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWR5huZ3X5Y4whNanYzPfm2fN1e8R4RyfIs62pU0NKVMAD-OBZufQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tasty, Comforting and Affordable. We got: Unagi, Chopped Scallop and Dynamite Roll; And takoyaki and appetizer tempura. Was really delicious and well worth the price. The eel had no fishy taste at all and the scallops had a perfect amount every bite. Split between 2 people was just a little over 20$ each before tip. Will definitely be coming back here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPccuqsq-BFQdSEQm6SGKnZrrv8IaPOrCjcv8JZ&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Carmen Stewart","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVFXe4EoZzAOkubIcHiJU27Iuag1as2s1tPKSWcxV1AyervXGfM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"1st time customer, not the last. Very welcoming staff, calm, beautiful atmosphere.  Very attractive plating, provided me incentive to try new dishes. We enjoyed every single dish! Thank you so much. 5 stars.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcYM9Xeo8R0Svau27rVJIk7jt0DQL3WI23i5cX&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Johnny Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEHv0rfGjoXCqvSEYHLOZPEbqQJmwfxnR1VW5k9cMeAG2rlYoq=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wonderful experience! The lady who served us was kind and friendly. She even gave us free miso soups and ice cream in the end. Loved it! Thank you, will definitely come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBneXLirIE9W2huWODKJVH3g9X3Ebw8FCc_ofq&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Ken Dinh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3jXYZKVoN5hqUhBEoNZyh5iQyB0R2uLP0r3red4Lyw8dHeA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem in downtown Port Coquitlam. The Sashimi here is good quality and very fresh, I love their rolls, very nice presentation and delicious.
I think I found my new regular sushi fix spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4rfcSR6tBZASUk9HC0YdEvelwG29OVV815CsN&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"Neda G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcXBADLi2CMhn5hf9f-JdbOlYYM_LHhdjb9JmX03VjxzMph4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden Gem!!! Must come! Beautiful fresh sashimi, interesting and different bento boxes (we got the  Mackerel Bento). Great service and very clean. We will absolutely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHgUVZowkXy_MpUeZJWoEeqOG0NRKYirrwoI_4&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"mia Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhYTet3Z_abtGOZAqzP3SaySXldPI65BESVdAmbOk5amUxN0hX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've always wanted to try spicy crab pasta.  It was great, as I expected.  We additionally ordered assorted sushi and salmon sashimi.  They tasted really great.  The service and cleanliness of the store were also very good.  You can also taste Sapporo beer every day for the great price of buy-one-get-one $9.99.
Enjoy it!👍❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNSe_6guT4xCYYx0yv7xp0Io6hgqiQ8-qCAGz7e&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Chris Ting","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL3xmokh6DgnlxDwDleS_vRlVRBM6N9HV_X2xJoXYaonHc8uQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant has one of the nicest and most good looking food at a Japanese restaurant! Their mini crab is amazing, want to show some love to this restaurant,, hidden gem and not well known,, try it might just be your next date night,, better than lots of the Coquitlam Japanese restaurants. It’s by 7/11

Oh this place also has omakase!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUwQSxkMWd60Ebckitd1pwxWKzwkrR42JZmIUR&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Rajan Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIjHk0yDRdF8YJTKikQj4pF49eAxqpVm-eZLrh6pOEhzJnkwZrsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was excellent, and the food was outstanding. We tried the Volcano roll and the Victoria roll, both of which were excellent. The host did a great job serving us.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEZv414A6gGr6sNZi-YRCBN_12yyL-pM0BlfIH&fid=0x0:0x3171bd894a933bac"],"When":"2024-9-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Stacy Purum Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJokIsJGL-fv0gSK_iI4jQxVk_jmrb_b6s-LN0DAYOqzSpY2xQLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Good place for big group gatherings and drinks.
I shared seafood tower and we only shared with 4 people and it wasn’t enough. But quality was good.
One thing that I noticed was that portions of Sangria were really small.. I was a little disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG2bL5AOVdtu9KbBKpEuVsT7GsnRAx1co48Nl7&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Rana Askari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGiquaWdZZatUPMrkajAAOOReXikqtkW7mp94Z7-kKODiThKc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great atmosphere and tasty food. The burger was flavorful with fresh toppings, though the bacon was too crispy and slightly burnt. Fries were perfectly seasoned and crispy. The steak was well-cooked, served with crispy onions, mushrooms, and creamy mashed potatoes. Despite the bacon, the overall meal was satisfying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMWNn48FSQQq24jLQ-BEBeHk-JWoL8sBAKVBQB-&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Sam B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLBuz42uqfzXB3ElZGqaH5wSIVnQ8rMsu03T_blBqmnMaxLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I get dinner with friends here about every two weeks, and it’s great every time. Happy hour is a steal, and service is always top tier.
I usually get the steak frites or the Cajun fish. Both are delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoMTdvmaIx_HV4hHW1L9RcoVy_mAYZIpasPt-f&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: They now have Vegan Cheese option, Queen Bee Pizza was delicious!

Old Posts:Great experience every time I have been here to dine-in! Thank you Earls Team! Love that this location is a Test Kitchen.

Tacos were absolutely delicious along with the margaritas!! Fantastic service as usual!

Had an amazing dining experience on New Years Day thanks to our server Tess as she had great personality, provided quick service, accommodated to our needs and followed up appropriately! Been dining here for over 5 years and she was the best!
Food was delicious and drinks were mint!
What a great way to start the New Year!!
Thanks Tess and Earls Team!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrRfJzQdZ0inB94JqpPn9HmUKjzUAU8BKVRSjV&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2022-1-2"},{"Name":"장민","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK90us3Gcwq48qfQCsSB0ooW1tkDEG9RtVDQtgcR-Sa57rtyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It has good vive. The food wasn’t same that I expected but it was good. Especially risotto with chicken! The price was quite expensive I think because of the popularity.

Next time I wanna try Seafood tower or platter.😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgc5VeZj9HIQegM8b3ZzwlG3BzI2Ncv0TGHnCG&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-7-11"},{"Name":"Paul Legge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuepvhLXnwipKN8-zUF6NvDdgI9arbvikVkH_erBG_iDKrpA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am exhausted by chain restaurants and their quality of cooking and food. We ordered burgers for delivery from the Earls in Port Coquitlam. It is 5 minutes from our house. We have 2 young kids so we just wanted an easy, no-think meal. My wife and I had ordered two burgers. Everything was cold which is what it is. Could have been late delivery. We accept that. What we do not accept is undercooked pink burgers. It doesn’t take much. Like I said, we have two young kids. We don’t want to be bent over a toilet while taking care of kids. The delivery service cannot be blamed for undercooked burgers. Absolutely disappointing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNc0BXWfSPP9NqoUqBdqTcC04bIOmWl2Jvpd4i&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Ariana Abedini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKNjWemH3JT4c-lZV9IuSCGGzTuGZDPVm9u6xasU8uvx3gj15E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food, very warm and friendly atmosphere, staff very polite. To be fully transparent, I find it annoying when I’m asked 15 times in 2 hours “if I’m doing alright or if I need anything else”. It’s totally ok to ask me 1-2 times but not all the time and especially not when my mouth is full, please 🤣","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3fVPBmL1qd5llOP7Qn46aS34oIGOxkZyQfR3w&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Sima Rezaeipour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJQcybWXDTJoe-KrRcSgUb8-QvVcLEBaE87UgiArz4N3JCXZjm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their brunch menu was good, enjoyed the omelet and egg benedict. Nice staff","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP7CUHHcJ-3jKRA2mybt27jyfSHzyk7-Qi7mtFq&fid=0x0:0x364e4f3b56cfa8f4"],"When":"2024-12-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dan Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn20SO-hez6CdOPY0et6YJIfsXqZVK2JjuFROy8lc6ciazjVwLCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were staying at the Poco Inn for several days and we decided to try Izba. We had gone once last year for breakfast and wanted to try other things on the menu this time.

Food is absolutely amazing here. Service was excellent. We dined in and did take out a few times. We can't wait to come back to dine in when we visit BC again. The Pork Hock was amazing and I had to order it twice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkeN1QD0k77gLzuWNTChtSslZ8MsYKszhisKyY&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Ewa Jagla","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJt2Lx4cSyXVMUtHz5GqW2QX5giQiHT25H1LY2KPyEyH86PMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food freshly cooked from scratch, awesome atmosphere, superb customer service. The best place to have Christmas party as well as small gatherings.
Highly recommend 😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNhWkgmxDtyb6rEjrVCF6m82pasIw5N0DVS3SmQ&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Angela Jeffery","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtGyld6d4wIU2Lb7oe7xsoiq4r77iaBdF6nkFQ8ek01eF1q7c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ate here as we stayed at the hotel for work, and I may come back to try some of the other menu items, based on the compliments of the others in the group.

The server was pleasant, as well as enthusiastic and knowledgeable about his menu recommendations. He was courteous about checking in and giving us space for our meeting.

The seating was comfortable, and even when it got busy at dinnertime, the ambient noise level still leant to easy conversation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqeLGhHKnP50PS663FCp_-g_jpbS2XjZyg9vTH&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Laura Thomas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJ1taLWiLR5Kqy6TcBzB6ZWgyoj4UBO3ZptGvBaE7P-Aow2HBl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited Izba last week and while it's a regular in our family gtg's I'd be remiss if I didn't brag about this terrific PoCo restaurant, with its cosy, modern, diner feel. They have booths and tables and they can easily accomodate large groups.

I am hearing sensitive and I find the noise volume in this restaurant to be perfect for my needs. I can hear my company's conversation, while not being too quiet. It's a great place to eat & catch up with family or friends.

While they have a terrific  breakfast & dinner menu, we usually visit at lunch. While we've tried many delicious items (shout out to their pierogies, schnitzel & cream of carrot soup!) we tend to have our favourites on their menu. Their chicken tacos are a huge hit with our family, although I lean towards their chicken club sandwich myself. Yum!  And for the late in the day breakfast lover amongst us, the brie & berries stuffed french toast is ah-mazing.

This is a great lunch spot with great service and great food. We love this local gem.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR6It5KMGfKdXdWFlwEe9CsEMI6164BfCS_2qP&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"K Kunz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJritYkEeakN5S6DMeaooDNRMG4rg18kYdKvuJy7Hp_4TwqoG2=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our first time at Izba Bistro and we loved it! Our server Brenda was great! She was nice, attentive but also let us sit for awhile. Food was excellent. We started with the battered brie that came with fruit and a spicy berry compote. I then had the spinach and feta chicken and it was SO good. I loved that it came with spaghetti squash as well. You don't see that too often. My partner had the Vienna schnitzel with an egg on top. My partner being Austrian said it was different than what he's used to, but still enjoyed it. Lastly we had the sacher Austrian chocolate cake and that was also really fantastic! We definitely will be coming back soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPTHEmdhYUMMgbRx5jBghp47Wwy64aw3PImFw7B&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-4-22"},{"Name":"Varoujan Makdesian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfL2mqaxtwIkiG0HlyGX_xrPtFgM36rEWRUZvaEgqUWz0Duw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"****AVOID AT ALL COSTS****
I was really excited to try Izba, given its reputation for authentic Polish cuisine, but unfortunately, my experience was far from what I had hoped for.

First, the service was extremely slow. Despite the restaurant not being very busy, our server seemed disinterested and hardly checked on us. We had to flag them down multiple times just to get basic things like water refills.

The food, which I was looking forward to the most, was underwhelming. The pierogi were bland, lacking any real flavor or seasoning, and the filling was far too dry. The borscht was greasy and tasted more like something that had been reheated multiple times rather than freshly made. It was also way too salty, which made it hard to finish.

The manager/owner, when I raised my concerns, was dismissive and unhelpful. Rather than apologizing or offering a solution, they seemed indifferent to our experience. It’s always frustrating when management doesn’t take feedback seriously, and it only made the situation worse. It felt like they weren’t interested in improving their service or maintaining customer satisfaction.

Overall, I won’t be returning. There are plenty of other places offering better Polish food and a much more welcoming dining experience. I would not recommend this place to anyone.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tones Jyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK4GXgTVLnajqhYm0hfamOs6EgRB-CcfZKNyrEZSlfbU3odg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have driven by this place so many times and wanted to try it. Really glad I finally did and you should too! Had the platter for 2 and it came with everything in the picture for 47$ (2 potatoe pancakes that are so crispy and delicious, polish sausage, a huge amount of perogies with lots of chopped bacon and sausage to go with it, 2 large cabbage rolls, salad, and some kind of carrot mango salad) me and my wife both left stuffed and our baby even had his fill too! It was so delicious and you can tell everything is home cooked with care! I highly recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNF0XwsVtW1OfgUUiRRKbghfLTu0ovz1VSWdmvU&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Kat s","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2PheeHlSTOrgESZq7PphUL-4YpUmC6odPCrLoBmlFoDLLyzPn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had breakfast almost every day here while on our trip. Service was great, waitstaff was kind and accommodating of food allergies, and the food was always high quality. This will definitely be a spot we continue coming back to whenever we're in PoCo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKp-lMImM02uuFAI1z4isRNhCXkLkbDt4Yr4Xj&fid=0x0:0xc4417d5c6f1e0d7d"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"P Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlXs2TzM2uknqo2ufsT0wYUNB2JKpkK3UD6GmafGZl0UHRXQ4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Great cozy place. The donairs were average. The chicken was the tastiest. Very expensive for what it was. $43 for 1 large and 2 small donairs and a drink. Tried it but unfortunately we will not go back. The customer service could improve, we were not met with much kindness. I even got in trouble for trying to leave a google review and snapping some pictures being kind and saying nice things about this restaurant. FYI it is a public place and there are no laws to prevent filming. There is no washroom which I believe is against code. There is sign saying nobody is allowed in there and not out of service. Strange. Nice place though. Cozy. Your welcome for the review. Cheer up guys!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmGfiiXHKopalUlXtDyjXwojwbcUZNpwl9joX8&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Small parkling lot right beside it which is convenient. It is tucked away from the main spots for restaurants though so not a lot of traffic here.

The prices are fantastic. Around 12 something for a platter. These days it's up to 15-17. I expected less quantity but they give big portions.

The lady serving me was very detailed oriented, slowly stacking the salad making sure pieces dont fall over. The hummus was in a small plastic container that is put into one section of the platter plate. It'd be less waste if they just plopped on the hummus like other places. They give plenty of meat to cover the rice. I asked for extra garlic sauce and they were happy to give it.

The chicken was nice. Not dry. The lamb however was soggy like it was steamed too long after shaving the pieces. The rice was also disappointing and was way overcooked and soggy.

I think they could be a really great place if they can fix the sogginess of the rice and lamb.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzkx4A3-Rbt5Xe_z2vW_fcA9kqhZGNyS4NzZ8C&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Small take out / sit down venue with a good one page of selections. Reasonable prices with reasonable portions. Food is made fresh. Platter can choose between rice and fries. Rice was a bit spicy but very flavourful. Fresh veggies on the side. Dining area is clean and not overcrowded. Small parking lot shared with adjoining businesses but not very busy. Overall great experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB81_UEOFRfGn1VICD0_80zei-owiO4A3E_AwM&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2023-6-5"},{"Name":"David Durango","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_2PesKmt-cFSjzAWF8ZpvzKFIQfYWeYB7sfNc7YronxWjhwaDKw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"To be honest, I couldn't finish my donair.  It was DELICIOUS but TOO BIG!!
I got the smaller lamb fries donair so I can't imagine how big the "large" must be. The price is very good too. Also, this is the best looking donair place I have ever been to in the tri-cities. It's tastefully decorated with real plants and great art. A very relaxing and excellent place. However I do suggest they add a bit more sauce to the donairs. If you come, ask for that! Apart from this, it is very recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDqphhv6OjweUv5cVW4wGn53ipIAMcGYBsayRz&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2023-10-3"},{"Name":"Rich B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVoQ-WXqpj4r3w8UAKcm_AnoI410Sm3LNTYN6x5shslunTgL988=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Where I grew up we only had Subcity’s for donairs… I half heartedly didn’t want to post this review just so I could keep this place for myself lol.  These donairs aren’t for the faint hearted and this place means some serious business.  So either try them out or just leave them to rest of us! Haha","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEjX2AfRPdAJ1VRgisBYnYwHMWWF7TcGYxws4h&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2024-6-22"},{"Name":"Nika Moeini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsFWIuYGkU_vQ-SNFAaTjcl5dIFjZe-4IFc2dLJ4QKoHNKEpklHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really lovely service from Uncle Moe at Uncle Moe’s donair. Grateful for the vegan option of the felafel plate! Hope they can add more vegan and vegetarian options in the future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4jtK9sC9_UujXlTiUWlsHe528b9Ey8aYPE6ij&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Rachel Fontinha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWNj7fASKyewm3nmFMWCcFvbVg-ooLx-XqWjzN_sPfW-srGks=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A gem.

This was our first time trying Uncle Moe's and we had such a great experience. We were warmly welcomed by every face in there, each person said hello with a smile. The lady behind the counter (I'm assuming the owner?) welcomed us as if we were long-time customers and because of this we instantly knew the food here would be made with love. The atmosphere was very warm and family-oriented. It makes you feel like you're in a safe space and it is very comfortable in there.

We ordered the donair combos, I had beef with everything and all sauces and my partner had chicken with everything but no hot sauce. The combos came with fries and a can of pop.

These are some of the best donairs we've ever eaten! And they were huge! The beef and the chicken were season nicely and they were very juicy and fresh. They load it up with meat! The vegetables were fresh, crunchy, and juicy.. it was pleasant. And the sauces were flavourful and delicious. They put just the right amount of everything in these donairs, all of the flavours balance out perfectly.

The fries are their own catagory- they are so fresh and crispy! Wow! No seasoning or salt is needed on these fries, they are delicious by themselves. We did, however, put the last few bites of our donairs into the fries and mixed it up. And it was a fantastic combination. Highly recommend.
We will be back to try the poutine when we are in the area.

My partner has their heart set on 1 donair place in vancouver as their all-time favorite but they said Uncle Moe's is easily the next pick. As for myself, I say Uncle Moe's has the best donair.

All in all I would highly recommend this place to any donair lover, you will not be disappointed in any aspect! 5 stars all across the board. Good job guys, thank you so much for the hospitality and delicious, filing food. We will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNy9QCYzXdNPS2y__RbiYDi7vhKRc91NqytLnRe&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2023-9-24"},{"Name":"Vikrant Patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUptTxISAEHRdbzBbZSuM8ZHn-RjdVeH08Qt7ghgs8AUKHbEiwgTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Family run business serving the local community with great service. They have a nice selection of Donner with veg and non veg options.

We really enjoyed our wraps and rice dishes.

If passing through this town or live around it then definitely try it and you wont be disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPU2ba-5S3zhgWWbVEpb9Q0uT3X7EcFL-W-xrIA&fid=0x0:0xc69486f80adfef38"],"When":"2022-7-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Iron Ring","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8AgLXLDnFk_HiDGUYTTHlpHg1sVI4TzTKzad6egDkEMdrUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Only person walking into the place, no greeting no hello. When I asked for a falafel rice platter price, after not finding it posted after a quick glance, she just rudely told me to look over to the side to some papers, which were even more confusing.

I gave up and just asked to make me a falafel rice platter (no idea what it included and was never told). Anyways, she starts to microwave three falafels for me and only after being chastized by an older lady including the fourth one.

Two small spoons of tabouleh salad turned out to be an extra which was not mentioned anywhere.

Final charge was more than expected at par or above meat rice platters, and was told to pick my package up from her end of counter. Is this what hospitality industry has come down to. 👎

Came to home in 5 mins to barely warm falafels, cold rice and last bone dry pita in the pita packaging. So dry it was already cracking at its seams. Salad was OK!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMytSNMSK-faIzunZ_gtUy4HDrgru86QE-B41YQ&fid=0x0:0xd8e604a6cfae6336"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Kishi Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp7iQ5Uf7Un-XaXqZWvHP20ufS7JCMx4Fl5wwp6Ya3rqJRQtqn5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Tried the PoCo location for lunch.

Ordered Lamb Combo, Chicken Combo and Salad Combo, all with a side salad and a soft drink

The Lamb and Chicken Pita were very tasty.

The salad side was stale and tasteless.

Service was ok given that this is mostly a takeout place.

Ambience is what You can expect - not a lot of people sit in and eat so although there is plenty of seating available, most get their orders to go

Would like to come back for the Lamb for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFbO8dINaF7fyw5zsN28ayrEBCLYYIP4W66wDo&fid=0x0:0xd8e604a6cfae6336"],"When":"2024-8-14"},{"Name":"Hillbillytc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV833YeKMKJfxtYeKhRHVRSrikZoFOcCapKBwyEFBOnxiCMeXAZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The atmosphere is a bit dirty. The food is below average dry no real taste, old weird especially at 1300hrs rush hour time. Expensive and hidden fees. They ask you if want something but fail to mention they are going to charge you for it. Lots if GF options","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA7d27M1-JEWu8DOcP9beJpjLnKS3mQCZupnmY&fid=0x0:0xd8e604a6cfae6336"],"When":"2023-11-2"},{"Name":"Cameron John Keating","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0l9snfPFe9-PStNeO4_gvEXHR0CMtmT01G15Ldti8CPc9Dg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely love Donair Affair! The food is amazing every time—perfectly seasoned donairs, fresh ingredients, and generous portions. Whether you're grabbing a quick lunch or enjoying a laid-back dinner, the flavors are always spot-on. The service is consistently friendly, with staff that go out of their way to make sure you have a great experience. Highly recommend for anyone craving delicious, authentic donair!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"mariya arutyunova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWp297STgLj8EVo1kht9XfQS1JY7qeg-_OWwRDH1bumDiNQAEyh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to come here very often and their food was good, but last time I was there I had a thick black hair in my donair. Ladies working there are nice, but I can’t go back as I am not sure if it won’t happen again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Isaac Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0qd7wl_qu_53KYNc3m5SmzQ8LUGzE5oTpim0qvMqcwv3wlSo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"JUST THE FLAVOUR I WAS LOOKING FOR!!! The staff are nothing but kindhearted. There’s a beautiful walkway with beautiful flowers and benches to sit at and enjoy your lovely meal only two minutes away! My new go to! Can’t recommend enough!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPeHK6KNCapdsld-QyiUVhpU4ms_Y40-1BZNg2b&fid=0x0:0xd8e604a6cfae6336"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Rob Mckenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKYMc54aGeQ2e0cqU4irUfWRI9HTjwHqMkkeRPSw0YLWi54uo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I give 5 stars down the line because if you want a legit, classic style Donair this is the spot. The family has been running it since the 90s!! Sure they do the new Donair platters and poutines but if you want a quality, hand wrapped Donair come get it here. POCO'S original, still standing Donair shop!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shawn B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7PwLclAbvOTqw2KlQRZ8Yvg7bqh0V4BncKvo3mzD_hm79ivtcQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"They've gotten better from the last time I've been where I boycott them for year cause of either previous employee or owners. I'll give them a shot again and see if their service improves. At least it looks cleaner now","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ariana Abedini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKNjWemH3JT4c-lZV9IuSCGGzTuGZDPVm9u6xasU8uvx3gj15E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a beautiful spot for a drink or dinner! I really love the ambience. The food was also very delicious: the nachos were probably the best I’ve ever had! We also got a few more dishes and they were equally delicious and very well presented. Will visit again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCX4DG363RGUdHv_NiRwHZgtcortgSqEptx7AA&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped in for the first time in a long time actually. A friend of mine and myself were just going to stop in for a couple quick Beers, but decided on a couple Appetizers as well.

Had the Hot Wings and Salt and Pepper Dry Ribs, and both were actually very good, and great flavors on both of them.

After checking out the menu while having our first beers while waiting for our food to arrive, we definitely noticed that the menu was very nice with lots of different options to it. And lots of Gluten Free options as well since a friend of mine, as well as a few others I know definitely have problems with Gluten. ( Good to see ) As so many places don't really cater to that.

Also Orrange has a nice Gluten Free Beer as well. I had their own House Beer ( Lager ) that was pretty good. They also have Beer Flights and Margarita Flights as well.

Will definitely be back again, and bring some others along with us next time 😀👍👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZGJGATFFuAYpoUIokeK4zkl6r3muGQxnN3Hln&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Shona Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_pDuq2IEOYnuAz5jc_iUm4vZrwZZuuI3aConifzRVQAv9FGWl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Really enjoyed Orrange! Cute interior, friendly staff and tasty food. Cocktail menu wasn't incredible, but the wine was good. Will come back to try brunch!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMh8Q4co7elXvu8jUVB_NVDD68mvgq9-gXJfW-I&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Jinnie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK8gqt8IKnCRf4zl37GiLySrzoMAaxn28_yfYYzkVmL6ePwhw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"So I was there for a birthday party. Spent $150 and got the poutine to go…I think I count 6 pieces of cheese on my $15 poutine? I have not been there since it’s grand opening and my review remains the same…abysmal. Ordered deep fried pickles in the restaurant which was great. One server on a Sunday evening. Had to order via the bartender a few times but still got my orders at a timely manner. No complaints with the service…But this to go poutine had me at disgust. Will not be going back anytime soon…or ever.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwPzSJOyVyteL5QqYO9gjjGdN8MUga4DAgkPQm&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Will Desmarais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA0w2RDqHZeOd41COAUoFO6hnjotO4YccIPRzQzrfKQTCb31QR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Attended our company Xmas party. Service was good we were well looked after. Would definitely return. There was a shortage of steak and the staff went above an beyond too make it right. I couldn't be happier with the service and communication. Our server also treated the kids at our table with respect and even held the baby at one point. What a great overall experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Zahra Tejpar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1CTlu2lI8PQ8gnAmixjyIsCtSXmQKDl1rHjt5y812Oda0Ww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Driven past the restaurant a few times but never really been in to try it out. It’s a very nice, clean restaurant. The ambiance was relaxing and enjoyable for us. We went here for happy hour. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The staff came by a few times to check on us. We tried the yam fries, chilli + lime chicken, and Korean fried chicken. It was really delicious and we left happy. A unique restaurant I would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqbxFs_8Dnu0wgflWRFLU4ks6a1CCFqJ_MD4AO&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"Kaitlyn Forester","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkS1mVO5BCaF4vYxZsOQdUzbqxBXZ_kUF1c-SDQ-3HPYw5OR7q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My boyfriend took me here for date night last night and I LOVED it! I honestly don’t enjoy going out much, and although I don’t ever speak up or complain I feel like it’s been a long time since I’ve been to a restaurant and everything’s just been enjoyable all throughout. This was one of those rare nights! The margarita flight was so yum and same with the sangria. The ribs, dill pickles and Yorkshire beef deep were also literally perfect. I wish I got our server’s name because she was SO lovely! Thank you guys again for such a good date night<3","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVKhowrwMxC8CLpblw1iAfod41RPACmeva-SXP&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Daniel Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAxFTfz_ZYgM60gsStYArKOb4YgmHuHArMEsVm-TJD2WcKuo33=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This dining experience was a delightful surprise! We tried the Old School Spaghetti + Meatballs, Chili+Lime Chicken, Torched Butter New York Steak and Almost Famous Poutine, and they stole the show.

The crispy fries with just the right amount of gravy in the Poutine were a highlight, though a tad more cheese would have perfected it.  The steak was a crispy-tender delight, rivaling those at upscale downtown restaurants.

While the Old School Spaghetti + Meatballs lacked flavor, I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

Not much to say about the Chili+Lime Chicken, it is a well made dish, but nothing special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNrR5Y8VOSYfX-rZRsNhpWYfbjfPvr_uUc1v60&fid=0x0:0xb2e3be892520b306"],"When":"2023-11-5"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jodine Morehouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkI3ILmstAY-XeAWqv2CETEpjWiJVODW602jRpnYogrvfslqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I can’t wait to come back here again! Such fantastic food and a fun environment. The fried chicken was top notch and the waffles were some of the best we’ve ever had. The breakfast truly felt homemade and with care. The kids breakfast was a great size and my kiddo was very happy. Service was okay; you can tell the servers are very busy maintaining a constant flow of customers. It was efficient and we didn’t have to wait overly long for our food. We did have to wait 20 mins to get a table initially, but we wrote our name and number down and were called when our table is ready. There is plenty of free parking around. This has the be the best breakfast I’ve had in the tri cities.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKJgj8sWDLDS9qegVktaFJLY6wHAIH52u_I1Iw&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Christina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAZU__kcA5bzRg06Xj5DBBJ8cZ62N3LvOHAgj11jS16XxVPZvg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a good brunch. Can’t say anything bad about it. Not to pricey and the serving is neither big or small. Customer service is superb. We’ll definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvn0YrbOK9PQexBbmH0uzrLD7g4XyCGtU_9RmR&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Maria Fernanda Mejia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuRq66bP7uwZvuWOAzrXMaIaP65fNk1AbmES51ho5i654OFOA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best place Ive had brunch in Vancouver. Food was delicious, the place was so cozy and had the perfect temperature. I went with my sister and we share the Benny Eggs with cubed potatoes fries and pan cakes and hot chocolate. Everything was so tasty and well done, the eggs were pefectly done and the pancakes werw so fluffy.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOrT4XQKDGK2dJViD6VsKyNO0Zqf0UnFIb9_9w&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Korean western breakfast and brunch joint located in downtown Port Coquitlam. Lots of exciting dishes to try with Bulgogi dishes being the most exciting (Bulgogi Benny, Bulgogi pasta, Bulgogi sandwich, etc.). Service was a bit slow as the restaurant was busy. We had to wait around 10 minutes after we put our name and number down to get called. Food was good and presentation was impecable, but the taste was not particularly memorable. The door of the restaurant was open so it attracted a lot of flies from the outside which wasn’t ideal and really made the entire experience not super great.

Interior decor is very interesting with a lot of Lego input.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4awtX1JY8GFBJy9bWY0sS6Pd9fHU7-n1sKPpK&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-9-10"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great brunch spot in the center of Shaugnessy. Came in Sunday around noonish, luckily no lineup. Food took a little bit but was definitely worth it as it tasted great!
Seems like service is team based? It was a little confusing who was taking care of our table. Overall great experience","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPGRk5-xoM7MNas2Lf8X9-8tL5TPa1NyfeG2t5K&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-7-8"},{"Name":"Helena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiYVJyd2ntFwLRumbYS9Kznuj6jXHoPn0UkQ_zdJDM29rWiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It’s easy to find the small and clean restaurant on main street in Port Coquitlam downtown. We ordered a Bulgogi Benny and a Corned Beef Skillet. The portion size is quite large. I love the soft and fresh eggs that danced in my plate. The pan fried potatoes were crispy on the outside and tender on the inside.  Overall, their food is so delicious and service is great as well. The only downside is that the food is too salty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOodTPBFYt_-JZobr-pvtMCbt6_xvN_fc6G6khW&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"JESSICA","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVB2i5CpRP7UX8-wv47l2MrFmMz2VuMLPi87EdWVFtliHFbqvwR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute spot, warm and cozy. Reasonably priced and tasty. Benny’s made on sweet English muffins/crumpets versus traditional. Potatoes very tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpj7mBBwvQ0YWcrdYBHVE_81woZdvdFQHDUKKA&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Mike Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL20X_OxbcK6Mq4LfB8wD0MzYN5bZWaRAXw5XJobEo4cGthsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love how everything is flavored really well and that the Korean fusion element is delicious. I got a simple 2 eggs with sausage and hashbrowns. Everything was done really well. Note that the hasbrowns do have a layer of onions as a filling. The cubed potato’s were delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzoRfYSvHs4qQ-gqmZ89EYwZ0drtW3HbqfgRVO&fid=0x0:0xa167a404bce0a118"],"When":"2024-7-11"}]

descriptions: Cheery, snug spot offering Thai basics, including noodle & rice dishes, with modern accents.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kathy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiyb_IZpx_WoUpDbNVrKDpyLmD7_rVs6LOSYuAzIVmUAcA7Ma7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my third time coming here on Thursday night It’s empty at 7:30 pm.  They don’t except reservations after 5 pm.

I ordered 3 dishes of Medium spicy but none of them were spicy it’s kind of disappointing.  And the side of the dish is small portions but pricey .

However, if you are caving for Thai food you should try it because I have been trying to find good Thai Restaurants for long time in Vancouver, Burnaby.  Only this one I would like to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNG-6cY4t_vU5cimdXEpXnUN60nq80EIcilfGVa&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time here but won’t be our last. They have a dedicated vegan menu which was much appreciated. The shrimp fried rice was 10/10 and we had a basil tofu dish that had lovely flavours. Service was friendly and prompt. Atmosphere was chill and good for date night. Easy parking as well. Definitely recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJWBnYvdhAEY4hBguYOTDwv8UoABiSGlIuIxNU&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2024-2-16"},{"Name":"The JOKER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQuiHl5446ZqSIBmhoQY8q4NuTHDo0F4Qr2KVa1APrDHGiVv22=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty dishes. The curry Thai was delicious as well as the pad Thai.
The mango dessert was a treat.
Great service and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaWRst7K021hvM--E15degJs4PQg7ZxCz0oSxX&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Vanessa Mckenzie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-K9hBL7FvaAVpoj9V0DxVZ2oJ_XPHr6voSvjc5WJQ__VCUlaw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far my favorite Thai restaurant.
I love the food everything is so delicious.
The girls who work here are super welcoming and kind.
Don't forget to ask for a sticky rice dessert.
Greetings from Mexico 🇲🇽","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO5ygLMfgR1Q0gE3yprdKW2MFJ7PIOXg2EfZa8-&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Aydean Mehri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7vsez26Z2HmbRPWHEjpz0jN2LhiuT-gyNLWVk7RTpbV3-1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I brought my girlfriend here a couple of weeks back and ever since then she’s been begging me to bring her back.

She is new to the Asian food culture

She always loves sushi and pho

But her favourite now is Thai curry

And I don’t blame her it's Flavourful creamy and delicious.

The aroma and smell alone is to die for

Portions are fair and not overbearing

if you love your curries and specially, coconut milk, this is the spot for you

They have range of spice levels from mild to thai hot

Since I work from port coquitlam, I’ll definitely keep grabbing some more","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaqvxy8RAciwMog23bU1eP8wixVZCEp7bHn_hd&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"pepper mint","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVN4Ds1q5B4m-_k_YlVBUgeoeWSOszEUL6qvbQmyLcNAUHW_sge=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"beef khao soi is thai-approved. authentic rich and creamy coconut curry broth with hint of spice, squeeze some lime for more zesty taste. need to mention that their lime is fresh and the beef is remarkably tender like no other. what else would one ask for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR6o5x7e6YJaQ4vX46LGCB53LZvJATcVfbWtXn&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Joel Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXUfAEdzikN4KnruRBVXiiAAknuHWPT8Shf2wOdQSd5PONn8wss=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious, service is quick, staff is friendly. Reasonably priced, ordered a total of 5 dishes for 4 people, around $25/person.

Different spice levels available, so caters to many with different taste and tolerance!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNhezJc3FTKdX61G9X9oZs3PMyCXgIbTSsvJM0&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2023-4-8"},{"Name":"Selena L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXP-t5NiwFC9qHJDY9Z6EjmH1kzmKROMi98tMSbtHNAkxsUfvrn2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The service was great. We came when it was pretty busy, the waitress kindly let us know that there will be a wait and she put our name down and gave us a call when it was time. The food is absolutely delicious and truly authentic. The service was great, they refilled our water and asked how the meal was, but did not seem overwhelming or pushy. The atmosphere is lovely. It is a small Thai place but very delicious. Absolutely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXNURpJrsDIOT-hV-aUdkPI_bLGV1HYwWyg4Cs&fid=0x0:0x5925bce98fe15f30"],"When":"2023-5-24"}]
