user_reviews:
[{"Name":"deborah seebach","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLxjtRcY-2_KzPpCMrzNdYRO4yDgFrYJSeciYIRzIJqRHPhkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have eaten at this family run cafe since it opened 7 years ago, and not once have we been disappointed! The service is is excellent. The staff is always friendly and attentive. The food is fresh, full of flavor & so delicious.

The menu has so much to choose from & they cater to your every need, weather vegan, gluten free, celiac, dairy free, the list is endless.
brunch, lunch, dinner… as well as meals to go, & they  “ CATER! “

Don’t forget to call & order for your staff functions, Family party’s or celebrations.

The Chef is amazing, goes above & beyond, you won’t be disappointed.

Thank you Yoga Chef. We’ll be back  And will definitely recommend! 💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOs_A7Ys91yiAgoAXRW69SJbMXzOUx0mgJN3_3x&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2024-5-3"},{"Name":"Maraschino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhS3dYMThrWsdQxVJVk7bvap7Ye0aWDZ1e3W4Ta6TU9YM0Dnk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I used to love this place, but it seems now they’ve started bulking up their salads with soybeans as a filler (the salads I ordered did not list edamame as an ingredient on the menu). Most disappointing $43 I’ve ever spent after half an hour picking out soybeans 😞👎🏻 I hate to complain but soy is a common food sensitivity for many people. I really hope they implement some changes because I would like to come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVoKaO3DD1S1BaKU9Wz_7fmbrmuBh__OlpVUCk&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Simplified Financial Inc.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXdgnfINO4DwNxpep3AsBK1FMAK68ItBmdtybn7Iqyo6C0KGl-y=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We took a chance on this company and we were so delighted that we did!  The service was top notch,  the delivery to our clients boardroom was on time, and very friendly.  Our clients were extremely impressed by the presentation, right down to the small glass jar arrangements, all the food had cute little cards stating what they were..  The food was beautifully displayed and tasted mouthwatering delicious.  The vegetable tray was full of fresh, crisp, and colorful veggies.  Nothing was missing and they included delicious dips.  The sandwiches we fresh, light and again incredibly tasty.  The desserts were all individually packaged and not overly sweet, and beautifully displayed. All the drinks were as requested and refreshingly cold.
We will definitely be using their services again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I wanted to try this restaurant/cafe for a while when I first saw their menu. When I got there, the place was pretty vacant and quiet, which made my visitation comfortably relaxed. I liked that there was a TV that showcased all the meals they make. I had their Grounding Brunch Bowl with Avocado as my 'meat' choice, and it was fantastic. The egg is soft poached, the garlic aioli is very flavourful and went great with all the contents in the bowl. The Dark Roast Coffee was nothing special though and it was served with raw brown sugar. Still, the food is great and I would very much like to return there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvZRB521KT53TBOxhwP9ZdJZr0npMAk6nem_Dg&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2024-2-27"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We LOVED our meals here. Can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9WD2HW4zmicNWjX2I2cMOiVFuH5hRWhDbv5AH&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Davut Sanli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVff8B4e67hlzKdM5Yb_Lft7o-XnRu9OnqJRyo4R7s3WwLbwsF-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food is really delicious. With really good attention to the use of sauce. The food is never too dry or bland is just tasteful. Also love the variety of vegetarian and vegan options. And very good atmosphere.

My only negative comment will be on the use of plastic containers for their desserts. It really doesn't fit this restaurant style. Nor does it make sense to use plastics even for take outs when we are choking with plastics globally.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1J2GhJcm1GV5IoQ7EAtYsnWvbDb_Pzoz-5hom&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2023-12-17"},{"Name":"Dzenan J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXISZzTTcEVuyEWrUryNmL3YO_uwsvWO2Vmr-BxuaFzs5nMBEbgsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing place! I finally visited this cafe but holy is it a lot more than just a cafe. First of all, the food is amazing! I had the Marsala pasta bowl and my girlfriend had the breakfast sandwich, I was blown away by the size of the portions and the taste itself. Creamy rich pasta, great mushrooms and veggies, perhaps the only room for improvement would be the chicken which was a little dry but I don’t mind it. Staff is also very pleasant and nice. They have online menus with a large selections of foods as well as in house made deserts that I believe rotate often. Parking can be a bit of a bummer but if you park a block away in the residential streets that is not an issue. Inside it is well decorated and super clean, including the washroom! Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj4YRX59UAD_BLKaPaiXzKlvbdgXZ3psLeLR_x&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2023-4-5"},{"Name":"Sharan Scali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLT3O09Q4Xhsejghl8KS4xEA1TGA2hVtWl_AyxH_jX5VzdBxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered $350 worth of bowls that all contained 1.6-1.8oz of protein. When I contacted the company the owner informed me that I was mistaken and that is the standard amount of protein per $17 bowl.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdskoiaOT3VK5KcdBrpa7Bm_L12mIyPguOdGkE&fid=0x0:0xf3bcd4d835c470ad"],"When":"2024-10-31"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nahed Alsayed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIBCAbQDY_mlLyY7-1Z7OfI385qq3wE5XH08Wet13Zf9xAoBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I would like to start off with the atmosphere, which has so family vibes. Server was okay although she was sleepy in a way. Food was good, had a good taste and I think it was a bit too much on sauces which make the sushi a bit soggy.
Overall food was pretty decent. Love ❤️ their green tea. 🍵

This is what we order for 7 people
Spicy Dynamite rolls
Spicy yam and avocado rolls
Crunch rolls
Real crab rolls
Assorted tempura rolls
Chicken teriyaki with rice for kids","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM5pBoUJjJAjwMpZT-brTBlVOHTGgCjq13QxMIb&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"bahar n","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJmfGtscBDa09dk7b-7RvVKIZH6hneZ4y0b-VObedbjnl-MZvE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I absolutely fell in love with this sushi restaurant! The sushi tonight was incredible, and the staff were exceptionally friendly and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfw_RBvIS5VtgBMxeCT4ydcAEtFK8Y1uv-rjcE&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Jack Pajak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7kRSq5QM1wGXm36_dbE9YR6CpcUs9VUAhu1SxvpJkrQ-nGO0N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The reviews are right, Kai Japanese Restaurant is some of the best sushi I've ever had. Super flavorfull, perfect portions and a great variety of choices. I would return to try more for sure. The service was great, restaurant had a great vibe to it. Highly recommend trying them out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgdwW24fDqJiAj279Q1v5WoTLNvDPRJXBFBbhK&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Dung Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAXjHAV2t4x36Ir5lWIrz-sX4qzKSQvReu75jDU63zwMhoO5PE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best sushi place in town 😋 all the plates they make are beautiful and high quality. We always enjoy dinner here with our family, it's a great bonding time together at a nice restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUlKrtDkDNKVshWFLOAZ2kLfpEITBZtUQYTbYv&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Chi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcP2Hqb8y0uQXQVGiRb0Rhd8unHZXF5ccgIFUUDph7myO2Fj88=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The food at this restaurant was delicious. However, the portion sizes were a bit on the smaller side, and I found myself still hungry afterward. It would be great if they included a bowl of rice on the side to make the meal more satisfying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORVR9mzSxQMc651YKUWETjp--R-S_F76ieESdO&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"Patricia Sarroca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3gn9k0ww-YG-IL2ET6t-Te-Van1nsgwgpJXzLXGZEiwGGfW4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow what a gem! The sushi here is fresh and taste delicious. My partner and I got the lunch set b which came with a variety of different dishes that paired so well at an affordable price. It was fairly busy for lunch time so I was expecting service to be slower but I was completely wrong! The staff there know what they are doing and are very nice as well. Definitely going back and recommending this place to everyone!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bruce Luu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRaf1m45VYyCGlp50uH-2rHvYNM9RdGoAjp3PIAgLWyz7pPnyN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great flavorful food, the spicy chirashi sashimi bowl was MASSIVE btw. Blue fin was excellent fresh and rich in flavor. Fois Gras was also a very nice bold and tasteful option that was a rare treat to see. Resturant is rather busy and packed. Bur for good reason.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGSnA4lOBbl9_OITOUk-uDm3EmclsgwsnOvFrF&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update:
Came back to try more food. Quality was still very good!

So good! I came here on a Friday night around 7:40pm and there was no wait. We didn't have to wait long for our food to be served either. We ordered the Sashimi sample set and it was so fresh! This place has gomae with okra and tuna. The sauce was soo... good. More pricey than regular gomae with spinach but it was so much better! I enjoyed the Scallop roll and the special roll with Mango salsa on top. There was plenty of seating for small and large groups. It was clean, modern and had a fun vibe to it. I will definitely come back to try more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPEJ5JLS8UmtGSSi9dnvc3fmV8eMmEQLkIDCRE&fid=0x0:0xc045733293aaced8"],"When":"2023-7-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Neda G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcXBADLi2CMhn5hf9f-JdbOlYYM_LHhdjb9JmX03VjxzMph4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The reviews are legit! This place is a hidden gem. We had a lovely breakfast with my kids, mom and husband. The service was good despite only one person working, she did awesome and they were very respectful of my daughter's allergies.

More importantly, the FOOD was AMAZING!!! Crispy gorgeous potatoes, really yummy pancake and waffles and great coffee. Will absolutely go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZm2JrIJBpWvMNrTgyP1KWz2ol7OXkf14yCZLp&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Cherilyn Morris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIFSsTxkRHOvnhVnL21RRcRzjanEDvQ_-BctHEQEFo9i_I6jA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered via a delivery service and were very pleased with the food from PK's Diner. We gave a 5 for atmosphere as we have read reviews stating how comfortable the diner is and therefore had to give a 5 for that reason. We had the Bacon Cheeseburger and Clubhouse sandwich. Both were delicious. My husband said that the burger is one of the best that he has had. The burger was loaded with tomatoes, bacon and onions and he really liked the burger sauce that came with it as well. The bacon was thick and my husband said that the caramelized onions made the burger. I also found my Clubhouse to have been very good also with thick bacon, ham, and a generous amount of grilled chicken. The fries were crispy and the picture with the Clubhouse did not have all the fries that came with the order. We both have left overs for tomorrow. We are always cautiously optimistic when ordering home delivery due to the food not being fresh out of the kitchen. Well, we were so pleased with our meals and will definitely be ordering again. We are looking forward to trying out more items on the menu. Thank you so much PK's.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLTqRnbF0525X_IBQ69XBMilRq6EUKYroOWi1f&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Kim Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIR3fyXypuJm8ILEdOCVPODC97_SULpf89BUpmEUxYYnr0uBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Breakfast tasted great. I had the smoked duck benedict - delicious, tender duck meat. Fluffy pancakes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQQTCyuOJoSGd_q3QxCrjr06WtsiKzh8wWmmkI&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Khwanravee Phajum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI6GF6hlgxdCI-il-sbuGK3OWdGWyHB-PRNuj8HpNLtL-GTcQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love PK Cafe’!!! The service is excellent, super friendly staff. Their breakfast menu is almost like desserts, especially waffles and French toasts are unbelievable delicious, moist and crispy at the same time! I love my chicken lemongrass, so tender and flavourful. We can’t wait to try all of their dishes. To add to how wonderful this place is…the price is so affordable!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfrFZiCKbIhIzaUyEMRXaImFdwP6Ap1U7eiGgh&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2024-4-8"},{"Name":"Deborah H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsXwwC3s9WyQKJ7Zs95PXuhLbAGHn9sk0S1KGXgVkYpWzFwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice surprise to find this great brunch place! Situated in an unassuming small neighbourhood plaza, PKs Cafe is a very clean cafe with a perfect selection of choices on the menu. We have been here a few times and it is always topnotch and tasty whether its breakfast or burgers. Their breakfast potatoes wedges and fries are just the right crispiness. Coming back to try their sandwiches next! Service is always friendly and love the attentive coffee refills.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP30Phpcy40cKMXuRkCo3k4xseN5ZBjAvd2aWS7&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2023-11-18"},{"Name":"Dariia Druzkina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK1HtrODnJhuv0fWVXjF7xNuGcR7qBMJc7wC52gLfs1dI0JGA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a very cute cafe with big portions and amazing staff. The food was delicious and the menu has great options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3kHOFd3zoIPRpic-fVDR1pTnhEO9xOU7hJ5GR&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"Nick Tang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQkP22OPLsbOln7vAD-ae1LRI9zUvNKoMyd5lAIDRgo7JO2KRe=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"HOLY!!! The Smoked Duck Benny was deliciously savoury without compromising too salty/saucy! The lemon truffle had a  crunchy exterior and seasoned perfectly. I ate it so fast that I forgot to take a pic!

The Banana Almond French toast was soooo soft, light and not overly sweet. Most places miss the mark by making them way too sweet (sickening even), but this place made what I can only describe as a fluffy cloud ☁️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT2ii7umzJELBTgDbzMF4sQHmn-zKGU2LMv4hU&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sensational breakfast. They served great food with flexible options. The meal was filling. They had adequate condiments. They also make delicious soup. The food is cooked perfectly, therefore, it was a flawless execution. It’s definitely worth its rating, and I would highly recommend eating here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfMUQfP_csOgdrXJr2gBcHppoITpsoZIHVL0fd&fid=0x0:0xde5d02ec9b39e76b"],"When":"2023-7-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Armin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVKfPvn-jqW8hTOlU1VeElw6vFvjre9PTWSba_96soEJn4hAFVjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's probably my favorite or second favorite pizza place in Vancouver! Been coming here for more than 15 years.
The foods great, you have to wait a bit but worth it.
It was always expensive but with todays economy the prices have jumped a lot too so I find myself going there a lot less than before. More like an special occasion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb7IhsBtrpVD77pxDsLy2RE9hDy8rfFPJZWnaH&fid=0x0:0xa2c542823b0ae144"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"todd lazarenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMWhJK6u9XNG2-gmnhPqFucz9pNeWhp5Mzp9oBrrbII94Vr5o9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This establishment has the best pizza on the planet. If you have never tried it, do yourself a favor and try it. Other menu items worth mentioning are the pastas and the Greek salad. Great atmosphere and top notch service from Rohma.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfnRmUCKH-ZKcsk7_apXvhch4O2cnPeCf6SA0&fid=0x0:0xa2c542823b0ae144"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Hyeonlee Jeong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcI0gkDJVeRogratAEoVML3D18gR-yt8UO4ru1zdtGUcm039B7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vee was as fantastic as the food. Highly recommend. She made my birthday!!! ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCY_BuiLa6w4xcSFs7ypoFqHJdm6eJckzl_WbU&fid=0x0:0xa2c542823b0ae144"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Sahar Taghavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8OOT-rS2WgnxA0jJcUc4Eft2oUFCxHr9rO9ZWBW4wrpf0ow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I had an amazing experience at this restaurant! We enjoyed two awesome cocktails, the garlic bread was absolutely delicious, and the fish and chips were fantastic. Even my 4-year-old daughter loved her meal, which is always a great sign. We really enjoyed the atmosphere—it was warm and welcoming, and we had a great time. Special shout-out to our server, Sharon. She was so kind, lovely, and attentive, especially to my daughter. We will definitely be coming back again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"B B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWXkb7cw_G-9xJo_3-zWM41O-N5FcHl5P5HTGctsYs5K7I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent pizza. The Good ... The crust was perfect and the cheese was gooey.

The bad... The toppings were uneven... Way too many (uncooked) chunks of tomatoes, and not much sausage or peppers.
When I'm paying $32 for one medium pizza, the pizza should be loaded evenly with toppings.

Our server was friendly and attentive.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Terry Newell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJRknLWkJYbTIzXN9ch73xyBN0UHvNsr9dhuqoy0-12uNUjgQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We ordered 3 dishes to be delivered at 4:45 pm. We called twice but no one could tell us if our food has left the restaurant and if so, what the ETA was. We finally ordered from another restaurant at 7:45 having waited 3 hours. Woking’s delivery person showed up at 8 pm. Fully three hours after ordering. Nope.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"O'Neil","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlG_qS4RzoXq0jXYAc_venCNNLYuKBdxhX5Bt4JfwcrWcoZULh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went to this pizza place other night with some friends. They recommend it. I really enjoyed the service. The toppings were really thick and it was very tasty and well put together. Everything thing was wonderful. Price point was fair and portions were good. We ordered a large and 3 of use could not finish it. Also had appetizers were also delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiDR-RTb1qKIL8QRrBvX1p-oGWlwEhvmurFtru&fid=0x0:0xa2c542823b0ae144"],"When":"2023-2-12"},{"Name":"Candice C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwFBBjzDK0K147Ahvw56fgZp0Wzk8W8u0zo_aJQ425Hu_MYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Mixed review.
Pizza is very good!! I've only ever ordered take out and had no complaints.
The other night I called in and they said I could place a take out order as they were closing in 20min, perfect worked for me. I order the lasagne which I haven't had here before. Well it's literally 90% noodles, 5% cheese and 5% sauce and not good sauce at that, just very bland with little meat and lots of pepper. I won't order it again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOttwakDj7ldqA6GB4WNyu1yGy0wjdN_fIIUjR2&fid=0x0:0xa2c542823b0ae144"],"When":"2023-8-29"}]

[{"Name":"Keith Eastcott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk5BCUEJh42hOpsF-_OoCCbmyygcrHIJcijMiuq6slKML49qmN0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome donairs the owner is awesome. Definitely can't recommend enough. My number one spot for donair. It'll be yours too. Consistent quality products and always friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1M6LIxKkOXR-IY1s5DvEr6tbSD4APAtxlonPF&fid=0x0:0xebef672bb8734520"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Chris Argitos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6dFZ3UBCNRdXZqEVAeu8rxQbjRFLh1hxDNGGRhimnF25O8Jw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been picking up donairs here for the past 10 years when I'm in the area...  Husband and wife ran, and the donairs are great...  I highly reccomend grabbing a bite. It's worth it.. they have been at this location for 21 years...  congratulations and keep up the great food!

Many thanks to the smiles I'm always greeted with..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOC8VXXY7NV3V5ZU7Ga-O5ij3aCiqarfFoEQHsu&fid=0x0:0xebef672bb8734520"],"When":"2023-11-22"},{"Name":"Ombretta H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1ZXtiFNwE2MHcctQg0MRG2gpseFgWXQH128nezXrU5XvDIdDx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So good, no wrong donair choice! They are all awesome! Update 10-11-2024 still freaking amazing!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfYxPsN-4atMydKvFEf1-ZzlazMRmmn-dFJ5tP&fid=0x0:0xebef672bb8734520"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Dan Yang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWn20SO-hez6CdOPY0et6YJIfsXqZVK2JjuFROy8lc6ciazjVwLCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been to this donair place since 2010, it has been several years for sure, I always have a great meal there, never had a bad experience. The gentleman who serves the food is such a friendly and kind man. Very welcoming when you go in. He remembers you so you always feel at home when you go. I don't come out here enough since I do not work out that way but I will drive out few times a year for tasty donair. Lots of parking outside. Big portions. Awesome all around.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0-Lo0K5kIQSxOhZ0bzu3jGTTBfKXzEgMzzb3k&fid=0x0:0xebef672bb8734520"],"When":"2018-7-19"},{"Name":"Fateme Fazeli","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvjX4myfKYdeWeaVg3zgR3YGukIOQhtrzltOrVXrKUWKpUPHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very tasty and fresh food. I liked the lady who served us. She was very friendly and professional! I definitely go back and eat there !
Thank you !","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neda G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcXBADLi2CMhn5hf9f-JdbOlYYM_LHhdjb9JmX03VjxzMph4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I thought this was an authentic Lebanese Donair place but it was not sadly. I asked for no onions but both wraps were full of onions. I agree with others  that the owners are lovely and friendly but that said, the taste of the chicken was off and had way way way too much cinnamon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ken Mogridge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3Ml8d1_DawOEpC9BGDlwnu-HDiERRmxYUGKPaV0u2VlGki3R9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome Chichen Donair!
Friendly Staff.
Ate in the shop. Clean facility and washroom. Easy to get to. Lots of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxrZNRMsA15IVWEtd2yqTUG9PScUnsb0lgHh7K&fid=0x0:0xebef672bb8734520"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"Andrew Frazer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK76cOz3em6ymp2wI-Elgqg051IYPpuTnSItpdAlVYIRQLQnw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nothing bad to say about this establishment all all. Food is great. Portions are generous and the husband and wife team are always very nice and appreciative of your business. I fully support them and recommend you check them out. You won’t be disappointed.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Yanti Sulaeman Walton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEJtxnbNlrz2GfQ6F6zKOL0xDPhJ8aB4uqGe9QOPIwQS3i14BB-Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious persian foods,huge portion and affordable price. Must grab & go persian food when we craving it 🥰","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMTwrR8VTA4y8Lp6qOpHfSsMzBOFO58fdMMzCd&fid=0x0:0xfe535cce35f49e37"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Armin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVKfPvn-jqW8hTOlU1VeElw6vFvjre9PTWSba_96soEJn4hAFVjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is great for the price. Vary fair price for a decent Persian food. Lots of options on the menu too","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPullyZx7AqqrjCoCtY-kUc2duamE-y9zLBYWkt&fid=0x0:0xfe535cce35f49e37"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Saeid MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcewSnJcAhACCkEWKUQGjPaBy78cIOsSGEe0B0nR_ARAnMiJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered Koubideh and lamb shank, it was good but lamb taste could be better, needs to have more flavor. Also the Dough was really tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOukA4ha22SFPQ6FAbBVu7NKkVDbpC6zgLzLmQN&fid=0x0:0xfe535cce35f49e37"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"abas jalili","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5-JtiEFM0TKssaNHVpKBJWLNTuIm9OgdKbnu5pCDZzBmdt4ra=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered lamb muscle. The behavior of the staff was very friendly and polite, thank you. But the taste of the food was not great and it was average. If you are craving funny and excellent food, this place is not recommended for lamb muscle. Of course, the prices were very reasonable, but with payment  For five dollars more, you can have a much tastier meal elsewhere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ridhwaan Murad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZ01NrIJq-bXx2O0TQQ_Nlv3d1BmJDfMG1zJNirVKOrJxl9RtiBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The restaurant is at its name suggests “Grab and Go” so order and pickup.

It is recommended to order before picking up as you will have a slight wait if you walk in and order.

The food has been great each time I ordered. Portion sizes are not bad and the food is always fresh.

Lots of parking available outside and at times they can get busy.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Candice C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwFBBjzDK0K147Ahvw56fgZp0Wzk8W8u0zo_aJQ425Hu_MYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Take out restaurant, the place appears clean and tidy. The staff are welcoming and friendly. Had the beef kebob small platter and that was more than enough. Lots of options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOshxNmRcFxtlY7YaQH-8G5BG1zitn4SatKU0Pb&fid=0x0:0xfe535cce35f49e37"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Reza Az","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8VOIYGmudwFgomghjsI628UIOyauu99PTTRqvMp19GbPgNp4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Grab and go Coquitlam is an unforgettable experience! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm hospitality that made me feel right at home. The ambiance was cozy and authentic, transporting me straight to Iran.
The food was absolutely incredible. Every dish was bursting with rich, authentic flavors, showcasing the true essence of Iranian cuisine.
Whether you’re familiar with Iranian food or trying it for the first time, I highly recommend Grab and go Coquitlam for an authentic and delicious culinary journey. I’ll definitely be returning soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Reza Beik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWAk5FOTBi4eYl4XJK_pY6EefWdKrL0UdJY6hMoW801u1k_XvKn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I called and ordered 45 minutes before the scheduled pickup time, and the person on the phone assured me that the food would be ready on time. However, for the third time in the last two months, I had to wait an additional 15 to 20 minutes at the restaurant to pick up my order. I understand that they are busy and that it may take longer for orders to be prepared, but when a customer orders ahead, it's because they don't want to wait—they want to pick up their order and go.

The restaurant should ensure that they provide customers with an accurate pickup time. If you're busy and the order can't be ready in less than an hour, just let the customer know. But most importantly, make sure that when the customer arrives, the order is ready and properly packed.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"O T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNMZRDyPmCXOIYr2knffcKqnpyxzie7qHVjFWoC2-ZmJX5_do-=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We visited this restaurant twice, and unfortunately, both experiences were disappointing. First, the portion sizes were shockingly small. We’re not big eaters, and we don’t expect massive portions, but we did expect enough food to feel satisfied given the prices. Both times, we left still feeling hungry.
On one visit, the server got our order wrong and brought pancakes instead of waffles. We decided to let it slide, but the pancakes turned out to be terrible, so we asked for them to be replaced. To our surprise, we were charged for both meals.
Overall, we were really let down by the food quality, service, and value for money. It’s not a place we’d return to.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwTnR0sk7n_ze7mP7n_f-jOtfF0efbBswqsPUQ&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We took my mother-in-law out for a late lunch on a Friday afternoon. My husband enjoyed his blueberry milkshake and we had two different veggie burgers, both nice. Dated atmosphere. Server was friendly and prompt. Worth checking out if you want some comfort food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzyFOKm-V4IPKAvAN5BodO9u64aX-PhSOkmL_D&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2024-6-29"},{"Name":"Kate Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr0wyxbETF1OIwtaRI7q7gqmb4Gyi3lrLYLvt0zWijOigiOvk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Consistently delivers delectable dishes. My friend introduced me to the franchise’s blueberry milkshake and it is a delicious treat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMuUI6nj548BZ1C4vgDjZOQjyjkUik-0PgfsNEv&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Y Asr","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiVODPcX4RwOd_Ul80uRIkFuz2OcFSnrFGXThpJ_cRU33YGpqN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely outstanding service! Marco was attentive, friendly, and went above and beyond to ensure we had an exceptional dining experience. His recommendations were spot on, and he always seemed to anticipate our needs before we even had to ask. It’s rare to find such genuine hospitality, and he truly made our evening memorable. We’ll definitely be back – all thanks to his wonderful service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ray Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnHoKzUHN2laU2bSp7bGdZulx8wlTrl7fcyIV2n_GmA8fi001AHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was good at this location the steak was cooked to perfection and tasted good the pasta was not bad either.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkkWX1s6vBv8MErdPfUPNiztR3S8TLwXV9QU6g&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"Izmet Barranco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiQo1jy483UmDOGk0DLpOPmwFqDxOxzKBlrj-9MTXzn_Zhoww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a late dinner with my sister. I got the perogies and the quesadilla from the happy hour menu and both were absolutely fantastic. My sister’s dinner was really good too.

Our waitress was super nice, on top of all our needs and once we finished we stay a little but longer chatting without realizing they had already closed. However we were let to stay without kicking us out. Thank you for that. Def recommend this spot.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbP7Jq3rdnOqBmTTFJrrrQoPsd4sy7F8HW39hx&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2023-9-9"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Overall, it was a great experience. The place is cozy and perfect for hanging out with friends. I highly recommend the prawn and bacon carbonara—it was delicious! My partner and I shared an order, and it was more than enough to fill us up. The flavor was fantastic too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO98UcdwDjsUTTb5qOqeb8-iiCt-ogOVBWi5VcS&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Voyager [*]","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxyrru_rgoUMojDzKD_gGADQ8Mavlr7MZtSONc9lqxxHKo4pEfUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Took a while to get our order ready and served. I understand it was a busy workday night, however 35 min. after placing an order is a bit longer than usual.
Food was good, like in any other WS, no complaints there.
I wish the restaurant was a bit cleaner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjoyo94aONBugYludN4aLeCz2glnU2U4BIl-As&fid=0x0:0x7ea0a39de7ea97b3"],"When":"2023-7-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Linh L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaB8qs_ygwwwpHNel9QXMXCKqxjoIZrWCW5N9kOTA3MUsIG0QWTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food quality has gone down quite a bit.  The service is still great and it's a clean place to dine at along with being able to accomodate larger tables.  I'd go again if it was the only option around here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVoOVfsz2IkZP8A7vFifm5tHHJIQd8T21GOmwQ&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"HW C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg-IQKwQu37rrt2uXrxPur2eFHVtEh0sof-QwsldNZaEygI2hK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Been here twice, never again! Would have selected zero stars for food if that option was available. This isn't all the food we got. We also had a kid's meal and a onion soup. Super salty soup. Kid's meal was ok but pricey.
Basically everything in here is pricey yet quality is not up to par. Not an ordinary Hong Kong style cafe. Stay away!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMJAxe1MU5inKBYv7ViYQ-mxrXjCf2k4WieUwed&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"TERRY CHENG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUsg-oI6sco7O5Go48_oGM2GdPS9ywAc_QfXDXDKM3uhrlF3VpMxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food is delicious. I had the chicken with salted fish fried rice. It was made perfectly with wok hay. You can taste the salted fish. The kitchen forgot my wife's order but unlike other typical Asian restaurant where the server just says it is coming, she apologized and went to follow up immediately. The atmosphere is loud and tables cramped. It is busy so you definitely need to wait. The washroom is 3/5 stars. Difficult to find any slippery floor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcw9bZT9QydmEGTIcGIKCSRHagLaVgqiZt-4Ml&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-3-2"},{"Name":"Kevin S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWW-HoTH05SDyiEsT9u8Wd25Wyn-omXApiCGy1l-mOBxv_wj5xh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A fine Hong Kong style restaurant.

I found the prices a bit on the higher side, but just slightly. The portions were generous, and the baked rice was quite creamy and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnMqJR3qWP9PZWzBIUrCkSJrm8aqc7e1v_rq0_&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Kanako Sakurada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKYybgPjG_d3LYq66Ui47Ocd_2PMrfkKaju5V_L0IyVTR19lQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"HK style cafe with wide variety of food from western to asian to fusion! Great steak combo and 10% off ordering on line even when eating in. Food is more than decent and the portion size is large.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNN16kz7Zh95HdWI--Ik0AAwQ2Z7ETsd_sBB0GP&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-10-2"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious and solid place for classic Hong Kong Cafe food. You can order online from your phone and they give you a 10% off discount if you order this way. There are plenty of combos that come with a drink and the menu is vast with both Western and Asian dishes. Highly recommend the tomato sauce baked ox tongue with a pasta of your choice. The tomato sauce was creamy, sweet, tangy, and savoury reminiscent of Campbell’s tomato soup. The lobster bisque was filled with lobster shell flavour. The red bean and grass jelly ice tasted delicious and refreshing serving as a dessert and drink at the same time.  Everything tasted delicious.

The portions for the fish and chips and pork and chicken cutlet and steak were good. There are comfy diner booth like seats to sit in and eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOrZgPDR6-6MMRH7dQMHRUTXL89zevjiNTvoji&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2023-11-5"},{"Name":"Linda Vu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4Mt-fIM1ZKQuO_Y2ib9yo6xFV3B1mBRBjrbB_M80tp5QNaP0e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best HK style cafe in Coquitlam.

Services and food are fast and efficient. The food is high quality and decently priced.

Breakfast ranges from $12-$14
Lunch ranges from $14-$18
Dinner set menus ranges from $19-$23","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0PCRS9s3F_2r1xDSLsmEsNMEbJdi19UCaeY6C&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-1-29"},{"Name":"ladan ghafouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQKWEx_YV_Uj80v-xctgsLSGRY6V78hw5KMb4aNvRdZAaXJWti=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"My partner and I went there for brunch.We ordered Mexican and vegetarian omelet. We pick the French toast to come with. Also we asked for coffee. The menu was really rich and you will have variety of different opinions. We really loved the omelets. The French toast was perfect.  For the coffee I just prefer to have suger, milk and cream on the table like as every where else( they just asked us how many suger we want and put 4 milk on the table, not even in the plate). Overall I really liked it and we will go back to try lunch and dinner .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHNXWlB85awZcVo4LsFWw7YzcOUxmmYs4aAxUG&fid=0x0:0xb89aa5370ad1307a"],"When":"2024-4-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mars","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWHtjcjaWQzqHOLzQxnithsAhAEbGsw7p50S0nVK1aNY3FFQevV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing atmosphere the coffee was absolutely delicious and sweet without any added sweetener to it, the cake tasted pretty good and they had a new seasonal drink, apparently we were the first to order it? But it tasted pretty good as well, the staff were really friendly, really recommend this place! Wish i lived closer so i could come more often","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN2aPqxMR_mt6ITbzSKVPFSNIOgOiPnulW5Nw4m&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Lekha Reddy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmJGhl1-4gmLsjhODLv0EBv4db0I65Xj_LQ4N38nJXAbHQF354=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A beautiful space with high ceilings and pleasant vibe with a cup of coffee, read or work! The latte is good while I didn’t realize Ube latte is just flavored with milk and no espresso disappointed with my choice. The art on coffee is so beautiful. The cinnamon crumble coffee cake is so dry, lacking any flavor. Wouldn’t try food again but maybe would choose for a coffee only. Lots of free parking available and free wifi. Staff is friendly!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_eViKyKmBi0_pPdoyK4kQsTcRyGcM4X_Mr4dA&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"021 Rima Akter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpRbHZwUEZP3uYoGDv8yEC5E42IsVQEyVoc1nBO6tj0X-rKZDe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this café and had a wonderful experience. The coffee was fantastic—rich, flavorful, and exactly what I needed. The ambiance was also very inviting, with a cozy, relaxed vibe that made it easy to unwind. Whether you're there to work, read, or just enjoy a great cup of coffee, this place is a gem. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwiKV2iPZTCQEuQO-velt2zg-7xEvVUngdZ-v4&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Brenda T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX21R_5u16kqQIHvt9qXxNqCuRkOusYkvwIs7ECZAUMv-eNNgAW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for the first time from all the way in Burnaby!
I've been wanting to go here for months but never had a reason to commute all the way out here.

I'd say the ambience of this cafe is sooo nice, it looks aesthetic,  clean and spacious. Soo much seating available as well~!
I love pretty looking cafes.

The food, desserts and drinks were delicious as well.
I really loved the sky blue lavender latte. It was soo creamy, light and tasted almost like cereal milk.
The carrot cake also desserves its recognition. I eat carrot cakes everywhere and make them at home as well. I'd say it tasted amazing.

Will be coming back one day if I'm around the area! Worth the drive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSPB6SgXECTpDZZZayTC6cjMI82pqHl0UPVPaK&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"tikki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzV_Y6bQFjodBKC8anq5nBVFmCTC7hA6Nh7xklFQuKGefK40A_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very stylish Korean coffee shop in Port Coquitlam! The inside is so spacious and bright and it feels so good just sitting inside. The cake was a little sweet for me but the drink was refreshing and tasty!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnk2Jb0AwaX52tNBMiZKXxkkG7_JmDmv_1p0rP&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"mora hakimi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUVznpJSYkqm2MAnPhVvqD5lXuM9PV4wi9xjf_zSEfSnREOxRKA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Seats are a little uncomfortable but it doesn’t stop me from getting a good coffee. My go to place to grab a drink before heading to work. The coffee arts are so cute l. On slower days I love to order the black sesame chicken salad and catch up with school/work stuff. The baristas are all so friendly and can make the drinks within reasonable time even in busy days(it gets really busy trust me) I also like that it stays open pretty late compared to other coffee shops.

(Ps I might be a little biased bc I think I have a crush on one the baristas HAHA whoops)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEgHwghsU0KLQ8zvtUFwT9pgcO0evZRPZ_161y&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"Jennifer Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpoEXdttHjVVsSTvCa_zr74WgEbDQeCwR_j4Iibc7tqIGRebJq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This Korean-owned café offers a spacious and bright environment, making it a comfortable place to dine. The dishes are creative and delicious. I especially love the Cinnamon Crumb and Carrot Cake（it’s soft, moist, and has a wonderfully aromatic flavor.）","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMbkgtFHX87oq5mJH_cWsK1anX0mn79r8rqcD3&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Farzeen I","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLH1zW28Bv8ZviGpx4sgECjw3ckb9UrK98YcO9-xBEXgoU_Qg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is great to work at. They have outlets and the atmosphere is calm. The music is great too. My absolute favourite thing about this cafe is their drinks. The tiramisu latte was amazing and well balanced, not too sweet and just the right amount of flavour to coffee. I had their coffee cake and it was dry and bland, would not recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuGAkuQbYCxZCoP2yxQ3_AjGDaA5RA35gALGBV&fid=0x0:0xf4222decbb1723c4"],"When":"2024-8-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Something is wrong with the patties here! They are not like the other Wendy’s locations. The patties here are thin and squished like dry smash burgers. This is not a normal Wendy’s as their patties and product quality are so much worse and different than all the Wendy’s locations I’ve been too. The burger patties were thin and dry and the buns were both dry and stale. Wendy’s headquarters needs to come do some quality control at this location as it’s the worst Wendy’s we’ve ever been too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPQTmHfGJJZFgl-xzGLUaZKpMszwNMpTFfXGLDE&fid=0x0:0x9eb3cf628fc5c45f"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"Justin Geraass","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEv6atV9LNQuY5-Mp6zg3wvWsS8o8zeLKYudSFpPx41Zyk7zY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Leaving a one star review because the JBC are made with 2 bacon strips. Unfortunately it looks as if the ones I ordered are one strip cut into two. But I I'll let others be the bacon judges.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOTthThlEnWkrovnjOGjecrTZeZXl662HNwjbkv&fid=0x0:0x9eb3cf628fc5c45f"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Tones Jyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKK4GXgTVLnajqhYm0hfamOs6EgRB-CcfZKNyrEZSlfbU3odg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"DONT GO HERE!!!! Any 5 star review is completely bogus. What a rip off. 33$ for 2 spicy chicken combos. Medium drink/large fries. Fries are half full and the price is ridiculous. And at the end they want to charge you for bags and cups too. I’ll never go back. Also fries were cold as hell.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKbnq78kP-LIB7VfyTEfbLG2ZAMt9wiBJEBrCB&fid=0x0:0x9eb3cf628fc5c45f"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"John Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAq3ml95jHUMxZNKiBUEM24tdpzJMiqP5RJmX8-A4uSjHfIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Disturbingly fast drive-thru, but the food always tastes good.

The burgers from the location on Schoolhouse Street always taste old or burnt. This location is consistently better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kobe Hum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWutJMS7AhPWfGtUn4xjFqkgxHFM8CR-5UfW8-rZsiVh6fuYSQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I barley call that 1 strip of bacon let alone 2. The other review regarding bacon is sadly correct.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfJwg2YjOk4mgAIc7i3bcKXxnW_W-C-jqowM4M&fid=0x0:0x9eb3cf628fc5c45f"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Saeid MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcewSnJcAhACCkEWKUQGjPaBy78cIOsSGEe0B0nR_ARAnMiJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered 6-Piece Crispy Chicken Nuggets, Dave's Double® with Cheese, Poutine, French Onion Cheeseburger Single Combo from this branch and foods arrived warm. [{"Name":"Lizzy M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWRiStE0ywEIVujNLBTE2DhyxAvIgDo2f4uOov-ZF7W0EKfjRF8rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For the first time in a long time, at least in Canada, my Big Mac was made perfectly! Not a messy pile of ingredients in a box like most Canadian McDonald's. The fries were fresh and perfectly crispy with the perfect salting. Staff was exceptionally friendly. High fives to all the staff at this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMa-qhkbYGuKF5EyTEW9IHIq1Zf8VchsMTvRil&fid=0x0:0xab5244876b9bf67"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Blank Face","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJd7j7QWEpZGpAgJYXa1MLH8fmDdRWNFdxt439X-8F8WcHPhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I got a wrap and the tomato was severely underripe. Like more than 70% of the tomato was green and inedible. Everything else was fine though, but they should be paying attention to what their putting on the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPROhJV_tFBz3Rt6NwDrnneeA08IgzmRto0C0Eu&fid=0x0:0xab5244876b9bf67"],"When":"2024-10-3"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Had a cheeseburger, quarter pounder with cheese, apple pie, and fries. Everything tasted standard and average. It’s an average McDonald’s in a Walmart.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMV9FhCxs01JIYOfMjuFWkvBOHWlP6fZMGCDIbt&fid=0x0:0xab5244876b9bf67"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"M Storran","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQDo4nA9i_t9Moex5kkGFtT_VMTKNEoyZ5C2OMoIsb6lcIrw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered a extra large earl gray tea. They gave me a cup of hot water and charged me 3 dollars. Confused when I showed them this dilemma of missing tea bags the cashier actually had it in them to question where i put the tea bags.. After slowing the speed of my sentences down and speaking in kindergarten. The cashier came to the conclusion TEA NEEDS TEA BAGS NOT JUST WATER!
I was so proud of the cashier for getting a manager to confirm this. After almost 10 minutes I finally got a tea bag for my warm water.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfiZoJipmb6mKHLSihw7ES2LXhthWEjqmHfRAKM3_sbdY1sPJsnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Updated review:
They have changed.  They are now serving it the way  it should.  Happy with their improvement hence upgrading my review to 4 Stars.

__________
I buy McDonald's every day for my son that has autism, it's his only food
But this mcdonald's have failed me multiple times.  Their large French fries is shrinking
Just had this too many times now,  had to share this review.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXBDRx34aYqFhIvZawp1taw8ZgmZpzB4G2jWk7&fid=0x0:0xab5244876b9bf67"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Sam V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIAegXn9Fxq_EiBDBJ41L_sZTyQZ7S5_b7m85YC1sK0rvYjWw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This must be the slowest location of McDonald’s I’ve been to!
First the cashier charged me full meal price for a combo, got it wrong again after I told her, before finally getting it right.
Then I waited and waited - another lady ahead of me went to inquire about her order before she finally got it. Eventually, my drink came but the rest of my meal didn’t. When I asked, it had apparently been deleted, but they recognized their error and pulled my meal together - it was supposed to be done in but they had it ready as a to go- I just took it as I didn’t want to wait any longer.
I start having my meal and realize they haven’t included any paper towels in the bag - so I get someone to watch my stuff so I can go get napkins. When I pointed out that no napkins had been included in my bag, I was told they don’t do that anymore unless you ask for them …..
I will obviously not be coming back to this location any more","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Arthur Cheng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWxlxYPFkvC81vA5tasND7__T2ksVDw4UlwiyGw0M_hn9habTU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Clean and light shopping floor.  Dinning area with tables, chairs, and benches provided.  Dinning floor is a bit dirty.  Employees are nice and friendly.  Serve speed is ok.  Order speed is normal.  Mobile order available at this location.  Credit cards accepted.  Located inside Walmart.  Free parking lot available.  Walmart public restrooms nearby.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbMwrcY41vDdtfCYj7G5a-w6g4UYHILwjxX4_-&fid=0x0:0xab5244876b9bf67"],"When":"2019-2-14"},{"Name":"Ryan Simpson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGdlvCvvrRhEb3iCUMcKVAEipRRnca_qW1lVmfwyquBwH7N_AeHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Staff are just following orders and i can respect that. Paying extra for a lid for my takeout order drink and paying extra for a bag for my takeout order is a new level of dystopia. Am i supposed to juggle my food out the door?","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"L’espoirducoeur","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXYOgTeV2_ww6s9tqNXmDRJczT1aljcVqEtrRtUoOfjdBo_zI_bg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This all started with an unexpected encounter. A friend recommended this restaurant, and at first, we thought it was just an ordinary Korean eatery. Little did we know that the dishes here would be so diverse and delightful. From our very first visit, we completely fell in love with this place. Over the next six months, we came back multiple times, mainly to enjoy their udon and creamy udon dishes.

Although there’s quite a distance from where I live to here, I’m more than willing to take the trip just to visit again! Wishing your business continued success, and thank you so much for providing such amazing Korean cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOi77AO_2BLOY6EeE011HSVXP_TclX9nfsLjD4-&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Ellen Tsang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzoh866OovBfVlMHdFGLQnEdLyB97Utya-3yzGLsM4EYweL6y3=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious korean food. Satisfied my tteokbokki craving! Opens till 12am midnight (11:30pm last call), so good for a late night snack 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCLfzWc6wBHfYjjBI0E250L7lLfFzfWrIKR6Km&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Daniel Yim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLQasZok9PzRbGWAPT2JykQMeRGEE-9L_G4T1fQkEB1IiM4sw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their Seafood Tofu Jiggae is a delightful blend of fresh seafood and silky tofu in a rich, flavorful broth. The Kimchi Jiggae is perfectly balanced with just the right amount of spice and tang, making it a comforting and satisfying dish. And for the Spicy Calamari – tender, perfectly cooked, and with a kick that leaves you wanting more. Highly recommend this place for anyone craving authentic Korean cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMF6zOjsQvY7QmJU3Kjcc-B3XbQkiQAFftzX1ko&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Ron Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU4C9fuu3Pgu102q3bAxHKivkiOQqwqKjJditkVdy4zIZ628gCE7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place to eat, service was great and food was delicious.  It wasn't that busy when we went in which surprised me.

Ordered the pork hock, came with lettuce wraps, kids meal with tonkatsu.  And the carbonara pasta, which was one of the best we've had.  Pasta was done perfectly and came with plenty of sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh0X3rkZVUzx9xBJp3KQgna03hKjlsXR_TsK1M&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Stella Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIiz7riC32XwfhlP5DvzuItYRp8oAjyv_k1YErclM-E0H0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our family’s favorite Korean restaurant in the entire Greater Vancouver area. It offers great taste, generous portions, and a clean, pleasant environment for dining in. HIGHLY recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLiiN-p8xtwA1-uOvZRiGTzsjpYEWyYIDmHA&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Charlene Alimot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK49oevTBzIqwreFOt7DPeIa3qXCXxyJ2zOmFgYQExA20Kp8Nm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really loved my experience at We Grill today! Overall the restaurant is very clean, the staff are polite and friendly and the food portions are so great for the price.

We ordered Beef Bulgogi w/rice, Rose pasta and Carbonara pasta. All of them tasted so so good and we left feeling so full because they have big portions. Our server was so sweet and attentive and made our visit so much better. I definitely recommend going!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3IQXhfGUCqNRd5Gj9XU17frfYRISey9KfOOQj&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Jannette Salinas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNCiCjc6eiEYYi_OI3UFBLaZFQh3EJuupDGtLhx3pepo90_Uaq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing! The food is just delicious. We ordered the Spicy BBQ chicken which was so juicy and the barbecue flavor was there with a generous portion of sauce, we algo got the Rose Udon. Just lovely and a very friendly server. Super recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnhqqqd7CS8BO_4ciVYiecn5bwi4PqDQk1q2At&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Damilola Ajiboye","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIn5vQKlTs3-hP4RePJHtoDmc3aXrf7dj3dhn4eifq39b6ysA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"All our dishes we really yummy. We had to order one more plate of the grilled chicken. My picky eater kid ate a lot here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxcTz4Ydp_ESb0KBby1NLzAjrj8ubDthYCCXe3&fid=0x0:0x32c61bd38a609209"],"When":"2024-12-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"S D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKJYsqsfylRWb2qB-xJh6bN2jntU-d5BqDo5FMP29y23P0aTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing Dinner at Rumi’s Kebab & Grill

We had dinner at Rumi’s Kebab & Grill, and it was a great experience, from the moment we stepped inside, we were welcomed by a cozy, inviting atmosphere.

Very clean and well maintained restaurant.

They have a great selection of different cuisines Afghan, Persian and Turkish.
Every dish was packed with flavor and beautifully presented, you could tell the chefs put a lot of care into each plate.

You cannot visit this place and not try the Kabuli Tikka!! Trust me you will love it!!!

All in all, our dinner at Rumi’s Kebab & Grill was a great experience. The food was delicious and service was outstanding. If you’re looking for a place with amazing food and even better service, Rumi’s Kebab & Grill should definitely be on your list.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYSNqSGcJpWEmIcdvajCh8IhBfodu1m6iFGQWi&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Disha Rana","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9RvTMXeP3KqSHfnATMTo2ic7srx022rxbo_TaCIeCacEG1IXQ0A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely loved the flavours and atmosphere of the place.
The food was delicious, with perfect seasoning,  the flavours are spot on! You can tell the ingredients are of high quality, and the portions were generous.
The ambiance of the restaurant was warm and inviting. Yousef was incredibly friendly and attentive, ensuring our meal was enjoyable.

If you're a fan of authentic flavors and excellent service, Rumis Kebab and Grill is a must-try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOU3DB2Kw0nheOR6wdaTr91ItSr_zrUtGJ_Igvp&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Albina Smishchenko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKW-1yczTyBCGKI9JUS936Gi4bmhbmRzZRmqdOT0R09GfFUtA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere is very cozy, with an authentic oriental interior that immediately takes you to Turkey. The service is at a high level - the staff is friendly, attentive and ready to help with choosing a dish.

The food is simply amazing! I especially liked the kebab - juicy, with perfectly selected spices.

I recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants to try real Turkish cuisine. I will definitely come back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjPss8kI6WsxXlGtdh-jDA5xPbLPaZOrp5VufE&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Shah Babur Rais","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfpy04fX8eU1SWBi1gGmmSfUYeKEsc_ozYdpzlC0WdiYmJpUog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food with great decor and atmosphere. It is truly an authentic afghan cuisine with a variety of dishes representing real afghan taste. Thank you for a great service and delicious food after a long day of work. I will definitely come here more often and would recommend it to anyone.

The food is so delicious and authentic that I had to eat the whole plate. I took a picture of my empty plate to show this for future foodies.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsnQmhI5j6qjfCM1v8yPIX_zHVO5WF1E4NJXEa&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Lise-Anne Bielak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlwZNw8zHw4_84s-ID1xXFCYqDrDxmOWGXXNg_SYvcZVngBLK-=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came twice for the brunch and each time was absolutely delicious. The mantu dumplings are super flavourful and would come back just for those. And the sujuk (Turkish sausage) would recommend you get extra!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKM56V12-IAMTjdPp9ltCGAyMCB8f4WLyAkP9v&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Narges Amirian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM8zUxZ7t3xIXkqdR20aB3Re58yZTb9VHoU9Nv2RpaF6upqSc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently dined at this resturant, and the food was outstanding! Every dish was not only fresh but also packed with delicious flavors that truly showcased the best of Afghan cuisine. Each bite was a delight, from the aromatic spices to the perfectly cooked ingredients. The welcoming atmosphere and friendly staff only added to the experience. If you're in the area, don’t miss out on this gem for an authentic and tasty Afghan meal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwTDXTB4UDbrOm9mn4kt_y1NYTgnnzFVwyK0-o&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Tomis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5jFOkJ247NYbh_k4LmxmH66JB0yPwuwyoCPAVh9_W6x-N0Tk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Showed up at 5pm. Place empty. Ordered mixed kebab. Very good. Pulao rice definitely worth the extra charge. Talked myself into the baklava as well as Turkish tea. Definitely going back to try more dishes. Atmosphere only 3 stars as they were playing Christmas music and pop, would have been nice to hear real Turkish folk music.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQvvjlEJRFLo7L-lbGjUvCaEEbOJbJeAajMAmZ&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-11-28"},{"Name":"Свят Мысив","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX93F7wrB6Dc0ihsqMdg_UZCsT49nCSpKfsLxLjyzUVquEapYQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was nice to visit this restaurant. Unlike other Canadian establishments, it is clean! This is good. The waiters are always attentive and ask if everything is okay with you. The food is not too spicy and very appetizing. I ordered lamb shashlik - it was great! Thank you for a pleasant time spent in this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeIU05X14Ie38BFyWhufcdQpqU5xnff4qd-n8T&fid=0x0:0xb645b5df0f288bfe"],"When":"2024-11-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Coniah Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRF6exFWLtpR3e9xDEQIA8baJa13bfBk5CzdOsGQJX1lxG9B8F=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A hidden surprise gem!
Came in without any expectations but very pleasantly impressed with the interior.  The food was amazing!  Everything was in balanced.  Truffle Risotto was well cooked with hint of balsamic flavoured mushrooms.  Benedict was creamy and soft.  Seafood linguine was tastefully fusiony spicy.
And the cruffles… what a fine and delicious to finish off a meal.  And yes… all the special coffees were good!

Will definitely recommend this place to anyone.

The restaurant is also family friendly- they have special kids menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzA5sKIVZBj7hdzzdx0dAJrQ6A9GlxkEbKK7DC&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Stephie N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd0_eqzaDNFpYKxu_At0QKV_opW1IXDZ3BtSf_D5LFw7-X91jS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m genuinely surprised this fantastic place isn’t packed with people. It feels like sitting at a bistro in Paris, with its beautiful patio and ample space. Unlike other popular brunch spots nearby, you don’t have to overhear conversations from the next table, thanks to the generous spacing between tables. The food was delicious, but I wish the coffee were stronger—it was a bit too weak for my taste. Even the restrooms are stylish! I’ll definitely be visiting again in the near future.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIPt9HrlVESQ7NWmlger11SRLVUmi3PzCBp7V8&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Dahee Sim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUX9xskvqrMlPhfaEjei8fHc2AKp7yd0SfCkRSHV-khbg0nQPk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A gorgeous mid-century-style interior and great food. Honestly, I was surprised to find a brunch spot like this in Coquitlam. It’s not too busy. I enjoyed my meal without rushing. Highly recommended for a date spot. I would love to come back and recommend this place to anyone I know.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMe76FYiQnvzBF7kVx5mnkesf4oadu4dy_tlnyD&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Jenna A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGeR4hbJbNaJlqcXNAxQUrp3QHCCXfRtmHBdhtRlvTl_6ydw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've visited this restaurant several times and have enjoyed the wonderful ambiance, particularly the patio with its beautiful views. The food is delicious and well-portioned. However, the service quality varies. While most of the staff are courteous, one server was not very friendly and handled things carelessly. With more consistent service, this place could be exceptional.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6B3d3ldgXF0MjORrSBlg1esfRXZTZl94EWzI4&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dine-in again in August, new menu. Taste is good as usual. Still like it.

Dine-in twice within one week. Very interesting menu. Love their vibes. Service is a bit on the slow side but perfect for me to make up my mind on those interesting dishes. Every dish is a feast for the senses, combining color, aroma, and flavor perfectly. Will definitely return for more. 😋😋😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx9tx4IxpQSmwOcmLv8ddhuFNkeLJXAmiPW7VI&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Courtney Pittman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImDRdaEZ1vUaDf3DGIejVTXETr6R1b9106tf3qLHJFMRHijw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It has a nice atmosphere, and is very spacious inside and has outdoor seating with a beautiful view! I went there with 5 adults and 2 kids under 3, it was accommodating for our kids and they have a kids menu and a high chair. I ordered the tomato seafood pasta, it was delicious! And my husband ordered the salmon eggs Benedict, also very yummy! I especially liked the spices they used! The staff was also kind and very quick to help! For example, my child spilled his water, and they cleaned it up for us right away!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNgjAY09m6k9cxVOG4Az0WqGpq2fFEdBw-FJImn&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"A Miraji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVKbtSn1-d3iEkTDQas0xH_xCGg1PKv8z1hKaZIhPkrsgM_kICp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Loved this place, food was very well prepared and served. The staff were nice, polite and helpful. The place itself is nicely decorated and a appropriate selection of music tracks was playing which made the experience even better. Totally recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrQC1fF5b3mfJw-XcDL01DLAj6uIxwwrpmTln6&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Ruby E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTXhvN-EpNac4Qr_mgdf5IDJLY8uKSuinXxuVkhfUtlVyIdrlu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you love bennies, this is your spot!  Spacious with lots of seating and good variety of menu items so there’s something for everyone, including vegetarian & gluten-free options.  Even though brunch is served all day, some other items aren't available until after 5pm.
The coffee was disappointing. Their $4 coffee was in a cup that held less than 6 oz. The flat white was served in a glass without a handle?! & way too creamy (more like a latte).
The "Sunset mimosa" ($12) we ordered was delicious but we suspect we were served their zero proof mocktail instead the "Sunrise Mimosa" (for the same price) as there was a canned cherry on the bottom. The Espresso martini ($14) was too sweet & creamy, opt for the Carajillo instead if you want more coffee flavor.
Overall, we prefer Pur & Simple for brunch & beverages.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMIRn2r-vEtR6XvTYqjnnBoMAcr3moEk50xhb05&fid=0x0:0x8242b04469c5d5af"],"When":"2024-11-3"}]
