user_reviews: [{"Name":"Grace咩兔","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUI-W3qvPZ_dtCTql0SnUuneRjFkFMOchDSb5QHe8nHoDZIlBQC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t know if the owner change or what, was first suspecting that the portion changed, second later we realized that all their ramen were now frozen ramen and they just took the frozen ramen, reheat it, and serve it for $15 per bowl minimum. The garlic is turning bitter because of the frozen process, the soup is plain, noodles are reheated soft and broken. What’s the point of spending this much money for frozen ramen? Owner claims the ramen were fresh and we asked the lady after we seen frozen ramen being brought in to make, AND WE ASKED THE LADY SERVER, SHE SAID YES WE DO MAKE RAMENS FRON FROZEN ONES. So I don’t know what you are trying to prove, or if workers are just being lazy and not doing their jobs. Been eating for more than 2 years here this is really the first time I am mad like this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNiZOM2h0Hxnq4GAC7K0LrqJH1cyU6vdwwS93RW\u0026fid=0x0:0xe188065d1d0f3cb2"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shoyu Black Ramen with Karaage chicken combo: I gotta say: I love the broth in this ramen. It’s very tasty and satisfying to the taste. All the ingredients seem to balance well. The karaage was tender and juicy as well. Thank you Ramen Bella!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxX7f748Uh3Q_-qeVkqXxmVyVYAPaap9WSEVTK\u0026fid=0x0:0xe188065d1d0f3cb2"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Jimmie Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXR6wUm0lgZgvSi7C1j6GOl0shdaQgFTP7c5sE96BI6AUiQT_P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their noodle is very tasty. Staff are extremely friendly. Worth visiting. Hidden in the corner in the complex next to Michaels.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNliihQrW0sDyjc1RnuuvawI_4G870jkcyk5iKR\u0026fid=0x0:0xe188065d1d0f3cb2"],"When":"2024-12-16"},{"Name":"Shaun Lemmer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV2rbAnnMeXk7ZalSFPMvdpl0da2SCWMRkh6Mcf-GzObuSjpmu0eg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was driving through the area, googled “Ramen near me” and this spot came up as closest. Love it! If you love. Good bowl of Ramen then definitely check this spot out. It’s a hole in the wall but adds to the charm. The Black Garlic Ramen (one of their house specials) is awesome and so was the Gyoza. Will be back","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aron Conger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhfb2ZZh-zxwmBatAurkeLBa0GqznwdaFknY8BuLE-n98DNvE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Double Pork Ramen + spicy tofu + Veg bowl. We loved our noodles and the tofu dish immensely. We will definitely visit again!\n\nThe place was very hidden in the corner of this complex so I never knew it was there until I decided to go for a walk around the complex. Hidden gem worth visiting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOQ8M87Chy7Jpyl3ge9isPptoHkmUxqSKJIzIa\u0026fid=0x0:0xe188065d1d0f3cb2"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"SorrelCritter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJevXn8zwl51aYOqoNQe3SpLC5RangJ4KHJn7sVXt95mTUs5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Really not good. The chicken was really oily, and all I got was a mouth full of oil every place that I’ve bit into. The broth was really bland the noodles had no flavour whatsoever. They basically put a lot of garlic in it to overpower the flavour and that’s all I tasted. The broth was honestly like milky looking water. I am sorry but I won’t be back there. I could’ve bought a package of Ichiban and made better noodles at home.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeffrey","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWvyNznqn8FRtxedDT9r80F6RrLYbSNLldZqgQnZdP9scFDeWG8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ramen portion and pricing were good. We ordered the spicy miso and black shouyu. Black shouyu was sweeter than expected while the spicy miso was saltier than spicy. Overall, the food was decent","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFUKxj-jm-Ri1ofIG5d7YjIUzzc5g-G3vNRT-i\u0026fid=0x0:0xe188065d1d0f3cb2"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Rona Rezo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZzluRsycMYAlJRF5Az8cYEY_Kqelb6XG2XMBxs-wKm7bQ5frv=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered through UBER. We had 2 kinds of chicken karage. Both are pretty bland. Gyoza is the same as well. And the dipping sauce that came with it seems like it's a used oil from their deep fryer. It was very gross tasting. The Ramen is okay, as I understand it is best enjoyed in the restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8F88Cl-QEvxLS6RdCIC1ozI4OGJa7Sw1CI37B\u0026fid=0x0:0xe188065d1d0f3cb2"],"When":"2024-6-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Connie Robson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVcD3CpjQ2KIT9ukXOt3q6p8B8SMkttAVRJsUo328I8e2x3t4I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I ordered the apple cinnamon French toast but there was not a single piece of apple on it. My friend ordered the same thing and again, no apple. It was still very good but I don’t know if the missing apple was an oversight or if it doesn’t come with it then the description is misleading.

Overall I liked the restaurant - very lively and popular and will come back to try some of the other menu options.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-O4q7PCGAe_Q_exHXbh66W5xF0fvIy5DjDcX0&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"BABAK TORABI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXte01Tl3Efa_m0ADFo96Kz1F79A0-Ap8jSjGIMNFygHZjHQcocIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently visited this restaurant again and noticed that the portions of some dishes are quite large for one person. This time, we decided to share, which worked out perfectly.

The food tastes great, the quality is excellent, and the staff is incredibly friendly. The environment is clean, modern, and welcoming. One of the highlights is the open kitchen, which lets you see the chefs at work—always a nice touch.

The only downside is the noise level. The sound seems to reflect a lot, likely due to the ceramic flooring, which is easy to clean but amplifies noise. The ceiling also doesn’t seem to have much for sound absorption.

It was a bit crowded on a Saturday morning, but that’s to be expected for such a popular spot. Overall, a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN5kNNNIObhREuuSscKObbYbvBBCdaYd8SvrHjg&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Annie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJAG4UtHNdn-C74S5I053c9lMdRMdh_AH35u090AgjHoFmF2GSW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So happy to finally have brunch and it did not disappoint!  The location is easy to find and lots of free parking. The atmosphere is easy and friendly and the food and service were excellent. Can’t wait to come back.

Returned with my family and it was even better. Our server Gurleen was an absolute delight while she managed a busy restaurant full of guests. Today was savory and it was amazing. The boys shared the big 3 and it was more than enough. Can’t wait to come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiCPG4ng_rPed3P8NoMqKZwG2zyzEYpkFnrOYt&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-7-12"},{"Name":"Craig’s Food and Fun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUha2Q8WiUjbezKLoCbc8g-ZcFkFuHpjx0PE6RArmNeLmTAwJN4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was amazing! And the staff was very friendly and professional, definitely coming back! We had the fried chicken eggs Benny and the fried chicken sandwich. The potatoes and fries were tasty and seasoned and the chicken crispy. The eggs were farm fresh and the hollandaise sauce was excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPx6ygBpCV1nh9QvLFAAD3WtpH8Ta9carJ7YKDn&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Nick Wang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK9cUtJY153nRWD4hzNcIo_gDDe44hWUa0zRGkneCYmPYO49A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for family!  We came here on a Sunday morning for their Kids Eat Free Special.   Between 7~9am, for every $25 order of an adult meal, you get a kid’s meal for free.  We ordered a Canadian breakfast and Pesto Philly steak, both tasted amazing.  Usually when you order a kid’s meal from restaurants, it’s small portion and not very appealing.  But the free kids’ meal at Pur and Simple, were full size crepes and waffles, filled with banana, chocolate chips, and strawberries.  I also really like the country style decor that they have.  Great vibe, great value and great food!  Definitely worth your visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2uPEhDiPYzzlUmh-jAKSk098DjZpOsiek7DqQ&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Sia Ghaem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEMQ83Io5sE_IiypwGW5tpjSnD5RcP1dPzKLkdTOi-SisSW8bCuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We have been to Pur and Simple a few times and it has been a satisfactory experience every time. They are border line Good/great time restaurant. Not great to blow you away, but good enough to draw you back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1cabewFzUoYl0Ck3t7YQ0X5raQ_yGu8-dips2&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5pgqDcV4jXxCDs44gFpKqBE7-kpDe9pqH0qySpykt9h70rZWn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"During a recent visit to Pür & Simple in Port Coquitlam, my girlfriend and I enjoyed a delightful breakfast experience. The restaurant’s bright and modern ambiance created a welcoming atmosphere, complemented by attentive and friendly staff.

I opted for the Coconut French Toast, which featured thick slices of brioche infused with a subtle coconut flavor, topped with fresh fruits and a light dusting of powdered sugar. The combination of textures and flavors was both satisfying and indulgent.

My girlfriend chose the Gourmet Breakfast, a hearty platter that included perfectly cooked eggs, crispy bacon, savory sausage, and a side of their renowned P&S potatoes. Each component was prepared with care, resulting in a balanced and flavorful meal.

The service was exceptional; our server was attentive without being intrusive, ensuring our coffee cups were always filled and promptly addressing any requests. The menu offered a diverse selection of breakfast and brunch options, catering to various tastes and dietary preferences.

Overall, our experience at Pür & Simple was outstanding. The combination of delicious food, excellent service, and a pleasant atmosphere makes it a top choice for breakfast in Port Coquitlam. We look forward to returning and exploring more of their menu offerings.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLLZ6a2rGBYbAJu6qxbOFMZlUqdNznKM-GgC9i&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Nazanin Tehrani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLNvnOcnvQZmQRfgcZ1xIfiff0XhYrv3BK46Bu6rg2GKUDhBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an excellent breakfast experience at Pur & Simple. The atmosphere was welcoming, and the food was just what I needed to start the day right. The menu offered a great variety of options, and everything I ordered was fresh, delicious, and beautifully presented.

A special shoutout to our host, Dyson, who provided outstanding service. He was attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed throughout our meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtjwERVXfcA2zNYNfAsBJWo_5Pds5RsfhS84G2&fid=0x0:0x23a839fa4c1f06bf"],"When":"2024-8-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"JP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX90NeQebsEGfp9rJe7B7QdUfdncEkOmwFrEw8C0EIB0z7Jl9-uUg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is a must-try Korean-style Chinese restaurant. The food is incredibly tasty, and the broth of the jjambbong is clean and refreshing. Both the sweet and sour pork and the spicy garlic fried chicken were perfectly crispy, with delicious sauces that made the meal very satisfying. Plus, the prices are very reasonable.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"HYEWON LEE","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocImw2BV3gpBbuKJRFJyndnOLdUx52roq9Q8ll4TquJg0hNwng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome foods and nice service. Most favourite is spicy seafood noodle, which has a lot of seafood and perfect spiciness. When my parents don't have appetite, we place orders of deep fried spicy chicken and seafood scorched rice soup. The rice soup is very soft and delicate and spicy chicken has a perfect balance of crispy outside and tender inside. I highly recommend this restaurant for family dine-in.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP61jdct5gPQytDMdHPfQhPfCjuShmJpan19VB_&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2021-3-24"},{"Name":"Francis Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgfmbUHLwmxF3ATfQGv1RD5eZck6TDnyYt1IZAHB6YDFw4kfEYkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is great. This has become our regular place to get Korean food. The location is also clean and a good place to eat with 4-5 people. The seats are in booths so you will need to separate if you have a larger group.

Their khanpuggi (Korean fried chicken with sweet sauce) is my favourite and probably the best I’ve eaten so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMfITN5SV912JFu-VXkNc8gJs4lMk8JJ0OwZRg&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2022-10-30"},{"Name":"Joe Ong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWY0QkKOvXmXArCRzRQc2K62z7cyKngNEnzP-kHw0mhUaDX-VbO=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We drove by this place countless times. We new that Ruran was a new Chinese Style Korean restaurants. As the building is an old building, we noticed an old building smell immediately. There were not many people dining at this time. I'm guessing daytime business is much busier.

We quickly ordered a combo. It came with sweet and sour pork, black bean noodles and a spicy seafood noodle. The sweet and sour pork came first and I must say that it was crispy, juicy and flavorful. We had the sauce on the side so we dipped instead of drenched.

Black bean noodles and spicy seafood soup noodles were good. Very good price for Combo A. Great value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZjlZWy42PlZ5TiA0W8JhaAz6YORSYU1HZj-ph&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2019-9-14"},{"Name":"Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrftba3fmWixW5Rg8SO3N0tTHgu3sUj3by9VHuwz4x8TXWATfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So my Korean friends recommend us this place so many times and very first time visit here on Saturday:) This place is spacious and quiet 😊 in small old town this is a gem!!
What we order as my husband loves fried rice ordered it and I got spicy sweet pork . We both were super happy!!!! They brought us our childhood!! Will definitely come back again!!!😎❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrOmrWMCwLYkwpyhT8a2We0vdwOB1Y6tR7v_Ho&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2022-7-3"},{"Name":"Jamie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIU1OPkdAYZ2-cX58b7PHdKmE9L8kdrxNfX8MisT-pu7cl-1mE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best Korean Chinese restaurants in Vancouver. Ordered combo-A for three people and it was more than enough. Tang-su-yuk was freshly made and perfect chewiness. Jjajangmyun and jjambong were the best!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPN0MYvkJ0YFEmHXPeWoi1fhP-6BHy4T62zMPud&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Kristine Salva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL7O2uIYZr4PZGpRXNs61iZ8-knWMylsARmkmvYkxWZVPz5Hg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I usually come back here to buy the chicken and fried rice. The taste is inconsistent sometimes its delicious and sometimes no taste. I was looking forward to buy take out today. What i got, chicken is soggy and the fried rice is good but no coleslaw missing in my order. Food has no taste or i might ordered the wrong choice. I put the chicken in air fryer hoping it will be crunchy but doesn't. No more take out for me its not worth $48.  May be dine in is worth it than take out and order the right food i may like. I might not come back here. Im so disappointed today.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0I7gAa7mtytOTFc0NXovFxChtADI30efeVIha&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2023-9-29"},{"Name":"v l","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdZvJxBhGRMKAh6ZoV-1pNG0RsqEMX0Q7xeTmMWZiQ1-rLiRu7Rg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Not vegetarian friendly: just edamame and noodles with black bean sauce. The noodles were pretty good, though; a lot of onions!!
Other dishes were pretty good, Chinese Korean style. Dominant flavours: onion, spicy mustard (😋), black bean, rather than the usual Korean gochujang, kimchi tastes.

Large portions, shareable - for family-style dining.  Yellow pickled daikon and onions with black bean sauce for banchan.  Overall food was good.  Would like to go back to try other items on menu available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYpnJXFyhZVxgyf0eMqNRlJIooulpbKe0ox4zo&fid=0x0:0x76c34e41dc3dd317"],"When":"2020-7-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"james corbett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXORPNpjn99AmypwXC5L8gqaCK1buk43veXhtLSzHUK1ZItjmE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere here is nothing special and does not need to be with the food they serve. This is some of the best food I have had since being in LA. I go to LA to see my Korean adopted fam and they take me for food I could not get in Vancouver. The chilled noodles brought me back the first time I tried. Kimchi pancake was crispy with a nice soft inside. I ordered way too much as the portions were large. We all enjoyed the meal and I have thanked the friend that suggested it multiple times for taking us here. Now I need to go again and just order less food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjnrBc83bnjesqd7a_A31XBSajmsoWJxCMyDlv&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2024-11-26"},{"Name":"Ess November","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuPJ8X9jOZ2CtOO2jCad-r9UmiPcylLXs6WZsf1PzrAZBsBSHw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for authentic Korean soup and fresh ingredients, this is the place. I’ve been here 3 times so far and it just gets better. Authentic handmade mandu (steamed dumplings) and fall off the bone pork back bone soup with a deep flavourful broth- this soup is what Tongileo is known for so I highly recommend it - you’ll be hooked! The side dishes are fantastic as well…very fresh. Overall 5 stars and highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOew8gNH7gPRqP4Av9gCLhX8FzNkktx42Rwhml&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2024-2-20"},{"Name":"Beatrice Gandu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-m69YxvoaMOoMimuj6-sA4-k4eYqu5MNiPHLVrevqzu-K2Gac=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I love our time there, and it was our first time there. We got want we were craving for and were satisfied. We'll be going back soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNb3TZRpKTHP5Y6aPV3mC_goLkNKC9KgXaB5Sdl&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Peter L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJSG7FnL9eakxXRPAc9ls0ptr2FhkmSk4cro_gsE76Wu7JPcW0z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had the bibimbap with beef, and the portion was on the small side. Besides a lot of large chunks of green onion and slices of onion, there were barely any vegetables.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipML6J-vTHvaqQ_JNrjMylk-3LVy9s6HAKBVAG8T&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2024-11-1"},{"Name":"Yael","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK2CedmibCs3GgALTk7vZt6eeRKcGkvp_k4R782jS2YY2IhPA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"backbone soup is great and meaty! Squid bibimbap is sweet and spicy, my classmates think it is average, I prefer this taste. No more spicy kimchi soup, replaced with kimchi tofu soup, which is delicious. Free to give us three small dishes, sweet potatoes, seaweed is sour and sweet taste, delicious. If you happen to be in the area, you can come and try it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOf6we7xCuCK8euUNqwVxrvr5JmtA4jcG1ensk2&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2023-7-23"},{"Name":"Eagleridge He","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVyk6k_xeBUj_1KDLC2dilz6BOL-9JcNSoxnyXWuMM0QdJPvjOF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is always our family's favorite restaurant in Tri-city area. Whenever I want to skip cooking at home, we'd like to come here. For years, we stick with the same orders.: Pork bone soup, bulgogi in hot stone bowl and pork cutlet.
I noticed their prices have been keeping on going up, but still the most reasonable in our area. I like their sides too, which have been cut from 5  dishes down to 4, now 3. But still no complains since they were generous before and always gave refills if we asked for. Recently we started to like their bibimbap.
Their cooking is good and food is tasty and homey especially in the cold winter, very filling and satisfying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNFIZ_N0rsUyopk6JEQk92YOL6_V0b6MNsdlq8&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2021-11-9"},{"Name":"Kat","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW9KU6JHMNV2dJVHVeBb2rvEzltNXWG-yaPrGGgPwOBW0ejMgGu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very delicious and well priced! Service was quick when we were there, we came before it got too busy (around 4pm) but soon after we got there people started rolling in. Obvious favourite in the community and I understand why. I got the tofu seafood soup and my bf got the dumpling kal gooksu. Was very good and the portions were generous.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNwF1mvva63r1fhCJLj6PNVklaEZ4rOa0yaxXW&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2023-1-8"},{"Name":"yumi chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTtW8e1Rmf0_77OCHIl7oqCn3pXLHhqJBUZVfdHrPrImawFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently dined at this restaurant with a pregnant friend, and the experience was beyond disappointing. To start, we were served spoiled squid, which is completely unacceptable, especially for someone who is pregnant.

After we told the server, they offered a discount as a form of compensation. However, when they got wind of our intention to report this incident to the health department, they shamefully retracted the discount. They said they are being generous and take our intention to report as a threat. Also, they emphasize that we have to be responsible for what we order, but we didn’t expect to get the spoiled food. To make matters worse, they even summoned the police to coerce us into paying the full amount. And they take away the dishes but never serve us a new one, so basically we paid full price for nothing.

This level of disregard for both customer well-being and basic ethics is inexcusable. It's disheartening to see such a blatant lack of responsibility and accountability from the management. I strongly advise anyone, especially those who are pregnant or have health concerns, to steer clear of this establishment.

The blatant disregard for food safety and the mistreatment of patrons is simply unacceptable. I have already reported this incident to the local health department, and I hope they take the necessary steps to rectify this situation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzXIc3umbyprD0wTKFcJVYCpFTVPYTWpqe5jaT&fid=0x0:0x5fe33e293525f560"],"When":"2023-10-4"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very popular local breakfast and brunch spot. Be ready for a wait, but it's worth it if you're looking for generous portions and sweet rewards.

We ordered a few dishes to try:

Apples and Cinnamon were exactly that. Sweet and delicious with just enough tartness.

The Mexicasa Omelet was savoury and spicy. Wonderfully satisfying, and a huge portion.

We had a hard time deciding between The King Kong and Bowser. But the toasted coconut won, and we went with Bowser. Believe it or not, it wasn't too sweet. The flavour and texture of the pancake helped to balance the dish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtawtl5BET-xx7jUpEtFONFxkBUI9Bfsvlqihi&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-10-15"},{"Name":"Juan José Salaya","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1Ln__1lVc-JSwJxu3Sudj7VGGpDHTTaI6ATzhk7kkdUk_WRTN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amazing service from Shauna, fast en friendly.
I had the chocolate waffle, insane! And huge portions.
But the savory pancake not the best, hipster hash. The pancake was good but the side of hash and vegetables were not very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmaviqW2sU_R_MfMRdvFHaU01XhNLfVwSVCcOH&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Mar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWTdC3Cu0qquRYQVKhOdWcOmJsma73tOEyPAbRghfK5B9Xyfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Quiet and cozy place on weekdays. My favorite dish of all time is Veggie I Love You, which comes with a pancake. The veggies are always fresh and neatly sliced. The only drawback is the high price","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoiGISJgSmJLSHz_XDKv3UeFGIR2oQ23GqinXJ&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-10-9"},{"Name":"Jeff Downer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXl3HQ-1C4N-_a7ykvhIi5aM883AB-cDQVYb1xeenCY7zekayvZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I had high hopes for this place. The hash just didn’t deliver. Pretty average Sysco quality potato hash with premade tasting hollandaise that resembled cheese. One slice and a half of avocado : ( I just wish it tasted more homemade and less store-bought. The pancake was good! Sweet and caramelized. Not worth the price of the dish (Hipster Hash)
My partner’s chocolate banana waffles were a hit though. Very good and nice portion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtalSDrAz-3j5GtPKct2PF6onzeKeFu4j88AIk&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"danakhatib","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkw_MS-bFFQL-DqU_kCatDuVYGKImx-f2Z5AnYQHBCy9-uZ6_t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service was fantastic! They split our foods onto seperate plates (without us asking) because we wanted to share some dishes, which was very kind! Food was great, we got the chocolate waffle, which was delicious and the smoked salmon benny. I’ve had better hollandaise sauce but overall everything was awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcXsNe5b-w07YgnnqAfyFuObJiLP2t5VicwA1B&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Kiah Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTVXBfiLNTJ8gFd9zcQjhLGEsYxsifqJuzzyh3SEwJwRrMplme=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for incredible food and an amazing atmosphere, The Big Flat Pancake is the place to be! The quality of the food is absolutely top-notch — everything is fresh, flavorful, and made with care. The pancakes are delicious, and the portions are generous!

What really sets this place apart, though, is the staff. They’re full of positive energy and always make you feel like part of the family. We shared lots of laughs, and their warm hospitality truly gave us a fantastic start to our Saturday!

I love supporting local, family-owned businesses, and The Big Flat Pancake is exactly the kind of place that deserves your attention. I highly recommend giving it a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMy6zOwu4HHfJ_gTbG6krgQtrhQd5D-xVfx0wsj&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-11-9"},{"Name":"Davina Johnsen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOWfxjdUo4u1LYvAiA8xMOSJlaFjaSMXKmyFbVlITAYWYoqbeaXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our second day in a row here because it was sooo delicious yesterday. I liked our server from yesterday better (purple haired girl- I think her name was Tasha?) she was great. The food here is out of this world. It’s a cozy little hipster place, great music. Clean washrooms. If you show up and there is a line up, please stay, because I promise it’s worth the wait!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNk5YdsWzVNzwwA_kkRWs6GwvBXaSg7LV_7oKIg&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2023-10-21"},{"Name":"Adam M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBezQ5u52QUPfNCS-XISW7oETfNlf5RvdoikJTFUzauPV7HEINiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big Flat Pancake has been one of our favorite restaurants since the day they opened. Whether with my family or just the two of us, we’ve enjoyed countless breakfasts here, including many Mother’s Day and Father’s Day celebrations. The restaurant's modern design and simplicity create an upscale breakfast experience, even though it maintains a casual and welcoming vibe.

Seating is limited, and I still recall waiting outside with social distancing protocols in place during the early post-COVID days. Last week, we visited again, and as always, I ordered my favorite: chicken waffles with whipped cream and strawberry topping on the side. My wife, on the other hand, loves trying something different every time we visit. The food arrived quickly, and as usual, it was very tasty.

However, (our visit on Nov 30th)  I do want to share one piece of feedback from this visit. My wife and I were enjoying our coffee after finishing our meal when the server brought the check—completely understandable, especially when tables need to turn over for waiting guests. But this time, there were four empty tables, and no one was waiting. Moments later, while we were still sipping our coffee, the server returned with the cordless payment unit and stood by our table. We were both caught off guard, thinking, “What…?” We paid because the payment unit was already there, and the server was waiting, but the interaction felt rushed.

Having owned a restaurant in downtown Vancouver, I understand the need to turn tables efficiently. That said, there’s an unspoken etiquette between servers and guests, and this instance felt a bit abrupt—particularly since the restaurant wasn’t busy.  It’s a small issue, and I’m sure it wasn’t intentional, but I wanted to share this experience in the hopes it’s not repeated for other guests.

Of course, we will continue visiting Big Flat Pancake because we love the food, atmosphere, and overall experience. This is just some constructive feedback for management or ownership to consider.

Thank you, and see you again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3DgZTp8jMRgeo2EOBKceMPW-1SSt0lYSYOwaO&fid=0x0:0xaaebff47a4a99ef2"],"When":"2024-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Avis Woo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh4Pb-SJt2DTMUggN2-tIRxEo8pAErRU5SI_TxM4gC-gvdVBym=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for family brunch and dinner! Dishes all come in n big portion! Coffee refilled unlimited times! Tables and environment is hygienic and seating quite spacious and comfortable even for senior citizen with backache like me. Toilet is clean! Waiter and waitress crew are all very nice and professional too! Love this restaurant very much❤️❤️❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPza0ew2GjCDcnw3yaVoLhK8iMmk0FFxjlS2rw5&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Kai-Chun Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUjTiDNcTKlmyRrDWdGPFt530dlO3QJbviz_GUObBc3bQ0rNmRp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is one of my favorite restaurants in Coquitlam as it's a place where I'm guaranteed to have a good time.

Food - the food isn't the most amazing thing I've ever tasted, BUT every single one that I've tried was at least good or better. There's basically no bad choice in the menu.
Service/atmosphere - the seats are spacious and comfortable, the waitresses are always friendly (even more so to kids!), we never had to wait too long for our food... it's just a great experience all around.
Price - with the above points, it would've already been one of my restaurants of choice, but then they went ahead and kept the price reasonable and that just seals the deal for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN90L9zlD4vK0EDnXwB3NnlbNYPDfIUE5NcHqHh&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Omid Dadgari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWXY5oTTgmTf1M1XQYNbrrLX-SdVGDzUB3Iw3aDSyAgQLf2_BwYgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I visited Coquitlam Grill for breakfast today and ordered Steak and eggs. The overall quality of the ingredients was very good. However, I ordered my steak medium, but it arrived well-done. Despite this, the quality was still good. The quantity of the food was very generous, offering great value for the price. It made me full, even though I hadn't eaten dinner or supper yesterday. The servers were attentive and friendly. The atmosphere was typical of a North American restaurant and quite enjoyable. Overall, a decent experience with room for improvement on the steak preparation."","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT61QeH3ufJtT_GqPt1Sg0rufpTlP24BeUhlEu&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Julie B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4pd43YT5KSqkORSPaVbra7_KcodZ1kkwID5yaolZD_WuCOEiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing restaurant. We went just after noon on a Sunday only waited a few minutes and were seated. The place was packed. Everyone thoroughly enjoyed their meals and beverages.
Food was Ultimate Omelet
Mexican Pulled Pork Hash
Tex Mex Omelet
Eggs Haida Benny
Drinks were margarita, mimosas and a Ceasar.
The service was fantastic and Susan was amazing.
Everyone raved about their dishes and everyone cleaned their plated and both styles of harsh browns by far were the best we have ever had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNatRTF11J76msxdL31ksun0mlD6h6LFwhaBmNW&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-7-30"},{"Name":"Thomas Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUITuDRjw9J9Us45xAUXKSfp8lG2sJ2s04TW_lNAi_G6a5d62ur=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Just came here for a dinner. Thought it was good overall. Satisfactory but not amazing. I had the steak and it was cooked nicely. I wouldn’t rush back because the value isn’t very good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJH7QVel_maomATRS9LUNPh_6vm10Rj-xcyjR2&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Rakin Hassan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXandqMb5qdp3U7pCkKHH5i5AInuGc7KeC3c0mJR9W6MOUUvQAlEw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Don't order the turkey dinner if you like flavor. Its all just a big mush. If there was a physical representation of the emission "sadness" this would be it.

Ps had a taste of my friends burger and it was one of the best ive had. So Im sure their other items on the menu must be good, just not the turkey dinner.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqodY3fX-WlUgRDwc2Piqi1n1ENVZQ-jAmw5hR&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Gaelen Norman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBHJXfwZ66Qec82NI1asE8mxzV5EwKVb0vYtF7rcjFlBcha36q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's exactly what you expect for a little greasy spoon. The Friday special is my favorite. Ribs and spaghetti for $26.

Service is good. Free refills on pop. Good food. Just what you need","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtZLYC7SXtZ97JI0Cb02o_4Sii4vdAzTdKrt9i&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Amir Zadmoghadas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqdew5KhFVD5RxOgB382TX7EpmHMMi0CV5o3h8uilBWfKyE8w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"great experience with friends at this wonderful restaurant. Thank you for all the excellent service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHZ5toNPIibXswgykxegtY3Ax23juUgo7gz5X3&fid=0x0:0x1d1cd1ad544caa40"],"When":"2024-11-12"}]

[{"Name":"judy lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxQFsQ_JnNA4CIO0ttfhv0mp59ggfnPiiIcA0n0F4ju1lLlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the location that I return every year for my Christmas dinner Great atmosphere, great food and inviting customer services, making this a great places for any occasion for hang out. Especially Jennifer, she was a fantastic staff who look after us all the time. Gave us recommendations that exceeded our needs. Thank you for spending the night with us!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQRHmPptwa-QTYI6RBVTzuf0k2O0LCeiTgymy1&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Martin Dichupa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNDFb5fEpdn1lV1xMh2_IBXJ0jnoQ6_jFy0aGbcE01nG9ImDpM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently held our joint Christmas and retirement party at JOEY Coquitlam, and it was an absolutely fantastic experience! From start to finish, the food was exceptional, and the service was top-notch.

A special shoutout to our server, Lexie, who truly went above and beyond to ensure our group felt welcomed and well taken care of. Her attentiveness and cheerful demeanor made the evening even more memorable.

Thank you to the entire team at JOEY Coquitlam for providing a 5-star experience that we’ll all be talking about for a long time! Highly recommended for any special occasion or group gathering.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3n5_s8dop4ZL1-3yNhteI5QvPuYJCiRWWE2GX&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time at this location and I was happy with everything. My MIL and I were offered sparking wine while we waited for a table - that was a treat! Fish tacos were good and my husband and MIL ended their meals as well. Lovely glass sculpture in the dining room - great atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOO8s2wbmxDA3OW_Q-Fei91wBIxqxuBwFkGJq2I&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Annie Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXeiXkcyhTInf8H3hsa41qWaj0-pj73GTGWAJSoVjdLilWPzd7b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Upon arrival, guests are warmly welcomed with complimentary champagne. The service is exceptional, with a team of friendly staff. Our family celebrated a birthday, and the staff went above and beyond to accommodate a small issue with my entrée. They also surprised us with a complimentary birthday dessert, making the experience even more special.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd2rvjU8Iq0HggwcxRdQ3iUjkHCt1i_xlP_Pk&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Kayla Cochrane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPCxHm8VITPtk2g9XDHBWfyZtomSP_ai-b0ipoJVYmIOKKEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had our staff party here tonight; Bianca and Jesse were amazing to us! Bianca was so sweet and attentive - Jesse gave us a great set up and was so welcoming! Food, overall service, and atmosphere 10/10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4lMwDnQhZroZ3cc7kUnByVwVgdllfheVWkikv&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-11-10"},{"Name":"Jamie Brand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXKYZgBpqiELo9hDY5N-5k-gorixQvb36QqVW-qrYDjhXG_wuiwQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best dining experiences I’ve had in a long time. We had gone previously and had a subpar experience, but were personally invited back by the general manager for a chance to redo the experience. Everything was incredible from the word go. Our server was extremely personable, and I don’t think I’ve ever had a French dip like that before. Our steaks were done to perfection, and I appreciated a couple of drink recommendations they made. We were treated like royalty, and I can tell the GM takes great pride in her restaurant. After 15 years of enjoying Joey, this is by far the best time I’ve had.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnXXGCOP-ZGWLV7lPed7ddiNLbfTV_EgEvP9fY&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Jim O'Grady","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJGgsb2sCcFjV1Mve3M5vv3QuR2DK9KBJEfmo_m9dlw5ULu0-QIA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently arranged a birthday lunch for an old friend at Joeys, and the experience exceeded my expectations. From the moment we arrived, the staff demonstrated exceptional hospitality, but it was Sydney who truly stood out. Her attention to detail and professionalism elevated the occasion, ensuring that every request was handled promptly and with a warm friendly demeanor. The manager also made a point to personally check in, adding a level of service that made us feel genuinely appreciated. Their combined efforts made our celebration both memorable and thoroughly enjoyable. I would highly recommend Joeys for any special occasion.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl7xObgarUbqZ5ioLnryyK2VjAiQ9nUewKH8G-&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"camille sal.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7Ks7QNJJsJdwwFb2BHOVyVy0T4aFfD9IIuenSGN5xn7y4mt27=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Joey’s restaurant, specifically this location, is an amazing dining experience! The food is absolutely delicious, with a menu that offers a great variety of options to satisfy any craving. The service is top-notch—friendly, attentive, and efficient. The ambiance is equally impressive, with a clean and welcoming atmosphere that’s perfect for any occasion. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for great food, excellent service, and a fantastic overall experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEvE0G517vl-jg_1k27I_p0eCrQDbGt4SvClOA&fid=0x0:0x29a9313c1a6dc6ea"],"When":"2024-12-23"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Louisa R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJK3ST9Om4q9TA-nJ0W3Py9B2aqqqJYttJDPV_fbhJn2NszEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Dropped by after visiting the Farmer's Market and was pleased with the decision to visit. The quality and the freshness of the food is good and tasted good. The prices were also reasonable. We had the Chopped scallop roll, Rainbow roll, and the Volcano roll.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJgYLGWwn1K5JJgBWNAPlA7N1CYkDnjyvSNzQV&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"Maria Fernanda Guaraná","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU949zWMPKzgd78YIgipV_4PUI5bJb069xY2JNqEIjY4HsjgWnfzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this hidden gem on Google! Food was very fresh and well made, sushi was one of the best I’ve had in a while. We also got some of their spicy fried chicken and it was SO GOOD! Crispy and juicy, the sauce was also pretty good and the level of spiciness was perfect for my taste. The atmosphere is cute and welcoming, our server was really friendly and service was fast..prices are very fair! Would definitely recommend this place and I can’t wait to go back and try other dishes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"trentongrover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVQwBaIjS0DBOqwmNCbk7peJC-3TbK8aNhs0jIXgmSZEYnEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Passing through the area, I asked trucks Nav for sushi near me. Up pops Awesome Sushi, sounds like I need to try it. The name truly says it all! Great sushi, nice small place with comfortable atmosphere.

Try their Jalapeño poppers!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORZLLEbBpqyDCRUERIoZo7SBaUnU9ejEsUKwbs&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Saeid MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcewSnJcAhACCkEWKUQGjPaBy78cIOsSGEe0B0nR_ARAnMiJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered smoked salmon cream cheese roll and spicy dynamite roll, which both were delicious and loved it. Just the spicy roll wasn't really spicy. But definitely will try other sushi here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUGYY3ulrzAaYBtxDrvqyMiXzkmBw6O8J0jE9x&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Martin Matahari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUAn1gLSlBMeGXZBHUnKkSJRx9LUQmHP9VKEpiPVA6PU8EOwPbl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My wife and I enjoyed the yummy sushi here! Miso soup was very flavourful and not too salty. The rolls we tried were very good, sunset roll, red dragon roll and yam roll were excellent. Perfect rice to ingredients ratio. The toppings were very flavourful. I liked the crispy bits on top. Not too spicy at all. There is limited seating inside the restaurant though. I would highly recommend this as a hidden gem in PoCo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOu5kD4wX2JnZNcUp_ISc_jv_YitcT2GKbZzvxM&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2024-2-19"},{"Name":"Mel “雅慧” Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwpbcKV57q67MH16Pap78Z0NPVo3apLaU7yhpxrZCEPOSw4WXktQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was looking to try a new sushi place. This one didn't disappoint. Food and service were incredible. Despite having quite a few takeout orders, our food came out incredibly fast. The server was very thoughtful and pulled over another table to give us more room to sit and eat.  I'm only here visiting for a short time but will make sure to come in and eat here one more time. Highly recommend!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoBtxF2S7t4aOVEVOr-iNP3XeQxH0BWYN5hBAk&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2024-5-18"},{"Name":"Sarah Woods","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV7JUbYP9UfvKcKjMTVtGVK_u-4I9H-snWOBROylNTcUUw0zoIdXA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"After searching high and low for a local gem, I stumbled upon this incredible spot, and will be my stable sushi to go☺️
From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warm smiles and attentive staff who made me feel right at home.
The sushi is very fresh and tasty. I
recommend the dynamite roll and Montrose roll 🍣
I love the cute cutlery🍴 I know it might seem like a small detail, but I absolutely adore the attention to detail in every aspect of this place, including the utensils!
I'm already looking forward to exploring more of the fun items on the menu. This place has definitely won me over with its fantastic food, delightful ambiance, and exceptional service. 🎉 It's a gem that I'll be returning to again and again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0_bB3DiuCW8dER5nMrgh2jMXjV-Na-pG3JKDy&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2024-3-18"},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Classic bento box (beef): It was delicious. Miso soup was great, tempura was fried well, the portion was right, and I really liked the plates and bowls. It felt good dining at Awesome Sushi.

Chicken teriyaki roll: I liked the sauce, the crunchiness of the chicken, and the taste of it. Really well done!

Thank you Awesome Sushi! Your sushi was awesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPBOvmemlb_YpTGqlDLA3MzyFMppmrHa16bCYZ&fid=0x0:0x1df20d1659b81e20"],"When":"2023-11-20"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXyajiM8jhhadmB24OL7xR6-3AcTWkbqu3nHe56zwz2EWFlpHA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went with my friends during lunch on Saturday. Lots of seats available, which was great.
Service was great! We asked to watch a specific soccer game, and they put it on for us.
The only reason for a 4 star - is the food. We ordered party size nachos & cheese - it was fine. Not the best taste that I had, but was a decent size. Also ordered burgers, which were a bit “dry”. But for the price it was good. Just not as good as it was when we had it last time.
Anyway, I’d definitely go there again, probably would order something else, not the burger.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"james corbett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXORPNpjn99AmypwXC5L8gqaCK1buk43veXhtLSzHUK1ZItjmE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came in for drinks after dinner and the vibe as soon as you walked in was chill but energetic. We found seats and had a server greet us rather quickly and mentioned the specials. We had long island ice tea and they were well balanced and not sweet or strong ...I enjoyed and had 2 while one of the group had an enjoyable dark and stormy. The food looked good that I saw coming out of the kitchen. I would go back for drinks and meals as I enjoyed my first visit.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"E Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSf46GoVDYA6DwVd9VW9_YDSbB2ZybZwD8Gjg5Qpn6bN0v14Wr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Haven't been here for a long time (no minors allow, so tough to want to be here if you have kids). Used to be a great neighbourhood gem with good food and service, but kind of disappointed when we were here the other night. Arrived on a Friday night around dinner time a couple weeks back. Place was packed as expected, so we understand the service could be a bit slow. Very limited menu (when compares to other pubs in the area), and very pricy for the quality and portions they offered. Waited almost an hr for a few pieces of chicken wings and onion rings, taste was just meh. Our server was friendly, but pretty sure she brought me a lager instead of the honey lager I ordered. Maybe it was just one of those nights?","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1WcCEBPc_TsMnRLBo1xDvfIsMTbep7KEKaj2d&fid=0x0:0xddd414d544844a6"],"When":"2023-9-18"},{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My brother and I frequent Samz often, and when friends are in town from the island, we usually take them there in the afternoon for lunch and a couple drinks while watching a few games on the TV's .

Our server on Friday was very nice, and took great care of us while having to deal with one of our Island friends, and his Shenanigans lol.

I do believe our servers name was Alexandra, and was great while dealing with the one friend. I blame the Limes Alexandra lol.

We always have a great time at Samz and the Staff and everyone is always so accommodating

And of course some of us walk home as Samz is close by, and the others took Uber home. Always do it right or don't do it at all I say...

Forgot all about our lunch, basically it was just my brother and I who ate. I had the Samz Burger Bacon and Cheese with Shrooms with Fries, and my brother had some Hot Wings and deep fried pickles. Every thing came out hot and ready to go. And I have to admit I really enjoy the bottomless Fries as well  ( great touch ) as our mom loves that as well when my brother and I take her to Samz for lunch.

And finally in the posted Video  Steve'd has left the building lol. Emphasis on the Steve'd part lol... 🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴🥴

Once again thanks to everyone at Samz for great hospitality as always 😃👍👍🍻

Update...

We were back at Samz on Saturday May 24th 2024 and one of our friends is Vegan, and Samz accommodated him no problem at all and made a special Vegan meal just for him. He was extremely happy and really enjoyed it.

The Vegan meal picture is in with the pictures posted...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSSwz3WOtWUiRn9Y5dWWFbRRS984hH2nC8j6AL&fid=0x0:0xddd414d544844a6"],"When":"2023-11-25"},{"Name":"Christina Gompf-Alksne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXhCy51p896p0hWTuQ2f6jBzuO5Habqt6RsYQFNNmstZzCLKuQ3VQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The burger is amazing. My husband and I both got one and we agreed, we were visiting from Calgary and found the best burger. The mushrooms were grilled before being put on the burger so it wasn’t sloppy, the fries & gravy were also great. Definitely recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Trinh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLGKmpoLpVi9_ZLeKCQEZPnQ-vrekua-m32_C1oTE4XYHSsT8fY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This local pub has delicious burgers and pasta. The atmosphere is clean, quaint and chill. The service is friendly. We ordered the Same burger and Kobe burger. The yam fries are quite a bit better than the regular fries. We went on a Saturday lunch period and there was no wait but quite a few people enjoying.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6fvq5sAV6cJ0e25feonHhUOE0BHs-tzcBaaIL&fid=0x0:0xddd414d544844a6"],"When":"2019-11-10"},{"Name":"Lang ラングErich エリック","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_fnBQbwZD7MujuZxz_w__in2Ebl1mFxa5cYrAsb2pWV0IGQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Probably one of the best Pubs in the area, great service, great food, comfortable surroundings, if there is any sporting events on the place tends to pack up quickly although they do have quite a large  capacity and plenty of TVs so you should be able to get a good view no matter where you sit. Lots of good specials every night and tasty food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNH9iw9DPYaPLRkUbk8NUgKa1bPSZW6-qKClvE1&fid=0x0:0xddd414d544844a6"],"When":"2023-3-12"},{"Name":"Janice Lemay","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLYaV_Cz4FnkW55dz-tNUpcnN3jiOUEhJxM6D-NWnqjJiTvoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"My husband and I came in for Sunday breakfast/brunch . We both ordered the classic breakfast,  I ordered mine with sausage and my husband got bacon. When the order arrived I didn't notice right away but noticed the sausage was a Bavarian sausage not breakfast sausage.  I asked the waitress,  she didn't apologize or anything just that's what we always have served like I should know. The waitress,  I believe by the receipt her name is Lesli. She offered bacon instead and when brought out she just plunked it on the table , no apology at all....I have been in the customer service business since I was 18, I will be 60 next year. One thing to always do is apologize even if not your doing. ALSO your menu should say Bavarian Sausage 1 waste of money 2 is what if someone did not know it's a Bavarian sausage started eating and had an allergic reaction!!?? Not everyone thinks about mentioning food allergies.
Samz pub is convenient for us but standoffs staff does cut it. There are other pubs in the area.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered takeout and the pizza was delicious and real tasting. Our favourite was the fungi de Alfredo pizza. The manager’s choice is good too if you like meat and lots going on as toppings for your pizza. The Hawaiian pizza tasted standard. The only thing in my opinion that would make the pizza taste even better is if they applied a little more tomato sauce on the pizzas as the Hawaiian and Manager’s Choice pizza were a little light on the tomato sauce (as seen in the photos) and the tomato flavour was very light and not too prominent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNDanaQg5OogPQ81J4SQ9fw9ApD-2ZO_W4nlOgX&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-8-17"},{"Name":"Bekah French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiYLh-7emQ9AthzE2N_CGxwmtRUdZguPeMRuVIWmhyOtllxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Upon recommendation from a friend we ordered a pizza. We chose the Italian delight but switched the olive oil base for pesto instead. It was delicious and quite affordable. Large (6big slices) for $22. Love the light thin base and great toppings. Easy walking distance from our place. Will be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7PNveFE7yJk1kR3lFheirfPwsbjs0YO3AvaFT&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"Gite S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWHPoVrM9Tm0TZoTyA1T3pPI7MnOYZYRFCqeGjCzaz5c8sBg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently order pizza for our Christmas party and it was absolutely delicious! The flavors were incredible, and the ingredients tasted so fresh. The crust was perfectly crispy, and the toppings were generous and well-balanced. This is hands down one of the best pizzas I’ve had in a long time","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Karen R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDV_xh-2FRTt60Dk8cmOVYbJK862izxJKbtP4b4MrmUNx8NdUF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’m Impressed!

This place came up on a google search and I was rushed and just went for it, so I didn’t know what to expect. I didn’t even read the other reviews. I went in blind.

The crust was nice and crunchy on the bottom and soft on the top. It is somewhere between the Neapolitan thin-ness and like a “standard pizza”. Best of both worlds.

Toppings were not too heavy but I think there is pizza science out there with a toppings to crust ratio. If you want a stack of toppings add more.

Cheese was light but again I think this is purposeful and it works with the rest of it, but if you need to live the cheezy life, just add more of it.

I was very annoying by accident and I made a few special requests while it was busy on a Friday not knowing this place is actually quite popular and busy. They accommodated my requests anyway.

Online ordering was easy and the timeline was reliable. I waited maybe 2 extra minutes (probably while the accommodated my annoying peak hour requests)

The staff were nice.

It is August and it was hot. I would not recommend sitting inside on a 31 degree August evening to eat your pizza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHPjN224PO1yD1vEICW09TRi7_Ob8BC9EHiWeE&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Marie Amin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKR0qp3fose5GsYts0dtMeJqwXo1MWNFSPwo4SjCtJGEbgYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":""Just tried their pizza for the first time, and I highly recommend it! 🍕 Best pizza I've ever had with amazing customer service. Definitely worth a visit!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOk6JBQ77EXh9lNodBouxDx5ck25ioObiX2nxxi&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice flat pizza with great toppings and aftertaste. Really grateful they have slices available even late","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPdju3xRR9csby2HRwLCeCGjQ8wAdbmHMC6jUyr&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Vegan Cheese option! My friends & I ordered takeout this past Saturday for UFC. Their delivery timing was on point and the pizza tasted really good. I got the Bulgogi Pizza, flavor was spot on with a little kick of heat, crust was so good.
The only thing is the base dough was so thin that when I lifted the pizza.. All the toppings fell off. Otherwise it was excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzoCgWjE1mKqA-AcqireE5BW9YSqEN4e9L_wWq&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great lil place, food was fresh and tastes great for the price and quality. Only problem is that the place is small inside so dine in can be a bit difficult. Other than that good pizza with soft crust!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfKGlU00XGevawFJe4aofL74KKYSwEHBqbTgIw&fid=0x0:0x6203e4dff14a041b"],"When":"2024-5-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Julia Tallentire","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXn_PwbzuLg5S_bvw5WHe4l0QZc_at0pWbVdGfDZVABBRc3U2Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food! And friendly staff
We've had and really enjoyed so far: ginger beef, Sichuan string bean, spicy tangy dumplings, and Xiao long bao (not pictured)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeSIwUywSsyDEQI1Pq27rykd23xsm7ar3ppLqg&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Christopher Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVexNzsO8991iK-9EWX-70Xc57sEkVGaaf84klilDJ3qadcoigBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Shanghai food! This place has signature beef rolls and dumplings. But don’t be afraid to try their other dishes. This time I ordered beef noodle soup and deep fried squid. Soup was perfectly flavoured (spicy) and noodles were just the right texture. Fried squid was also spot on, seasoned well and nice and crispy. There are lots of items on the menu I still want to try so I’ll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgA2PeHLvPPlkRNTVYhK4DL8hjIT3xoB0l1vFA&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"M Carol W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXrApweCZ_o2cDt96mptjdkKLzhWxJGrqd2c_QO9FLaF9_6WY6Yig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had read my local Peaceful Restaurant (Poco) had very good Szechuan food and I was craving decent soup dumplings. I also ordered Dan Dan noodles, which I’d never had before, but seemed like a good bet. I was very happy with my selections.

The soup dumplings were delicious. The skins were not super thin so you had something to chew, but not thick either that it would be heavy. Each dumpling held a lot of soup which was clear and tasty, not greasy at all like some other places.

My Dan Dan noodles were such a surprise. So delicious - the flavours were well balanced. I would definitely return for another good meal there.

I gave atmosphere a 4 only because some of the seats need repair.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSTDqMuxZj7V8h9zTazE-awoO9lc6V7tJgHCtX&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2024-2-3"},{"Name":"Janessa Irene","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpSbGDk4PCkkLcrRU_e1Ak4moHQg_aEB533erdgDtSMnKW0one=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been coming to Peaceful restaurant for years. Being from Edmonton, we only get here when we are visiting the Greater Vancouver area and the food is ALWAYS good and consistent. The noodles are so perfectly fresh and chewy, the beef rolls are crisp and the beef is cooked to perfection, the XLB are the best anywhere and the Dan Dan tastes like an airport hug. Often I find service can make or break a restaurant and the service at this location was phenomenal. Our server was attentive without being too much, friendly and super engaging. It was our first time at the Port Coquitlam location and it definitely will not be our last. Thank you again for the amazing service and food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIbJhJMOR9aBntLk6tLpaANizaTnPokA81-W-u&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2023-4-25"},{"Name":"Clara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJWIwshLULE3B_RdNi9aKWLWw8jS-s52J_rdUUXlZsGL8nMFDg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"At the old Deer Garden location, so same humble Chinese restaurant vibes, which is something I personally like (not even any music). I'm guessing due to the pandemic, it was pretty empty, but our food came really quick and service was polite.

They're known for their Xiao Long Bao (soup dumplings) and those didn't disappoint. We got other standard fare in this category of cuisine to test on this first visit (rice cakes, garlic string beans, Taiwanese beef rolls, Northern pork dumplings), and it was all very flavourful. I could eat the rice cakes all day.

Not a fan of using disposable plates, though. Feels a bit irresponsible, especially with so few customers during the pandemic.

Will definitely return for the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOV8JXRtTwa8nwu5YuczgGlaoLSjK0H7mGNHMmJ&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2021-9-15"},{"Name":"Shar E.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUSTTeWSwBUCCTyXplz3ZdtlER3HBP0xmei1e1PbBmts9nKzEHujg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went to the Vancouver branch some years ago. I remember it being really good, so I visited the Coquitlam branch.  It did not disappoint.

We ordered the beef rolls, pan fried pork, sweet and sour chicken, young chow fried rice, vegetarian noodles, hot and sour dumplings, a s Xiao long bao.  Everything's really good.

The only thing I didn't like about is how cold it is inside the restaurant.  They had portable heaters on but it wasn't enough to make the whole restaurant warm.  Probably their heater wasn't working that day.

But other than that, we enjoyed eating in Peaceful restaurant in Coquitlam.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fred Z.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlT70QWwV2DY9EdRG6qQQBK_x9FK_vcq8MKjgCHFTXA_U_2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is new, but they are good! Fresh ingredients, great menu options, and friendly staff make this a go to!  they are always friendly, easy smiling and helpful explaining everything. There is a friendly & lively atmosphere with great tasting food, quality of the meal was excellent and fully loaded.This place is neat and great, I like it very much. I also feel that their response to Covid-19 is very good I have seen in restaurants setting. I highly recommend you try them out, and you'll keep returning.❤️❤️❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjyp9fVbVXFemLZMfLxEZ-DcRgBBL39O9_k3Cm&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2020-10-31"},{"Name":"Jennifer H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEzU9INF1_sZTYVftrDSnlryIgHLw3kMLOe1cm6D0xxwHTb8jqsw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Having been to the other Peaceful Restaurants in Vancouver I was excited to hear that a location opened up so close to home. They seemingly opened quietly during COVID so I wasn't too sure what to expect and I'm sure a lot of people also don't realize that this location is here. So that's why I really wanted to try it out and leave a review, because I think there's great potential here and I hope they get more business!

I've been here twice now, as of this review, and I think this is the type of spot where they do some dishes well, and others not as much. I often find that to be the case for restaurants with larger menus, not every place can do every dish well, and I think that's understandable! So your experience here could definitely vary depending on what you choose to order. The first time we came we ordered the Kung Pao chicken because another review said they enjoyed it, but we found it to be pretty "meh" and just okay. So the next time we came we ordered a different chicken dish, the General Tsao's Chicken, and we like that one much better! Much better flavour!

Other dishes that we enjoyed were the Xiao Long Bao (a dish Peaceful Restaurant is known for), the Beef Rolls (another dish they're known for), the Spicy Gingered Beef, the Vegetable & Tofu Stir-fried Noodles, and the Sichuan Stir-fried Noodles. The broth in the Xiao Long Bao (Shanghai soup-filled dumplings) was delicious and went well with the vinegar they serve it with, the vinegar really helps to cut the richness of the broth and pork filling.

The noodles also had a great texture to them, a nice bounce and chewiness that was satisfying. The Sichuan Stir-fried Noodles were my favourite as they also had a nice light heat to them. I will say that the "Spicy" Gingered Beef isn't very spicy but that may be a good or bad thing depending on who you ask. It's still very tasty regardless of if you're a spice fan or not!

I had family members who visited on a separate occasion from me and they said they wouldn't recommend the fried rice (a category I didn't try on my visits) and that the squid had good flavour but was not crispy enough! So maybe keep those notes in mind when you're deciding what to order!

Now, the ambiance at the restaurant is where I think there could definitely be improvement. It's very clean and quiet in the restaurant, but a little too quiet as there's no music at all! So if you go on a quiet night it's a bit strange having it be so silent. I'd recommend they put some light background music of some kind on and it would be much better.

Also in terms of ambiance, they don't provide regular eating utensils, but plastic cutlery and styrofoam plates and cups. Yes this does upset me as someone who hates single use waste, but I do understand that they opened during covid and it seems to be very quiet for dine in (at least when we've gone). I suspect that they may also be short staffed, so this might be a way for them to keep costs low and keep workloads manageable with only a few staff members.

I definitely hope in future that they will move toward regular cutlery and plates, but if this would be a deal breaker for your dine-in experience, then I recommend trying take out! I did see quite a few take out orders get picked up so that's definitely an option some customers are choosing, and it makes sense.

Aside from the music and dinnerware, the waitress was very friendly and attentive, which we appreciated. Parking is also plentiful so there's no issues there. The price is not bad at all  either, we always get at least another meal or two as leftovers so it's good value! My hope for this place is that it can work toward building a better ambiance and that people will still give it a try as they work toward that transition. I think there's room for improvement but I also think there's definitely some things they're doing well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0DwGVQ0f-1evWkGfS9MOh0jP9iL_22siWwZpO&fid=0x0:0x9d1f8426af958dd1"],"When":"2021-9-23"}]
