user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mina K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqkiz0bzpa-16Pndf1kiK6M5DS6vr61upv2ilmD1PLQdXAb-I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good chicken, crispy and juicy. I ordered 3 flavours. The yangyeom and soy garlic are cover in sauce, it’s so tasty. The creamy onion comes with a small sauce on the side, just wish it has more sauce for that amount of chicken. It’s the best chicken in town so far.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPC3bXMUb8Wgdoo4_FkMUAtaamWzdnoEgX6IE85&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX98PrUHxEgks1p_UHXz6OQ_Vovq-hbr6NA6018tymH019sjnz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went to finally try this place out. I tried the "Big Bang" (sweet and sour chicken with pineapple) their photos and description are a bit misleading. This dish is mildly spicy even though it says "sweet" on the menu, and they use smaller pieces of pineapple instead of the bigger pieces they have in their photos, it still tasted good but I didn't expect for it to be a little spicy. So, I would ask for extra pineapple in the future myself. I would go back to try more of their menu. I wish there was a smaller option for the Big Bang or a combo for one option. Good chicken here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHN632jLVNxQQVGLcrL1nnVcwd10rxTsA_P2ur&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Minipa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXLkpsoXCUt-uCoPDrB_Mv40ZqSioejOqdNEdMQaklHEBDE1W1x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food, made fresh to order. Clerk gave a bottle of water on the house on a hot day too. Very charming and funny man.

Cant wait to come back to try new flavours.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMI6ShFxLapYajTPoq2MC_sArGIkrzCbzLmve4a&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Jag Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtpdplh3A6xm-KZ7Hgdk0TvEmNi0MAclqn7NsyIPBJuuFEonw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best fried chicken I have ever had. Nice white tender meat, crispy and non- greasy on the outside. There’s no drenched oil taste or smell. Super tasty seasoning and sauce flavours. I highly recommend and will be back. I wish there were more locations.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kaveesh Kukreja","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyGM5Wur1OIcPaIKHk8y8hADl72LlmzqOApRwMvp0cKEQAxid2PA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our Boys at Hens Up Chicken serving up some Delicious Korean Fried Chicken without so much as an Instagram page even.
Honestly, those pieces were FIRE. The sauces could have been better but whatever they lost on the sauce they made up for on the crispiness and tenderness of the chicken.
We ordered the Trips Threat for $32 in which we got the Spicy Yangneom (Not Spicy at all), The Honey Garlic (Your Basic Honey Garlic) and the Pepper ( My favourite)

I also got a Mexi Ranch sauce on the side to dip which was like a mixture of Korean Sauce with Sriracha so added a bit of spice to the mix and it came with coleslaw and what I can only describe as Coleslaw Sauce.
Extra $2 for Pickles if u a radish is a must have guy otherwise I'd skip it.

Clean Place, Quick Service and Good food. If I'm in the area I'd re visit for sure!!

Rating - 8.1","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXTQwYZvk6mT8chLPPpC85KpFRL3-ws8kYVK9F&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2024-8-26"},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Half & Half Chicken (Honey Garlic & Cheesling): I liked the honey garlic, and would recommend having either soy garlic or honey garlic for your chicken. They featured two new sauces for me to try - one is soy-wasabi sauce and one is like a sweet white garlic sauce. I loved it! Thank you Chicken Hens up!

Upon my third visit, I ordered rice and soy garlic chicken. The server was very kind and gave me a side of coleslaw too. I appreciate them!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRxTpMaPrF8s8qnSdSI3J873ZVw9YhgET7sDGN&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2024-4-14"},{"Name":"Jason Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMhOEKKHXAe86LaxehFj_x7OVFNVhnJ9HjVRBWt_-JiYzZSRxP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing chicken, along with its sister branch in the coquitlam center.

Fried perfectly, and it does deliver the flavour!

The owner is super friendly and goes above and beyond. He recommended the onion sauce to go with the original chicken, gave me a small portion of sample and it was perfect.

I've already ordered twice from here and I'm definitely be coming back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1K094qyuSjiOqQpK8FYP3M8v-Wi3DZDWMVsfT&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Called to ask whether it was open Boxing Day and luckily it was open. I ordered three whole soy garlic fried chicken and the snow cheese fries. All the food was delicious; however, I wished the soy garlic chicken wasn’t spicy. I also hoped that there was air holes to keep the chicken crispy during transit back if there is take-out involved. Prices are good for the portion size. It is located in a plaza with parking spaces. Negative was I stood waiting for a while for an employee to check up on me at the counter when I first entered the store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-S3RgkD6lOgogRVV5ZsDeUSvena19R34XWog2&fid=0x0:0x4276b8d959ef57bb"],"When":"2024-1-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! All I can say is they serve the perfect piece of pizza. The dough to sauce to topping ratio is just right and the ingredients are fresh and high quality! Will definitely be back. My favourites were the cheese and pepperoni pizza because their tomato sauce is particularly delicious with savouriness and tang. Really impressed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQoJx7_wzA3EbpOC8_CCBcxmc3Ce8LsytAcHZL&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"W L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK87lyILn2l1GNJGaxosGEolmCjP2Is4zUBq1wgU_yTgsuEnQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Poco is lucky to have this gem of a pizza place. The pizzas are absolutely delicious and you can tell that everything they use is top notch. The dough is light with a slight crisp, not oily and greasy like most places- thank goodness. Generous with the toppings( it’s thin crust pizza so please keep that in mind) and baked in a gorgeous Italian oven. It had the perfect charred crust.
I think a lot of people compare this pizza to the other places next door not understanding that this is a completely different style. This is not your regular conveyor belt pizza with a thick bread like crust.
Was pleasantly surprised to see that they sell beer on tap and wine as well. They have an extensive menu with loads of options to choose from.
Friendly and knowledgeable staff too.
This place is a must try if you like quality pizza. 10/10 Reggianos, will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOw93I_3pXWCL818Bl_GgwtZK_YbmMbJJm8WPuL&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2024-9-22"},{"Name":"Jasmine Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJuOzS967Hz_egt9IQZrMH1_TOYLzJMv0RljQ3XzcQT0pp3BA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For that size and quality and how soft and chewy it was, was definitely worth the experience! Sometimes other Neapolitan style pizzas in other stores can get too chewy and stiff but this one was perfect to the crust. Will order again for sure to try different kinds!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNoegTFGywrC7JrR_cikpDdceJJ8eUE6y8PFGO&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was in the area and needed a quick bite between appointments. They had a good selection of pizzas slices available and were also ready to make custom order pizzas. I got the last vegetarian pizza slice and it was good.

The dining room was spotless and they have a funky public washroom (see the video). A great place to get some fresh pizza!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIrFqONmLFOti0GvALnnj31WmTRqYBB_pYUuyh&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2024-3-9"},{"Name":"Kayleigh Chapman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXggIZcln7wZ5SbxNQJuMEWmRbeK0R52nrQoptdEmgNElWW-c4LNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best pizza place in town. Pizzas baked in the stone oven were delicious. Price was very good - my partner and I spent about $40 and had enough pizza to last 2 days. Service was fast and friendly. They also have a decent selection of good beer to go with. Definitely check this place out if you haven't already.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNmJlPBnmrd7vm1EyFdiehyVzbPEGK-9pin1iYH&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"vanessa lucas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK6tWx3DcZm7qvPeZqBDVhnPAzsGDyE0VLCDhzoWWLQT0ORjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hopped into this Pizzeria to have a slice of pizza and had a slice of heaven instead. We ordered the Regianno’s Deluxe and it was a sheer delight. The toppings were generous and fresh. It had the right amount of cheese and the crust was one of the best we ever tasted. The staff were friendly and efficient.

Will definitely be having some more. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1_3jEEnB25tL_TMPzn40R0ZU8O-Fw0-yN48Dj&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2024-2-4"},{"Name":"Alishya Shroff","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzk4pbNxSWWBC4SdXDAth089lM_nR_IuBGHpbAw24vCEK5SjYzzA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had ordered pizza for my kids birthday party recently. The pizza were not only delicious but the quality was excellent. Everyone at the party raved about the pizzas, especially the kids..they thoroughly enjoyed every bite of their pizza. We had ordered margarita, chicken pesto, Fungi and pizza Verde.. all of them were excellent and at a very reasonable price. They even cut slices in such a way so it's easier for kids to eat. They delivered it on time at the park as well which was amazing as it saved time and stress for us.

I highly recommend Reggiano pizza if you want supreme quality and scrumptious pizza!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUss3Xiky_ua2bDX8b8zSa1uC7sAzx8dANwSqBcBq6pELbRRfQi=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We’ve had the Tuscan chicken pizza from here. And it has been very good. The centre is usually soggy which we don’t like and we do wish that could be fixed. Sometimes the bottom is undercooked.  As I move back to being a vegetarian, and then, hopefully, vegan someday, I was excited to see they have a variety of vegetarian pizzas… some with vegan cheese and vegan pepperoni. So I ordered that. Was very disappointed, the middle 3rd to 2/3 of the vegetarian pizza was so soggy, there was hardly any vegetarian pepperoni - maybe one round and a half per large slice of pizza…and where was the cheese? I will never ordered a vegetarian deluxe with vegan pepperoni and vegan cheese on it again. I will give Reggiano’s another chance as I said, we have loved the Tuscan chicken, hopefully the next vegetarian has more toppings on it, and isn’t soggy. See photo …. Litterly a piece and a half of veggie pepperoni on each piece 😕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2pBviGtRK3Lc7mIqDsth3Dx18EHRi28ebOY_L&fid=0x0:0xac675e17aa1bdcfc"],"When":"2024-1-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"pkkt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIxTsqnnXFXrL60DNstdKJH-P9RNNK4Kfr4DE9YEqWRLFavDg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was a disastrous take-out order on Christmas Day. The restaurant was quite pack, as expected being Christmas Day and I am sure the quality is questionable. I ordered 6 dishes.
1. Diced chicken with salted fish & tofu - 90% tofu, 10% chicken and definitely no salted fish. The looks of it is very unappetizing and virtually tasteless.
2. Yan's House special sparerib - clearly they gave me the wrong order and it turned out to be honey garlic spareribs
3. Deep fried squid with peppery salt - completely with any trace of peppery salted other then it is deep fried and the flour batter would not stick to the squid.
4. Beef with string beans in black bean sauce - 90% of string beans and few slices of beef with no taste of the black bean sauce
5. Deep fried prawns with pumpkin and salted egg yolk - 5 pieces of prawns and the rest is pumpkin. Absolutely too little of the salted egg yolk
6. Fried vermicelli - too ordinary

To sum it up, the restaurant was all about rushing through the orders and sacrificing quality. We dined in several months ago and it was just an average family restaurant. So we though we would order take out for our Christmas lunch but it turned out to be very bad. There is an inherent risk whenever you order take-out because you never know what's inside the packaging. I thought is was a waste of my time to call the restaurant to complain. Damage was already done, so the recourse is to write this review and I hope the restaurant owner reads it.So beware if you planning to go there.
Will never step in there again.
If I can award No Star, I would have done it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNT1ITY_zzDiLe563LK-JCNe0dhqGcMowqgERQR&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-12-26"},{"Name":"Regie Sacdalan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVDuCV38ynK6mxDdP-HlWdoPODHVpBYeLjIOghxaV1fgHRoA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's no wonder why this place has such a high Google review rating! One of the best Peking Duck and Lettuce Wraps in Metro Vancouver and at a reasonable price.  The duck was plump and juicy. The lettuce wrap course had a perfect meat ratio. The best Deep Fried Squid I've had -- light, airy with just a hint of spice so my kids were able to enjoy it too. The squid at other places is often tough and this was not the case here. Everything tasted great and was high quality. Food was served hot. The servers were very attentive and kind. We will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP45SWEE9L8SmkSTJFyrr_zJmSoMsRDskWEqo_J&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Newly opened Hong Kong style restaurant. We went there for lunch and were pretty happy with the quality and flavour of the food.

The portion sizes are quite big so I’d highly suggest getting a dish or two less as we were a group of 8 people and 6 dishes were too much for us.

Service however, could be improved as the kitchen forgot to bring out two of our dishes until we reminded them about 30 to 40 minutes after we were done with the others.

Price isn’t that bad. About CAD20 per person.

I’d recommend making a reservation in advance as the place does tend to get pretty busy and parking can be a pain to find.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMptKLVmoMm8826G-woKe7UTtGCTE6Z_UlJ5MMX&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-7-10"},{"Name":"Bob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkEC75mT1rTSBiWusD60B4Ypx_mMWrgo5mEAuPBQ7mgpfmDaoe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"When I went it was still considered a soft opening for the restaurant. The dim sum menu items were all very good. The seasoning was well balanced and not overwhelming. They were understaffed today and the customers were getting impatient, but there isn't much you could do. Come on guys. It's hard to hire people and they just opened.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-M6i5DzCOlWPhn8UH4RjKHzD8CMfstAiJ0E6n&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A wholesome Chinese restaurant good for family dinners with good portion sizes given for the dishes. The honey garlic spareribs and deep fried squid were well fried being crispy on the outside and moist on the inside. The Peking duck was standard. The complimentary choice of mango pudding or dessert soup at the end was nice. Solid place for standard Chinese food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPM7O1IwhE73us5iOTaBQDUKFzzcfIrATj9lDfY&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-8-5"},{"Name":"Tmo Jra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKu-bLJQalUBeL5kjDEs0RopDiDGGJMUE6USX1nrCypwPJTfQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Newly opened dimsum restaurant that we decided to try on a whim. Very glad we did! The decor was nice, food was delicious, and the people there were quite friendly.
Also, the portions were huge! Got used to the small but pricey portions in most Vancouver restaurants, so was very pleasantly surprised with the size of the orders here. Our family of 3 ate till we were stuffed but only got through a 3rd of each order (we normally don't have enough left to take home).
Definitely get the bang for your buck here!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPtiSgEaA709o9eEKbxoIbV5FcseRz7ewMOhaXf&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best dimsum in the area! Formerly known as Rainbow Butterfly, Yan's House is the updated version of a neighbourhood favourite.

Dimsum is fresh, hot and served quickly. Main dish portions are massive. We ordered fried rice and we're surprised at the size. One portion will serve 4-6 people.

The Deep Fried Squid is wonderful. Crispy, light batter. The squid is tender and cooked beautifully. We crave this dish.

Spicy String Beans with Minced Pork is so satisfying to eat. Savoury on its own or delicious with rice. It's a family favourite.

Dimsum is served all day. It's quite busy in the morning but the restaurant is quite large. Make sure to put your name on the list and you'll be seated asap.

Great space for a group, or small parties. Once seated, you're provided a carafe of hot tea. There's free wifi available.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW9KvDGBCNNyd-yCe-Pda8deL6vOs2zEpruOf_&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Eveline Yu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKZ_kiKNY5YBfaLOhaLW3SLnIfYj072uzzapXDuzRiVxziOnO0=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First visit! Tried to come in the morning for dim sum but it was so busy, we decided to come for dinner instead. :)
Love the atmosphere - staff are friendly and helpful.
We had the 2 dish combo + a side of bbq pork.
Combo comes with soup, rice, and dessert. Such a great deal.

My kids liked the chicken cream corn soup.
Dessert was mango pudding.

We ordered the stir fried green beans & beef… pretty tasty… and big portions.
Broccoli, egg tofu, mushrooms was also yummy.

Overall, decent meal. Reasonably priced. Had leftovers to pack home. Will come again :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeNsl4u7Ms7hOZM-A7umSD_YQU9soxfp434hDm&fid=0x0:0x8b30f4df92938c89"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Golnaz J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwh094AvMjRiNSQoo9HjnFTPUMh8c3XSGOFZ78okUlI4KLdqnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The Kaleh Pache was decent, but the experience overall fell short of expectations. The Tah Dig Gheymeh was a letdown – it wasn't crispy as it should be, filled mostly with rice, and had a very small portion of stew that was overly oily. The Persian pizza was just average, lacking any unique flavor that would set it apart. To top it off, the wait time was quite long. Overall, it was an okay experience, but I expected more in terms of quality and service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-DzvesS71y-fgPB5CjK_5S8bmZDJjWPi46iSO&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-10-31"},{"Name":"Ashkan N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKGC9QpVpAYzkuU2nETbRxXDGZW6ZxU4DFK0Bytd5fdamCstw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice little local restaurant/ghost kitchen with a solid selection of Persian dishes. The pizzas are decent, though not the best. Their standout item is likely the kale pache, and the tadig khoresht is also quite good.
Service is very slow. But overall I'd give them a 4.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWxtyTF9I5R2VTJVF2ZMshGzFUPWcZVNlsN-Bi&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Aran Owraki","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMukJTyOYOyVYJHs5NR3brAaT7WkUiw2-ZZJKxdbciL2IrOk1t=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"🌟 A Taste of Home at Ron’s Kitchen! 🌟

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Ron’s Kitchen, and I must say, it was a truly unforgettable experience. From the moment I walked in, the warm hospitality made me feel right at home. The staff were incredibly welcoming and attentive, ensuring that every part of our meal was perfect.

Now, let’s talk about the food—absolutely outstanding! Their nostalgic Pizza and the Tah Dig with Gheymeh took me straight back to the beautiful memories of Iran. The flavors were authentic, rich, and reminded me of the comfort of home-cooked meals from back in our beloved country. It was like taking a delicious trip to Iran without ever leaving Vancouver!

For all my fellow Persians in the area, I 100% recommend that you come and try this place for yourself. Ron’s Kitchen has truly captured the essence of Iranian cuisine, and I can’t wait to return!

Thank you, Ron’s Kitchen, for a perfect meal and for bringing a slice of Iran to Vancouver!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMiXbAVwcP3z55Fs-Xct5p7ayC1xWdYz0NWIKh0&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Hamid Hadilou","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ12isydAXwM3ARp62zO3XO3aAlRt1Lz7EzJoHZ_jp5xJJpCg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have a new Chef in PoCo Town! The food quality, cleanliness, and service were amazing. From the moment we walked in, we were greeted with a warm and friendly atmosphere that set the tone for an exceptional dining and Pick Up experience. Every dish we ordered was a masterpiece, bursting with flavor and presented beautifully. The attention to detail in both the food and the service was evident, making it clear that Ron’s Kitchen is dedicated to excellence. The restaurant was spotless, and the staff was attentive without being intrusive. This is a place where you can tell that passion and care are put into every aspect of the dining experience. We can’t wait to come back and explore more of the menu. Highly recommend to anyone looking for top-notch food in PoCo!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiNP5H5N26celVarfM24lmbEAtDdYacTyFRrtE&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"raha jazayeri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLeHwyKukldVqCQIaW6Hb1fVivrQi2xY8TwgMoYP5s_QjdArw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had the Gheimeh and Fesenjoon with Tah Dig, and they were amazing! The flavors were rich, and everything was perfectly cooked. The place was cozy and had a great atmosphere. We’ll definitely be back to try the Kaleh Pacheh next time. Highly recommend this place 😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMP25ckOHlByt-xKZiP9UiHcavjmNJzyWNJpIme&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-9-21"},{"Name":"Roozbeh Mahdavian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlYHlliT96h2CKmEL2OP36V0Ebi4mRPOIoBhegocBDCMV6ZxIC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a Tahdig and Stew at Ron’s kitchen. The Tahdig was super crispy and a bit oily which good Persian food is. The stews were super delicious . Ghormeh sabzi was slow cooked to perfection and I can bet they used herbs coming from Iran . Gheymeh was also super good with hint of rosewater and cardamom so it makes it a special gheymeh and not a normal eveyday one . The owner was also very friendly and shared a bite of their new Kabob which was really juicy and tender .
The prices were not the cheapest on the market but well worth the quality they offer .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN7h4TsC8YlTv2IibS4gxGrbmh35eO9rWA9vU8t&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-11-27"},{"Name":"Behzad S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVdn5sAH4_-94pUgypGL0vz7OLt2p1u7D01QH_tNkAPq1dokklOrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried Ron's Kitchen Pizza in Port Coquitlam tonight, and it was a fantastic experience! The pizza was delicious, with fresh, high-quality ingredients and perfectly baked crust. I especially loved their creative topping combinations, which added a unique twist to classic flavors. The service was friendly and efficient, and the atmosphere felt warm and inviting. Whether you're dining in or taking out, Ron's Kitchen Pizza is a must-visit for pizza lovers in Port Coquitlam. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzU16bkHjUGWzC-Qm-4RE_98M-r8UJd591fuRN&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Negin S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9PFM8OFXz96EGupa46F26TjSmHGXNqJDPVPW5fuudtMqYhMU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just visited Ron's kitchen and it was by far one of the best persian food experiences I've had. The kalepache is the best in Vancouver, absolutely delicious and the chef is very kind and hospitable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2GouF2kXIaJ3D4KrtPPpudztewpIYoKWNouA&fid=0x0:0x3c64e6ca184bd7fd"],"When":"2024-10-20"}]

title: Fresh Bite Food
address: 2641 Shaughnessy St, Port Coquitlam, BC V3C 3G5
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true},{"name":"Delivery","enabled":false}]},{"id":"parking","name":"Parking","options":[{"name":"Free parking lot","enabled":true},{"name":"Free street parking","enabled":true},{"name":"Parking","enabled":false}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Scott Betson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcox7R_d2UIpZxJy9jg8qvKIHqDBWPRmbkoX9c7rSOI5RCVwk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic place to get a slice of Philly and New York with their sandwiches. If you want to try a Chopped Cheese if you’ve heard of it and haven’t tried it, I recommend it with the tomato, garlic sauce, and lettuce. It’s gonna make it fantastic! The people here running this shop make it so much more filling to see. Only downside is how small the shop space is as there’s not much for seating but they do make the sandwiches in front of you if you wanna see them do it. Can say I’ll be coming back 100% for the Chopped Cheese and maybe a Zapata as that sounds sooo good. Awesome stuff everyone! It’s a You Gotta Eat Here kind of place I feel! So fantastic..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOceLB5qq6ruX5QZxP65AdIFiIJOYx6b7TiUapZ&fid=0x0:0x157996bd6837d810"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"70s Guy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLpFEkMFgbYDe4BGpd7FdUKJSZCGFJjct_f3_FcWBpZ1Qx4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Damn good sandwich!  I've been meaning to stop by this new sandwich shop at the north end of the downtown Poco strip - finally made it today and Fresh Bite did not disappoint.

I had the Philly cheese steak sandwich which was made in front of me and served on a soft, fresh baguette style roll.  Price was fair for the quality of the sandwich ($15 including tip)

The owner was very friendly and even offered me a free sample of their house made pita bread to try.  (also delicious)

I will definitely be back to try the chicken kebab sandwich which is served on a Pita!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOApqjZVerkWiWPQh5s1OfxjhkyZ043Z8G3s5fM&fid=0x0:0x157996bd6837d810"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Patricia Sarroca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW3gn9k0ww-YG-IL2ET6t-Te-Van1nsgwgpJXzLXGZEiwGGfW4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This restaurant just opened up and I was very eager to try it. Just like the name says - the food is all fresh! The pictures don’t do the delicious sandwich justice. I wasn’t sure how I felt about the style of bun since it almost looked like a hot dog but but I was wrong , it was a fresh baguette style like bun. Do note that the food does take longer but that’s because they use fresh quality ingredients! We ordered the Philly cheese sandwich and it did not disappoint. Make sure you try out this local sandwich shop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOc_zuxS2MsDMdQYsw48Ag11Upy4F--zd-vISfV&fid=0x0:0x157996bd6837d810"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV44fpfaEhe-NUZmd0KxbQW5h4ZO24PneHP0Sgtc4_visySni_S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So glad there's finally a legit sandwich shop in the area. I went on their first couple days of opening and although they're still working out some kinks, they obviously care about the quality of what they're serving. Bread is made in house and they used big chunks of fresh meat. I'm not sure they were expecting to be so busy already. I tried the Philly cheesesteak and their fresh bread just elevated it to new heights. So hard to find a good philly. They have some middle eastern sandwiches as well made on home made pitas which I'll have to try next time. Very excited to have them in the neighborhood. Will be back often. Don't mind my photo of overfilled veggies, I requested it that way.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0jPsxpKIlqV7RwIc2CuuL_uZlBKhgV0lJSy7y&fid=0x0:0x157996bd6837d810"],"When":"2024-10-26"},{"Name":"Milad Esmaeilpour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU5Fp92GmfJrmhI9nTkbyE2Oed6YtbkIMAidtI4zP_WJSVGdPPSsQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious sandwiches that are prepared fresh right in front of you. They make their own pita wraps fresh! We’ve tried their Philly Cheese, chicken and koobideh sandwiches and they’re all great. Philly sandwich is more filling than the other ones.
Friendly service too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeev G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVqKzEs_siUW_4T3Y0xyZnnb-IYQ8PUJe53Rqb383Rv4Wo6w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sandwiches and quality ingredients! I tried their Philly cheesesteak and it was delicious, not skimping on the meat! I also got a chicken kebab wrap for my wife to-go and she was extremely happy with it. All of the meat and bread was grilled and baked fresh to order and you're given your choice of toppings. I am definitely coming back to try more!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"FRESH! Name speaks for it self, little bit of a wait but 100% worth it! Friendly service. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP1AeA_i4lVivBpdjNdGnZw_WmwWwhPHOzZRr7n&fid=0x0:0x157996bd6837d810"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Mahsa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXlUy1dOYEIyqYJxM5Cn5_hoL291jzxhchx0eJPJMH5YnKkVRXEpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We arrived just as they were about to close, but they kindly made us two delicious sandwiches. The homemade pita bread was amazing. So soft and fresh! The place was super clean, and the owners were really friendly. Awesome food, great vibe. Definitely coming back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Achala Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNIC2g0HGjKFHPx1wG-0_bq9506_pU_hOMImast0PQ1NG-Rw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently hosted a party for a group of 45 people here, and it was an amazing experience! The ambiance was perfect—warm, inviting, and spacious enough to accommodate our large group comfortably. The staff was incredibly attentive, ensuring everything ran smoothly and that we all felt welcomed. The food was delicious, with a great variety of options that everyone enjoyed. From appetizers to desserts, each dish was well-prepared and full of flavor. Our guests were delighted, and we couldn’t have chosen a better place for our celebration. Highly recommended for group gatherings","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjkUTU6pF5ebxpatL0ezKSfwYNsNwTAxd4-aoN&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Natasha Mendes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW8MrkpGvB93CVBNDfguq5bo6qfoTXiQgXikuLElA2iSrLfAVr3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"An Indian chaat and dosa restaurant serving varied, authentic and traditional cuisine.

The bright and clean ambience along with the taste of traditional Indian food made this place my Go to for my Desi cravings. You know it’s the real thing when they get the chutney and sambar right and my sambar had drumsticks! Yummy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTVRtCQs-pbFsNNaWpnizVCsN6YTq_hn_Hi3Ff&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"arti patel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYnkS3LwmlsJQ8qXHQqBgjglrvpQDwzq0Tl4KETEz6wH-OiGs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went in for an early dinner and shared Sambar Vada, Mysore Dosa and Chaat dish. Each dish tasted authentic and had different flavours! We also got Kulfi Falooda ( it’s ice cream with milk, vermicelli, other flavours). This restaurant has authentic cuisine from south India. We thoroughly enjoyed our vegetarian dishes! Will be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfsvlt8Jm0_BGsAWr0HR_72be89OHEmjm9D_ez&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-7-16"},{"Name":"Christopher Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTcJAGWdmNZh_350tGgyDVrHJVGD3SOIaxlTnaARTAJEKc5gtr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The masala mojito was so refreshing in the heat wave.  I'd come back just to have that again.

The dosas were delicious, with well-balanced flavours.

This place is a great addition to our neighbourhood.  They are also open until 11pm, so this is a nice change from all of the restaurants that close early.

Edit: Their AC is stronger than when we first csme, so it is very comfortable inside!

Edit 2: Got the Cauliflower 65 and the Lamb Kothu, and both were delicious!  We've never had Kothu before.  Will definitely get the Cauliflower 65 again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM75zi0bxfEX_oBvO-AlMIlWTiWgx14zidR80VX&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-7-9"},{"Name":"Akanksha Mhaiskar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJOkCkRt0arUT7rW2MYIakXUqVjyIzjsGuGnQWn803Lroe3vHu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for dinner and everything we tried tasted authentic !! We tried sambar wada, vada pav and chicken vindaloo dosa and all of them were extraordinary !! Ambience and service were great too!!  Highly recommended and will surely visit again ….","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNh1tRr623a2oOaS15Bjj8ZpJMAX9nXZ98durZB&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Ron S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIZcggmgM2MFIZbykYRW5nsqKFeELIB6kfrMLiWzttDZd4AEk4d=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing great tasting food, had chicken Dosa and lamb curry,  chicken 65 with Chatney appetizer was perfect spice for me.
Lamb curry and my son loved chicken dosa for time he said it was epic. One of the best tasting meals I have ever had in Great Vancouver.

Ordered take out after to bring home after for dinner and most curreys taste just as good when reheated.
Note I took photo and we had already started eating Chicken 65:) Looking forward to more meals here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONQDnQEBrZ4AQra1I8e2GFaXDGHI0-GXWm3dV7&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Nirali Bhate","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-Y-uOS6bvjpVbp0aCn0FDXGCbTKki1Qbg4mhoTrDVrVlHHCM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"“We had an amazing Diwali celebration at Dosa N Chaat Khazana! The food was delicious, with a variety of tasty dishes that included Vada Sambar, Paneer Chilli, and Chaat. For the main course, we enjoyed naan, missi roti, dal makhani, and mix veg—all vegetarian and absolutely full of flavor. We also had refreshing mango lassi and soft drinks. They do offer non-vegetarian options as well, though I’m vegetarian so I can’t speak much on that. The ambience was lively, with a big TV that made it fun to dance and enjoy the music, and the cleanliness was spot-on. Highly recommend this spot for Indian Cuisine","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMb3WC-lWEOnApFG6ZkH7LpHbxi9VWGoiuBhAgz&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"VARUN SENGAR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLPHLfcpSifJBWqIokaKJDad6xs82IQ31nTG0Qr2NVNDl2QRy0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem in PoCo downtown. We ordered Paav bhaji, Butter roast dosa & Raj kachori. The was food fresh and tasteful, with generous portion size and great value for money. Overall a great place for Indian food in POCO.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFQPA8i494366hoKYdxGidsc9RCK_rE_4nPRzQ&fid=0x0:0x337d776eade96f0"],"When":"2024-9-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"K’s coffee lover","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-385uQOflrqOxsV0QWsdIyhv-rxdZ7rLwLnLPmzpfPGzr9P6Z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Heard lots of great comment about this hidden sushi restaurant. Finally have a chance to check it out. We had high expectations from the sushi bar which definitely did not disappoint us.  All the fish were so so FRESH and tasty 🤤. Which goes well with good sake. This sushi restaurant carries wide range of Japanese beer and Sake. Read some comment regarding not able to book a table. I reserved my table by sending text msg. Contact no can be find in their website.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAwRnt--pe-oG_pYrmzDqjYEnUVoWFHJ5t3JNm&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2024-5-2"},{"Name":"Fady Daniel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtSa8909Zvb8JHUTGGVcRXnet67ACdiu-ilSLWe7UkrDATPic=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"very good restaurant clean modern you fill your in Japan. I really like it. Highly recommended gets service little bit expensive
But worth it everything fresh I will be back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2eq-Ta_DGQZ6mloqFzJe9ne7LbO24_76r6Og&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"Raymond Soegiharto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWaAFdVfw6WvqJk9LFfIIvryL-t9PGh-FNdHekUANnqs-xmp7GQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is a truly hidden gem in Poco. The sushi is authentic and not run of the mill kind. Service is fast, and the place is clean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPKF0u2C8wsAiyKANoNwDskP2zSCccqtnjtgmK9&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2024-8-16"},{"Name":"A C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNC-25n_7VHdF0fcW5yoHsSN_LG9V_NFaqhduDeuNjQmzbSx4rbw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolute gem! Love this authentic Japanese family run sushi restaurant. My friends and I have eaten sushi of all quality and price points from Asia and North America and this place does not disappoint. Their pricing is super on the low end but their quality and selection is amazing. They get their fish fresh from Japan and their 10pc nigiri omakase is beyond amazing at only $42!! You can get a similar deluxe nigiri set from Octopus garden at $80 but this place totally takes it at value!

This place is in a quiet place in Coquitlam but totally worth the drive from downtown Vancouver.

Highly recommend this place!!!

Pro tip: when ordering the spot prawn, always ask for the head to be deep fried. It’s delicious!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKUR88UjIg3OlGUD83mawHEWF0DEGQGEeb7SJL&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2021-9-18"},{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice Japanese family restaurant operated by an old couple. Very fresh sashimi and good tempura.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNuv_1X0vJvAyVWfgKpHB0hax9T2fb8aVDUGPf6&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Alex Lim.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTYyD_qWKDPciRpUU5J2ZXso4oVgiBQVoHTn6GW6TkM2ICONCr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of nigiri and sashimi. The uni and sweet prawn were my favorite among the other great dishes. Sockeye salmon sashimi also never disappoints","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOM4WHgOxDfgbC11p2OmyHAEmqvoObzttrD6RbJ&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2023-12-29"},{"Name":"Mei Louis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgXRRaGeGHZwDQ3Cd4BP54rgwmhE9FWdhKccUqwHk97sb73g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This gem is tucked beside SaveOn. Wouldn't have seen it if not for Google Maps. The generous portions and the freshness of the raw fish are worth every penny spent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPmamkC7-PamDA213TZD7gkAFaCdvMSgYt27jhJ&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2023-7-4"},{"Name":"Maria Tarasyuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJx5K1sgOHqYGdkqjAt61IHPyCo8MFYVdS9Wd4rw1EddjbwQpM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you're seeking an authentic sushi place with the freshest and softest fish, this is a great spot! Their Deluxe Nigiri set was an amazing gastronomic experience and was worth every dollar.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsILIIgo1yrIVysX0aNCqPjQtvutOaWsxfj38O&fid=0x0:0xec70b93b411740fa"],"When":"2023-7-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A pretty solid dim sum place with some good portion sizes for its price! It's nothing spectacular, but it's enough to fill our dim sum cravings. I also highly recommend trying out their congee dishes, it's a very big portion even for the smaller sizes :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqLUIR3113JQiwghJ0rTtfOg6MeBLHIom1Nusz&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Izmet Barranco","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiQo1jy483UmDOGk0DLpOPmwFqDxOxzKBlrj-9MTXzn_Zhoww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I gave a try to this place through Uber Eats (had a craving for Dim Sum) and I was very pleased with the result. Everything came well packed and hot. Portions are generous (had left overs for 2 more meals) and tasty. I will definitely order again from here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMmD7UXmUboit2xbF_yN5Ys4HOi60O1H1dOHOlJ&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Amy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXqddZyajPNoFhSfeKC0jxyRc2Om1n2-N6OKu8IHOhfMDJ3cE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Third time to come this restaurant for lunch. Nobody write down your name or give a number to get a table. That’s not good. Always need to walk to cashier area to ask for table. It’s very noisy inside restaurant and hard to talk with friend to bring along. Th good timing for dim sum is after 2pm, no need like up and more quiet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMQnvjNsoDWrZlglHOi1dhcGhcoRCXeaAcuWXnW&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Stacy Purum Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJokIsJGL-fv0gSK_iI4jQxVk_jmrb_b6s-LN0DAYOqzSpY2xQLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wonderful place to have family celebration, big group gatherings. But as a big group, prepare to be hungry a little bit. Serving is not super fast but your stomach will be full for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdARKT_83o7JGkz1gZt3M9u5asO5tb7xwpZ3CG&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-7-22"},{"Name":"Christine W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKPsEE58m4l7C5YBEcOPLQtBTaYwdBFGzTSKEIraaLnCr6OYcs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We made it just before the lunch rush at noon and only waited about ten minutes for a table of 3.

The hostess asked me if I would like Jasmine tea, I said no and asked for Chrysanthemum tea.  She didn’t understand me and brought me jasmine anyway but it wasn’t a big deal.

We marked off the dim sum we wanted on the paper and the dishes came out relatively quickly considering how busy it was, one at a time.

The food was steaming hot and delicious.  We had the egg tarts, fried tofu, shrimp rice rolls, beef balls, pan fried prawn and chive dumplings, chicken feet and beef brisket rice rolls in a clay pot.

Everything was absolutely delicious, the shrimp rice roll was loaded with prawns!  The servers aren’t the friendliest and don’t hide that they’re annoyed when you ask for other things such as hot sauce or a drink.  I understand that they’re busy though and I’m there for the food so it’s not a big deal.

The hostess also missed one item that I checked off on our order but we were full anyway.

Bottom line, yes I would absolutely return for dim sum!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOnaVG2kGThAKwI_-1GwALL1JRsn48bC2BI75fc&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Ngoc Ha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBQDR7xuHV7zpmSmm8y3qArF6yv91O7Kuz_kGRJuYZ6FiARojF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a 3rd time I am here. There are long line up for brunch. I have never had to pay, so I can't tell about tipping thing. The service has room to improve certainly. For example, when we say today the food seem to be a little bit saltier than the last time we were here, and we ask if they have new chef or what; the server acts like we speak nonsense. I am attaching here the updated menu in case you need to know the increased price. Today is September 30, 2024. I recommend you to bring cash to pay and ask for promotion of cash payment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwhQqJazyjZJ780aB1nl5jFq0sJazfM_7PRRv9&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"---edit June 2024---
I tried different dim sum dishes.
Deep fried squid tentacles - really good. Portion is a bit small

Beef Rice rolls - good texture.

Shrimp paste on eggplant - came out piping hot

Shrimp patty with chives - this one came out cold... it was good but it probably sat there for a while

Deep fried glutinous rice balls with meat filling - the outside mochi was good but the filling was lacking in flavor and in portion

Beef brisket on chan chuen fan - love the noodles. Can't get this type of noodle in many places. Beef brisket was tough and not much flavor. Would try the pork riblets next time.

-------------
In terms of flavor, this has got to be one of the wosrt ones I have been to.

Century egg and pork congee - flavorless. No salt. No base whatsoever.

Hand shredded chicken salad - extremely small. Most places that give smaller portions have expensive jellyfish in the salad. This place is only chicken and preserved vegetables so there is no need for it to be half the size of the plate, smaller than other specialty chef items.

Deep fried chicken knees - giant pieces only to find out it is 80% batter. The garlic salt and spice just sat at the bottom and the chicken was never stirred with it.

Minced pork fried glutinous rice dumpling - the glutinous rice wasnt very sweetened. The insides were ok. The only good thing is that it came with 4 pieces instead of 3.

Overall, the dimsum dishes were not very good. The prices are high with poor quality dishes. Maybe their dinner menu makes up for it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRL0bQXOdXOmLCPckVyE40kKNkpOpokL1auaQZ&fid=0x0:0x2f02bed8d172b222"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"Brayden M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPBZNPVNqHW8dSCFike-NLUMkuCrsmT6ZW7ysivwMhyRbgUxkL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for lunch again, and it's always a great experience here! Arrived around 2p, so we were seated promptly (wait time ~20 minutes during peak hours).
We ordered the 蝦餃 shrimp dumplings, 牛筋肚 beef stomach tendon, 菠蘿叉燒包 BBQ bun with crispy topping, 鹹水角 'football' pork croquette, and 炸兩腸粉 fried rice roll.
The Pineapple BBQ bun was sold out, so we replaced it with a regular BBQ bun. However our order was not properly registered, and we had to wait around half an hour for it to come out, though our server handled the situation very well.
The shrimp dumplings were large and fresh, the pork bun serving was generous, the croquette was hot and fresh, and the rice roll was super quick to come out.
Overall, we had a great experience, save the minor hiccup with the pork bun, and I look forward to coming back!
Total cost for 5 dishes: $48+tip","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Jimmie Mitchell","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVXR6wUm0lgZgvSi7C1j6GOl0shdaQgFTP7c5sE96BI6AUiQT_P=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"North tasted very good. The large house special pho was filling. Salad chicken roll was delicious. Viet ice coffee was what I expected. Place was quite busy already for dinner before 6 pm. Would visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOocFN6NrdolHUnOM2ZClTYEykpuLbPH3vBBBTA&fid=0x0:0x4c03fae378fac8f7"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"Marty Robson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLs-qAopzNrx9EGQDi7GN4xD02J2pck_DVfjFguPBup-m7aNw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pho 51 Is our favourite Vietnamese restaurant. I can’t remember how many times we have has Pho and it’s been super salty they season that soups perfectly here. An emphasis on health and taste. Those who know about Vietnamese food will appreciate how clean and fresh and tasty food is. The owner, who is lovely, treated us with a free Vietnamese coffee after our dinner. the service is super friendly, and the food is Sensational!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP74koDd9v-_dNx8w-9mmbS2FTwO7fEPVtJWw9C&fid=0x0:0x4c03fae378fac8f7"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Jennifer QC Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvEycMetQ2qBBYbb69CD9fB8-C9Lt7_RAzoQDKv_njvoyxuQimoA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My second time to come to this Vietnamese Restaurant inside the somewhat new to me plaza in Port Coquitlam. The friendly services and fresh good quality food. MY husband like their Grilled Lemongrass Pork Chop (juicy and meaty) with rice and salad. The famous Rare Steak and Rice Noodles in Soup. Very reasonable price too.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rahul Chadha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVobj1UEYQdI0jNBj7TT3GejauUOjkw9hlu8Odzj_YyyegSiE06JA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious. Such wonderful staff! Thank you for the fantastic meal after climbing at the hive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-y1ZBnf-vzsF3UWNkviB-C0WvskQT6CGXUjcI&fid=0x0:0x4c03fae378fac8f7"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Shawn Pederson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUE1pg-AUV60_J-mzyu8ObtqOlvf6nSxUllyi_-cowZ3fdsIyw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was excellent. The server was pleasant. And the fellow customers enjoyed themselves in exciting conversations while they waited for the food. In a mainstream world where all restaurants look the same, this place transported my son and I into a foreign world while we ate. Thank you for remaining unique in the face of a million mirrors.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"James H Terre","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXQe3cD2OAW2WicJ2iFvBRW7BSYgRuA0F0JJhj-r3nWIlovZFE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"veggie spring roll (5.95) / deep fried squid patty (13.50) / deep fried chicken wings (14.75) / pho chin nam gan sach (17.95) / hu tieu tai sate (18.25)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLwJ4JGWElRAV2VJIE7N5jF9Hv9eUbwGb4wMrH&fid=0x0:0x4c03fae378fac8f7"],"When":"2024-5-6"},{"Name":"D James","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwc3KKuUbX1If5UPHN7eLz1aw3cboPxA8m1AEfNRS8vXFd0V5S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Broth was very bland. Tasted like they used bouillon cubes and water.

Aside from that, I had a dreadful experience checking out. Debit machine was down so they had me e-transfer my payment to them which I did not have time for. Sat there for what seemed like forever logging into my bank to input their info then had to wait for the payment to go through even though in showed them the transfer was complete.. I ended up walking out and will definitely never walk back in again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sam Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKE5mTKD61HIgHQk8dxPyuoRqeGbk2g-M7HwnIwadO5n9CEZ1k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you love Pho, this is a great place to try!  Their Pho broth is very good, dishes are generous size.  Service has been consistently good.

Grilled lemongrass chicken is also a good alternative to their Pho soups.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lenny Pottier","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxzZl5gT-cauJ3WfvWzNtU6dLIejZJz4545gK9rOohGI8c0kc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Bbq is my go too fro kfc, i love their cheeseling fries... i usually order from the port moody location and never been disapointed. Today i order from this location and received weird shaped fries mushy and barely edible. Yes it was free with my purchase but for the quality i will have prefer paid and get rhe real deal.... (see picture attached). Chicken was good but not as crispy as usually get in port moody. Will probably not order from this location again even though it is closer .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOwJ1OtTgs7S3n5mfI5LJ9h1H_DuFFGlqgoLD9G&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Jennelle Stam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWYGUfyG2dESbyA1fBLy08rntV4nEfvkAAwXniWbZmYxCYIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Finally got the chance to dine here, after months of my friend recommending it (and sending lots of bragging pics). It did NOT DISSAPOINT. Not only am I planning on coming back here to make my way through the menu, I'll join my friend in singing it's praises. Food was awesome, and service was wholesome.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOK1D7wMftVr2zQ-SnWrQzZ8xwrydvMFLAIxHYB&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This spot was kind of easy to miss entering the plaza where H mart and Pomme are. The KFC Korean Fried 🍗 Chicken was absolutely amazing! Tou have no idea so many flavors ever Gangnam Style !!
Rhw server was super nice even though the kids were making a rawkus!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMljFLHZqn4SXfgxAlv9n7VzRvIazMUCtesYhyP&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Ellen Sea","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgyvw39gUnCgl6xsGC3h38EgAvDpICnxUdU619L8I4-wyV0VMy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Ordered the galbi q chicken and the assorted cheese balls with a pitcher.
The chicken was actually quite good and moist but it wasn't crispy at all, so I can imagine that the takeout orders wouldn't be crispy either. The assorted cheese balls were also really good but just know that they're filled with cream cheese and not the stretchy mozzarella!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVhOBmL1dXlMrjKdvXJeEweA36IPC25MDmn-qE&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious hot chicken straight from the deep fryer. Fast service and it only took less than 10 minutes from ordering to when we got our first dish. Lots of fried chicken options to choose from but we chose the golden fried which is this place’s signature dish. It was so flavourful despite looking very normal. The restaurant also has $5 happy hour 3-5 pm and 9-close every day. Lots of parking at the plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdBNPkj9lUhkiYlFXOCn5CmJyKztu4wSvXxjsz&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Lindsey Williamson Christy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm0fBNIzlRgvO6bgjVqXgXmvR5p2HzkxHc09XqHLqCh77AS_a1fA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Awesome little Mom & Pop Korean Chicken place. We tried a few things and everything was great. It’s good little spot for a quick tasty meal","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVDSwHj5NdWzjBydxx3Bp83sC3EjikOB47Bkxh&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"P H (p p)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJKZy9bt4M6XUHig_6VLAGdw5hO6Ek6ULZkNZOMB3D3bFiKF4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Service is good cause I just picked up not for here.
The secret source flavor is not good as Metrotown. I still remember that metrotown’s is more spicy and the amount of chicken is larger.

I could remember wrong for the amount but the taste must be right. Hope it will improve next time. Well I still love it anyway.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNifXAAchMK9-BVRuriRjlpbA5Rzsa8LWflCELG&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Fremy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWqXXZ5rKarOZyZdNvNUw-YcnDQL3N2JVFQewPrpwmHEPRYalMs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The honey garlic chicken was really succulent and crispy. The flavour of the garlic and honey harmonizes really well and its flavour was bursting the moment you take a bite into it. On the other hand, the mala hot chicken tasted more peppery rather than the signature flavour profile of mala. It has a really strong kick for people who are not accustomed to hot spices, such as myself. Overall, for less than $20/pax, their portion is just right.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiPdaZa_WzdSiRuZctc9_11e4iWL0ills8MITc&fid=0x0:0x616e899f573a2426"],"When":"2023-2-12"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Westcoast SCI","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpJhoP7-vC8Se5z3JAfb4BRE9JvzaGqnklMMi9D-Mq3-jOlfGK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such friendly caring staff. Food is always top notch. Been going here for ages and are never disappointed. Great south East Asian food and a local favorite.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWthTd3sZpy1B6sbOYXmPIwJTJ8MWT6CwPmaQY&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Adrienne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKvS1YiBi1kAYmplCTkzo9NqyjbLMViYayHxaEQA-dKyQUyyA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service was great, our meals came out quickly. The food was very tasty and well seasoned - we do wish the crispy prawns were crispier, but overall everything was great. Their chili oil had a lot of flavour and is great with pho.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOJCURKxhDsejvYWKZ3B2tGoLFsHmqwT3PbhcwV&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2024-6-1"},{"Name":"Melinda Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMsYIuruesNJ4fTjqy4yNevJthJq9c29QqfPxA8x09D9sg2sf9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Two eggs for the rice combo?! Two thumbs up! All the food we had here was great. I really enjoyed the chicken spring rolls, they’re fried slightly differently and it was so crunchy! It was slightly rainy today so the pho really hit the spot. It was a solid broth. We ordered mostly Vietnamese tonight but there was also tempting Thai food on the menu. Would be interested in coming back to try those.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8UTX-2aljdQeJ3LYJ7VLvwf206soFVvn3NLF_&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2023-10-17"},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Hungry we decided to try this place for pho and wasn't expecting much. Was surprised to see that they also had Thai food. The mango salad had some really unique flavours with spice, sweetness and crunchy textures from the mango and cashews. The pho broth was flavourful and meat seemed fresh. The lemongrass chicken was also well seasoned and one of the best we've had. The shrimp rolls were alright, i wouldn't get them again. The service however, was a bit of a miss with one of our food coming significantly later than the others. Overall good spot to grab a bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPiWbheoUAie-TYos2gKT4z4NTT52Q5fBSephfj&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2023-9-2"},{"Name":"Lu Kong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiVMtuHct0ut1Io0IRXiCox51SyCX5BuI9wBm4XQtwUdKlKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"For those who want pho and Thai dishes that is really good in one place. This is it. Started on the combo platter then realized should've taken a picture.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNw02Bh1DYLgwrWxEuHwcTOfEyn_D68CfX53A3F&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"John Harris","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKAq3ml95jHUMxZNKiBUEM24tdpzJMiqP5RJmX8-A4uSjHfIg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their pad Thai is very good. But why isn't plain chicken pad Thai a regular menu item anymore!? I don't want chicken AND shrimp / to be charged the same price if I want chicken only. I don't want to deal with picking off shrimp shells or skin or whatever the shrimp stuff you can't just eat is.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Blampin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUe_Zl-7bsR_k4aPN0CDrFm3JxQQaY2wgkXgNPVdZQs9NDoFTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really good food. They have so many things to choose from. Thai and Vietnamese dishes.
Appetizers, soups, Mango salads! 🥭  Various spring rolls, Ravens, Noodle dishes and rice dishes.
Quick service.
Lots of parking outside and nice booths yo sit at inside.
I'd go there again for sure to try something new from the menu.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvp-DNUoHMlkOHc7q4cn6AuP1fZ67JpgES4kr2&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2023-5-15"},{"Name":"Jason York","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2KL5JJiTZL1QVt_3AcqILQXXBIuqDWdYOdj3lYENvavlAma6S8A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Vermicelli - Grilled beef w/ spring roll
... Got a free beverage for my Google Maps review.
Food was beautifully presented and tasty.  I'm personally not allergic to peanuts and was happy to have that option on the side.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNYpDJ1yDJLzCSeZClsNkf2VsUYfYZe8EnseRp0&fid=0x0:0xcd64adebb2d5434"],"When":"2024-4-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Deb PS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX2JrjvxBJWPrjHCwBxV9NiRybb9V5GJpynDBuSW5sd6snYZiMa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is a very unassuming place. I would have never guessed it looked like this inside based on the exterior. It was very clean and the staff was super friendly with a great sense of humour.  The food was also very flavourful.  We all enjoyed our meal very much for not being a high end restaurant. Prices were very reasonable as well. Will be back for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCVOc1V1GanW0vAfXOMHxUlD7OXgwln2QuHrH_&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-10-24"},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hadn’t been for a while. Food was really good and service super friendly. Good size portions. I would prefer a menu with pictures though.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxcvuP86fZtjp3Yr1fSFBnF1sXV3XGZII_RYI&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Ricardo Amanda Paliotti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-tWR3oImGXb1bh0eJaBkqqB4lKa--eRLaWv99DtP2gOoadI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellently executed every time we visit. Flavors are on point. Always fun times there ! ☆☆☆☆☆ / Dec. 15th Sun 2024","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFnUCp9_Bgr50_ywSBFmDWPht7MdMv6uwMz8wv&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-10-27"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This place has been here since I was a kid. Glad to see it's still here and I'm visiting again after 20+ years. All I remember was that I liked their hot and sour soup.

Not really an authentic Szechuan restaurant. 30 years ago, most chinese cuisines were cooked by hong kongers or south chinese people. So, most of these dishes are going to be a southern take on it.

Hot and sour soup - price is awesome. $11 enough for at least 6 bowls. Souo base is missing a bit of flavor but it is jam packed with ingredients.

Drunken chicken - it was ok. Little on the salty side.

Shanghainese pan fried pork buns - these were probably the worst I've had. Not made in house and not properly pan fried. No juice, super dry, no fried bottom crust.

Bean curd wrapped pork dim sum - surprisingly this came out last. At least 20 min has passed. This is a steamed dish but it came out with dried edges like it was sitting on a dry heater. Taste was ok.

Mapo tofu - asked for extra spicy and extra numbing. Numbing was there but nowhere near real szechuan numbing. Was not spicy at all. Sauce was more oily than saucey.

The price point reflects the quality. Things are either mediocre or a complete miss. Would come again to try only the better stuff. Staff was friendly. Came to try to refill the tea way more times than normal. The iron goddess tea tastes much better than a lot of dim sum places elsewhere.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsyXtmZVjFTpSM7j5XHpsMqasJjiN51hrkn9sk&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-5-14"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good Chinese food, some of the best we’ve tried! Brought my family of 18 there and everyone had a very positive review to leave. The restaurant is clean, nicely decorated and the service is phenomenal, on top of amazing Chinese food. 100% recommend. Accommodated us no problem and efficiently being a large group.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4Zm-hsHEcTAf_11Ju8D7ypxHDl4umZ6xffmp0&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Marie Amin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIKR0qp3fose5GsYts0dtMeJqwXo1MWNFSPwo4SjCtJGEbgYA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I have been craving for a good Chinese food. We have done take out here many times before,  it's our first time dining in actually.   I am so amazed on how good the service is at this restaurant. Food came out fast and it was delicious.  Did not disappoint 🙌.  Thank you wahwing, we will definitely dine in again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOVB0fCOEp8ge2kh842Ux2XpFXVwgqLutUtBbEG&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"Amy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUamHxgbXpYwrJI1uE5cJUYfe1wmxOQk5ygeSabzKwSDEQZmU3C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my first time to dine in at this restaurant. The service is good but the food need some improvement. I ordered a noodle but the soup base taste salty . Chef should put less salt or no salt since the veggie already taste salty and the Chinese broccoli taste not much flavour.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNCpErihv2HeGr4hQralU6fnwyOSS6XRaqyldOu&fid=0x0:0x7c85358e6c767e95"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"Julio Cipriano","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdiL69VWk_HhrY9vvXJcaFkLa2z0igCrSjghxutPFMYl05ZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been going or ordering from here for 20+ years. Can’t remember a less than great meal!  Same applies today for lunch ginger beef, pork buns, even something simple like spring rolls all 5 *.  Tried the fried banana balls  and mango ice cream.  So so good!  Staff went out of their way to make sure my mother (little older) was taken care of. Congrats on 30 years and hope your here for another 30 for my kids to keep coming to!","Images":null,"When":""}]
