user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you try this place out, you have to order the fried chicken wings that are garlic flavoured and crispy on the outside and juicy on the inside. Love the booth seating too. Another highlight is the trio dessert with warm creamy kidney and white beans and green pandan jelly that is mildly sweet and warm on the bottom topped with ice and condensed milk and syrup. The textures, temperature difference, and flavours go together so well in the trio dessert and it was very enjoyable and beautiful to look at in a good sized mug portion. The spring rolls were solid too. The pho dac biet and beef carpaccio were just average. Their sauces are nice and fragrant with lemon grass hot sauce. A good dinner. Would go back for the chicken wings and trio dessert.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMeSPoBD5ayxZ1dsT5JC4iC7lB5DjLNkYVkoEAU&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Adam O'Hara","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWilWKfj4mARbNOIUfPpMaX6ohQ3UW0xGMG7MTlXisTmO2eNVjR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We order takeout from Mr Pho all the time. The food is excellent and fresh, and it is very consistent. Springs rolls are unbelievable, and the salad rolls are so good too. We enjoy the lemongrass chicken vermicelli and grilled pork vermicelli dishes.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSYqyxiJnWogm_AZoK3WzQJJxKn_ncDVYKHKpD&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There is a lack of good pho places in PoCo. This place was surprisingly good and for a realistic price. Pho can be from 16-22 nowadays and this place is priced on the low end. The beef broth was extremely well made - super beefy and lots of spice. I would rate the broth one of the top ones in Greater Vancouver. Their vermicelli was ok. Nothing especially delicious about it. I wish they offered lemon grass meat for their vermicelli. Their service is good and they ask you if you want the bean sprouts cooked or not. Lots of places kinda give you the face if you ask for that.

There are limited parking spots here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-EohuPShCGZKVIfAMpXKwPBFyny9oPbtfr5Q3&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2024-11-8"},{"Name":"Mei Louis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgXRRaGeGHZwDQ3Cd4BP54rgwmhE9FWdhKccUqwHk97sb73g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cozy atmosphere, friendly staffs and delicious food add to a great dining experience. The grilled pork and spring roll vermicelli bowl and spicy Hue beef noodle are flavourful.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOA5n6LNYMV3gxDQoO0WY6CAj1oKNtFbf3nrI_p&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"Jack Antos","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI1TGVjeR1aosKpbwp6STozjVfeCGVhxvIWQhreLHIAbO1a8w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and customer service. Had food to table during a full house 10 min after ordering. Highly recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPemNh5al-HfCq2g9_8cTqi1M4BBhzQYUmEUoZ_&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2024-8-25"},{"Name":"Avis Woo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXh4Pb-SJt2DTMUggN2-tIRxEo8pAErRU5SI_TxM4gC-gvdVBym=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was our 26th wedding anniversary last night and we wanna celebrate with Vietnamese food! Really follow the 4.6 rating and choose this Mr.Pho and everything was so satisfactory with awesome great taste! 👍🫰🏻😍Even the house tea tasted great! The bill was surprisingly value for money too❤️We definitely will come again and again from time to time! 👍","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Christopher Tan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTcJAGWdmNZh_350tGgyDVrHJVGD3SOIaxlTnaARTAJEKc5gtr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You have to try the chicken wings, especially if you like garlic. The wings were incredibly crispy, yet plump and tender on the inside.

The green mango salad was also great, with well-balanced flavours.

We also got the pho, which was good, and had a lot of meat, but we thought that the broth could be a bit stronger (with respect to the spices and herbs).

It's a great addition to the neighbourhood! The chicken wings themselves are good enough to come back for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdFqNaI3QMljyDkB5FkwZwpDvFJy124fGvgLXn&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2022-11-21"},{"Name":"Elysa Jones","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAo75J_Rtfi9O06eVuLzCtXlTBuV0m9jYy9iywg0OytgDFLbGDzw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Got takeout from here a couple times and was always impressed (not to mention the food travels well).

Today I got the opportunity to go in and fell in love with the place even more. Cute decor with lush live plants all around.

Service was super attentive and food was served quickly.

These are hands down some of the best wings we’ve ever had! The beef carpaccio was perfectly balanced and full of flavour, and both definitely be something we come back for.

Beef ball pho and pork sausage rice plate were both super tasty, and very generous. we definitely left very full and will be back for more - Hands down best Vietnamese in Poco!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMM7IQOr1JcxG17zGJMTDeRZHIpILQA3LFdp3W&fid=0x0:0x8b84110915097c24"],"When":"2022-12-19"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Clara Chau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoMWRC0cDGP4nCpQ1_Zdm86daXS0A0KJbVAa9QczqqbfD7fWIZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here a couple years ago when I was in the area for a construction project and was back again for another! The meal we had this time was as good as I remembered. You order at the front and as the sandwich or wrap is being made, you pay at the cashier counter on the left. We got the schnitzel sandwich with a hamburger soup and a chicken caesar wrap with the cream of mushroom soup. It was so filling and one of the best places to eat at in this industrial area. Definitely my go to cafe whenever I'm in the area for projects.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRvjyPLX2cIVwIjqrPrMI_56YKGPMkHonsJN3N&fid=0x0:0xcb8389149a656735"],"When":"2024-10-19"},{"Name":"Tara Mcwilliams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_ylB7rUaGCnXVjDoaLmquAg048zRAxIPFyQczQ6NNELdySlzk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update Dec 21/24

Since my previous review, they continue to amaze and delight! My husband is addicted to the Korean pork and when I p/u my lunch I usually bring it home for dinner now. Haha I'm lucky to get any. They also have a bunch of new dessert squares which are just as addicting. Highly recommend 👏👏

Previous review
Amazing Korean pork on Thursday and spicy Korean chicken on Tuesdays! The Shepard's pie is also on Thursday and delicious. They do a chicken Katsu with curry that's very well done and their chicken Blt sandwiches are so good too! The chicken sandwiches are made with the schnitzel and pounded until tender and thin, lightly fried and crispy. The specials are typically served with salad but you can have soup instead.

The specials change every day- so usually 2-4  hot dishes plus 2 soups rotating daily. In addition, there's a sandwich bar menu with many different types of hot and cold sandwiches and made fresh to order. (Salads are as well) U can choose your toppings and dressings and select between different bread types, or different buns, or a wrap.

The dessert available fluctuates- usually they have a selection of a few of these; lemon coconut, Nanaimo bar, oat fudge, triple chocolate brownie, peanut butter bar, Rocky road and then a selection of huge cookies - peanut butter dipped in chocolate, oatmeal raisin, chocolate chip. Chips, candy bars, gum and beverages too

The service is really what makes this place stand out. It's a well oiled machine for one; they all work in amongst each other very well, and know where the next staff is going to move next. They are super fast and efficient even with a huge line I've never waited long. They're super sweet and accommodating and so friendly! They try to accommodate anything you ask of them and never seem put out. I'm here every week as a result of the service. In a world where service seems to be lacking and most fast casual places full of either under trained or uninterested staff, this place is a gem! Oh, and it's SUPER CLEAN! Even when they're super busy the place is spotless. Both behind the line and in the restaurant area. It's an open kitchen and prep area too and it's literally kept impeccable and they have fantastic hygiene. Well done!

Thank you :)","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"breakneck777","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIJD5h8PnJQlkxk6pWskbzuz_uWIWTigTynUjEtLAWcqsSiw2k=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Decent food if overpriced. Nice owner, unfortunately the older lady working the front is too stupid or miserable to handle the job.  Customer service goes a long way for a small business!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Elmira Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUS8psOPde-fgvVYsglTVKj-j9hpNdB1347mGr_T9d11yAStREO4w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great lunch spot. Very quick and good stuff. Loved the chicken schnitzel sandwich and the soups. The sandwich could have used a little more flavour, but overall recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbYVekYTC7ueJtN7VUG-Luhq7yTNX1LSIXJ_98&fid=0x0:0xcb8389149a656735"],"When":"2020-10-6"},{"Name":"Blaine Hodge","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1q3xKjHksN2qtWy7GxOL2aicsOG9q4q9cy8x_SKxzZgT8A4D8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The chicken schnitzel sandwich is my goto.  I keep meaning to try other things on the menu, but the schnitzel wins the decision every time I walk in the door. Everything else always looks tasty as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNFYRtsi85PQmuM_ZO7C8BPoJhDimzJ1_g_zqzT&fid=0x0:0xcb8389149a656735"],"When":"2023-1-14"},{"Name":"Amanda Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX2-QkU6r0X4DLM6-w27hOoQabXaFOXnHBh92gU3KWWKAd6KWGjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's almost impossible to find a place these days that offers reasonably priced, consistently delicious and convenient food that isn't greasy fast food. Suzette's is an absolute gem! Their BLTs really hit the spot - the bacon is smoky and thick with a perfect texture every time. The schnitzel sandwich is also fantastic, and the blend of veggies they add really puts it over the top. I love that they use local Cobs bread - I can't resist the sourdough! The soups are also delicious. Thank you Suzette's for being my breakfast/lunch saviour. ❤️","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jo Makeup","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVl737EErGAxSogRAYd6tmxJ8UArTd6-ofyTW45YWdG2u4hqqs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Good prices, good people, good food. Get the schnitzel","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsQK2qgWsEWtbZ5MGT1H9TvKW-vscc9zrJPCgT&fid=0x0:0xcb8389149a656735"],"When":"2024-11-15"},{"Name":"John M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWItgijJKwgA0f52g38y2veJk-Ddfx32Y6n5pRa8jqM3m7RR0lStA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is located in an industrial area. They have good food options and specials on different days for the week. Lots of workers in the area stop by here.

Not really much of a cozy atmosphere but they have lots of seating available inside. Parking is available in the industrial complex behind the building.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Faith Oh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIRU1l7lR0St2FKA3sFQRqByUMO0kTpIy7V5hHpzuF2subJjzXD=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious sushi restaurant in poco!! Their complimentary barley green tea was so tasty and it washed down well after each bite so smoothly… The Japanese Pumpkin Korokke appetizer was so mouth watering it was almost the best thing we got here. Must get! We ordered assorted aburi sushi combo, very high quality with good prices (in the photos it shows 8 pieces because we ordered extra! Originally it comes with 7 generous pieces). Hawaiian roll with the deep fried garlic and ponzu sauce was just the perfect roll, also a must get. Godzilla roll was very much like the roll’s name and was so delicious! Such a bang for your buck. All the staff here were so polite and provided sensible service. Prices were so reasonable for the quality and quantity given, which is always great. Definitely will become a regular here and if you haven’t checked Sushi Mi out yet, this is a must visit for sushi!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzXJo8KsApKoaLia23Wcokx0ss2NEd9bO4nvsl&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Keith Eastcott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk5BCUEJh42hOpsF-_OoCCbmyygcrHIJcijMiuq6slKML49qmN0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place. Sushi is great. Chicken teriyaki dinner is great. Definitely check them out, eat in or take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBpR8fJVK14gqnTfKjaq_QAyhepgz0GbWd6Rwy&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-12-9"},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for their lunch special 20% off.

Good food, just slightly small portions.

Food: We had the lunch combos, Dynamite, Mi Special and Aburi Oshi. The rolls and sushi were fresh, packed tight and very delicious. Tempura tasted slightly off with a slightly strong old oil flavour. Spring rolls were so so.

Service: Relatively fast as there were not many patrons around.

Price: Approx 20 per person before tax and tips and after discount.

Would I recommend: Yes. I’d recommend getting their rolls and none of their fried stuff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOxATTfNNWlB1NJHdfw7CoJHFjyTtctWHtNZi9&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"ALFRED CHEUNG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIT2FfsIYlcMtZMfx5S50jtyBU4f02MMH3fvMct4kX_yli8F6e5A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We go there for lunch and the lunch special doing a promotion discount. The food is excellent, and the service is fine. Overall experience is excellent. We go down once a month, never disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMrWyBW8pfFf_3jKGuTEkWgRDIZK0B58lSyWkKd&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-8-20"},{"Name":"AnnB G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx_EqQ1Qby9In7pmXay57uqh-S35etSlqf6kLjV8ZKXTATjchx=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had to try this little gem based on the reviews! Delicious food, well presented and value priced! The server was super nice, tiny dining area but clean, modern and pleasant! I had combo, partner had 2 rolls. More than enough! We’ll be back soon! Highly recommend this local family shop!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCNmXD5cjjUnj5_uuW07A4_qbPajdl5Y7kjixc&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-3-13"},{"Name":"Holly Boucher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-xeDRiO9_ikZrdv5UeZDCWB1UhcifZhsaqcEbQ9q7pMZ_o8M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Found this place by happy accident today! I’m from out of town but I can definitely say when I drive through I’ll be stopping here from now on. The portions are generous and everything was absolutely delicious. The owners are very friendly and kind. The restaurant itself is quaint and clean. Best of all there’s a 20% discount on the lunch combo’s menu right now. I got the premium lunch combo (miso soup not pictured here, but included) which came to $20 after discount. I’ll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjY8lUUeYga91a5_tItB7tXk16ZZ-TlrMU2uFU&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-1-4"},{"Name":"Jana Kivi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLHGq7TC1gz1Wulhf2LuP2-XduKFqa27fK4a5yFBRhWyXreg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"In town for one night, found Sushi Mi and so glad we did. We ordered an assortment of specialty rolls and were delighted with all. The prices are quite reasonable considering the amount and quality of the dishes. Staff are so friendly and welcoming. We received the Jackson roll and pumpkin croquette on the house and they're so yummy! This restaurant deserves all the love! Highly recommend . Excuse the half eaten food photos !😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqQAEzovGPOYMsS4Z7_DuqnVRa3Em3UNW08cs&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2022-12-18"},{"Name":"Fernandawong1 Instagram W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNFtqoy-cwodQwEn82tgfWyur2vGbFJj5rTY0AvCzEsWJEe71e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"5 starts to this place is amazing, super clean and amazing food I really enjoyed this place. Beautiful atmosphere a little bit small but is good","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw6lmiCUQdsgh9luUHEmYKwMcR61YFlkzWaGuR&fid=0x0:0x4c18326833f0f8da"],"When":"2024-8-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"De Dutch in PoCo is a fantastic place for breakfast or brunch. Our family often pops in spontaneously, and we've never been disappointed. Staff are welcoming and kind.

This weekend, I tried the Banana Walnut Pannekoek. It was great - balanced sweetness and satisfying textures. I'd definitely order it again.

Wonderful coffee as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCUzcF1aD566iblSvYeuCjczzYzXi2yFhLD6WY&fid=0x0:0x2a2ffa9683aaa841"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Karen Bhartu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLdopOfw1lel9670W1W1oVUovbH9ggQ-wn3kfHpu_Tg3BNaqg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to love this place. Unfortunately just had a horrible experience. Walked in, no wait…straight to our table where we proceeded to wait 10-15min while several servers walked past. Had to ask the hostess to please identify our server. The manager came, and said our server was busy with a bigger table. The manager took our order and brought our drinks, and then after 40minutes of sitting and waiting with hungry children we were told it would be an additional 10 minutes as there were 2 orders ahead of us. Left hungry. Won’t be returning. Oh, and we still don’t know who our actual server was.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Agni K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkDG9ralu9RS3nZ0v4vIcP6bNgjmOEKH-8N8DikYFi0AF_Esan=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for brunch, was craving a good crepe and boy did they deliver! Crepes were light, filled plenty, great ingredients and delicious! I ordered a cheeky baileys coffee which was somewhat a disappointment, it was very watery, had no whipped cream on top, and lacked coffee taste. It seemed very watered down. But then I ordered an espresso martinis and that was perfect! I should’ve started with it!

Staff are friendly, attentive, they repeated our order back to us to make sure our modified order was correct and brought our food promptly. Overall it was a good experience.

I particularly liked the solarium dining area as you could enjoy the warmth of the sun without feeling the chill of the wind. They also have an outdoor patio for warmer months.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUBNRGv68sYC-j_8WblXYgcHe28ctM08U1S_Kl&fid=0x0:0x2a2ffa9683aaa841"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"MORI N.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXmh-25mC5oA1PFMMA_52ysg1xmB302WDBqAM9LeMqrXCsb_9pPTA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We were sat right by the solarium style area with lots of windows and light shining through.....so good start.

What's good about chain restaurants is you can expect a set standard. What that standard is of course depends on the chain. Before heading to DeDutch, we walked into a local family-owned breakfast place, and walked right back out. Why? Well......standards....let's leave it there.

The Canuck French Toast -
Decent. It came with back bacon instead of strip. I don't like back bacon.
Back bacon is like the ugly unpopular cousin of strip bacon. However, this was actually prepared quite well. Crispy on the outside, juicy in the middle, not overloaded with sodium, and the grease padded away.

DeBakon Avocado Benny -
The actual benny was nice. The potatoes could've been much better as they resembled more cafeteria style hashbrowns.

I think what we can take away from this experience is that the food was reasonably good, but not $23 per plate good. For $23, I expect more culinary skill. I mean it's eggs and toast.

The service -
Unprofessional. Not that she was bad. No, actually she was very friendly.
Unprofessional as in ....she was not professionally trained. forgetting details of the order we asked for. I'm guessing they told her....well....bring them coffee, take the order, bring them their food and give them the bill. That she did and she was very friendly.

I don't tip unless it's earned.
With her, I could see she was trying. It was obvious, and she was going it with a smile. That was enough for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN4zASpnImbQ8trAidzW8wtilifReWKXSVOnXs8&fid=0x0:0x2a2ffa9683aaa841"],"When":"2024-6-2"},{"Name":"Tatiana Machulis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfiCaI-efpwC7gNnzZVCHlPn4MHsq8B_kMNrTN2tstdUAVMwyt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was there last Saturday to enjoy my free bday treat. The food was good as always, but what made this a 5 star location was the service. Reina (I believe that was her name) was so friendly, very smiley... She was just amazing! She deserves all the tips!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKb-5T-MnueWbJ3gY5zBl9oA3udgQP4a8SmgVl&fid=0x0:0x2a2ffa9683aaa841"],"When":"2023-11-15"},{"Name":"GREGORY WELLMAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXAW-s39raxpX32XWGDc3RqF-M7I0dQKwlbBPlBwLcZxi7lzkq1Nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A friend brought me here for breakfast. It's wasn't where I would have chosen but any preconceptions were all wrong. We got great service (professional, polite, friendly and sense of humour), the place was bright and very clean, and the food was great! I had hash and poached eggs medium (no pancake) and it was excellent. Perfect in fact!
Okay, so the view outside was a car park, but who cares when your breakfast is this good?","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The place was nice and clean and the staff were all very friendly. It’s a bit more expensive than I remembered and I don’t think that the food necessarily reflected the final bill. Regardless, their breakfast was still hearty and the potatoes were pretty tasty. I also liked their da bacon and the ham. I was a bit disappointed that the hot chocolate was just a generic hot chocolate mix with water, but the coffee was pretty good! It was a decent place to eat but I think there are other restaurants that are more bang for your buck.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-eFQdMBIDXo7IjyE74QpsSVCDqPQUIHjZdsJQ&fid=0x0:0x2a2ffa9683aaa841"],"When":"2022-11-22"},{"Name":"MAY 매이 Elford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxJVIiA7BVVmzUGqT6sRzP7-hCdYJttIOnYMeIvWOWZPmq7cr7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We always enjoy the Dutch pancake… way better than normal pancake.  The summer drink flights I ordered was very expensive 😅 they were good though. Wish they were colder.
Service was ok. It was pretty fast. The food was good. We don’t mind coming back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd5MLYLq135ZiJH-V1o43jUtY6WovMBX5EyyHj&fid=0x0:0x2a2ffa9683aaa841"],"When":"2023-8-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kimiya Namdar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ5NoUG9m0kwHJtkvaDA-UHALghW-sRI1Mo4nWzPLFWn5wQUVw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For our anniversary, we decided to stay local and chose Cactus Club, and it didn’t disappoint. We arrived 15 minutes early but were seated promptly. Moe, our host, was attentive and made sure we were well taken care of. We both ordered the steak, which was delicious and came in generous portions. When it came time to settle the bill, we were pleasantly surprised to find that our dessert was on the house—a thoughtful gesture for our special occasion. It’s the little touches like these that make all the difference.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlxtSajFGYkpR7ks7zBaxq3E_Rq1AoW205uJz3&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"jackie spears","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQSpIRsoeLZKzPhRjMQrTuHhWXI2eeJUv_G6fSe8jGwzpSrvc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wish I could give no stars,but had to put something unfortunately.
So loud couldn't hear anything from my coworkers to the server. Food was cold and tasteless (had the chicken strips and truffle fries) fries weren't even seasoned and I paid extra $$$ for the upgrade only to have tasteless fries and cold chicken strips! Will not ever be returning to this location.
Also to add the Bellini I had was definitely definitely not worth the price I paid for either and had like no alcohol in it! Another major let down which is another staple CC is known for!
Have had mediocre service from this location before and now after this last service will definitely not be returning! For the $50 I paid for just myself it 100% was not at all worth the price. My co workers complained about the lack of attentiveness and poor food quality as well and said they won't be returning either. Usually cactus club is an A++ but they absolutely more than missed the mark on this night. So no thanks, I'll go to a much more reputable place that knows how to make properly cooked chicken and well seasoned truffle fries not just tossed under the heat lamp for a few seconds not even room temp fries 🍟
#nothankyou 😞","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTChYQLzDD-_sWCeaozWjveRAUsUuT4CBWbN2j&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Date night with my husband. I got the lemongrass prawns and he got the garden burger with Parmesan fries. No picture, but we also got the chocolate peanut butter bar which we love and have ordered several times before. Service was alright but not outstanding.

Edit: we’ve been back several times and always great food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz5o-NfFrzlsDuL1toQAzF3vym_4Nh0sKHc_Lp&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"Jordan Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW11-xeEA0Ih57ocfphXt0C50QwI614ll6t2qknklEqHoDt3aVy=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid cactus club location; nice atmosphere and decor. Food quality was good, and service was good as well. If you’ve been to a cactus club location, you know everything is pretty consistent in quality, so this location is no exception. Consistent and stable restaurant chain location if you’re looking for food in the area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7JfFoNjTGrrXQsFLHbl5e01TNdKb9RpDU_IFL&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Karl San Ramon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWMltI1k0x7sCrxqWzfGjhhl5muphr65hDnGIRaggxIcR7yfMIR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cactus Club has a great atmosphere and excellent customer service. There was a small misunderstanding with my order, but the staff quickly corrected it, and I didn’t have to wait long. The portions are very generous, so you’ll leave feeling satisfied. I highly recommend trying the Grilled Dijon Salmon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl92y_vb_FdIj60kUcUGAjZPOYeXYYPKVGDMhf&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"KANVAS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIc7GQRe5cyMmMtBU7rwkkBMqSxMQC9wVOgxESX-9VBPO4cx_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Im not one to go chain restaurants, given it was my first time and was highly recommended by friends. Overall the food was beautifully presented and favourites were well balanced. Toronto your better not let me down your new location is next!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMA1QrmgM-GyOZ24ZLj9F_eDXwNVUXstwreB7rT&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"L V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbiBK61CfZsFrw4Y5hmNaYU_dtvifHPnmGFELAVcKqQqcdlg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We did not make a reservation but we did not have to wait too long to be seated. It is a busy location but the ambience and music is great. We had the Hot Chicken and Pickles, Szechuan Lettuce Wraps and Truffle Parmesan Chicken. Love the combination of the spicy chicken and Pickles. The lettuce wraps were a little too sweet for my liking but it is a great portion size. The Truffle Parmesan Chicken is amazing. All in all it was a great meal, excellent service and ambience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNQyUeOozUAESqYwdONgFOXK7yBuKkPRnZnhibN&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"MAY 매이 Elford","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxJVIiA7BVVmzUGqT6sRzP7-hCdYJttIOnYMeIvWOWZPmq7cr7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Celebrated a birthday 🎂 and the birthday card on the table was a lovely touch. The free dessert with a candle was superb! Thank you for making it special.
Our server was friendly and great!
No problem with ordering and food came out quick and perfect.
Even with someone who had a difficult dietary restriction, the server managed to accommodate my friend. She also managed to get my drink request done!
Thank you! Keep up the good work! Hope we can reserve again for our next visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipND9CuiRPSHeu1y7A29JkMA03atMeWruLWhVzkM&fid=0x0:0x29de451081a450a0"],"When":"2024-5-14"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sunny Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI24WPvgM-FfIlJLLr7IedglAHWoUtLRiaKg7As2_gjZs7wTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I worked at lots of Japanese restaurants all over Canada for all most 15years. I just found my go spot whenever I come to Port Coquitlam. Hands down 👍 😍
If you are sushi lover, won’t be disappointed here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-vyyowiFAyY0Gcda7FFUG_B6I9YBYmOKTO6-7&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Bill knox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSRV11XH3-3P7ySnqI01hySFkx75lkH_2ysCH7LkCeT5zF-A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This should really be a fine dining restaurant. Exceptional food and service. What more can I say? Lots, apparently. Every dish is carefully crafted, not just thrown together. There was a remote-controlled light buried in the ice to high light the sashimi, and the server showed us all the different combinations to the delight of everyone, especially my 6 year old grandson. We're very surprised when  we were presented with deep fried ice cream. Delicious.
Food is key, but for me, service is always the lock that makes the meal. All the servers waited on all the tables. There was never an empty plate on the table and if the food was ready the first available server brought it.
That is what makes a first class restaurant, first class.
I will always go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCCHGqeHwmdR-Ci0vBcZx3zIorHb2hjpaNN9iB&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-4-18"},{"Name":"L Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQvIh5w41NvNm69uuQ6fEFfx4_xCLgbz-lb793dTjac89L3A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you want fresh sashimi and sushi in Port Coquitlam this is definitely the spot to be at.  The sockeye salmon sashimi was fresh and delicious and presentation here is excellent making the whole experience very enjoyable.  The California roll and spicy salmon rolls were equally enjoyable.  If you come at lunch you can get lunch portions at a reasonable price.  For the price point it definitely is a must try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvhX_vpggJiL0Kmp4k48_WtKhbXe1TZ7FJUKeP&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Chan Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP8ZIfapwxhfTSOijijHjaOYybbetMTtbDMDr_n7A2U-HLr8E-jA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very good food, very good presentation and very polite staff. Despite a little pricey, we still like the food here. The menu was complicated and had no picture, they promised they will come up with a new menu soon, hope it happens.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSDe1QEzN-mbqc7yqGx8k7BpaZuG0JEljHCFx9&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"J T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhlRzWDXzdsN5IEg7ILK_EQ56zA9jcQ-fPPr3cS5cgV1YVlw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Last man eating…

In the area picking up something from a customer and options for a bite was dwindling down. Finally decided for a revisit to this place which I haven’t been to for years.

Inside is one of those smaller cozy place; clean, typical and nothing too fancy. I was glad the server seated me on a bigger table instead one of those midget size ones. The server informed me they have a Tri-city special set menu for $35, quick glanced and I opted out on that. Here were the food I ordered;

1. Miso soup (complimentary). Pretty basic but thank you, nice to have a hot soup to warm up to from the cold.
2. Appetizer tempura. Pretty basic and as it should be.
3. Oyster motoyaki. I was glad they were on the shell but didn’t know it’s their own version of it; cold, marinated with cold pan fried onions on top. The cold oysters didn’t really do it for me. Is it really that hard to find just the basic fresh oyster motoyaki baked with Japanese mayo anywhere? lol
4. Foie gras nigiri. Okay this is one of those must order item from here. Loved how the way it is put together and seared. Rich, buttery and creamy that literally melts in your mouth. Very nice!
5. Spider roll. A little bit too basic, could be more generous on the soft shell crab.
6. Saba shio yaki. It was okay, pretty straightforward dish.
7. Assorted sashimi. It was okay, the Akami could be a better cut.
8. Chopped scallops, uni, amaebi nigiris. The chopped scallop was fresh, the uni was a generous amount, I like how the amaebi head was prepared so easier to eat.
9. Albacore toro, Akami, chu toro. The albacore toro was a bit dry, the Akami was fresh, the chu toro just make it to the satisfactory level (as you can tell it lost some of its beautiful colour already).

The restaurant is conveniently located on the corner of Lougheed Hwy and Shaughnessy Street in Port Coquitlam. There are plenty of free parkings in the plaza. Inside the restaurant offers a causal comfortable dining atmosphere.

The food was okay, could be better in some departments, but overall satisfactory level.

As for the service, the staffs here were very friendly and welcoming. And quite accommodating to me being the last person left munching away (sorry over stayed 10mins after closing)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMgz35zAf1EBI5VT4-S3OU-XjBlX1JuPyxUP2it&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-3-4"},{"Name":"eva lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLG6_-zQP_odjQCD6-QyiUAohJJqHIlSZOxxzIrErs4yEpQng=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely love this place! Food is great. And their services are amazing as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOS83AdNvfEIDJZZkV3DePelW_McN7Tj1FLm851&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Stacey Robinsmith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV_qFQLK010t5gOeaOzVIwWOPcgI7YdNFJni03OtXqoh_08R4sIAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kosho Sushi is a littlest treasure out in Port Coquitlam. Beautifully prepared and inventive sushi and sashimi at reasonable prices. I was very pleased with my meal at Kosho.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdr6lPpr5NkL1VSyjPq5BpayThmxigiz0TjCi_&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2024-6-3"},{"Name":"Shirley Cha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXpR8FGS-5KuK23fMRpnfaa4vxFgDGeGslPmJNLIpRzEPP553My=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I LOVE this place so much! I’ve been here a lot of times, and each time I’ve had a wonderful experience. Food is beautifully presented, service is exceptional, place is cozy and spotlessly clean, and most importantly the food tastes AMAZING!🍣 It’s always fresh and made with high quality ingredients. Their menu features variety of dishes that are creative and innovative. Whenever I want some sushi, this place is the first one that comes to my mind. I can’t wait to go back and have some more!😍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNurzGF_ST8dpEReGzlZ8wENSDXHDG8Zh9Wsq65&fid=0x0:0x29d676848f2eea7f"],"When":"2022-10-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Earl Malvar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIKiqglVXoT9nPmI192J6J7r6928JA2bFrsB4MMWVRLWvGQBQp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have gotten consistently amazing food and very personable and engaging service from the staff here. They you for giving your kind attention through your hospitable and pleasant energy! The ramen lineup here is likely one of the best. The place’s ambience is a bit fast-foody, but they don’t lack in quality of food and effort in service! A gem in Coquitlam 😊😊😊","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1UCLuJHgTXw-8GkzRrLo28YuQXJMxLzAyuFWH&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Angus Hardy-Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOtcmYFtll6p-kcABiTyaSvlUBcLetlTn7Oc1ghrcT_-ZvyqXKtQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really tasty. Got the Chicken Katsu U.B.B and the broth was so flavourful. One of the best Ramen places in Coquitlam hands down. Would definitely recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOehz3imBdiTzWxuzqvlxnkhc1wGK3AzUJXvEl6&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Allen Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUgT6c216gR4aXOZdp51tQMw3SUSSLvDCBkRg7H0SzEcFVDKJU=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had a good time here, broth was rich and delicious. Service was quick and efficient as you would expect.  Served was attentive and courteous!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN9oKhWjY86cmXTrWKTbI47nPnGHGbsDpa9ELzG&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-11-13"},{"Name":"Jessy J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLHNRFw0Z_JgaU0TxGr1Pv5X-w9V6JzR0bnCuTDlGr_7pfsbx_k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Our first visit to this ramen noodle restaurant with the family was delightful! The atmosphere is spacious and welcoming, and even though we had to wait briefly, it was only about 5 minutes, which was very acceptable. The service was excellent, with the staff bringing out kids' utensils right away, which we appreciated.

The highlight of the meal was definitely the noodle soup. The broth was creamy with a distinct bonito fish flavor, making it a unique take on our ramen. We've never experienced a creamy base with shoyu before, so it was quite interesting.

Their Gomae was quite tasty. Instead of using spinach and peanut sauce, they used Choy Sum with sesame paste sauce.

The only minor drawback was the soft-boiled egg, which was slightly overcooked.

Overall, the service was up to par and we had a great experience. We'll definitely be back to try more of their dishes!" the family was delightful! The atmosphere is spacious and welcoming, and even though we had to wait briefly, it was only about 5 minutes, which was very acceptable. The service was excellent, with the staff bringing out kids' utensils right away, which we appreciated.

The highlight of the meal was definitely the noodle soup. The broth was creamy with a distinct bonito fish flavor, making it a unique take on shoyu ramen. We've never experienced a creamy base with shoyu before, so it was quite interesting. The only minor drawback was the soft-boiled egg, which was slightly overcooked.

Overall, the service was up to par and we had a great experience. We'll definitely be back to try more of their dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPovmOXlxrn71FdseJvAjANGOudb6lv_Ph6vheL&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-4-20"},{"Name":"melissa choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPYCcnHjMsXKLjSAR5QRLFI-pwNjpHDAAO3nrNqEuOCcrf9A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I came alone. there were maybe 4 tables with people seated and already eating. One other guest came after me. It took forever them to ask for my order. They got the other table before i did. They never checked up on me after placing my food after me. They were not attentive. Food was okay. Wasn’t amazed by it though. Will not be returning. Overall atmosphere was clean and calming. I personally will not be returning.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzaN_LsU9Kwak7qgzrRh5nUJIoBMK7KF226Z2f&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Chi Hsi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWcBbxQUmUDBINWW8gpiVBRZkPGVAvZUVKaxZbYRVQUj9Y0ACg0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We came here with our preschooler on a Thursday night at 6pm and was seated immediately. The service was great and quick in response when we raised our hand when we needed anything. They brought the kids utensils, scissors, bowl and cup right away.

I ordered the U. B. B. extra to share with my preschooler. Rich, flavourful, and creamy broth which I found a bit too salty for my liking. I was able to finish the end of the broth with the extra bowl of free rice. My husband doesn't finish the broth whenever we have ramen so it seemed a shame to dump it. We were able to get a to-go container for his remaining broth.

They also have an universal washroom for handicap and any gender so it was easier for my preschooler to reach the sink to wash her hands or go with my husband instead.

We'd recommend this place for families for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMye_HMVe1iRiTuUeVDUU-tRMeahxBkdlzSUbA&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-9-13"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious ramen with splendid, rich and creamy broth. Tried the black tan tan men which came with a bowl of rice and the flavours were great. The black sesame ground pork was both sweet and salty and went very well with the rice. The U.B.B. Extra ramen came with thick noodles that had great texture and the broth was so rich and complex. The service was great and the place was clean. Solid and satisfying ramen place. There are also complimentary sesame seed and chili powder toppings on each table.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMOZzYuriQu4IYkOTSb_x2nmC5vxcMD9MWz02sD&fid=0x0:0x66fc3602c0cc67ed"],"When":"2024-3-25"},{"Name":"Megan H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIku9KV44jqgA8L-HCiMZoBBhlSnQF2rqxPqsFbb_vW5iUOog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Thank you for great experience! :D
Vegetarian ramen coconut soup is new to me it was good.
We loved salt and seaweed sause on table for changing it soup own flavor.
Garlic add on was bit over cooked taste was bitter.. more soft is better.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Meghan Atkins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWpn_HJKLz67oWun2TqZ53LpPOuwDcgytLe9I7rJRW9gkR5zUDI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I ordered take out tonight from Dinakis (through skip the dishes). Ordered my regular Greek dish, the chicken souvlaki. I often order from another restaurant but thought I would give Dinakis a try. Upon eating my chicken souvlaki skewer, I noticed the taste and texture of the chicken seemed off. To my surprise the chicken was raw in the middle. The restaurant was immediately called to inform them. They stated that we needed to contact skip for a refund (which is fine!) and said the chicken was raw due to how busy the restaurant was tonight. Unfortunately, I do not see this as a valid reason for serving undercooked meat. They offered to remake the meal and have me come and pick it up. Unfortunately with a baby in bed, leaving the house is not option which is why I ordered in.

I’ll no longer be order from Dinakis. Perhaps if the situation had been dealt with differently on their end I would. However, it’s all left a bad taste in my mouth - no pun intended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPamzWqtMSJD_2lXqeftQ04VTeQ-qet20_AUo7c&fid=0x0:0x9aee5f46d48e0cd3"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Queenie Chao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZJZmSpZQRAFF9t6SoJ29KP7hdKen-l5gR8pgpgRf7-1s6aED9=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for my dad's birthday. Service was excellent! Food was great - the roast lamb, chicken marsala, and moussaka were all amazing, especially the lamb! The only exception was the steak, which was over cooked and full of gristle. To make up for it, they offered us a tiramisu cake which worked out well and was tasty too. Would definitely come back for the lamb and try other items too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUkbQOcVFipathRk-dHPJeXSBTX5g93Ke5HcNA&fid=0x0:0x9aee5f46d48e0cd3"],"When":"2024-10-14"},{"Name":"Jessica Tite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDIMc556UvdeCdK2q0SIDelAc_HJzjyapBYqP0A0CPBdyeWUex=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the best Mediterranean food I've had! It's no wonder they have so many awards/accolades at the entrance way.
The food is incredible: well priced, fresh and great portions.
The restaurant is neat and clean, including the washrooms. It has a very cozy feel inside.
Service was excellent!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP2zKnmJCNiyvvJJiFSndVY5qI8Go-Dp0HU1Vdj&fid=0x0:0x9aee5f46d48e0cd3"],"When":"2024-2-11"},{"Name":"Al So","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLumQHIv-5W9wXPr4ZbA1zWCVnPk2w1Kc3bjsO93-VMG-v7JQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re in the Shaughnessy area in Poco and craving some Mediterranean magic, look no further than Dinakis Mediterranean Grill. Let me just say, the portions here are generously sized, so come prepared to feast!

The tzatziki is a standout—nice and fresh, with a flavor that’ll make your taste buds do a happy dance. It's the perfect companion to their delicious offerings.

Speaking of which, the Souvlaki Combo is a real treat. It comes with beef, chicken, and prawn souvlaki, each one cooked to perfection. The beef is tender, the chicken is juicy, and the prawns are succulent. It's a delightful trio that hits all the right notes.

We also tried the roast lamb, which was cooked to perfection. It wasn't fatty, and the meat just came off the bone. We thoroughly enjoyed it.

For those dining with little ones, you'll be pleased to know they offer kids' portions. These come with one skewer instead of two at a reduced price, making it great value. It’s the perfect way to keep the kids happy without breaking the bank.

Overall, Dinakis Mediterranean Grill is a great spot for hearty portions, fresh flavors, and good value. Make sure to bring your appetite—you won’t be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNi-Vmmgslvmp-CsAb30_lQnluDK_dEqTU341G1&fid=0x0:0x9aee5f46d48e0cd3"],"When":"2024-6-30"},{"Name":"Patrick Laplante","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWEQ6rmzYgqU18BgeUeFbN3j9UzTXOfNOAqOLvy-TwFRIxBth-Q7g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Firstly, the service and the staff are absolutely fantastic. Secondly, the food quality is great, it's really great value, huge portions, and always fresh. And thirdly, great drink selection, and I was happy to hear that they can accommodate large parties as well. Whether for a cute date, family dinner, birthday celebration or quick lunch, I'd highly recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGEpDRCp2o6wFFn9ZB0lPz_oE8b1ckSu6JjaQG&fid=0x0:0x9aee5f46d48e0cd3"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Julian Sara Joseph","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWofxVvuCZOl3BWxzMUTJPVosg-yW0WoAuPTsW6aFO5_K2yZycmSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Greek food here was truly authentic and tasty. Souvlaki of all varieties was great. We had come back from a trek and all our tiredness was gone with the kind servers and their affordable but yummy food ❤️their portion sizes are quite large so it is filing. Loved the presentation too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJvrpsBh0Cgol4Hr9mDBGY6_JEDFnb7KJHbIEJ&fid=0x0:0x9aee5f46d48e0cd3"],"When":"2023-4-4"},{"Name":"Cheryl G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQZ5krFYmB32nSSVZRn_5-zzzmWzMyLr7fQFLOSOH_4NttzFie=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall good experience. We had regular entrees but also ordered happy hour appetizers, portions was a little small. I also found that an automatic 18% gratituity was surprising for 7 people dining. But we enjoyed the food with our dining guests and I would recommend.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thom Slater","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNyquzT0Ty5ga2cGbYXqVQ4Zp1mr8dSG4EejGqH4R5Eqad_PSB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came in for an extended family dinner. Really generous portion sizes, the lamp chops were fantastic.
Other than the great food, what really made this a 5 star experience was the incredible service from Mariah.
She took our 12 person reservation last minute despite being solo, had such great energy the whole night, and really made it an enjoyable time for everyone. We'd come back just for her.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Leon Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWPOnBvlGz2k_WzxOhCiURR3aRaAE5ffHXfUBJJ4GP7GBC5Wn8K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A cozy little cafe/brunch place with plenty of delicious dishes to choose from! They've got a nice portion size and we especially loved the way their toasts are made. I highly recommend their omelette :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZ5K-Qmil3-5FfOu3HV6suOUB5_gTZaSdx6lXR&fid=0x0:0xc5b1d5425c13c8b1"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Joanna Fahmy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJTznlA_q5Xa6Whv5wHF-yEDXEyOSOXOXBiPU7xtZRDBuF4Yw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Came here for breakfast, food was decent for the price. We were surprised by the cheaper prices compared to other breakfast places, our plates each were between $10-15!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMzu-Xt_jxAyTGDfs4rTT284gusElPuQMtjRPS0&fid=0x0:0xc5b1d5425c13c8b1"],"When":"2024-11-19"},{"Name":"Joanne Shih","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXximxdR2J0MX38SMpQXvX83o69PGyHXNObNbbK0mDK-tz8T9Z6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Cozy neighbourhood brunch place! Came here years ago, I had a pretty good overall experience. This time revisiting, it’s as good:) Have lots of options on the menu with pretty good prices. If you’re looking for an easy layback weekend brunch with friends and family, this is the place😉😋","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAEYQcbo_wZ58s9yrSFOG1879NJa2cpm6b4Dzw&fid=0x0:0xc5b1d5425c13c8b1"],"When":"2024-4-28"},{"Name":"Chanelle D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCEGtGi_rnAXcez2UGfi8tPvkrtnC3uoCyaDz_NpX-tJAfWp2A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great little local breakfast place in downtown PoCo. I like supporting local businesses especially when you see them trying so hard to give good service.  Food is delicious and if you are looking to take a break from cooking, this is a place to go. Many familiar dishes for breakfast and brunch. The prices are very reasonable so tip well. The portions are sufficient. Good value and easy on the wallet. Fast service. Great for walk in because parking is a limited at the front.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC2XT0W0I6LPk5xzrNiIq7KCmlFqE6wzuS3_ZZ&fid=0x0:0xc5b1d5425c13c8b1"],"When":"2024-1-8"},{"Name":"Imran Cuttilan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz9vHOBlaUTXNDsWXAFrX2NjKnPFKZDmrrx2BKyP3U2hXEVQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Don't be fooled by the outside, this place is a great find!
Honestly one of the best breakfasts I've had since moving to Vancouver. Don't expect gourmet meals, but hearty, well-cooked food for less than $50 to fill a hungry family of 4? Yes please!
It feels like a family run place and the wait staff clearly know their regulars. I'm almost considering moving to PoCo so I can eat here every weekend.
If I have one recommendation, skip the hash browns (fried potatoes are pretty much the same everywhere) and go for the wonderfully fluffy pancakes.
Cannot recommend this place enough.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chun Ho Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeN6tyeslrX1zBXDjrKJdBmn-J6R7mrVei78Pf_EwSNa0qPEvB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This place is great for the price that you pay. Never did i imagine that you can find a less than $10 breakfast and with this amount of food. Swiss Sandwich with fries was great. The pancakes and eggs and sausage was good however next time we probably won’t get the sausage as the bacon on someone else’s table look better. The pancakes were light and fluffy. The hamburger steak and eggs - hmmm. I will skip next time and not great for 14.95. The pancakes and eggs and sausage was better got less than $9. I did change a hamburger for two sausages with my wife so the pictures won’t look right. But you can see the amount of food there is for such little price. It’s definitely a 4 star and I think next time I will find something that I will like to bring it back to 5 star. Not today though but close. For some reason they are not doing soup with the sandwiches so just beware. I certainly be back as there’s plenty to choose from.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFN8PXpXtYRseN6e6FzlaSNbb833AYUq_pm39k&fid=0x0:0xc5b1d5425c13c8b1"],"When":"2022-9-10"},{"Name":"Emmanuel Carino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJ9g6OsewbE5PvEJQG0W2MrejjY87xqZcS0O_-lbnLLATuQeGq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Amigo Pancake House is a delightful spot for a classic, no-frills breakfast. The pancakes are perfectly fluffy and made with care, offering a comforting start to your day. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it a great place to enjoy a relaxed morning meal. The service is warm and attentive, ensuring you feel right at home. If you’re looking for a simple, satisfying breakfast without the fuss, Amigo Pancake House is the perfect choice. Highly recommended for anyone who appreciates good food in a friendly setting","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Yvonne Chow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwIOIAqx6fGEXpwJ9wznPD-K-TC6RqVahvNzt21E-visP9PQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food may be decent, but the kitchen service is exceedingly slow. We were here for brunch - arrived at 1120 am, and we’re still waiting for our food more than 40 minutes later. This is for a table of 2 with no additions, sub-outs - just two breakfast mains. To be fair, they comped us a fruit salad but with other brunch options in the area, it’s not the fastest service for simple food.

We visited about a year and a half ago and had the same issue. Their kitchen management needs to be much better.

To be fair, it might be a weekend issue as my in-laws said they liked it when they visited on a weekday.

Probably won’t be coming back though. The service is lovely and we are happy to tip them well, but the kitchen management leaves much to be desired.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4xqBL2ofcHFLZBewBZKBDJPaSYa0OSM7cCuox&fid=0x0:0xc5b1d5425c13c8b1"],"When":"2022-10-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shiva Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVzd9PGyiNJmwLm5yfA-sJl4BpBMAnWlGsSejcj9DY235f2_ZWo4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for a place to enjoy delicious food and create lasting memories, this is where you need to be. Every visit feels like a treat, and the experience is as wonderful as the food.

Having visited many Persian restaurants in Greater Vancouver, I can confidently say this one is unmatched. From the moment you step inside, you’re greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere that immediately sets the tone for a memorable dining experience. The decor reflects Persian culture beautifully, creating a cozy yet sophisticated vibe.

Our friends and family come from all different backgrounds, but this restaurant has a way of bringing us together. No matter where we’re from, we all share a love for the incredible food and the warm, welcoming atmosphere here. It’s a place that feels like home for everyone.

The food is absolutely outstanding—every dish bursts with authentic flavors, from the tender, perfectly seasoned kebabs to the aromatic saffron rice and hearty stews. The side dishes, like eggplants dips, fresh salads, and tangy yogurt dips, are equally delicious and pair perfectly with the main courses.

What truly sets this restaurant apart is the exceptional service. The staff are genuinely friendly, attentive, and always ready to make thoughtful recommendations. The chef’s skill and attention to detail are evident in every bite, and the management ensures everything runs smoothly, adding to the stress-free, enjoyable experience.

Whether you’re dining with family, celebrating a special occasion, or simply enjoying a night out, this restaurant delivers in every way. It’s not just a meal—it’s a journey into Persian culture and cuisine that leaves you excited to return for more.

We have dined here countless times, and each visit feels as special as the first. This place has never once disappointed us, consistently delivering a dining experience filled with warmth, flavor, and care.

The cleanliness of this restaurant, including its washrooms, is truly unmatched. It’s a reflection of the care and respect the team has for their guests, and it’s something we deeply appreciate. It’s rare to find such attention to detail, and it makes every visit even more comfortable and enjoyable.

A heartfelt thank you to the owners, the talented kitchen team, and all the lovely staff who make this place so special. Your hard work, kindness, and passion shine through in every detail, and we’re so grateful for the memorable experiences you create for us each time we visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMczAwKj4A_k1Za0keZhy-d5RactAuJsjO8MIQs&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"As a Turkish citizen, I decided to try this restaurant on the recommendation of my Iranian friend.
The dish we tried is called “Kale Pache.” At first, it seemed like an unappealing meal, but with lemon and garlic, it was truly delicious. This restaurant prepares it exceptionally well. I’ve had the chance to try it a few times in Turkey, but nowhere was as good as this place.
Secondly, I’d like to mention the cleanliness of the restaurant. Restaurants reflecting Middle Eastern culture usually look a bit shabby and not very modern. This restaurant was different; it was both very modern and very clean. When I asked to see their kitchen, I saw that everyone was working according to hygiene rules. Additionally, their kitchen was spotless.
Lastly, the owner of the restaurant hosted us wonderfully; he was very attentive. I haven’t had such delicious Iranian food in a long time.
I tried to think of a negative aspect, but honestly, there isn’t any. You must try this place.
They also offer other dishes besides Kale Pache.
Once again, I thank them for a lovely breakfast and their customer satisfaction-focused service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlo2r94f53qdKhg2n2HBwk-rYqotX-tFDPbO_5&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"JOANNE KADIR","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK5FtQlTqwnaEemJG-2BJY5ImgYhsbRGNlAyMyitnPajXzAiw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband and I went to Shemroon for lunch yesterday and I have to say, it was some of the best Persian food i've ever had! It was flavourful and authentic. My husband got the daily special, which was the celery stew with a bed of rice & I got the walnut stew, also with a bed of rice. We also tried their cucumber yogurt appetizer and it was so tasty! The atmosphere was so cute, I love the decor the owner chose for the store and the staff are so friendly. I was extremely happy with the service, and will definitely be back with my friends and family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPee-OFDpK2K4OsrZmG9aXxnyS5qydV-KqprIc&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-12-12"},{"Name":"pegah sedghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJLiNV-UWi9udm3iXnF_xdi5sUEh1p7ESZZP-b8NmmVZr9yzw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had kalepache here, and I could say it was one of the most delicious one, the meat was well cooked, tasty and there was no bad smell. The bread was fresh, and the service was great, they behaviour was really friendly, and the tea after that in those glasses was great.
We are so thankful, Shemroon.
Unfortunately I forgot to take photo of the food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCVHQxwknBRTr0bE_MH-4hgypr0zWsGChTL15M&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"amirali soltaniseresht","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI4NItNzqz4vIRAjofhZXUA96PRthiJElTa31nxJnQMi0lTxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Shemroon and had the pleasure of trying their Vazirzi, and it was absolutely phenomenal!
The dish was a perfect blend of flavors—juicy, tender skewers of lamb and chicken, beautifully seasoned and cooked to perfection. The saffron rice that accompanied it was fragrant and fluffy, making it a perfect pairing.

The ambiance of the restaurant was warm and inviting, with a traditional Persian touch that really enhanced the dining experience.
The staff was friendly and attentive, ensuring we had everything we needed.

Overall, if you’re looking for authentic Persian cuisine at Port Coquitlam, Shemroon is a must-visit. I’ll definitely be back to try more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPP9kL87qKmKK1n-61Jx0xpsXZEMkXmALk_GWih&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-10-10"},{"Name":"Sean Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLa2nbdhfTAJwsejRS86C7FhvPUumsFGv-cHzJUBYr2iFqGJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food, warm ambiance, and awesome service. I ate here with two other friends and we all thought it was a great meal! Our server was very friendly and we enjoyed her suggestions.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0PQ8ffrhN-6hmRD6tNqY-y4-Szyqo9npip6YC&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Nima Ashrafkia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIhCeBQhzwCFMHTX293urOtHgPZvp1N4dhP07LmlghewE6qkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Shemroon restaurant and was blown away by the authentic Persian cuisine. Every dish was a flavor explosion, from the perfectly grilled kebabs to the aromatic saffron rice. The atmosphere was warm and inviting, making it the perfect spot for both casual dinners and special occasions. The service was top-notch—attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. If you're looking for a true taste of Persian culture, this is the place to be. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfSvJnEkKP4h3Re6vWbBWdluHObgKKQtAkA5cn&fid=0x0:0xa44f41c917c99255"],"When":"2024-8-27"},{"Name":"Ferial Kabiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNJSEzvc4IEHA3ToX2itau1biTjLXsZQYy6l6I_VjTX2j8eqY=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tonight was my birthday at Shemroon restaurant 🥳I can’t say enough about the incredible experience we had at this restaurant! From the moment we arrived, the service was outstanding—attentive, warm, and truly personalized. The staff went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect.

The food? Simply phenomenal. Every dish was prepared to perfection, with flavors that left us speechless. You can tell they put thought and heart into every bite.

What made our evening even more special was the DJ they arranged just for us. It created the perfect ambiance and added so much fun to our celebration. It’s rare to find a place that nails the trifecta of amazing service, mouthwatering food, and exceptional entertainment.

Thank you for making our night unforgettable. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a truly remarkable dining experience. We’ll definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Al Phantom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJIRjcrfU1cmtc-V_kF2jqeL_tULlMexV51_gw9_fyawewFrEor=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New to the area and had to check out Un Pho Get A Bowl because of the name and the amazing reviews they had. So the food is so tasty and we got amazing dine in experience from friendly staff. Highly recommended and will be returning for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOPPIeupemJ1nmUfyKZZYQOj0LpdApTCCPxwnRj&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Eunice Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKjaJk5tbY25ChL69fV_ocn7nRSwGZqxj2ZjIz3nq-c5wM1ow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Un Pho Get a Bowl was so unforgettable that it made me question if I even like pho. I got a Bun Bo Hue and it made forget what good pho tasted like.

The soup was bland, not the right colour, had no depth or body, and any hints of it possibly being a beef soup were forgotten. The only redeeming factor was the xo sauce they put into the soup, which tasted like any other generic store bought xo sauce. Needless to say, no socks were blown off and only sat in an unforgettable disappointment. I certainly will never forget this meal as it's the sole reason that I will not be back.

The staff was nice, the restaurant was lacking AC so it was very stuffy on a hot summer day but still clean. But none of that contributed to the unforgettable experience that that bowl of noodles gave me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNeZ3stZP3G-M9Diy3-3JTvzkxlB_GU4Yin7j4g&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Ivan Celuszak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUUD7T6QUK-_m5jgLHeTZIcotEHFQ24zmGZUmqYdTw8PWaYYTLz=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best Pho I've had to date. Lovely to sit outside with your pet and dig into a magnificent bowl of pho. They offer all cuts including tripe and tendon, with a broth full of flavor not salt. Give them a visit soon, you wont be disappointed!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEd7KmNH44qsKkZW34TrR6tXVUUF9MQnDUXmOu&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Chan Andy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUP8ZIfapwxhfTSOijijHjaOYybbetMTtbDMDr_n7A2U-HLr8E-jA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Vietnamese sub was soooo delicious! The owner of the restaurant speaks perfect Cantonese. Happy to find this hidden gem, the outdoor seating was chill and relaxing, hard to find nowadays.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNtm8Rr_A6B0b66AI5MDlGcbCTKJLSJIPEm_VnH&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Disappointing and unfortunately also forgettable. We ordered the grilled lemon grass chicken and spring roll vermicelli as well as the grilled pork Vietnamese sub. The vermicelli really lacked in taste and there wasn’t enough sauce for the entire bowl. The Vietnamese sub also wasn’t very tasty and the combined ingredients weren’t as well paired (i.e. pickled vegetables were not pickled enough). Overall, it was a very mediocre meal and didn’t satisfy our taste buds. It was around $31 for both items so it was average value.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkNTuXKhpOwTlP7H7yfwYstMqoZXzC2YeZQLFQ&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Cynthia Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzeJkq7FGsDfGgQXJWjS-SJOYYhnjPNUtm2wbKTNa_uJ8TyBMm=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We often get take out from this restaurant because it's our favourite Vietnamese restaurant in Tri-Cities - the flavours are great and the portions good. Today we dined in with our young kids. The food was fantastic as usual, but the servers went way beyond for the kids. There was kid friendly bowls and utensils, and they even split a bubble tea into 2 cups. One of the best kid friendly services I've ever experienced.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wilbur & Sabastian's, a small bistro Ltd.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX08RCl1iw2DUIkCfZ9wZdfmRgpgxs1Q5dd4HP6BLEcVIUYn2aEyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food comes out hot, fresh and consistent. Decor is a little sparse, but it's part of the charm. It's a family run restaurant so they close a little earlier than most Pho eateries. Service is always welcoming and friendly. Great value for the amount of food served and the freshness shows.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_Q_S0nRPUJ2pJr0FCJvhQtPEKG32zCohoeXt7&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2023-10-23"},{"Name":"Wendy L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJVQ9cp0BV-8-9lGSqB3ROaDyBbCcE9TmB74xhqioGVGvKgsLg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been trying to find a good Bun Bo Hue in the Tricities area.  We tried Un Pho Get A Bowl.  It's an older looking place but very clean.  Service was very good and it was quite busy so I had high hopes.

However when my Bun Bo Hue came, I could already tell it wasnt going to be good.  The soup was quite clear colored and bland tasting.  There was just a bit of spicy-ish oil added to the side.  There was no lemongrass or fish sauce flavor/aroma to be found.  There WAS a lot of brisket and meats included though...but the broth was not up to par.

We also had a Beef Brisket, Rare Beef   and Beef Bowl Pho.  I had a taste of the soup and it was bland also.  In fact it tasted like vermicelli water (like it tastes like the water after boiling the rice noodles in it).

I wasn't impressed at all and I won't be coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_F8AUFJxHK68myrr1FWneWsajFjYAV0sZA5lV&fid=0x0:0x6211da00f1baf0ea"],"When":"2023-9-26"}]
