user_reviews:
[{"Name":"alyssa ashmore","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVOo2Ana9SrozMVEWHmoyMc9k1bhNGtV_yiBHUnwhVBvgw42Ejh=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"ABSOLUTELY TO DIE FOR!
I had the coconut rice, ND mixed veggies.
So much food left over, and I even got a pita and dip sauce to start, the food was sooooooooooo delicious!! I can't express this enough. 10/10 across the board. It was amazing.

Every bite was a slice of heaven 😍
The waiter was very attentive, and gentle hearted.

Was such an amazing experience, I can't wait to go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqV2RsaNZCcWBHKnbdn9MUDpKE2DWcsFSuyT3e&fid=0x0:0x42282c8c8fc3aa94"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"m K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJYvXswOl7wK2atqfh4adGfxokH9Ctv2BYvFj4qoyW5lba0_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I come here often with my family and it's our favourite Indian restaurant! We love the lunch buffet, but this time we came little later in the afternoon to enjoy the entre menus. The service was good and the owner was very friendly. We got what he recommended and it was very good. I had a good lunch date with my mom💗","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNz4kJr8Qef_4lA4-K83RjFHectR5m4PlnnYhKa&fid=0x0:0x42282c8c8fc3aa94"],"When":"2024-8-13"},{"Name":"Rose Mary Lim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJjB1fF3__uMRzEKBuUTM4zdfk3_WqWdPDPnAo4PUotQyIms0nS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome, tasty food! Bombay has a great lunch buffet every day for about $20 a person (as of Dec 2024). It's always so much fun to try all the different dishes, and their naan is amazing. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlwiYasqdqkdnPayJj-H3BGLJREK4SYwNgl2KS&fid=0x0:0x42282c8c8fc3aa94"],"When":"2024-12-10"},{"Name":"Jessica Bolt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVPPtorvO_ChNwC0W6IfBD7Z8Sdk6aYW98UDYimR9G_zI01AwEu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far my fav Indian Restaurant.  The dishes I order every visit are the Vegetable Korma, Butter Chicken and THE BEST garlic naan.  The service is good and prompt.  Nice, clean, quiet atmosphere.  If you haven’t tried it yet, I would highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNnmH_CR4mQ3pze-ylroa_w2PGLPHstXH0t0qd-&fid=0x0:0x42282c8c8fc3aa94"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Jayesh Yeola","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVx0LsgXYlxeLePeYmflI7CeMBaHcd4uwd1m2qzO80duYycIuqg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We visited this place for dinner and were pleased with the experience. The food was above average—we tried the Chole Bhatura and Chicken Fried Rice, both of which were quite good. The staff was friendly, and the atmosphere was pleasant and enjoyable. Service was quick, and the food was reasonably priced. Overall, a nice spot for a casual meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNpmTLtM5R_GSvm7wueJ31pLesWzWfE1Abf_qmJ&fid=0x0:0x42282c8c8fc3aa94"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Alba Bb","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXiCJnaLP0VJ2znzj5kXM-jXCt_67iJuibUtYkUwy-theElZxtH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a lovely place… amazing food , great service and good atmosphere. I’m surprised that the place is not full with a huge lineup ! Hurry this gem won’t be a “hidden” spot for long 😀😀😃😃💖💖💕","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuPgjSiBM9vS_YHaas33iMKD7QdXF-Kgfj17FB&fid=0x0:0x42282c8c8fc3aa94"],"When":"2024-11-21"},{"Name":"Elvis Kuan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ8nlBCt4yDUGbGGsbldRkeysUdCr8pS1IcCVaQGfAZ3S-0qw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for the lunch buffet. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Cinthia Carter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxCKtnLXcRtOq8N3koaZfmHaE8dGxh16NKhaW2jHYv2KMggWER=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ordered a delivery of the Chicken Briyani and Vegetable Pakora. Sizes are generous and tasteful. Comes with yogurt dip and sweet sauce.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMwQCorKsyXVqRtyeS_eUWRsZNmPiiBLHb7_OF0&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2024-6-15"},{"Name":"Gen Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL0x4Eq9GRWvX9EA38H3GMWPqz4gj6UZw48zS61frnmQ0-oj3E=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered take out for the first time at Spice Cart Indian Cuisine and we’ll definitely order again! Great service as well, I had a question in regards to ordering and the person I was talking to on the phone and when I picked up our order was very friendly and helpful!

Everything we ordered was delicious and the portions were great! We ordered the mixed grill, jeera aloo, vegetable samosa, vegetable pakora, butter chicken, chicken curry, lamb curry, daal makhani, rice pulao and family size garlic naan. We ordered the rice pulao but the name written on the container was vegetable pulao which was still good but I wanted the flavour of the rice pulao as described in the menu.

We ordered for 6 adults and a few kids and that was plenty with leftovers. Love the option of family size naan too!

Various spice levels to choose from. I personally prefer the mild spice level as there is a bit of a kick to it already but we also tried the mild-medium and medium for a couple of the curries.

I was a little confused with the name though I thought it was Spice Art but found their website as Spice Cart. I had to check a few times before placing my order to ensure I was ordering from the location I wanted. Maybe they’re going through a name change?

Definitely recommend Spice Cart Indian Cuisine!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipORhwg6Z106k-utRilMEv5ub_jGowvjp5aiZZSG&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2023-8-9"},{"Name":"Lu Kong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiVMtuHct0ut1Io0IRXiCox51SyCX5BuI9wBm4XQtwUdKlKQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Awesome!! Garlic naan is a must. Ordered butter lamb and chicken, prawn masala, fish pakora, chilli chicken and chicken roganjosh. Chai and mango lassi to finish.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9ccpxZ5691vQJEqECNY6TQO-pNlZCzh_Dgxm5&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2024-11-18"},{"Name":"Andrea Montalvo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUM85_tvYyazq3zpCbhXaoxAHQ8AFH9PyvgEoJARteWjTICLgM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing customer service and food is so delicious and fresh. Their lunch special is something u can’t find anymore these days, such a great deal with more than enough food to fill one or even 2 people up!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGIcZSqsUP5fdacxYTpcTJcbncd7cC6yQtM_U&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Aliah Penner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX1TDYmKUFrTjDo4d_P5m90F8ZGophb_NfpYjPdV2J8RCVU6pmp=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"These guys are awesome. I consistently get the lunch special which is a good portion size at an exceptional price. Today I took my wife for dinner and we each got a butter chicken along with the "family size" garlic naan.

I was not prepared. Attached is a pic with a full size dinner plate for scale. Words cannot adequately describe this behemoth. It COVERS the lunch tray on which it is served. I'm not the type to take pictures of my dinner, but I was stunned.

Um, so suffice it to say the food is excellent and tasty, the portioning is incredibly generous for the very reasonable prices, and the service is great. Our family loves this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlfb_uW48LRZi-xtmIrSzaiHcSmtVDW4FaBnk6&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"EVAN ETHAN","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUx4wFf5gaB1lR1A8XX5kn8xelbVXHG8-xFycDrpZ-n6j0ewpV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"TRICITIES HIDDEN GEM! Cosy causal Indian restaurant. One of the best in Tricities - Taste, authentic, portions, value & friendly service.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0idsX1GkRrscRGEncB95mVmsU5uPRDgqsye7-&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food, value for money, and quick service, definitely a must visit. The restaurant has a lunch menu from 12pm-3pm each day with vegetable, chicken, paneer, and lamb combo ranging from $7.99 to $9.99. The combo comes with plenty of naan and a side of rice. The butter chicken was great with three large pieces of chicken and a buttery sauce with a slight hint of spicy. Dine in available. Located within plaza with parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOj1P-OKcJcIcVrjY0aY6npDxo6ixOAS77FMnzY&fid=0x0:0xb875a0b35cf34e92"],"When":"2022-12-31"},{"Name":"Dilsher Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNMNLx9r_56qC0KfTM3Gvi9WvSjeIJDuQMhdv0AgCMlUgAwg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The best Indian food in town by far . Spice Cart service and food quality it second to none . Ash and staff are very accommodating and prices are very good . Always make me feel at home and go extra mile . I strongly recommend to try Spice Cart for unforgettable experience. Thank you Spice Cart . Keep up the great work !","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Arian 36","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUFTlTdvT_zr-o1w7P7AN_uJIx1Kn8CV_mCHPPxQFpomP4GbdZa=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The food is not meeting the requirements. The portion is really small but the taste is good. The two skewers that was mentioned in the menu was the same size as one normal skewer. There was barely and rice and it took them 1 hour and 20 l minutes to get the food to our table. The picture in the review is not what you get. The fork and knifes were not clean, and the glasses were worst. Would not recommend this place to anyone!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS6g-zVLW5D3_BhXBpXe8FjyVdfHvhP3HFsnvG&fid=0x0:0x10af2b2489ccaa5e"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Aakanksha Mehra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWuYdKCUfmzBWVi8hHJdEW0VQHgKBu9GL7pviB3VjBf3i4r2lDX=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first time at this place and we absolutely enjoyed our meal. The portion size is good for the prices.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP3-G2QDdLE2b_1UZgkSNW6RxVsGqD2TzdE8q8Q&fid=0x0:0x10af2b2489ccaa5e"],"When":"2024-7-29"},{"Name":"Patrick","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJfUj3HvKD4ciN-Idmwd2CPPRVRuAQyJPrnmtOnY9zQqZgOlg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have been ordering food to take out from here for many years now, best Greek food in the area and their staff are always great. They've only ever made one minor mistake on our order and they went above and beyond what I'd ever expect to fix it. Excellent service and food, worth a visit for dinner","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ashley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItl4Nrnx-qvH8DpYTbdQQ4b9fX3lXFSp54MJ4ldlRjh_YoAmM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good is good, service was careful, atmosphere is good, but food was so expensive

We had Arni psito,scallop & prawn Pernod, zucchini fried.
Everything was good
I loved zucchini fried.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuUGFxdQ_UZ7UFGFXfDn8HDbdYEnUl6nE568om&fid=0x0:0x10af2b2489ccaa5e"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"Rick Bonn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIsPGilC2db48cSZ1eLfiBdNSJT-9VkYRS-lGHr-ikGs3EYk_K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Outstanding Greek cuisine. Their roast lamb melts in your mouth and the calamari is crispy outside and tender inside. Also, our seafood platter was all cooked to perfection The service is very friendly and attentive. We had an excellent experience here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf1AQUd9-e1lsBgZgbTKoBCSVG98JoW0nUxPkj&fid=0x0:0x10af2b2489ccaa5e"],"When":"2022-5-23"},{"Name":"David","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLMVNrelwnKYV3EAFXn5yFTrrNDpu5H9f8WpsH0l1WWE5BxoQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Have been here many times and really enjoy the people and the food. Tried the zucchini sticks (bad for me but always good), beef souvlaki and the lamb shoulder. I would recommend the lamb.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkw8fDo3ZDk84Mb-EK_4k5RGRUmenEAt-AhtBu&fid=0x0:0x10af2b2489ccaa5e"],"When":"2022-7-19"},{"Name":"Eat with your Eyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgc3D36hC9LnUjrxO-CwFHr7PU5juZamcTjOmDBAM-qBeAww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had a Greek craving today and decided to try here. The website's menu and dish descriptions are so enticing it was hard to choose what we wanted. We ended getting the saganaki and the Pallas Athena platter as that gave a good variety to try. I called to order and the person was polite as I ordered. The order was ready in 30 minutes. The restaurant was clean and they seemed to have very good covid protocols. I really appreciated the fact that they put on new plastic wrap after I used the machine. Unfortunately I found the food quality not what I'm used to when going to a nice Greek restaurant. The portions were a good size and could easily feed 3-4 people. It might be that these dishes are better when eaten in but I found the lamb lacking the juiciness and the calamari was flat. I found some dishes a bit on the salty side and it almost felt like I was eating leftovers rather than take out. Overall I'd give this place 3.5 stars as the food was ok but definately not making me crave more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOSwQmfCoPkHr2U7R5TVVqOnprez7i3SKa9Eg_H&fid=0x0:0x10af2b2489ccaa5e"],"When":"2020-9-3"},{"Name":"Lin K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0ELkURsWr6kead0nBxgmyV1ezfr4rQ5zqHzmrvoOtn-YSbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Love this place but not anymore . Food quality has gone down . Bought Arni Sito twice and this is the second time round they forgot the Taziki sauce which is best eaten with lamb dishes . Spoke to a lady and she says the kitchen is having pressure now but that non sensical reason had nothing to do about forgetting the sauce . It’s not my problem as I paid $30 for that meal alone . Lady over phone says she will replace next time but it’s currently that we need it .","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"ridvan t","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFnmnYRhSVOj1LDdhErDnSsnxlF_5_XoPsFmpvGmOgUuHP2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went in this location hoping that it’ll be faster to get a seat than in Coquitlam and we were right. Seated right away. We ordered turkey dinner and Yorkshire pot pie. They were both delicious. Happy hour prices are decent tho menu is pretty limited. Inside of the restaurant is getting outdated. Its still clean organized but you know, you can tell its old. A face uplift would be helpful.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Don Koo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJB6FSBTPbmnb1GKcRS4jNZ-2MIUDgRkjj8HHmlcm20DjZuRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Service was poor. We were seated then after quite a wait we had to seek someone to get service. A lot of servers just standing around chatting.
Posting a couple pics. Stuff on the floor that the staff did nothing about even though 3 of them came by the area to reset tables and clean windows.
Our server, when we finally got service was clearly overworked.
The "Give a damn" level is pretty low here. Not coming back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzkEny-6TicbBI97ZoMQXhys65jgwL4xxgsVHW&fid=0x0:0x8229dcaaac451818"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Another great Whitespot!
Great customer service, food tasted great, had to resend a steak (a little undercooked) but they remade it quickly and came out perfect!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_dpErZ4Bo7l3tkDQZYoYMOIz1nlMbmsqZ_3qd&fid=0x0:0x8229dcaaac451818"],"When":"2024-8-1"},{"Name":"Nahed Alsayed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIBCAbQDY_mlLyY7-1Z7OfI385qq3wE5XH08Wet13Zf9xAoBA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We had to wait for 45 minutes before getting our food in. Server took the order and disappeared never comes back to asks us for water or keeps us updated about the order delays.
When our food arrives it was cold, not as fresh as expected.
Not recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4hYPlKEvOc8YZc9rT4HBiCGvo9vMjMrMAhopl&fid=0x0:0x8229dcaaac451818"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"ghost box","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-Z5ZRns_Ifttr-Ob7-4XHSnvSRbUApOQgHvkqcCNg6e7964Gn=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible experience.. hair in food!
I didn’t mention anything to the staff but I called customer service spoke to the owners and it was an eye opening experience. They refused to help or rectify the situation.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHKe1D_0HC4VCJpqie12RTjJbd6XEJ9JmOr128&fid=0x0:0x8229dcaaac451818"],"When":"2024-12-18"},{"Name":"Brittany Ditchburn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKgAQa5XBN4DTcQPuQK-jbmctReEr70YkMTka1F12_QMzA-Fw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My family and I of 8 were in having dinner this evening and we had Derek as our server. He made our experience amazing! He was attentive, energetic, and really patient as the kids ordered their meals. Not once did we have to ask for him or for anything for that matter- he was on top of everything! Because of him we will return to this location. Thanks Derek!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Greek Filipino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEZnZpwL2tn2ZsCen9rq3u_3r4ZlMKv00x-TTfmQlT0zGUFF64=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is fast and we love our food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMTclfiOd6sgmUNBDW4069ObiRcKdvFnmN4WKu6&fid=0x0:0x8229dcaaac451818"],"When":"2024-9-19"},{"Name":"Eat with your Eyes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLgc3D36hC9LnUjrxO-CwFHr7PU5juZamcTjOmDBAM-qBeAww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Wanted something fast and chose Whitespot. Ordering through the phone was difficult as they didn't answer so we had to call 5 times before it was picked up.  When we received our order i was shocked that the "Legendary" burger looked like a toddlers plain hamburger the name and $16 price tag does not make one expect it to be like that. I think even the Ferry's legendary burger isn't like this. We called and the manager confirmed that was the correct burger but was kind enough to offer another burger with actual toppongs. The rest of the food was good but the shock from the over priced plain burger is hard to forget. Don't be tricked! Just got the replacement burger.. it was not cooked. Also found a rotten grape in the mixed fruit. Lack of quality control and value found here","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZyUGZq9yGqlKrIlX3rm46JlYjvHJe9BP_amo0&fid=0x0:0x8229dcaaac451818"],"When":"2021-12-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Adam M.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXBezQ5u52QUPfNCS-XISW7oETfNlf5RvdoikJTFUzauPV7HEINiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We recently celebrated Father's Day with a lunch at Kisso Sushi, a spot that has become a bit of a favorite for us. This time, there were six of us, and I had wisely booked in advance, which turned out to be a smart move as the restaurant was nearly full.

This was my third visit to Kisso Sushi, with my previous visits being just my wife and I. This time, we were seated at the booked bench seats, which were comfortable and offered a good view of the restaurant’s charming blend of traditional Japanese ambiance and modern design touches..

One of the standout features of Kisso Sushi is their use of technology. Each table is equipped with a tablet, making the ordering process incredibly convenient. Whether you need to place an order or request service, it can all be done through the tablet.

After placing our orders, we had the unique experience of having our dishes delivered by a robotic server. It was quite a novelty and added a fun element to our meal. As for the food, it did not disappoint. The dishes were delicious, and the portions were generous.

In summary, Kisso Sushi provided us with a delightful dining experience for Father's Day. The combination of tasty food, substantial portions, and efficient service, all set in a beautifully designed space, ensures we'll be back for more. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPO6u8yWJkEqcwhDv5acWee_n-dpaXn28mvd2l3&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Jason Tribbiani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXpvlAY0NULhaj1b4k1yZZtRXFlzsqxg5gIO8-kzQ1-Qy-iq7d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"**Rating: 4.5/5**

We discovered this restaurant by chance after a stop at Costco for gas and groceries, and it didn’t disappoint! The excellent reviews drew us in for a late lunch, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting. I ordered the miso ramen, which had a generous portion and was a fantastic deal. However, the beef tataki, while decent, could have been fresher and a bit more substantial for $17.

One standout for me was the Japanese black lager—it was hands down one of the best beers I’ve ever tasted. Rich, smooth, and perfectly balanced, it truly elevated the meal.

The service was exceptional, with friendly staff and quick, efficient table service. A fun bonus, especially for families, is the robot that delivers food to your table—kids were absolutely thrilled! Overall, we thoroughly enjoyed our visit and will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFuVsWhF70wdcZimTYvIyJbMK6q1HkOqa-SUa8&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-9-16"},{"Name":"Lillian Lum","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJrY8_dgCjRNM3DfoPeTmvJyXQqnWprjrecffpwFkgSgCFdD7j=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My first time here and the food was very fresh, loved the salmon sushi. The ramen was a nice texture. Chewy. We couldn't finish our meal, as the serving sizes were a good portion. We had a few rolls, presentation was nice. The ambience - comfortable. The music was not too loud, so we could hear each other talk. The servers were attentive to their surroundings. All around, a great experience?! Would definitely come back here. You must give this place a try!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlLc4F32L3coxlryaEA4E6j-T5DsGgNqR1l2Fi&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-4-19"},{"Name":"C Kirin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKnBT8Oa_FVHcdDihDKiA_9JO-x7_bvGiDCptW0i5MK-RhAbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Second time ordering takeout, overall im happy. Very good sushi, average price. Only downside I have experienced so far is getting ginger/wasabi in my order BOTH times when i always ask for neither..thank goodness its not an allergy. I also didnt get chopsticks/soy/napkins this time.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMFS1_9-QI1kizcK53owssPV7KjTm0B28wbQdjr&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Meherin Aupee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXY5oPef8T5X6ZOo5uF-MPpN3GuFeAURkWs8rvqfslB0DHFHA4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here first time. The staffs especially servers were very friendly. Most of foods were very fresh and tasted good. I would recommend this place for sure to my friends. Thanks Kisso!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPe4O_ffVKB-Z0FL1avA-B5Hi4--4qWyFAB5F9f&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-5-8"},{"Name":"Chris Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKL6NY8ujR0ee9OFhMcGaL3sLgJDF84QvHUJHWiYfXacg9U9g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very decent family Japanese restaurant. Food andnpricing is decent. Best value for variety of food with their lunch or bento specials. Seating is a little awkward for bigger groups (we were 8) since most are booth seats so people need to move out to allow inside seaters come out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjpKeZ7pNu1E_HZeW2RZ0eIQnibF0_XcFBkN3s&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Jennifer Striemer","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUEEFR9xHL15YRMNBDlhmzVrJqB31txOznAF7BjTCvcCx2lGOtd=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is fantastic. I've had both the Sushi and the Ramen and was very satisfied. The service is great I even got served by a robot! The Atmosphere is very calming and charming. Totally recommend 👌.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Augusto Velez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKapxvbdj8vqqNYigF-wnM0Yr3KpjStzucZu7_xdLasSfSudQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi place.
Their Ramen is just like the one I tried in my recent trip to Japan.
Overall great food","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMevN0fy4JAxApdbJXwXN1WqawAVzp8Lnz4ezsc&fid=0x0:0x8fc73854e26bc0ef"],"When":"2024-11-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nedra Fernandes","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIx0UkAMtiKBUUMMcp5qQ_FgjJSnbXAl2FG-yWFWqLLAtkSfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I thoroughly enjoyed the kebabs paired with fragrant saffron rice. The lamb shank, served with a special spiced rice studded with sweet raisins, was equally delightful. The slow-cooked lamb was incredibly tender, melting in your mouth with each bite, while the rich, flavorful gravy was simply mind-blowing","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMY3_-l8aFfKgsRIbitG_RgovRp_zKCYOJQhFZ1&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Morgan Hf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg9v8lwsjqUCJSayLNycctRUMA_VacLbUTiQIB7yQTm9fZhysC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you’re looking for authentic Afghan-Persian cuisine in the Lower Mainland, this restaurant is a must-try! The kobide and kashke bademjan were absolutely delicious—the kobide was juicy, perfectly seasoned, and made with fresh, high-quality meat, while the kashke bademjan had a rich, creamy texture and a perfect balance of flavors.

Beyond the incredible food, the customer service was top-notch, with friendly and attentive staff who made the entire experience even more enjoyable. This spot truly stands out as one of the best in the area for Afghan-Persian dishes. I can confidently say I’ll be coming back for more.
100% recommend it!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyRYLRaQDas9K-HsPZPgT13dZqSTuEFbwWhHnc&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-12-23"},{"Name":"Rick Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgl51VE-11ZQHoLrvu5S0KCm_i6Bwt16vq_3evtPm8uLm2KZK8Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is beautiful restaurant with grocery store .. with fresh meats and vegetables fully halal. Friendly staff .. pricing is very good . Very reasonable.. would highly recommend shopping while food is being prepared… one of the hidden jewels in Port Coquitlam..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQsstMM8TU8e8C0MA5ixwngXX2M_MSvzCYCsjF&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"mahboobeh mahdavi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3YbWtkkVDpbXqLSJeS30o8XcUIjgFooeX2FQjYfSyesQD4NWO6g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was so good. Everyone was so kind and the food was one of the best we've ever tasted. 10/10 Definitely reccomend the baklava it was so sweet  and tasty.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3LZ_oaOPya4O8Hc4W7U1ziHhIuJVXidGrowE0&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-12-4"},{"Name":"Mohammad M Islam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXuRqeYa0qeQvQy57V-9LRvbVMV5FXbbaQqt8771B7XbII3uUko6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Day 2 Day Halal Restaurant is likely one of the best Persian restaurants in the Lower Mainland I have been to so far. The food was excellent! I ordered the Vaziri, which came with rice, salad, 1 skewer of boneless chicken kebab, and 1 skewer of beef kebab. It was delicious, freshly made, tender, and juicy. Service was a bit slow but understandable, and pricing seems very reasonable.

The decor is casual, with only a few tables, making it a cozy spot rather than a fancy dining experience. However, the focus is clearly on the food quality and taste, which deserves a solid 5 stars.

There's plenty of parking available, and the restaurant is conveniently located behind the "Day 2 Day Halal Grocery" store.

Overall, it's a great option for a satisfying and flavorful halal meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs-CtF-t8p6d__qbtNWKvWHOGFoIGHiSzG-wTQ&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Adam Cartwright","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKsKnCsOP-0T-zwsfA634EBIBcODT2U7_gjSIBsfbKoL7ngRw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Buddy took me here for a bite to eat. I don’t think I have had kabob that was this good. Very juicy and tastes amazing. Great people. I will have to come back here again. Thanks for the good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPAzZK86icUerGDPYomOJM5jt-d5X6cSzSAy8LX&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Ashiya Khan-Sequeira","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUuYMIyIS3X6ZJpbePdnZYMrcPZPFAgtN0wdVtEOXjUQWZ7pnSL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We did catering for 70 ppl for our stars sweet 16 birthday. Amazing food, very delicious and great service. The food was definitely a hit and our guests could not stop talking about how good the food was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNzxnjrRRsXIwZtKpSNUtt9t6flrCi99_UsGRUp&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-6-17"},{"Name":"Magic Services","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxyZHpuGhhxdh7d03gYfQmcEonwO1DsIXihj7u5I5HmvwINks=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely! Here’s a glowing review for Day to Day Restaurant in Port Coquitlam:

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Day to Day Restaurant in Port Coquitlam, and I must say, it was a truly delightful experience from start to finish! From the moment I walked in, the warm and inviting ambiance set the tone for a wonderful meal.

All staffs really nice and friendly,Specially Sonia and Hamed 🌹,thank you so much

The food at Day to Day is nothing short of spectacular. Every dish we tried was bursting with flavor and prepared to perfection. It's clear that the chefs use high-quality ingredients, and their passion for creating delicious food shines through in every bite. The menu offers a fantastic variety, ensuring there's something to satisfy every palate.

In addition to the delectable food, the service was outstanding. The staff were incredibly friendly, attentive, and eager to make our dining experience enjoyable. They were knowledgeable about the menu and provided excellent recommendations.

Day to Day Restaurant has quickly become a favorite spot for me in Port Coquitlam, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a memorable dining experience. Whether you're there for a casual lunch or a special dinner, you can expect top-notch food and service. I can't wait to return and explore more of their amazing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObswPg8l3CZK5x4spVMzuhtyJXbbQV3iGZNT4I&fid=0x0:0x5efb9a51da1d2e4b"],"When":"2024-6-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Meghan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXx-nTmucE2EoJoVZKyDaURTIIYHhu2J5CMiEPqSTwPd9phTwUD5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"New Chow's Kitchen is now a family favorite. He is always so kind and cheerful when you go to pick up your food.

The food is good, good sized portions. Great combinations for single eaters as well! I recommend the almond chicken, sweet chili chicken and wonton soup.

They did at one point have a delivery service (not sure anymore) that I wouldn't recommend, they guy couldn't find my house and I had to go meet him on the main road.

Not really a place to eat in as it is a very small dining room and more of a take out joint.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7lq6mNAEZZa_oJ7lV4rradPoz4orT3T5kqQdn&fid=0x0:0x3d1366fce46751f5"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Zak Bindley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4ovldlD-FCx5UF-n_0kkGub31_grb4YIy5bC0ywiYGTUtgg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Purchased 80$ worth of food tonight and after a 25% tip to the driver it came to 100$. Once my wife and I began to open the food we realized that both the rice and chowmein were both filled to the brim. But the prawns, and sweet and sour pork weren’t even 1/2 full. Quite disappointed in the portions after spending the amount of money we did. The food here has always been great as it’s been our go to when we’re looking for takeout but after our experience tonight we will need to consider for future orders.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New Chow’s Kitchen is an amazing restaurant they gave us the best service ever! The prices are great the food was fresh, hot and delicious and the owner is very friendly. We appreciate them serving us tea while we waited and delivering our Chow Mein to us that they forgot to include and they didn't charge us for it. We are looking forward to ordering from them again soon.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrRz0E8kC3cwnWuLuw7ufwKFT8Ok8lnqOYQVKL&fid=0x0:0x3d1366fce46751f5"],"When":"2020-5-22"},{"Name":"T K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWBjs_8XvvkzBMG-1HmgIjTdYzywRXtx1m_K9OxV4qzE99dY0-d=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you're looking for "fast" mediocre Chinese food; than you found your place at "New Chow Kitchen".

We ordered (to-go) 2 vegetable spring rolls, fried rice, vegetable lo mein and 2 cans of pop; all for $30.49 (including tax).

The portions were large; as we could not finish up our meal.

The food tasted "bland" not spicy. It was "okay".

The owner, Tom is very nice.

Our overall experience was nice, however; I "would-not" go back there again as I have compared the cost of what we ordered and paid for verses other Thai/Chinese Restaurants within the neighborhood that had much tastier food for almost the same price.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzAF6Rjjl6Xo0ocMM5_82N4lNcZBL6cIxfWqM&fid=0x0:0x3d1366fce46751f5"],"When":"2018-8-19"},{"Name":"Mike Thibodeau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLjwlKqXsi9nq3_I1QMglC4JRC7Mu0RfVuoPefhp4Jgu6CHnU8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Very tasty food for an affordable price!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-dYzbvLqASgZfkUYzkB05piQPQAvQuZjDy9fX&fid=0x0:0x3d1366fce46751f5"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Pamela Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIALm97KrF-OTcDmOprNmRfL_LjyDGaRveMcz7dR_bLa1zYbg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just ordered nearly $150 of food for my mom's birthday dinner. Got to the restaurant to be told they cancelled the order because they had a big party to cook for. No phone call or email to notify us. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. Will NEVER order from them again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Silvia Calero","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJZKA6Y9ywkVrqAmFKvNKcQ6zymLXDCtYAu4BdNAALEAPGQtTw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food is very delicious is one off the best Chinese  restaurants  New Chows Kitchen
Whit affordable prices and very friendly people the more important the food is very delicious I loved totally recommend 100%","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"joanne wu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcSEJurWLBNFjnai-lx4rvIBMoYPvFYQxGF3stDVeHcj90aksC=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Delicious food.  Ordered 4 person dinner for delivery and food was piping hot and delivered on time.  Everything tasted amazing.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Geraldine Sangalang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcAsqfNVs6uRfmsJ5FtsU66GdsPGBE4zo_tn8DnG79e7VADqel9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Solid neighbourhood IHOP. It gets super busy on weekends after 1130am, so try to arrive before then.

Try the mushroom and spinach omelet with the hollandaise on the side. It's my favourite!

When ordering seasonal pancakes, consider requesting the fruit compote or sauce on the side. They're yummy, but super sugary.

Love the classic bottomless coffee. It helps, especially as the restaurant gets super busy.

The staff is kind, welcoming and very hardworking. Highly recommended when you're craving pancakes or a classic Western brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMsa4V8uh0IWXY8_A9wj9cAmSoD4tkszMOpa1Ax&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A nice place to come for breakfast. The food was good, and the waiter “Darya” was very attentive—many thanks to her.

The only downside was that despite having 8-10 customers waiting at the door, there were plenty of empty tables inside. This gives the impression that the restaurant doesn’t fully value its customers.

Other than that, the food and the staff's attentiveness were great. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUBNYCwF1JhOrH--4umlezhsZ5WiIVamhAO6-V&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Yvonne","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUj_HNmRFhr0uY3k5KAoKohOmCo83kG-cmVR_BGACYiBkVXvGMN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"This was my second time at this restaurant. The burger and fries I had the first time were okay. I ordered the appetizer plate this time because I'm not big on breakfast. The onion rings were under done, the same with my Mother's fish. The chicken strips were okay and I liked the honey mustard they served with it. I know that it's not easy to serve a large group such as ours, but do not rush food if it's not ready. Not my kind of place but it's understandably busy because people love cheap food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcbYyh1trt090nBCBYYuPVzERd_HPalCC-DGpW&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-12-19"},{"Name":"Sina Atofi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKEU-M0EfgR7mtCTbA4YocuYcj6F3xX0erLS6Yd2IggUjdcRA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great Food and Family-Friendly Atmosphere at IHOP

IHOP never disappoints when it comes to comfort food and a welcoming atmosphere. Whether you’re there for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, the menu has something for everyone. The pancakes are always fluffy and delicious, but it’s the variety that really stands out. From omelets and waffles to burgers and sandwiches, there’s plenty to choose from.

The service is friendly and efficient, and the restaurant has a cozy, family-friendly vibe that makes it perfect for any occasion. I especially love their seasonal menu items and the value you get with their combo meals. If you’re craving a hearty meal that hits the spot, IHOP is the place to go!

This highlights IHOP’s strengths in food variety, quality, and atmosphere, making it a great spot for all kinds of diners.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdX45Kxvu8VFvTlP1Qsl0VwowzbrDZTXxotzjx&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"Evelyn Strand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVewN82R64qW8_51hIS4cZJin69I9hII7TCA4RyX12wGyLywBZh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great experience today at IHop in Coquitlam, BC.
Dayria was my server.  She was excellent.  Great sense of humour, lovely personality and was attentive to my needs. My coffee got spilled on my hash browns and she replaced with fresh ones. Meal was good. I highly recommend the pumpkin pancakes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlVRrBB9YF7O4M1JNd71wwip28iCbiNGNaOi90&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Bernice Deanna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVobmPdyGaprppNX6a3IMjWFEbtFcYfWk7PiMjNweH7XDOfhh8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"You'll leave w a to-go box.
Portions are generous, they leave you a coffee pot to free pour, good selection of syrups for your french toast/pancakes/waffles, excellent proteins - sausages, ham, bacon
Service is excellent - attentive but never intrusive, warm & genuine
Cutlery pristine & plates are warm upon serving.
We'll be back and bring friends/family over to this branch of IHOP","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNiTCBDMOwIaJdoob9XZvYwR1cZ0I-H7cDIn2d&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"OM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU33Qg1JE4YGnexw2nT6GbgjaBxZDhK0q9Dqqw_XlvAy_wSIlHW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The food is the best part of IHOP, for the service, there is often long lines and rushed orders; you can expect to have your order misdone at least once. The atmosphere is often crowded, bright and in my opinion unwelcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPcjzwV037HramzsuqEX-1xzmz88OAbrj1DbMVG&fid=0x0:0x9c24060342f50358"],"When":"2024-11-14"},{"Name":"Emily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxvvi5lkAfUslbBkQOmsgt8T6MOO582yIGzulUJGINvsLfiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"“I recently visited IHOP and had a fantastic experience! The staff was welcoming and made sure we felt comfortable from the moment we walked in. Our server was attentive, friendly, and quick to get our orders right, even with a busy crowd.

The food was exactly what you’d expect from IHOP—delicious and comforting. The pancakes were fluffy and perfectly cooked, with a variety of syrups to choose from.

IHOP is always a go-to for a hearty breakfast, and this location exceeded my expectations with great service and food. Highly recommend for anyone craving a classic breakfast or brunch!”","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The beers and chicken wings were very good; I would have liked the wings even more if they were crispy, but they weren’t. The ambiance is nice, and there was no music in the restaurant, which I liked. There were also two pool tables available for everyone to use, which is great for entertainment.

The waitstaff's attention was a bit lacking; they were very attentive, but they barely spoke.

Other than that, there were no issues with parking. The road is spacious, so you can park your car easily.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6mPnTXiOVAIyLPVjnLRdzoBzQQToaph574RRr&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2024-12-5"},{"Name":"Kyle Fraser","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVMtJJe2qhOrA2XlnNzIHU-2PKFecjgd4Zhh5leir5YT5OkF-4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would like to thank Whitney and Gina. Our party originally booked for 20 ppl. Found it later it was going to be closer to 40. Well it ended up being almost 50+ppl. So thank you very much Gina for booking us and accommodating us!

Would like to give a huge shout out to Whitney! She took on our whole party herself with a bit of hit throughout the night but pretty much all on her own. She kept up with us throughout the night and was very on top of what we ordered and our bills. Service was very fast and she never got annoyed with us at all as I’m sure we were pretty drunk.

She mad us laugh as well as making a funny joke to one of our pitchers of beer.

Again thanks Whitney from all of us for your wonderful service and taking care of us throughout the night! Happy holidays!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0R3FCWivkDnuYcJ95kowd_YrwAnNeeX-k2ycn&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Cheryl A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocId3JTMrjtqtdmj_0XOBMchbLGhcrTAO0uBPM1jzlHcNAjL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We sat outside and had to move because we could smell like maybe a dog peed in the area? They do allow pets on the patio . The waitress never told us any drink specials or anything related to happy hour . She was very vague. The chicken burgers looks good but the taste was nothing special - the chicken tenders were very dry / horrible-   The positive? - nice big patio","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPsVgrRofMXLWxsm-_F-Pt1Zp7eK8T2JgzSLs0&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2024-7-1"},{"Name":"Lavinia Kate D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUULjpaarpF4E4hyNszixvzThLgNY-_uK_5m05JhvQ6h30xmymY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were here today to celebrate my daughter in law’s birthday. The girl at the front door was very welcoming, and so was Kevan, our waitress. She made sure we got what we wanted, and she recommended us a very good sparkling wine to celebrate. Wings were great, as all of the food. Thank you for making this day special!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM9o8BD8MNIIXOsn6WSgtWmIUOKGLikbPU91CTd&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2024-11-17"},{"Name":"Eva Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbdn1JwTeGwTMz4zaH_aM0s2MjqUg4f-ith9g4COdwAGXFieA4Ow=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our friends and I went to this place near where we live, they have plenty of parking, we went around lunch time on a Saturday. No booking was required, also plenty of seats inside.

As a big group of 8 people, we order quite number of dishes. We have ordered 2 lbs of chicken wings - honey garlic and lemon pepper. It is quite impressive that hey have quite many sauce and seasonings to choose from. If you do choose seasonings, it might not be season evenly. Spicy waffle fries was pretty crispy but it is not spicy at all, which is a little disappointing for my friends. Chipotle ranch steak salad is in good portion and the sauce is spicer than the spicy waffle fries. We have also ordered pizza-When pigs fly, the size of pizza was a little smaller than I expected but the crust is good. The last item was ordered is baked lasagna as main dish, the dish is in good size and flavour. As general in bar, the lighting is quite dim.

It was enough for everyone, probably because we have 6 ladies and 2 boys. They did not put surcharges for more than 6 people, which is appreciated, which we did choose to give higher tips.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPlhidH17Pq533TJHOqnJd1l3TP6zmOhaz4KoeZ&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2024-5-27"},{"Name":"Allen Beik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUF9ADaYp8aM_t6ClRm3K9sF-sNZrKMskbGaiszRmMLDyZbTDv5=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I recently visited Cat and Fiddle with some friends, and it’s definitely a great spot to enjoy with friends, family, or coworkers. The atmosphere is inviting, with options for both indoor and outdoor seating. They have a nice bar, and the food is solid. I especially enjoyed the chicken wings with the salty pepper seasoning, and we also got a pizza, which was casual but hit the spot. Drinks were great too! The only downside was the wait time, which was a bit longer than expected. Overall, it was a fun experience, and I’d recommend it if you’re looking for a lively place to hang out and enjoy good food and drinks.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Helena","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLiYVJyd2ntFwLRumbYS9Kznuj6jXHoPn0UkQ_zdJDM29rWiQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Three families, six people gathered at the traditional and amazing club on one Friday afternoon. We ordered beers, French fries and the world most famous chicken wings with different dressing, such as dry garlic, hot & blue cheese, BBQ, and buffalo hot etc.. All of them had great taste. Every one enjoyed the happy hours, delicious food and drinks. The service was amazing. Parking lots were ample.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ7_A-OlL9iAHhEpbBv4ZX8mj2AhOqUVxg2NRR&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2024-6-20"},{"Name":"Antje S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLLt-LBIe3b3nKdqJNrzC8mzrltLY4gghwveDzasU9yAkF9Fg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good place to chill, relax, and enjoy. They have a minor allowed zone. Wings night is always packed. I love the loaded nachos. Pizza is also quite good. The burgers are kind of disappointing. Staff is always friendly. When they have music, it is often Iranian, which is not for everyone's taste.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9PhFBNAOnqmd-Z52QgnhzFJFAbSwuorscKS0f&fid=0x0:0x9f47a4ae62bc88ab"],"When":"2022-2-27"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"MET","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI5-P2CUjmGOJdlvgVS_ji9OeM1ZpvhJYb6CHZGH3hTELc7TA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Always the BEST pizza in the neighbourhood...very generous in their toppings.

The garlic fingers are superb if you want something plain and simple.

The staff are so great too..always smiling no matter how busy they are 🥰😍🤩","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHLr-P5n91xlRDiana3K5suUNRIrfiWSkATCxA&fid=0x0:0xc5dd6288af126de5"],"When":"2024-5-21"},{"Name":"Erin Jane","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXO5VOOsqSxJGzVnye98ULg0aUry93_pMFmkfDAW84t1PPk__43=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This review is long overdue as we have been getting our pizzas from Green Olive ever since we moved to Port Coquitlam a few years ago. It’s by far the best pizza in town! Has never disappointed. Plus where else will you find delicious green olives on take out pizza??
Tonight we accidentally ordered an extra pizza, and they were super nice about letting us cancel one. Always good customer service & always excellent pizzas!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ebrahim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPIKcLlYsRXzj_NU-cKrILAfiV6rHoottOnSl1Co3QI6YN1537=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would give 10 stars if I could.
First of all, just try ordering online. The website is well designed. I'm not a fan of ordering online, but this one is so different. Just try it.
The owner used to have a bakery, which gives him the chance to make the best crust.
Try the thin crust with sesame seeds.
I hope the quality or price stays the same.
It was one of the best pizzas I have ever tried in Vancouver.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3IUrOvrTsvPDx1v4My4l_miqtlTAG8OoVQtTH&fid=0x0:0xc5dd6288af126de5"],"When":"2023-8-8"},{"Name":"VJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUKXwIQLzLw86UhSm_6kRxs4-ngpLcPUkpcOMK4XElQ4ZWHrNI0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had ordered one garlic chicken and pollo pesto Pizza (medium size).
Both pizzas were tasty . And in terms of the base of the pizza, the crust of the base, toppings and taste.

We would recommend Chicken garlic pizza.
And definitely visit again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxTbkebP5mXjGdjz7z6W7_UOAvlIIX7C73WImr&fid=0x0:0xc5dd6288af126de5"],"When":"2023-6-8"},{"Name":"Naghme Mirkamali","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUr4q2PkBY-HH-5fMcz3wTx0wo-NcyMP9USlHtY8g25QiPh1veo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So delicious pizza, and Halal beef, and awesome garlic fries 🍟😋🤤so yummy
Recommend it 10 out of 10","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl_tYfuupDSvYPHUOxVD-i-f6y75BsNpATbZK1&fid=0x0:0xc5dd6288af126de5"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Saeid MJ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcewSnJcAhACCkEWKUQGjPaBy78cIOsSGEe0B0nR_ARAnMiJU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered double bacon mushroom pizza and it was really tasty and good 👍🏼","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDWot6GbDcqmPyUMq3qnCWUXEv3rfhsrCkovPT&fid=0x0:0xc5dd6288af126de5"],"When":"2024-7-24"},{"Name":"Danny Wozencroft","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJD5cBqDmkILGRrcstRLniO1YUyM6pSSOTgW5k0bqsmqB7qFA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mikayla and Sukhman were absolutely amazing. So helpful and cheerful.
The options of crusts available and cheeses including dairy free were great for our dietary restrictions.
Pizzas were so good and service was even better. First time there but certainly won't be our last.
Green Olive Pizza has been added to our regular restaurant list
Thanks so much 😊","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Wendy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6_SZiQStioXmbvv0S9IZORHUi5VoQzv6sQG-peGyskdFz7PuZuA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We ordered the pasta and pizza special tonight, and we were super impressed! Very fresh ingredients, everything was delicious. The pizza dipping sauce was amazing as well 😋 Super friendly and polite girl who answered the phone too. We will definitely order again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzrGrMHlKTfEm84loBM7rl7eAqv5SO5HFIY1O1&fid=0x0:0xc5dd6288af126de5"],"When":"2022-8-5"}]

But he was gracious enough to recognize that and cut me the deal, took the time to stop his job and help me out, very much appreciative!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kevin Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfDZMKtA3XjsJkWC4nffIO6PLVbtjYbD8kEOv4LwKtW4ysYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A fair number of nice restaurants with good amenities nearby. user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kevin Ao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkBvZ6ce_zHnWsLqA5ojfX0nMQ_CDE0WIX5k8yhZ46T8a1BLiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you're looking for a good selection of ice cream flavors, Matteos Gelato is worth checking out. The coconut flavor is particularly good, and the decor has a vintage 80s feel to it. The only downside is that the one guy working there didn't seem too thrilled to be serving us ice cream. But the place was clean, so that's a plus.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLF5xCtr4Oa4A0XsgyakRDoCXLGghpWR8vv4yn&fid=0x0:0x423384ed3c120dfb"],"When":"2023-8-19"},{"Name":"Ray Jang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3wj8Ne3ngI4eg9ouEU6zPmvERlQuudbckz4ma4Vg6pfYrsWM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Feels like an old style ice cream parlour inside with lots of seating and a patio. Friendly service and lots of choices in gelato flavours. Great place to go when close to the Coquitlam River trail.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNjkgY8ng5g7pVMGmf_428LpqotY-IvxKClzc3I&fid=0x0:0x423384ed3c120dfb"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Wheels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsz1Rg53Q2-m5JHAwzfaowNSrC2JEVYhO1hHp4iyxB4sDy77VI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Really enjoyed our Gelato! Very cool, chill vibe and the staff where super friendly!  The interior is really cool and they have good selection of Gelato to choose from. The place is pretty bumping with people,  I would definitely recommend going here and we will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhqUEoBv87s9WrR2DRndQL-yPds1niQmNB4LFi&fid=0x0:0x423384ed3c120dfb"],"When":"2022-7-29"},{"Name":"Aki Chacha","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyvNdeo69kF-CZF84gZUhThhokUgdK-Th9Jt0hvRFaLFhKiCZZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Matteo is my forever gelato place not just because they have the best gelato in town , it’s also because every one there is super nice and friendly.specially the guy I assume he is the owner and I always forget to ask his name. This guy has done something that I never forget and always appreciate it. When my dad was visiting last summer I took him there early morning just because he loves ice cream no matter what time in the day. I got an ice cream for my dad and this guy asked if I want anything else and I said no it’s too early for me . I paid and we left. We were walking half way to my car when I heard him calling us , he had a hot latte in his hand for me while he was almost running to us. How kind!!!
This is what I call a great customer service and a wonderful human.
Thank you :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPuAO-D0jfmcDlS98lWG8MDsaBCOWzglDf5epKO&fid=0x0:0x423384ed3c120dfb"],"When":"2024-4-21"},{"Name":"Ken Dugger","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVszZzfJIU4hVG6wl-uY1bl6aSUGN2iaKF52jBhuiTiWPj188I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"From not eating ice cream/gelato for years as in 15+ we are full fledged addicted. Double on a cone, chocolate covered cherry on the bottom. For us dairy free. The flavors are really good and big variety. Seems they are always open too. I am big on old school hole in the wall places that are reasonably priced and smiles all around. See you there. We sit in the corner!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Emmanuel Carino","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJ9g6OsewbE5PvEJQG0W2MrejjY87xqZcS0O_-lbnLLATuQeGq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Matteo's Gelato is a true gem for anyone with a sweet tooth! Offering an impressive variety of authentic Italian gelato flavors, each scoop is rich, creamy, and bursting with flavor. Whether you're in the mood for a classic like pistachio or something more adventurous, Matteo's has something to delight every palate. The atmosphere is cozy and inviting, perfect for enjoying your treat on-site, or you can take it to-go for a refreshing dessert on the move. The staff is friendly and knowledgeable, always happy to recommend a flavor or let you try a sample. Matteo's Gelato is a must-visit for anyone in the area looking for a delicious and memorable treat!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Kathleen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUS9Ug3XlQqFTi2Kka8On2HHAC4AwP3udP3zvZ6dZ_meq69x7z6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently visited this ice cream shop with my father and my two young children, aged 2 and 4. We purchased two regular-sized ice creams and two "mini" ones, which were served in very tiny cups. Unfortunately, my daughter accidentally dropped her ice cream on the floor on our way to sit down. I took it back to the counter for disposal, hoping that given the small portion size meant for a child, the staff would replace it without charge. I was unwilling to pay another $5 for such a small amount. However, the staff simply threw it away without a word and continued to engage in personal conversations, laughing and looking at their phones.

This experience was disappointing on multiple levels. Firstly, the lack of customer service and empathy was disheartening, especially in a situation involving a small child. Secondly, the quality of the ice cream itself was subpar and quite flavorless. It is evident that the standards of this establishment have declined over the years. Given this experience, I will not be returning to this shop.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Paula Ramor","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWmfchkC5ddM-5pYqVSmmcALOjXa79aUgfBNBrebQZQU-95NH4G4g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is the sweetest place (literally). Yes, it's about a 20min drive from home, but soon worth it. They have some amazing flavors! My fave is chocolate covered cherries.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Infinerdy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKdw8cmGEZOe4ZxNqM1yyRW6HBiHGHEEmmdejJQ4yv5X2_FGw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Spacious and bright. Service is friendly but slow which is to be expected when they often make most food on demand. Sometimes it’s clear there isn’t enough staff on though because I’ll be waiting up to ten minutes for my order which I was told would be three minutes because the guy on the register is stuck taking other orders so he can’t bring the food out.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dung Dang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAXjHAV2t4x36Ir5lWIrz-sX4qzKSQvReu75jDU63zwMhoO5PE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I'm very disappointed ordering breakfast here. That's ok if I am on A NORMAL DIET BUT I’M A PESCATARIAN (can't eat meat products) I keep my diet with eggs and cheese only without meat products. This is a big mess if the waitress can't hear properly please double-check accurately with customers.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbCUEBEfso-FMljfWyKwOiGKd38IV4B9BFtnlM\u0026fid=0x0:0x9308343b0a9c196b"],"When":"2023-12-27"},{"Name":"Kevin Fergusin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVGFARUIwpKmpNmVXVmqd9T6Q3ptiD7veE8Scs7dppCUxjQWz-z=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They ask if you want ketchup ! The service was great, I noticed the caring staff I can see it plus . . 2 combo deal for 12$ I'm filled up this extra crispy bacon .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rira H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKz3epzsJByTp5eZ3l5WVslLt4TMHCNYBZNo7NrN60niyz8Cg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was very fresh, service was great! The atmosphere is nice , chill and clean. The food was fresh and tasty. The staffs were friendly and attentive, especially the energetic lady “POOJA”, her passionate service really made my day.  I definitely will be back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOaOi5qg3eIYNqE1r3_F6ZIUZo1OVCb6FaXolfX\u0026fid=0x0:0x9308343b0a9c196b"],"When":"2023-11-30"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dominic Faria","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXja4ouwjZsqs66nHtVuLS2IUwKRavf12dJTVD_z_WIl8IDQw17_g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The restaurant has a wonderful atmosphere and great service, our server was very on top of clearing empty plates and when I asked for more tea she got it right away. The food was absolutely delicious, so fresh and so beautifully presented. We ordered hells chicken to start, then I ordered the Dragon roll, Tiger roll, BC roll and California roll, while my date ordered one of the lunch specials. The prices are very reasonable and comparable to other venues, so there aren't really any pricing surprises if you order sushi regularly. You can tell it's a busy venue as there were several customers in the restaurant and a steady flow of customers picking up orders and this was a visit from 12-1pm to give reference, when the restaurant opens at 11:30am. Would definitely recommend going to Sushi On and will definitely come back 10/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOEQhCMrEAVKv0Jdspa-kYtJngVNFTr3N9gFQ-D&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Chris Bennett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiyRctkUdXqKsV-iEZq3A4JF3vUq2QZcrQQUBG84a49C195QUzuw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi On is a hidden gem among the thousands of sushi spots across the lower mainland!

I was introduced to this place on a date night 6 years ago, and we're now happily married—this sushi spot has become a staple in our lives.

We order from them once a month, and I've brought many family members to experience their incredible menu.

The atmosphere is beautifully ambient, filled with positive energy that makes every visit special.

My go-to rolls are The PoCo Lady roll and The Halloween roll—two flavors I’ll be ordering for the rest of my life.

Sushi On is more than just a restaurant; it’s a place that holds cherished memories and continues to deliver excellence every time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONjlyIzpQcUnXnOizAOFkSHrJq9w9ofIqeMIrz&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Rosa Park","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXgxwKwGYZa5ZolcnIrIix77qAMZ1zxGI9KVT5k_Mku76RimgEn_Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hidden gem in Port Coquitlam! We tried one of the lunch set menu as well as the fresh sashimi and aburi nigiri. Everything was flavourful!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMX22X_X29Kg2VjgxyQmEw8f06f7dD_-OCKgIDl&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Aaron MacEwen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3Ky6ximZkKg4l7lYD2oaitNzrrzF59AoquM1M8Z4is8xtKGnG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you like rice rolled up and stuffed with things then this is the place for you!  Also if you know how to use chopsticks is a plus but not mandatory.  We had a basic sushi roll layout.  Cali, teriyaki chicken and the classic dynamite.  Standard decent rolls.  Then came the Wild Wild West!! Hot Diggity Dog it was phenomenal.  Presented really nice and clean. The torched salmon and avocado topping with sauce reminded me of the BBQ salmon my uncle used to make.  Awesome Roll one of the best I have had.  Definitely worth the trip.  Restaurant super clean and staff were excellent.  Cool vibe and modern decor completes the look.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvxydOxrJa0wlxtQmDjfD-KBgu4c55a1ZcOQsR&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Lizzie S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5qIG1VmBASZQRSYXsIMifm6rtLhZA6xcKTGDs0bvXyJT2pXkmsA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a decent sushi place. Food was very fresh and good seasonings. Services were ok even if they made a wrong order this time. I liked the bright and tidy environment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcExQvJoB8Mi9z9h6f3yZB9N23EDnofTUZCtAt&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-5-31"},{"Name":"Dominic Kohler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIr_Rds6INzk8uBD6vTiDGl0q4vd8v53cFPe8-iHXMsWrqpx1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went here for the first time for dinner. Was recommended this sushi place so had to give it a try. Really nice atmosphere, super modern and clean. I appreciate receiving complimentary tea upon sitting down. Menu is large, something for everyone, easy to navigate also. I ended up starting with an appetizer. The deep fried spicy tofu, it was delicious. Then went for a few rolls. The spicy California roll, and an inari roll. Prices were fairly reasonable. Very fast service, food came in minutes. Everything tasted fresh and was well made. Would come back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNiG7bVibVUdk062rY7zS_KwCTJXHqfzgWOdV0&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-3-23"},{"Name":"John M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWItgijJKwgA0f52g38y2veJk-Ddfx32Y6n5pRa8jqM3m7RR0lStA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Overall food was fresh and tasty for the reasonable price point. Bento and wakame salad portions were a lot larger than I thought they would be which was a plus. Tempura was crispy, Cali rolls were good, miso was hot and fresh. Torched salmon was okay.

One server came to check on us every once in a while and was quite pleasant and smiled a lot. The restaurant was pretty quiet and clean (smelled of cleaner when I walked in).

Would recommend and would go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODlFmUmJqhZGgihF3UmUr1SL7NNEZSV8OTpv91&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2023-3-18"},{"Name":"Noora","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJQwvKIMjuSfVfGeiTQM1f-NVR7AkmXhygNJ3ZO_FmxyEI8SGR=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We got delivery from here and loved the food. Delicious unique rolls with big portions. I tried the deep fried California roll but i wouldnt do it again, i think the California roll itself would be better. If you like deep fried food though, go for it. It does a great job keeping its flavour and texture being fried","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXJc-L4_q0E9DywpQ0iZiNRvE8TiRQvZzxT-Dn&fid=0x0:0x2c6dfc723189a0c1"],"When":"2024-3-18"}]

title: Mr.Neshat
address: 2606 Shaughnessy St, Port Coquitlam, BC V3C 3G5
about: [{"id":"service_options","name":"Service options","options":[{"name":"Delivery","enabled":true},{"name":"Takeout","enabled":true},{"name":"Dine-in","enabled":true}]}]
user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Golnaz J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwh094AvMjRiNSQoo9HjnFTPUMh8c3XSGOFZ78okUlI4KLdqnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I had an amazing experience at this Iranian restaurant! The koobideh with rice was absolutely delicious and incredibly fresh, perfectly seasoned, and paired beautifully with the fresh salad. Everything tasted homemade and authentic.

The highlight of the visit was the owner, who was so kind and welcoming—it truly made the meal even more enjoyable. Their hospitality and care for the customers were outstanding. I can’t wait to return and try more dishes. Highly recommend this gem of a restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNMR3ou9M4NX8wS0tNf55PkgzH2f0gpYtvYukLT&fid=0x0:0x826f99c10340ec77"],"When":"2024-12-17"},{"Name":"Hanie Nazari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW01f4ZGO102QBzXxWZ3lWU1vbkNQux4IH1xEodmUHvQVcE65P_=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve tried the Donair on my first two visits, and this time I went for the Kabab. Every single dish has been absolutely delicious! But what stands out even more than the food is the incredible hospitality. Reza always treats everyone with such kindness and warmth, making every visit feel special.

I love supporting local restaurants like this because they treat you like family. Plus, when you choose local, you’re directly helping a family put food on their table—not just padding the profits of a big franchise. Highly recommend this place for both the food and the genuine experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNKaurKSDrMrULmZOWKwgmZGydPNN4n30Nsiz4&fid=0x0:0x826f99c10340ec77"],"When":"2024-12-14"},{"Name":"Bob","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkEC75mT1rTSBiWusD60B4Ypx_mMWrgo5mEAuPBQ7mgpfmDaoe4Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm basing this review on having one item,  The Especial Donair Neshat. Having said that, the quality and balanced flavors of the ingredients were perfect. Oh, my guess is the other items on the menu are great too.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC79xXa0-0N-1X7tDyr5si2_4i9XY0AABORHdx&fid=0x0:0x826f99c10340ec77"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Rana Janfada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUNvgpvkzcenqlre7mRVpwgzrQY_jVXdEgFN4_LQSSio7EXnzPk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great food. I order a Koobideh for lunch. Tastes great. I think they may be new owners as the food was much better than the previous people and the menu looks a bit more refined.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMy-5p5iefcUSutnVlIwMUnJRv_cYTQ1z3IxKVV&fid=0x0:0x826f99c10340ec77"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Luvr Tru","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWb_DdXUs1pO-5UdyT8dPfr4rd7AiukcEQECvuTwaTy-sRog=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was my first time dining at this location under the new management, and I was pleasantly surprised by their warm hospitality and the beautifully presented dishes. The experience was truly exceptional!

I highly recommend everyone to try their delicious Persian cuisine—you’ll want to become a regular customer just like me.

Thank you, Mr. Neshat, for making the visit memorable once again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Parisa S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWewyhnvsFZHphGo2hJ0RgeBSoIcFwr5Al5nZsdIQPv2glpg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I had an extremely disappointing experience at Mr. Neahat. The kabab koobideh was of awful quality, with a terrible taste that made it hard to even finish. It’s definitely not worth the $10.99 price tag.

To make matters worse, they added tax and an illegal GST-free charge, which felt like a blatant rip-off. The restaurant is always empty, and now I understand why – the food is practically inedible and feels unsafe to consume.

I would not recommend this place to anyone. Save your money and avoid this place at all costs!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK5B0nZc7pfnZP0Dr5h_TAcTbcnwRX-0OethLznEp35ds4XQM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I visited Mr. Neshat , a fantastic Mediterranean restaurant and doner shop, and it did not disappoint! The mixed wrap I ordered was absolutely delicious – packed with flavor and perfectly seasoned. The whole experience was wonderful, from the amazing food to the friendly, welcoming staff who greeted us with beautiful smiles. Plus, the prices are very reasonable for such high quality. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for authentic Mediterranean food with excellent customer service. Can’t wait to go back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Farzam Molaei","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWV7eMDfx6vJZ9E-sEBxILn0miy-wDwhWU_0JH2zURBj0znw03t=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered koobideh kebab on rice and it was great tasting. Big portion and very delicious..
I would definitely recommend this place.
Thanks a bunch","Images":null,"When":""}]
