user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Whoever invented the Krabby Patty Kollab was a genius. The Krabby Patty burger is delicious and juicy and the special sauce is peppery and very nice! The pineapple under the sea frosty tastes like mango pudding in the form of a vanilla frosty that is not too sweet. It was delicious but oddly had no pineapple flavour at all.

The Dave’s triple was meaty and amazing. In my opinion, Wendy’s is like the In and Out of Canada with such fresh burger patties with lettuce, tomato, onions, and cheese. You can customize their burgers however you like . The cheeseburger with added lettuce, tomato, and onions was great too. Great kid’s meals too!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdy0BgXeKQ2BcHhriPEu4cJ2Oc4V93PQ2Uebwp&fid=0x0:0xcb9383729b83e8ab"],"When":"2024-10-18"},{"Name":"Hannah Knowles","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUdwy4lSj0IDXY4Cr5eO7gGf6z8pe__q3vG14tzG-LwTblRDYg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Usually decent food and all but tonight I just finished a soccer game and was so excited to get a Coke Zero and it had 0 flavour so I went back and got a Diet Coke and again it didn’t have flavour. My friend tried it too and she agreed it had no flavour. Didn’t bother going back through because the lady was giving us dirty looks. Usually wouldn’t care but I was rlllllyy looking forward to that coke.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J diax","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJR7FePGJ8NI_8G_QGFn_PI9m6lMD-cQ-XhhhEtRA0yQiyieQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don’t Buy A burger I bought this burger to take away and when I got home I thought it was absolutely disgusting a large Hair in your food 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM8PJNR0-BQTfQK5g0hrbT0IKJMRUtIzykKk_ha&fid=0x0:0xcb9383729b83e8ab"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Arash Dehghani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI0nBmfOdmBXZlqop9851lnu89llHcri3F9GvOMhY49y11DYY4=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We went there today with my friend,
There was a woman she told us if you scan the code behind the recipe and give them a good review, and before we gave her the review she said she will give us two burgers free.
After we did the whole process she said i can not give you the burgers because i didnt get any email. So that was all scam or i can say she scammed us so easy. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnQf23pme7gT6KkT8AiPTl9Sc56rmr3_v1CvRi&fid=0x0:0xcb9383729b83e8ab"],"When":"2024-5-26"},{"Name":"Samantha Kelly","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-pWC_OsYQzyEG-BGyZWkWCYnKrAy0ZcMrMLFCmRC08nc4ljS4Mw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the go to Wendy’s by my house and I literally just ate the worst meal.
The fries were old, the baconator had ONE half slice of bacon on the bottom which was pure translucent white (fat) and 3 half slices on top and all the cheese had melted off and stuck to the wrapper. Husband’s was the exact same.
No, we don’t want to come back down right now with a 4 month old to get the exact same joke of a burger. - which is usually what they say when we call because them screwing up is normal 🤦🏻‍♀️
I’m tired, the baby needs to go to bed, glad to have wasted money and gas again at this location","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkzw30atfTvaURRIYkRG8EK7h9VJ6KYCVL1N9g&fid=0x0:0xcb9383729b83e8ab"],"When":"2023-5-21"},{"Name":"Brow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJgdmmDQz_iKlF5xuirzS1Za6cyaqUf3tOaxKmDoyHqUtf2bQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Only ever went through the drive thru until today.  Was not busy inside and everything was filthy!  Couldn’t find one table that wasn’t dirty. Kitchen from what we saw was dirty, the drink dispenser didn’t look like it had been cleaned for a long time.  Our burgers were good but the poutines were cold.  Probably will never come back, and now knowing how filthy everything is inside I won’t be coming through the drive thru ever again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"AH P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV8hqcgFveDl5ZJjwLaG0dgcv0BDZqljK2r2_EjJu2FWyrI7nw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Another chain restaurant with many offerings 🍔 🍟 🌶️🥗🥤🍦
A lot of sides to substitute if you don't want the traditional fries with your sandwich😀

They do have a spicy chicken, which not many fast food joints offer.

Photo shows shrink-flation at it's best. This location has decided to participate...

Also it is now mandatory in BC to ask if you want a spoon with your chili, but not mandatory to ask if you want the chili sauce for it .. 😒 needless to say, it wasn't in the bag..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzDfg7UiyNC_9WO4_OA3wzNL1iRciiwWRINpPc&fid=0x0:0xcb9383729b83e8ab"],"When":"2024-1-10"},{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today, I came to this restaurant with my friend.
At the first moment, the cashier asked us to scan the barcode on the back of our receipts and leave a positive comment for the restaurant, and she will give each of us a hamburger.
We left for the restaurant and after we ate, when we asked her about Burger, she said that I did not receive an email that you left a comment for me, while we had a verified code.
In the end, she only gave us one burgers and went to the back of the restaurant without paying attention to us.
It is a scam to lie to customers to get a positive comment.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNJ_JdjM9RItAOx-bTAe46Rf7sXdq-z9B7bQX25&fid=0x0:0xcb9383729b83e8ab"],"When":"2024-5-26"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"HW C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUg-IQKwQu37rrt2uXrxPur2eFHVtEh0sof-QwsldNZaEygI2hK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here 3 times in the past week (and I don't even live close by). This is by far THE BEST A&W I've ever been too. They set the bar too high I won't even go anywhere anymore.
Great friendly staff. Great food (they can really do the eggs the way you wanted which is rare even in high end restaurants). You can even substitute the meat or bread with another kind, including pancakes. They also have fresh baked pastries from Pret and they were GOOD! Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM84lJgUZb1_oztIcMjJ5Jog52dUxkPjFEwxWp1&fid=0x0:0xa7881242be207994"],"When":"2024-10-11"},{"Name":"Mehran bakhtiari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX52_I8QBEvpbwP2DsvccLDQ1hUjTB0qEjwNL_660Q7Wjozcaqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was one of the best A&W branches I came to. Very clean and breathless. 🌸
The cashier, Mr. Nikan, was very friendly and warm, and I have never seen such a good cashier in any other A&W branch. 🥰
The manager of this branch is very lucky to have these good employees. 🤩👌🏻","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPh2gyg-lS4XDeKPorsuwZXCUNySTQxXkBWfyaF&fid=0x0:0xa7881242be207994"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"Aaron KS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqnnfqH52ze-6dar1_ioh-ovBYuedzOTdE9NmLxxYuUpvVxAiVFg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"When I visited the main fountain pop machine that was accessible by customers was out of service so they gave me pop from the machine behind the counter. After I sat down to drink it I noticed that it wasn't very carbonated so I went back up to get a different pop and it was also not carbonated. The carbonation in the last remaining machine was broken. They didn't seem fazed by this in the slightest and got a replacement lemonade which I guess is fine.

I am giving lower stars because I shouldn't have to drink pop to find out that the machine is broken and they should let me know in advance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Marcus Aurelius","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWUvbghmSJsBatb83ovDQuivvDf11ydvJzUUMrd7dyJbcJAzOlwqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Extremely fast and good.
They made the food so quickly, they gave my glass to fill the pop, and I had just finished filling my cup, after they called me and the entire meal was ready. burger was assembled very carefully and perfect. Fries were extremely hot and fresh. Even the washroom and dining area were very clean. They are doing a good job here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Leathem","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVfr1uYSq190uMrl4Dg0oWh0YU9ClxxoxmXYW2uYxZFzAk7KFM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was good, restaurant was clean.
Used the family washroom and on a cold Dec morning, the 30 plus degree temp in there was absolutely lovely! I double checked to see if the seat was heated. It wasn't, it was just that warm.
I'll definitely come back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Derek Wile","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOQItSCPkhlBn0dpBL481DMLfjN-NYPUAemlb0TtOLx9bHEgpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Love A&W and the food. But for some reason this location has gone down hill in a major way. Everytime we go, they are out of a mainstay item. Today, they were out of gift cards, onion rings and multiple drinks. If this was a one of things or even a once in a while thing, I wouldn't be writing this. But unfortunately it's become a constant situation where everytime we go there is an issue, so this only leads me to believe it's a management issue. Should they improve, I will gladly update my review.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shannon Bradley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVTexecSQIVUHWKHSknr_2Di1shuQFGkv8Ns5YAgdTeCf84lfdmzg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Standard fresh made burger and onion rings for lunch. Staff was very pleasant and the location was clean. I was impressed by the green waste/recycling station....I think all restaurants should do this!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPjwkDIDw-B8y-fIlZC04C4hO_J8o7M7kkL6t7&fid=0x0:0xa7881242be207994"],"When":"2024-7-4"},{"Name":"jaime mclaughlin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaq0O36QqK4WFLzWbmt-UuunjLl8hiaUFvAQ1oaafnVpKPww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Consistently good customer service from everyone who works cash, and pretty efficient food times at all hours of the day as well. I always dine alone, and usually only get 1-2 small items and they always prioritize me which I appreciate. There's one older white woman who works during the weekday in the daytime and I heard her very loudly and rudely make racist comments to her South Asian coworkers and that was beyond unpleasant and a bit shocking to witness as a customer. Owners should be mindful that employees like that can tarnish their hardworking teammates' excellent service.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sarah Okut","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLTH-O9yHrUXXSzwuweULzXw1pBbME2AVL3wPUzYMdoLT_dRg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited Pizza Pietra and really enjoyed their pizza and San Sebastian cheesecake. The pizza had a crispy crust with fresh, tasty toppings. It was delicious! The San Sebastian cheesecake was the best part—it was rich, smooth, and creamy, with a slightly caramelized top that gave it extra flavor. If you love desserts, you should definitely try this cheesecake!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN3wU0_wer5w028bhetbEqdDgTlTPAd9mr8aiH5&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Mucahit Mert Alagoz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlZFzlr8OmJ6ReNSeqILjiXkPYOR-Wi6HlJhjaTTE_xGsRl7kohA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really loved this small and cozy Turkish café run by two Turkish women. The staff is very warm and friendly. Although the menu is a bit limited, the breakfast options are quite delicious. I loved everything, from the sucuk (Turkish sausage) to the eggs and meat-filled pastries. For four people (we ordered a bit too much), the total was $105.
I definitely recommend it—a lovely café!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZkVllSrfsqQVnk7-eaCEQy80caDFl6QFecd6N&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2024-11-16"},{"Name":"방새단Jp","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXPRFl5X_2oRYVKyp5YOzyZvBiFq4LXRAXvUH4K1gSFuhrTkvIu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the poached eggs with avocado.
They took a while to get the plate ready, but it was much better than what I had hoped for. Ingredients were fresh, tasty and I would definitely come back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPW5MCUo0Kn75oa42Blt_gR0Ah7EI2gXYUVdZhL&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Mahesh Vanga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_R99DIUm3YNCVBnH6ipuMklk--v4TSFTsQ7Tybr4ECj_qR-ZP9A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is by far the best pizza place I have ever been to in the Mainland area. We explored this place as part of checking regular pizza places around, to our surprise this has been the best random pizza place ever been in fact the best pizza I ever had in the mainland area. Any food/pizza lover cannot miss this place, they got a wide variety of pizzas to offer as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO263l3lNZQ04gOHPrnihMubx8QyholXqUTO6DE&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2024-9-28"},{"Name":"Graham Sutton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8UeAA1nmB6Ej3WgCR3VioNDAdhDivzoWDT4UCyjNTsgC4MA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Breakfast was awesome!  Traditional Turkish meals with lovely fresh bread and Turkish tea.  We'll definitely be back on a regular basis.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODmWArQZDzyV5LCBa5m3uJi_01rXQ5LyF0EMno&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2024-11-20"},{"Name":"Onur Kaan KOÇ","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLl3-LHlkDHqQOafBmwY6xCPBlOCHVa2JkVR6DeNJcaxq3QYw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean, Happy and delicious Pizza Pietra, siezed my day 😋

At first I was hesitant because of the mixed reviews but I really wanted to give it a try, especially because of the praised stone oven and authentic dough.

I've been to most regions of Italy, ate a lot of very good pizza and I must say this pizza restaurant reminded me the times I was in Mediterranean.

You must use good quality ingredients and have precise dough craftsmanship, and have the right oven with the correct temperature to make a delicious pizza. But every body knows, in our modern times, this equation is quite impossible in big cities because of the cost and profit concerns.

But in this pizza shop they nearly got the perfect combination.

They have a real stove oven at the right temperature, good quality ingredients and handmade authentic dough.

Both pizza and Foccacia are nicely crusty and juicy. The Tomato sauce is not bitter nor too sweet, just yummy and fresh  ;-).

Toppings and mozzarella have a very good price to quality ratio.

All the ingredients are really really fresh 👍

A suggestion for them, I think you should make a pizza with different ingredients which are hard to find in PoCo

And for me the most important thing , people in this pizza shop are really happy, hospitable, positive and energetic. They really smile to you because they just want to. The total vibe is just like the warm and welcoming family owned pizza shops in Italy too 😍😍.

Ps: I asked the owner to tour the kitchen because of my cleanliness obsession. And yes he let me to quickly tour the kitchen and I'm amazed, this is a really really clean kitchen for BC standarts 😉","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODw8DnBQZ_EDJZzRNN9UlLF96GZOid--UDy1PJ&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2024-3-28"},{"Name":"Aamir Sheergar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUTKU4wfuc0kwoyEwJxy3N-nmGgBy-VjbHs41hImisM4pU2gpbxyQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great pizza, loved the thin crust. Friendly service from the ladies in the kitchen. One of my new favorite pizza places.

Also tried the cheesecake, it was not too dense and had just the right amount of sweetness, a great balance.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M. Murat Kucuk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWQxmakxls5MdK3S6o9QjUak841XsiEQ7PpJlT7cOAjNN9ECiE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Prepare to be amazed by this extraordinary pizza haven nestled within town. Without hesitation, I wholeheartedly recommend this remarkable establishment to all pizza enthusiasts. During our recent visit, we indulged in their custom 2-in-1 pizza, an exquisite combination that left our taste buds in a state of pure bliss.

The staff at Pizza Pietra were not only kind, but also exceptionally helpful, ensuring that our dining experience was nothing short of perfection. Their attentiveness added an extra touch of delight to an already exceptional culinary adventure.

Do not, under any circumstances, allow yourself to miss out on the opportunity to visit this exceptional pizza establishment. It is an experience that promises to tantalize your senses and leave an indelible impression.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPoC8qGLwQyu83S1THS9PbLQVeSXqTbUxjDY8X&fid=0x0:0x4640aee62581d2d2"],"When":"2023-6-25"}]

descriptions: Counter-serve choice known for its breaded chicken, wings, wraps & signature potato wedges.

[{"Name":"K S H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUpfuZFJ8RwqNTmsEi_Ve_L99RruCBycZdik5Nf-7YZZhK-hRF=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you like fried chicken at a reasonable price, this is surely a better alternative. They also now serve a grilled chicken option, if you are not craving fried. Customer service was prompt and very friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMw5JQGjIhSog5CAzGMLUuuCEQ3cMZjwnAeS5Wl&fid=0x0:0x9d865b2cef32698f"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Amina L Mohammed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUiogWqdmDb4Zhe6RH2PLDdsr8IDMcwMhN0XNmwWhjbZeJdyDnp=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I am so mad right now I send my 14 daughter to buy for me pineapple crash and the cashier was there. She told my daughter it’s not available and she asked My Daughter if she will want another one and My Daughter brought for me two Orange crush and one Pepsi then I told My Daughter why did you bring this? I asked for pineapple crash. I went inside and told the cashier that I don’t want this drinks if she can’t refund she said she doesn’t do that. I told her can I talk to your manager the supervisor came and she was telling me this and that and they said that I don’t like to argue so I left the drink with her and I did not get my refund. It’s not fair. They should have just refunded the money to me. I will never set my food in that place again and their chicken is too oily Bad service very bad bad bad I wish I can give them zero Star😫","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX98PrUHxEgks1p_UHXz6OQ_Vovq-hbr6NA6018tymH019sjnz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"*September 2024*
Food is always fresh when I order from this location, and the staff is friendly. Honestly, I'm not a fan of them asking customers for 5 star reviews, I feel like that should be earned and not expected/asked for. But still great food

*December 2024*
You'd think it would still be open but guess not. I guess the hours are wrong... hopefully someone fixes that soon.. this was disappointing to see. At least Chipotle and Boston Pizza are right here still open 😂","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAHh4z1qfJLg-gzeHTA9lG24blgbHlhAjirbtu&fid=0x0:0x9d865b2cef32698f"],"When":"2024-12-13"},{"Name":"Vian Rezakhani","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ0DMCw1Jdga__wtB1yZ_dYYDc_ppKyWMjTvgq4otcOAy1JRzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The taste and quality of the food was amazing. We had big mary sandwich and 3 pieces meal. The chicken was so soft inside and super crispy on outside. Also their taters is sooo good. The staff were so friendly and served a great customer service. Simran helped us so much. She explained the offers and the menu kindly and with patient. She is amazing. Other staff at the back were doing a great job as well. They made the order ready so fast. They all were trying to keep the place clean as well which is really important for customers in restaurants.I recommend this place and will definitely go back again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeremy Habetler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUb9CsboXDvTicWHR5MrERo1k7ScZcfy1JBXINPnta9hpLbjHeb=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have always had a great experience visiting a Mary Browns and this location is no different, the staff is very polite and are quick take your order. The thing that got me hooked on Mary Browns is they're the only quick service restaurant that understands what spicy actually means, their Spicy Big Mary can certainly pack the heat. I'm not usually a potato wedge fan, but with their seasoning and the way they are cooked I can't get enough. I'm just glad there's a location so close to home","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Kelvin Lo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0vDZHoz3vt6scDqHbx10356ESUd51j-OXY0KZhXm8OECNImru=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Previously ordered four 2pcs meal for me and my family. It is one of the worst fried chicken I ever had. No matter is spicy or not, all of them taste just as bad. Is very dried and not juicy.

Honestly  with so many fried chicken options to choose from around the area, would definitely go to their competitors next time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"fati bahrami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHsuIB1uEtUNLbMnu8Vpqm620bJYbEhiP_EDdqJ3_C-inbmRI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I menu 2 PC chkn and taters I ordered two packages of it, but instead of four pieces of chicken, there were three pieces of chicken in the package","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPH7TQJa8d2_ka8XhluCndOuRZX5ElrCh4KGHh&fid=0x0:0x9d865b2cef32698f"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"Alan Wilson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuj10RF8krbhoJ8BxGvowzT_TxEzrcKqWQnc4QtNnRbMshiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Their sandwiches have shrunk considerably.  That’s supposed to be a $10 sandwich... Not going back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPalDXzlZSZWjjKjB-GnKtARmE7uePAbhOE7eeL&fid=0x0:0x9d865b2cef32698f"],"When":"2024-9-28"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kevan Bonn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvNnHmBNFG_G3ySw9mP3BZPzSJjPIurU1Hy79afN_SrMR1Zg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ordered online a Cajun chicken sandwich with no Cajun, upgrade the side to yam fries, tofu lettuce wraps and an eggnog cheese cake for dessert. I got a notification that the food was ready for pick up 40 minutes later, my boyfriend went inside to pick up the food but was told it wasn’t ready yet… when he finally got home with our much excited take out date night dinner, we started to dig in. The first couple of bites were yummy, nothing out of the ordinary, but it didn’t take long before my boyfriend noticed that his chicken was not fully cooked through and still very pink. He refused to eat anymore and then we had to make dinner, which negated us buying take out and waiting for it. We wanted to treat ourselves to dinner that we did not have to make or clean up after. Over all we were very disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_E3fTpJJdLK0kMeulnj-eqylf46yXWbc1CBWM&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Susan Yuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocISqE3GGZHq77BbXSSOOoXO8UWomH8yim9n4ajppulvtJIkzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The server we had was incredible!  She was very personable, efficient and proactive.  I am lactose intolerant, so she made sure my meal was suitable and also comped my happy hour truffle fries when they were not able to make the fish tacos (ran out of pico de gao.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3XyhInD41Mtf1_R2GPa9MO7DdSZTTySrIl6tJ&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-12-24"},{"Name":"Mur L'Amour Beauty","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLWRTv6Ucl2AQriy5TjtYYVHeEv9CMDUYjKrDpm4hOiOHfpNg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was pleasantly surprised by the carpaccio at your cafe Very fresh and thinly sliced pieces, perfectly balanced with sauce and spices. The presentation was also impressive everything looked very appetizing. I’ll definitely be back for this dish again! Thank you for such a delicious 🫶","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYN6ShhxADOvPzWTa-wOUvGPBNjzR5tP_ZWxM6&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The ceviche was very good, and so was the service. But the main dish was really disappointing! The burger's meat was basically burnt. Both. The beef patty was thin, which helped to make it dry. In the end, it was just an expensive Big Mac.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNWeu7fZGthlPgUHdyxdo79Wu7OuNy5G0EJICj1&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Amanda S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfFdUftfUOx33L8DAwQyclFhJteI62arLCkWITYeGsgp-LQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Maria was probably one of the nicest servers I’ve ever had in my life. She’s was sooo warm, kind and bubbly. I was having a bad day and she turned it around with her positivity and attentiveness. The atmosphere on the patio was just perfect too and her recommendation for the Mediterranean bowl is now one of my favorites. Thanks again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOlD5hznwGa7DOTpstaj4P0zPs_a4_CQ2gRi6UK&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-11-22"},{"Name":"Lex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVIOoTFR1sL0065mPU_AeAGgpwzqHssyGAT0I917Apw20TmHTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend for group (work) lunches. Gluten free, vegan and vegetarian options available. The crispy tofu was so delicious.

5 stars for the food & service. Our team will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOyRhebp-rXmnYbmBl2L3bBgxAdFwumqf3-XiKh&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Naz Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRq8l2FAHrB_BVK6IQu7kkBhuqAvVszlJ_x3nATjhjB42KboI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our first server was great, super sweet and kind.  She made sure to make us feel comfortable and helped us decide what to order.  After her shift ended, the new server introduced herself and took over in the same friendly and helpful manner.  The best part was, the manager came over to check on us and was an absolute delight!  She chatted with us for a bit and made us feel so welcome and appreciated.  During a busy time, they all took the time to interact with us on a personal level while still making sure the food was on time and done right.  Overall, my best experience at CC which is almost always wonderful.  Kudos to management for hiring great staff and training so well.  I felt almost like I was at a small, family owned restaurant!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"dawn lopez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVN4Fd7SxUXBbHiu42-5cl9bOQZMv8_jHLVnj32nQgkACFpiRI=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went mid day on a Monday
Food was excellent 😋
Was recommended a substitution when asked to have ravioli without prawns . Excellent choice!
Both server and hostess were wonderful","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhYJd9bcx4x_09onaD0dUnluMyTyys_3o4IGAP&fid=0x0:0x5a740195b1b5f06d"],"When":"2024-10-8"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nicole B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIpMuVSXPy0_ZNJ5r_7iG7pgt5q5qas8zjAc3eN5JGU3DZhrQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"One star because zero is not an option. This is the worst subway around. Since new ownership, I will NEVER eat here again. The staff does not wash their hands often. They are constantly touching money and food without changing the gloves. I have witnessed this several times as I work close by as have some Co workers. Save yourself from food poisoning and cross contamination. 👎👎👎","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Carter Lefneski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXERKEfKNQjhbhpHOTqfA_EGg6bf7zUlMYtsuD8NCpW5x-FXsZc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Mahi is incredible, she always prepares my order quickly and with care.
I get subway for lunch nearly every day, she remembers my order and prepares it without me having to ask, even when they're packed!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Trevor Kiesman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8AByZAYmxMgJk--BzAL7jzum-xkOelPMv7qw1Ei7as1_VUQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Moved to Poco from North Van about a year ago. I stopped going to the north van subway as the quantity of toppings got less and less and not as fresh as it was previous.
This location in Poco has been our goto and up until yesterday it has been Great!
I ordered 2 Turkey subs and the toppings were good but the Bread (white and whole wheat) were both dry. there was also a special on the app for national cookie day. buy a turkey sub get a free foot long cookie. well, 2 turkey subs and when i asked about the cookies they said "you have to order the cookie"??
A new sandwich shop opened down the street and we will give them a try on our next sandwich order.
It only takes onece Subway..","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrew Marshall","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ7jfeLzIKVc0qRvNI_v50fz8r5vUV_upu7SthjR9RpHdaJ2g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sukhpreet Kaur has been great every time I come into the restaurant. She's attentive and pays attention to the details while crafting the subs. Always a great experience when she's working.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alisa Sytnyk","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJvbmGOgE5pkod7WjGQm5dttF9LqN6mNJfee9uyy5C94JZp_A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great place for lazy dinners or late night cravings. Sukhpreet was lovely - so welcoming and kind. Will def be my go-to Subway location!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Hafsa H","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVYE1ewuruvk5652z-GO4dR8GK7-9mRcn4Xl4j56YzhEcOzYw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I haven’t had a sandwich in a few months due to stomach complications and was craving subway. Kuldeep, an associate there was so kind and accommodating to my pickiness. Wanted to leave this review to just thank her for making my night and sandwich awesome.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bolu Adeoti","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX_czSJP8qRdbwv2Ao95telz3VD0QM0TSu-fw2F-0a6SjmqSZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Today is my birthday and I was treated so nicely by Kuldeep Kaur plus everything I got was super nice! I recommend this Subway over and over💯","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Simranjeet Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5o78NWw3VQi7Rz57ty-BOeCfd_D5eL_JiO_qR1jH6K8CPKuJl6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The owner is soo cheap they try to cut cost on everything. I got to know from the employees that they are asked to keep portions less than recommended by subway. Got coffee with no lid and i was taking some extra napkins and the owner gave me a wierd stair.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Candice C.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwFBBjzDK0K147Ahvw56fgZp0Wzk8W8u0zo_aJQ425Hu_MYA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Come here frequently, the staff is always great no matter if it's super late at night or mid day. The place is kept clean, the food always appears to be fresh. Orders on the app are pretty fast as well. They have a range of different sandwiches which you can customize plus the sauces can enhance whatever sub you've created. Kuldeep is always pleasant as are the other staff, they are patient especially while indecisive family are choosing what they might want. I've been to other subway restaurants and staff are hanging out in the back when it's dead on their phones, I haven't encountered this hear. This place is probably not anyone's top pick for a job, but the staff here do a good job so try and give them a little tip here and there.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNI6KljREgBDb-DT3oi8ol7G7Ztv2flH_dfHuvK&fid=0x0:0xcdc1f6bfeb8b83fb"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Josh Sager","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL1BMiwvck1JmDO_hJhlcdnFOxTOwZf5MwPR5gvvBd2p7IyJw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I guess that’s a great place to put the scooper when you go and answer the phone… I get it you don’t get paid a lot but this is peoples food you’re preparing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDygK8Xp2xi4J7lKsGSwlRZ0uK_JJuQFjr8XRs&fid=0x0:0xcdc1f6bfeb8b83fb"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Brittani Di Lorenzo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXqC9cP5nmef_S7CEH5ZJG145Bh-kByUYd2xzdH2mK7TFrbQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"They want to use door dash, take responsibility when they mess up and deliver it to the wrong house and ignore the customers calls. Don’t order via the app, they don’t care what happens to your order they just want your money. Well, I’ll be having the charges reversed and my money back through my bank.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Well portioned rice bowl with fresh ingredients. It’s a clean location. The drinks and chips are stocked, with some variety. I had no trouble with the employees.
Thank you, Subway!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO34eqQIHLKidzaaMJOHpgkZetDyaGyFpWyUpfl&fid=0x0:0xcdc1f6bfeb8b83fb"],"When":"2023-10-5"},{"Name":"Gagan Dhillon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJykBXKbSxg-6eqxuyN57B3IhVNcPYIaqqrqn-99xLi1DQBjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I am their regular customer, every thing is very fresh and well organised. As i always eat the veggie patty wrap which is just awesome. If i am not wrong i think i was served by harman most of the time and she always helped me in the sauces. I must say that everyone should visit this place .","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soudi S.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKQ4X5gvTASukIWRHIVKEUNzyTyhFpH1XPJwC94IuoRhrk3Pv0M=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We always order footlong steak sandwich because we like it !!! but this time we ordered our sandwiches from this branch! Wish we did not! The tomatoes were rotten!!!! It smelled very bad, one of the sandwiches was not full enough and pickles were all in one spot!!!! So awful experience. Unfortunately it was picked up and we could not show them what they prepared !!!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aruna lamsal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJOI95k6lkhoksmA1F2WaBG37tjaq7uRKvriy9mXwvkAgmLLw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great service and fresh ingredients at this Subway! The staff is friendly, and the location is always clean. Perfect for a quick, tasty meal.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Deborah Monkman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-u_zffUdWkQU_VyIEkR0xHl_MwAcPB_Oz7MCRvFngoFF23UOP=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"So major attitude from workers.  Life in Canada not going as planned I’m guessing not exactly a dream job , I know how that feels, changed a lot in 56 years still not an excuse to be unfriendly when you work in the hospitality industry Aka food service.   So I ask for extra spinach 5 times getting a single leaf each time, extra cheese “EXTRA CHARGE!” Shouted, add pesto please, “EXTRA CHARGE!” Shouted .  Then it’s slopped on ice cream scoop size.

Tried again .  Manpreet, extremely rude.   Doesn’t listen, I asked politely little onion, piled on anyway , asked take some off, major attitude, asked 3 times , serious attitude.  Then, to top it off, they hand you the debit machine asking for a tip unbelievable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPWVQrAMW_tgLhk26HlfuFGDTr4g3SP7Cvh8CVD&fid=0x0:0xcdc1f6bfeb8b83fb"],"When":"2023-10-6"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love their Thursday night 50 cent wings. It’s really an unbeatable deal. The portions are huge and they have lots of wing flavours to choose from. You must order a minimum of 10 per order. Would recommend the salt and pepper wings and the honey garlic ones. I would skip the hotyaki flavour as I found the flavour combo didn’t quite work. Service was great and the ambience is good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZLT0B_KKvgPfqi45umH7RrLYsT_VaXwPF3cCC&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Keith Eastcott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk5BCUEJh42hOpsF-_OoCCbmyygcrHIJcijMiuq6slKML49qmN0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was ok, I had the brisket sandwich and tasted like a uninspired sandwich made with lunch meat. Drinks were good. Server was quick and attentive and made sure we had what we needed when we needed it. Maybe next time I'll have a burger or main and see if those are a better representation of the restaurant. Gravy was pretty damn good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMt1tDfCL-KUqinnppfObzFiBiyDmEbElSW6BCm&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"J Yeung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKNJ92b9j3lqmRqAgTBh-3qy3x8VVuxDUGF6GquG2EpmZTw61k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Recently had a fantastic time here with my husband. It's been mentioned to us before but fell off our radar until we just so happened to be passing by when we quickly pulled over.

Let me just say the service was fantastic even though it was a very busy Friday lunch rush. We sat on the patio with a great view of the water and our server was very friendly and attentive. Never had to ask for anything as she was always on the ball.

With so many seafood options on the menu, I wanted try a bit of everything but we were satisfied with our picks. We'll certainly be back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH7Ay8eXOFiA5IDSSKOD0MYZUuTE6IPTqZNfsH&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Located just off the Marry Hill Bypass with a great view of the Pitt River flowing into the Mighty Fraser River.

It's been a few years since I've been to the Gillnetter but I was more than pleased that they finally did some nice upgrades to the inside of the Pub. Gone is the Carpet, and put in a nice new flooring. And not to mention they finally Reupholstered all the bench seating and so on ( believe me it sure needed to be done) like I said it's been a while since I was at the Pub.

The outdoor patio is a great way to spend a lazy summer afternoon having lunch and drinks. Not to mention enjoying the evening as well.

The Gillnetter has a not too bad selection of local Craft Beers. And the food is always fairly consistent, with one of my go to's being the Seafood Club Sandwich ( with your choice of bread )

All in all the Gillnetter Pub is a great place to relax and enjoy the day and evening with friends or your significant other.

Since they finally did some upgrades to the inside I'll probably be back more often with friends and so on 😀👍🍸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMHEoHYPRpsMBPkS-g2P1gTmM9thHAQhgmxWnv7&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-7-13"},{"Name":"Melinda W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUqFa91nGQX9-WVxFZ-rAUul10GF70bhWZFQZe97ymoPVUZrvFxnA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's love at the first sight! This pub has a bit of a rustic look. With the river on its side, sitting in the outdoor area was absolutely a bliss on a sunny day.

The food, I would say, didn't wow me. That said, they all taste quite good by the pub standard. They also offer an array of local draft beer and wine at reasonable price. I heard that there were often goodies in their inhouse liquor store, but I didn't get to check them out this time.

This pub must be a favorite hangout in the neighborhood. At noon, it's already full house. I saw its customers joyfully sipping their wine and beer.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNaryz0JOC4VTLRWqQsyZVHVw7RL-7VxA7J1YO&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Chelsea Vancouver","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVHVWaXfVBGL-NRGFFbHN7eiAD3hCGrOaEohFBcpGwJyjbv0CUl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent patio! Some vegetarian options, but not very vegan friendly. Onion rings were perfect. Gendered washrooms.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4Qb38xqAzG8JsVms0yuPo-sAqWvW2027WONk&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-9-11"},{"Name":"Lucy Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmYYCv91nGypEOH5i4zNNIgItYKA60aITY7qlGegel7t5goZaFNw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Fantastic service from Reanna! We had a large group of about 20 people, for a work Christmas party. She provided us with excellent service, every order was correct, and the kitchen was super quick in getting our orders out all at the same time.

The food was really delicious, honestly better than I would expect from a pub. I have the surf and turf and it was really yummy! She also took careful note of any allergies at the table.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"ladan ghafouri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQKWEx_YV_Uj80v-xctgsLSGRY6V78hw5KMb4aNvRdZAaXJWti=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My husband took me there for Sunday brunch . We were there around 10.20am . We sat down outside which was really relaxingwiththe nice view. They have plenty of choice.not serving alcohol before 11am. We ordered (ham and cheese omelet, also medium Benedict eggs with crab and shrimp ) they were both good and totally cost us 40 $ and somethings. We will be back for sure","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOsL-zgOyR8KFJGBH8DwEhOYbuA7YRhhqDinUJN&fid=0x0:0x240c12aa8f43bf5d"],"When":"2024-5-12"}]

[{"Name":"phung pham","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKPbfrHCpvzKVUr-D7nEtzNxkvlcXQr_EbAjiww4SBYRwVFAw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fuji Noodle Restaurant is one of the Chinese Restaurants closer to my home.  The foods and service were alright. Many selection choices you can pick and they open late so if anyone need late food you can come to try this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPKGlAvYB8pOCte1iK54kFOI9OIoEiixFk8AXi&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Amy Chan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXqddZyajPNoFhSfeKC0jxyRc2Om1n2-N6OKu8IHOhfMDJ3cE=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Firs time I try this restaurant at Port Coquitlam. The foods and service were alright. Many selection choices you can pick and they open late so if anyone need late food you can come to try this restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMkgLXZ8VxQn-rxPXS0DUFtoxMSugLHxi2BzmFP&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2024-7-27"},{"Name":"Michele L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAxzJT5HVd70ieWgtRPnBYOI-3WdHBp602F9b2NQ3FhsBevYCm=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here on vacation and went back twice this trip! Super friendly hostess (she and her husband own the restaurant), large group friendly, great prices, and delicious authentic Chinese food! We especially liked the eggplant and green bean dish and the eight treasure duck, which is pretty hard to find. Also loved the desserts. They’re open for late night now as well!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNcysj9p0OG-pLVRPkQm85HbeWtFdNNep5WY0go&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2023-3-10"},{"Name":"Belinda Jin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVQN2pGhoNzK76Clox_ElaIbflMT40WxZHUMqKpCiI5FtnukLZ6Zw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Fuji Noodle Restaurant is one of the Chinese Restaurants closer to my home.  We haven't had a chance dining at this place due to COVID. But, we always ordered take out from this place.

We already ordered the same food, such as Peking Duck 2 courses, sweet sour pork with pineapple, eggplant with spicy garlic sauce hotpot, beef shank in house special sauce hot pot and  spicy pork floss and string beans. The food very fresh and well cooked. During the holiday, the restaurant also provide free deserve to us.  Very excellent customer services.

The price of the food is a little bit expensive.  Hopefully, we can go dining at this restaurant when everything goes back to normal. I really want to try their noodles.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMKpMM1WFLa4MXEW9d39zC2IPQpkvUCsMvSak9D&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2021-5-7"},{"Name":"Kevin Luo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVWJMxLZr-3YvPOYEYkCwOqoRgX8yyWGLPYZ19IJEKzgIUssXc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great food at a great price! I had Fuqi Feipian and Claypot beef. Fuqi Feipian was warm for some reason instead of a cold dish, and beef cuts were too thick. The flavour was right on though. The claypot beef was great! The ambience is really dated despite the fancy light fixtures. Kudos to the owner for opening late!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMVHs8P1nhtQN_FBW5L-YjeVlQ7sBOg1epu_auH&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2024-3-21"},{"Name":"DAN NOU","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpYtBF7XkEge_dJaW_6qxQAvx0BMjlWIVs-s1F2tNjt9jcI0CG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant is newly renovated.  The service is good.

I order the beef crispy chow Mein with mixed veggies and was somewhat disappointed.  The flavour was bland.

Order the wonton with noodle soup and again the taste...bland

Order the 1/2 bbq duck and that was delicious!

Would I come back?  No, I would try other places.  Let me know your experiences.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6ZKNCY8H_nnNhuWnMlq0htWxUf2mepI2qkc43&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2021-8-6"},{"Name":"Andrea Koji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKm8xDujv3m2blHf2s7xyhtk3tC4OIHJVLzBx6iM1thEBZ-eg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Don't order from this place. Placed an order through Uber and received dishes that barley have any meat in them. My ginger beer and it was filled with more onion than meat. Meat tasted bland and tasted like flour. Also Extremely skimpy on soup ingredients $20 for house special won ton and recieved bland soup with 4 pieces soggy broccoli and one piece of very fatty pork. I called to discuss with the restaurant and they refused to refund despite my offer to return the food myself. Extremely poor service. Don't waste your money.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPqcEZu8QrOhB5cClzpkvGVuNoaRB9qQl7US_s_&fid=0x0:0x8e56f779bf6badbb"],"When":"2023-9-23"},{"Name":"Tommy Joness","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIvM1yb66GYDWFmNjC7izCZ-8qnEQR4tC-Kh4aYxaYhJXkZNwI=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This place is dirty and stinks the bleach smell was so strong we all felt sick. I went to the washroom and the lady follows me there and asked me what I was doing right after I asked where the bathroom was. She was rude and short with us ordering food and the food tasted cheep and was small portions my girlfriend found a hair in her food I highly recomend finding another place to eat.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ping D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-_KBk5-yIGzGmKAkX1L-6QPRrz_RZKkgRnIY4il5exhoL_sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a perfect lunch. Kids menu pizza was the same size as the regular pizza. Food and service were both very good. I’d suggest they offer more selections of pizza flavours at lunch time. It’s definitely a good deal to go at lunch. The comfortable meal started with complimentary dinner rolls with garlic oil.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN47_Do9ZdDwPr-MU16mYYSZu6ND1uoZmOWqwg4&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Amanda Green","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX2-QkU6r0X4DLM6-w27hOoQabXaFOXnHBh92gU3KWWKAd6KWGjA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We have ordered takeout before and loved it, so we decided to dine in this time. Very cozy atmosphere and lovely service. The food was so, so fresh and the flavours were outstanding. I ordered the Scusa Mi Pomodoro and I understand now why it's a challenge winner - it was to die for, and I can't remember the last time I had such good, fresh, perfectly cooked prawns. Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0E5mjnxKtwgfWXwsftGkVtde8Fcyw_qHRefWm&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-20"},{"Name":"Jessameen Dela Peña","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX9mRpmL8-ZJUG7UPFcnsjzRdxjABif-MswbO1rxgJyyWfns8Jd=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful family dinner at this restaurant! The ambiance is truly lovely, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The staff went above and beyond, being both accommodating and welcoming throughout our meal. We highly recommend the Baked Chicken Parmesan—it was absolutely delicious! A great experience all around!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMC3AKdGWBqxc-jukm25cD5f_HXE9kVmRakX-oM&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-8"},{"Name":"Nathan Ferlan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBBwm7N9m9VsEZe8oXWT3QVjEQHlJhduQ22vfMGOziLtc2Ouo=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A Culinary Experience to Remember!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

If you’re looking for a dining experience that leaves you craving more, look no further. I recently had the pleasure of indulging in the most exquisite Pasta & Prawns, and I’m still savoring every memory of it. Each bite was a masterpiece—perfectly cooked pasta with tender, flavorful prawns, all bathed in a rich, savory sauce that danced on my palate. The balance of flavors was simply divine, making it one of the best dishes I’ve ever had.

But what truly made the night unforgettable was the outstanding service. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel like we were more than just customers—they made us feel like family. Our server was down-to-earth, warm, and attentive in a way that made the whole evening feel special. Every request was met with a genuine smile and care that is rare to find.

The ambiance, the incredible food, and the impeccable service all came together to create a perfect dining experience. I had such a great time, and I’m already counting down the days until my next visit. Highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP6ocpt4jzjfqUqjB2OE7Fa55VrOmI8L5U_KNDR&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"James Mendonca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKDOYVs1G-8iT9QF6Fj3_nUauDo1DS6zISrEp3lZ9wij4inDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pasta Polo is an exceptionally great Italian restaurant that serves quality food. You know the workers take pride in their food and service when they post the restaurant's review articles on the walls.

I ordered the Osso Bucco with the Virgin Purple Sour drink. I was served complimentary bread with my entrée that included butter and a bottle of fermented garlic. The bread tasted pretty great on its own while the garlic made it taste much better. The Osso Bucco was delicious with the Bolognese sauce. The side pesto pasta was very good and was well seasoned with parmesan. The non-alcoholic Purple Sour tasted excellent with its exceedingly sweet flavours.

The servers were very formal with their customers when it comes to preparing their tables. They check on me as often as possible during busy hours while maintaining a positive attitude. The establishment was dark yet classy and clean.

I look forward to eating as this restaurant again to try their other entrees.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXlV9QLG73dgmJm2MgWDAp3IaT80Wb7UqKSEgR&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"S Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDCpcHtfixdQ1nlZ-cnjxErMYcSiJY3vif9B2kRQjg0W11mPsG=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It’s been a few months since we were here last. We ordered the chicken Marsala and gnocchi.  Both were delicious!  I love the Marsala sauce!  My husband enjoyed the garlic oil that was served with a bun.  The bun was ok. Could have been tastier.  I enjoy good bread and this wasn’t anything to write home about.  Service was excellent. We had Thea and she was great!  I also enjoyed their art gallery.  So much talent.  We will definitely be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZaMW99B_vyd2v_54Cdz758FoKxJtAP-r08b85&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-12-1"},{"Name":"Y Man","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB62F2-VitrTkpd3TexeBmDt6LJ-Ec6lzQvbbyCIp7HJAIiB3b=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Lovely Italian restaurant. The carbonara was tasty and creamy,  pasta is fresh and the sauce was enough to cover all the pasta and not drenched in it.  The meatballs were tender and mixed with fresh herbs,  a perfect meat side to the pasta.  The tiramisu was delicious,  creamy melts in your mouth.  Definitely coming back to try other dishes","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdg_N9cATCFpMd2RK_yR7Qj4KSOp6mP1XOgxD7&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-9-20"},{"Name":"Marnie Eudela-Umlas","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXg_gVRD_Hd9V3XIUh6_P71KHCryea9xsHYGqrZHTuXW_jdxEU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spent our Mother’s Day celebration in this restaurant and we had a great time. Everything was awesome from food to their service. Our server even took our photos, too bad I forgot his name. The pizzas were all soo good and my fave was the Anchovy pizza. Pastas were yummy and their desserts too were all a treat. We will surely be back :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbGw58cAzM4X4wXEw-LloHV5v2YTXfNlioydQo&fid=0x0:0xcb392bf507fb5484"],"When":"2024-7-2"}]

title: Emilio Finatti Pizzeria

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Rana Askari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGiquaWdZZatUPMrkajAAOOReXikqtkW7mp94Z7-kKODiThKc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"delicious, crispy thin-crust pizza with fresh ingredients. The combination of ripe tomatoes, green onions, and melted cheese creates a satisfying, flavorful bite.
Conveniently located near Costco, it's the perfect spot to enjoy a quality pizza after shopping.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfMqtguv4wCkgkyIsP4soAHuxeyuB7qfEBRGjR&fid=0x0:0xddcd733cc6107b18"],"When":"2024-10-23"},{"Name":"chris v","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKY4wQ2ecsLxmsnorGcwM70eJg77iKbT9s1HjO8M5wHcYfP-g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"If you haven’t tried Emilio’s, you’re missing out. Everything from the outstanding service, the high quality ingredients and amazing food. I ordered the Cubano. Let me tell you, the layers, textures and abundance of flavour hit all the marks, they even have several dipping sauces too. Before you leave you gotta try the cupcakes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRf8IDr5Fm_n1ztL0VmuEoLM13kw-Mh4bD--56&fid=0x0:0xddcd733cc6107b18"],"When":"2024-10-22"},{"Name":"Chris Cooke","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX7ZitLRSaPUzLf8OIDuwIM3kLaxcCfs4yG7khjBoZYSO3YJyom=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of the best pizzas I've ever eaten. The menu is impossible to choose from because everything sounds amazing. Luckily, I was with 5 others and we got a few to share. The toppings are farm fresh and every pizza was unique and delicious.
The staff was super friendly, the restaurant was clean, and the food was outstanding. I will be coming back many times.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tara Elizabeth","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWafp5-DbmdXd42lrIMIaPpUa4TG8IACFTFef3W9rqO44JjPcQgRg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Yum, yum, yum! Honestly, so very good. Take out is fine but eating it piping hot in house is really the way to go! I love the choices of pizza toppings. I made my own... pepperoni, onion, toasted pepper, and goat cheese. To die for. We will keep coming back. One day, I'll be brave enough to try the dill pickle pizza!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvkQCHBifPUmZUiCjdDj4e-q3-ftrumKSWTXk_&fid=0x0:0xddcd733cc6107b18"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"ls ls","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmdwuBe0oZxjOOxkgGfxlKi7F3OgOPVCMLgJaAiH9lNSZaiA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am a regular of Langley branch. We were in PoCo so we tried this branch. Unfortunately we were disappointed with the food. Ordered couple of calzones and there were burnt, no honey butter drizzle, dry, not much fillings.
Too bad it was not consistent with Langley branch.
The good things: there are tables you can sit and eat. Place is clean including washroom, lots of parking.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPIBUbJNVvQxettdmFks44KazcwEz2VwwO36RMw&fid=0x0:0xddcd733cc6107b18"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Ali Khosrowtaj","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUoM0cjUtnq6E1isct1hz6jgBG3eWe4jR0FUDJ0E3LNkkcUogio=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Special thanks to Sergio , Alex and their amazing team for Tasty food and quality service . We had Al-Copon , blue beef , chicken Cesar and godfather . Fresh ingredients and definitely very yummy .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPG_gEXdF-0uynpGabjgzMMgKk1-bopnT2DNmS1&fid=0x0:0xddcd733cc6107b18"],"When":"2024-9-1"},{"Name":"Ida Sedghi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUWLdQOLTx3ODsKPqiJ7bOzNcI6NBQmLdqq3SNJDKDpT8VJIJA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"So, I am always too lazy to write a review. But seriously, everyone should know about this pizzeria. I sometimes crave pizza and anywhere I got pizza was really disappointment and didn’t satisfy my craving. I found this place by chance and oh boy, I LOVED it. This is a pizza I was looking for, for a long time. Sophisticated taste with fresh ingredients and lots of creativity. When I walked in it felt like we know each other for a long time. He was so welling and friendly that makes you feel so special. He decorated my pizza box too, which is so happy. If you haven’t had a pizza from here, YOU SHOULD. From now on I only get pizza from  Emilio Finatti. Thank you guys for giving a delicious and happy ending to my crazy Monday!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Cristian Hinz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX95aR0OL-fmO5RyDUp7y-3rfnBMDQLwN6PjprUEn1J2eUqFfKJdA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had the worst experience with this pizzeria!  Ordered a half margarita pizza, it had the most bitter disgusting basil I've ever tried, no one in my family could even take more than a bite. They asked me to take it back, and asked them to make one without basil, I get home and lo and behold, there's the same disgusting basil all over the pizza again. Will never order here again. Thanks for ruining dinner. It used to be good, not anymore.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNkO-25yCI6HI04r0jWr5ZzPJXCkEfZoNfDmXBW&fid=0x0:0xddcd733cc6107b18"],"When":"2024-6-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"April D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKhXTmXMcbHV9U_slifft7f4XW1MBDsJD8lmRCzK6wcqFIYkA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We had the sashimi and sushi bento box, chicken karaage, beef yakisoba and salmon olls and bc rolls.  The bc rolls and dynamite rolls were big.  The karaage was my favorite.  Light batter and tasty.  The portions were decent size.  The place is very clean and the servers are very attentive.  Grace was awesome. Food service was very fast.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOukZp6fNAPku05q0XmzpwfWlkcgTaw4iyzcOz6&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-8-29"},{"Name":"JP","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV1-cKS73LFdPpUK8ydeROIv67Jn247b5Czi9JdZER_3gApKDPn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Golden gem and best Japanese restaurant in the area. This place is cozy and delicious, I've had many different items here but never a bad experience. Today I had the lunch ramen (k ramen with egg) and it warmed me up for this cold day. I asked for a nigiri suggestion and they said Toro. IT BLEW MY MIND. Couldn't taste any fresher or it would say glub glub 10/10.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNyGFkHlxiJ3JcwAOznyzbC5fYDgU_10XgTcrmo&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-11-29"},{"Name":"Ester Long","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWOKRS2CO7SSJZRN-XB5hE_uO63OiMsGo__NRGl22IStfa1Z7NL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi way! An excellent place to eat! Awesome food, service and atmosphere.
I have only been here twice, now, but I have to say the dinner was amazing! I had avocado salmon sushi roll, and It was delicious. It had a generous amount of salmon! The other roll I ate was the smoked salmon roll! This one was also tasty! The salmon on top was smoked and flavorful, and the crab filling paired with avocado really hit the spot! And as appetizer I enjoyed their amazing chicken karage. They give a very large amount; worth every cent!
The catering(service) was great! Not sure what you people would call outstanding, but in my opinion it was the best. I immediately was seated given chopsticks and menus. They brought the food quite quickly, 10 minutes or more, maybe. And when I left I got a free candy and pop(pops coz of this review, their having a special event. Write a review on google maps, get a free pop.).
The mood was nice. I was there early, round 5, so it was quiet and I was the only customer. It's cool inside and spacious. Plenty of seating alot of light. Amazing for casual and formal meals.
If you know what's good for you, you will give this place a visit. It's worth your time, money and future. 5 stars seriously.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM72fYYuvWCXWrvIwHHLcejxepiaso6KQ_xVigv&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-9-5"},{"Name":"Daniel Chiu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWsBnAvnLjkTjTJTiFa05UhrFJ3ERMQXPECqwUOCCvi7Wh8yrFJ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The owners are very friendly here. The foods are delicious and always fresh.  And their portions are more than enough.Especially, some of the foods are very creative, the chefs are thinking outside of the box.  Makes the food even more fun to eat. Suggests to order their dinner special, and  sushi salad .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO6glwL7JSb3D8tk5sac84spr_nD6xMMP3UEtIn&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Kishi Malhotra","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXp7iQ5Uf7Un-XaXqZWvHP20ufS7JCMx4Fl5wwp6Ya3rqJRQtqn5Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Centrally located place in Coquitlam next to Mary Hill Bypass.

Tried Spicy Agedashi Tofu, Tuna Gomae, Salmon Roll, Tuna Roll, Inari, Miso Soup and more..

The rolls and the Sashimi were average and nothing out of the ordinary… Spicy Agedashi Tofu lacked flavor. The tastiest thing on the menu was Miso Soup.

The ambience is nice and relaxed and the service is good… staff is kind and responsive…

The menu is quite varied with Udon, Tempura, Ramen and other options. Will try to come back and try more dishes….","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRjQXnsvc__cjRgLKlkAbFYfpqTtqX_-AjQ5Rp&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-8-10"},{"Name":"Natalia Maldonado","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt4dPbENzVhwUgNrSi2E6ozeZqAD5D5GRRORzbUfRkN_WqUGt6=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Did I have to come all the way from the Rocky Mountains to find this amazing sushi place? HECK YEAH! 🥹
Thank you for a great dinner, full of flavor, great portions, innovative special rolls and more!!!
Sushiway you rock!!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM3pTdf6CttahelsbowoK9u52ex5Ns37Zhs9mnN&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Mahal Ravina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIIt9pigy_HOio1Nvq9ubDRohG2TObQS5JCEA6STi3IyoWzuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Service is amazing, the lady is very nice and giving a good service. The food is great we enjoy every dish we order. Thank you","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-TVFvRQQpYVgIxqv32pBPUUP4-qgr-QOcR4QR&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-10-12"},{"Name":"Quân Nguyễn","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJKGv-uUQvZC_awt7CjlalkreqtUxxzoJ_59WEZUBTsc5Ncjw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely out of this world! The sashimi was super fresh and the rolls were on fire! They also gave us an amazing complementary dish as well. Would highly recommend this hidden gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNMuDgyKRhJSAp-J9CvAmv374iu0kq0wJcg6Sw&fid=0x0:0x71c40f9d17172413"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Kaylee Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUrnelwesLWszVvjanLNlsfSIxKVIQPnh9SEyYTfIQJ3XkS9yt8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great Italian spot near Como Lake area! The pizza with its thin crust and fresh ingredients is fantastic—definitely the best I've found within a 15-20 minute drive from Surrey. The carbonara is okay, but I'm hoping to try a better pasta option in their menu. The service is always friendly and welcoming. I visit almost every month for the excellent pizza and warm atmosphere!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPEuS0Mu6EwQyj-eOwZklsK5XdyKwUeWnRSKQ5P&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-11-5"},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5pgqDcV4jXxCDs44gFpKqBE7-kpDe9pqH0qySpykt9h70rZWn=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"If you’re craving authentic Italian cuisine, The Golden Boot in Coquitlam is a must-visit. We recently dined there and had the Ferrari Pizza and the Funghi Pasta, and both dishes exceeded our expectations.

The Ferrari Pizza was a masterpiece of fresh ingredients and perfect execution. The thin, crispy crust paired beautifully with its rich toppings, striking the perfect balance between flavor and texture. It was clear that great care and quality ingredients went into every bite.

The Funghi Pasta was equally outstanding. The earthy richness of the mushrooms combined with a creamy sauce created a dish that was both comforting and indulgent. The pasta was perfectly cooked, and the flavors were well-balanced, making it one of the best pasta dishes we’ve had in a long time.

The Golden Boot offers more than just great food; it provides an inviting and cozy atmosphere that enhances the dining experience. The staff were warm, attentive, and knowledgeable, making our evening even more enjoyable.

If you’re looking for a fresh and authentic Italian experience in Coquitlam, The Golden Boot is a gem worth discovering. We can’t wait to return and explore more of their menu!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNBr1HapyFm5MQNZ6xipl9yNR8QHro3gqqHsWMA&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-12-11"},{"Name":"Jamie K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbJ2U1LY4qMlQOmrUVddM2YAaHlcLuD0VLF8l26mbYtDI6YXU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food was good especially pizza was delicious. I would love to come back to try different menus! We were not greeted by whoever was at cash desk but our server was very kind and friendly (was a young male, didnt grab his name)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNGWVloDIoqugcX7cgGNXPcXNx_7E-rP1ybD7lq&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Stephie N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXd0_eqzaDNFpYKxu_At0QKV_opW1IXDZ3BtSf_D5LFw7-X91jS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Although I had heard about the Golden Boots restaurant from my friends and acquaintances for a long time, I finally had the chance to visit it with a friend yesterday. The place has a cozy, ‘hole in the wall’ atmosphere, and the food feels homemade. I especially enjoyed the lasagna and penne alla vodka. The service was prompt and kind. I will definitely keep going back to this restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZDk4LyqX01zLqd_7wvJhWV6ZoirX1krVr-mP9&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Nathan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6aOctokU9KmE5fwo6-6THfOky0imQyJSKP9b0jCAM3iXNSZtK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"My wife and I came here for a date but left with a bittersweet taste. The staff are friendly and the sauce was amazing, but the pasta was quite hard and felt undercooked - I’m not sure if it’s supposed to be that way. For two dishes, we spent almost $60, hence the three star rating.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipModeQECB1BLCY6b-NGSlZLF_OwAKKZPDxognru&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Afreen J","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWL1ZeweaycOte33MDbmpSg8MtgerWXZP23M-ogg8fCZaa9zvz8=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I discovered this place while in the neighbourhood. Great Italian place that is family owned.

Their food is amazing. The service is great and a great recommendation by the server for the pasta I had.

Will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZJZ68qRTqpsh_LiMfgCNh5hjdJ0CnDClvi4V9&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-9-15"},{"Name":"Rick Z","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc1RB-9qyXWMnytRLNxhH7YaYW62JkQs6KrpP4vpe5CjfhN98MBw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner tonight and we were impressed. We got lucky as we showed up early without a reservation and someone left as we walked in and got the only available table. The service was excellent. The pasta was really really good. Fresh made hot and lots of flavourful sauce. We will for sure be back to this family run restaurant. You can see they have pride in their food.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Darryn Tsuen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKbDcjC9Ga-8tH4ExWmugm3iFb6E8r94-zSVfwYhntq2jgWeiA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Delicious Italian cuisine 😋. One of my favorite spots in Coquitlam. Everything is spot on taste, portion and pricing isn't bad. Highly recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMG11zyOX96tJIT3Djhz-EM-uVWkZRWZGbFEXum&fid=0x0:0xec9b84a60327fe07"],"When":"2024-6-10"}]
