user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Pradyumna Gujjar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVHYwZPoeWTWb_r-Pj3URXZmwvjMuE8IJLkPSR4xqAVv86CR0HjQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"One of the better brunch places here in port moody and the neighboring areas.
The food tastes great, good atmosphere and service is fast.
We their the baileys flight, which in my opinion, could be improved. We couldn’t really make out the difference between the different flavors except for the peanut butter one.
The Maui Thai chicken burger was awesome and we was the Yorkshire Benny. I also loved their take on the hash browns.
They could definitely work on the pricing as we found it a bit on the expensive side.
Would def recommend this spot for anyone looking for a good brunch spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPPToGwTm2g2cjL5bBjFYtzUui484e0jSqqK2tE&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Aaron Brousseau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVrpCaHqR-XwUoFEei3pehP3F8y3p8zpxIo1yJXL2DI8WHkRvkE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing brunch at The Hard Bean Brunch Co. in Port Moody! The food was absolutely phenomenal—every bite was bursting with flavor. The vibe of the place was spot on, cozy yet lively, and the beverage selection was outstanding. Whether you're into coffee, juices, or something a bit stronger, they've got you covered. Our server, Josh, was fantastic—attentive, friendly, and made the experience even better. If you're looking for a brunch spot that nails it on all fronts, this is the place! 10 out of 10 hits all key points for a brunch spots.  Ps the patio was Lovely And is dog friendly which is a huge plus for me.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMNaHI05Lx6EisqaeHHwsYPAftWP6Jdr06aQfbG&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Parneet Kahlon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqz_l5BzN5_mBY3QC7SEZWEVervEPkE_VocF-ECzkBQsGcdPO6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a nice brunch place in Port Moody.

The place had ample seating and since we had our puppy with us and patio seating was perfect for us.

Food we ordered was very delicious and prepared in a timely manner.

For drinks we ordered coke and mimosa. Mimosa was good but we were expecting a nice tall glass.

Maui teriyaki chicken burger - it was very juicy and delicious…. 10/10 for the flavour

Hard Chicken crunch - Again flavours 10/10 chicken was cooked perfectly

Last but not the least, Hard bean co burger, very nice vegetarian options. Bean patty was very nice not too dry..

Definitely hoping to visit soon, been looking at so many more options to try.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1KrvVRsRO_zbgmwGyZyuW9bPr71yR3bhKnNq5&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-7-31"},{"Name":"Billy Lam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVSxOBk_c92Ol0FCdQI2uK9UOXNvJt85D76p4UHFqKR_gkp-zYHgw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been to a lot of brunch places this year and I’ve always been underwhelmed by the concept of brunch. Well, The Hard Bean Brunch Co. broke the mold.

First off, amazing service, people were so friendly and helpful. $6 all day specials as well for drinks.

Ordered the Yorkshire pudding hard ham Benny. Out of this world. Probably will never order a Benny elsewhere ever again. The smashed potatoes were out of this world. Crispy on the outside soft on the inside. Wife ordered the quesadilla and that was equally amazing. One small knock was that ham waffle fries were a bit undercooked but don’t get that anyways, stick with the smashed potatoes!!

We will be back if we’re ever in the neighborhood.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM7JAnb6jeZFhYaQ6sJ8zdxRiRMdkaulczFv38U&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-11-25"},{"Name":"Mandy Sam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfdcmtmnw1QBUKzc568p_XlShrjauBmzaYnb3AklL4JCX7IFSL3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"On Sunday, I visited the restaurant with a group of four for a late lunch. Upon our arrival, we were informed that the wait time would be approximately 25 to 30 minutes, which we were happy to accommodate. While waiting, we took a leisurely stroll around the area. After 26 minutes, we received a notification that our table was ready, and we were promptly seated.

The restaurant's interior displayed a lively and welcoming ambiance, creating a wonderful atmosphere and vibe. Our server provided attentive service, checking in on us periodically. However, there were instances when we wanted to place additional orders but had to wait for a while before our server returned. We ordered a diverse selection of dishes, including the rose spaghettini, Julius salad, everything grilled cheese, hard bean co burger, and hard chicken crunch. The handheld dishes were pretty good. The hard chicken crunch lived up to its name, delivering an exceptionally crispy texture. The Julius salad was enjoyable, although the dressing could have benefited from a touch more acidity. Regrettably, the rose spaghettini seemed to lack in terms of flavor.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO2M-uiySMHfptiI6rZzA40nKLqNvQnsjzaLR6d&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Zain Bhanji","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKlgk8aN8btcOJZzZf5wvoL31ZimhDnrY-IWz_-xujZJutZcBjZ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was an upbeat and lively brunch spot! Great music, cool set up and loved the colour scheme of the place. Service was quick and friendly here, however the serving sizes are quite small and not filling enough. I ordered the steak tacos and although I even ordered a side of fruit at the recommendation of the server, it still wasn’t enough to fill me up. I felt the resto could have been more generous with adding more meat to each of my tacos. Regardless, these tacos were quite small - pretty much a 2 bite eat, which in my opinion isn’t worth the $18 you pay for the plate.
Would consider coming back here but having something else hopefully more filling!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNShnQT9frNbDmQjQgCIY3Hm7YQJsMWry9askrq&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Golnaz J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwh094AvMjRiNSQoo9HjnFTPUMh8c3XSGOFZ78okUlI4KLdqnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the yam waffle fries and Bacon Burger with a delicious Green Salad, and it was an exceptional dining experience. The burger, perfectly cooked and topped with crispy bacon, was juicy and flavorful, offering a delightful blend of savory and smoky tastes. I asked for lettuce wrap for the burger. The yam waffle fries were a standout, crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, with a natural sweetness that complemented the burger perfectly. Accompanying the meal was a fresh and vibrant green salad, featuring a mix of crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, crumble feta cheese and quinoas. This combination made for a well-rounded and satisfying meal, balancing indulgence with a touch of freshness. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a delicious and hearty bite!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPOUaR5a8FLR6B3otK7luPOQG3JxexiCAA5PCQA&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-7-15"},{"Name":"Mounota","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvpiSPg9AtpTNs-8JJvoJHojdmAI1FZcME9pprQbBKumVFhadS=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The atmosphere was pleasant. I had their smoothie bowl. It was okay; tasted a little watery. It looked pretty though. I might return and try their other dishes because the reviews are so positive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMW-NUkGkpjmqUH4iPJ4DTyhMBN9ZyBBys53Ycn&fid=0x0:0x4acbc2a73f7224be"],"When":"2024-11-21"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Nathan Edwardson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuxXGFWhKzNyAQzhtKHQn_iMh9h3zj59CMAh7A6cPStOWw5w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice place located right next to my favorite game store. Food and portions are good, fresh sushi. They offer their own delivery which is amazing as I do not like to support third party businesses like skip the dishes. It's clean and beautiful inside nice comfortable chairs. Biggest thing the price is unbeatable for the quality 🫡","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMpcgDlQcxQDWajER_dhKh905iid8PozxFPcIcF&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2024-9-9"},{"Name":"Jack Allaby","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJocZqOWf-zpMv2b_LL8M0wLjOfBAWRR3Utds762Hzj7DWOmA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Avoid if anyone in your group is vegetarian. Myself and my wife have been regulars here for the last 4 years. Ordering on average once every 10 days. This USED to be out absolute favorite sushi place of all time, however, as you can see from other reviews, it has really gone downhill lately, my understanding is they let go of a bunch of the old staff and hired new staff that have no clue what they’re doing in many ways.

My wife is vegetarian so we would always request meat and vegetarian dishes be kept in separate containers. In the past they did so with no issues, but over the last 4-6 months they consistently fail this task which, to me. Seems like a basic food safety issue. What if someone with a severe allergy comes and gets food cross contaminated because staff will not read any fine details in an order? This is now the 6th time in the last few months its happened.

It makes me sad, but we wont be ordering from here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNoflYVBrpwZEcUCpEC8izAdLqhGV8IZrGMQaZt&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2024-9-17"},{"Name":"Bekah French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiYLh-7emQ9AthzE2N_CGxwmtRUdZguPeMRuVIWmhyOtllxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food at affordable prices. Enjoyed our dinner here, excellent service. Only recommendation would be to add ice to the table water.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmkb4SO7-NCSEh7XZFhFVpIOvQruYEshE8nb0z&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered a party tray with 78 pieces for a dinner and the sushi all tasted fine. Liked the variety of sushi flavours offered in the party tray and the amount of food. The downside was that a lot of the rolls were unraveling and falling apart while in the tray which made it hard to eat in one piece. Otherwise, average, acceptable, and fresh sushi.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwBc3oEUTgyX41ZubxuAzARhwnR4cu1y5uxT02&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2024-8-15"},{"Name":"Sophie Pratt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLh7k6-21NBMQYIuK68Q8phU1orAC4H6O-_4MJL9UZbjYF-SnTT=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Unfortunately we won't be returning to this establishment. I had placed an online order at 11am for a 6pm pick up for a large party tray and several other items. When my husband arrived at 6pm for pick up, he was told by a staff person it'd only be a few more mins. At 6:20pm my husband asked again if our order was ready and mentioned our pick up time was 6pm, the female staff person just gave him an awkward smile and said sorry and that they're making it.

He didn't receive our order until 6:40pm so 40 mins after the scheduled time. The food was fine and pricing was affordable but service was not dependable and if we didn't need this order we would have just canceled it due to the delay. I'm fairly confident they didn't start preparing the order until my husband actually arrived.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Chantel L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWX0TcjzqwikidGgR8ECofcjHJqDNcicSn1j3ilup0dRM-BrEdq=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Edit, this place is amazing, the sushi RICE is cooked so well - it's so delicious and I'm Asian I know my rice!

I love how they pay attention to requests ie., little rice, extra sauce and attentive to packaging.  Cold dishes are never packaged in hot dishes/soups where as many sushi places don't even care.  The tempura always comes crispy and hot.

So glad I found this gem after recently moving to the area, they DELIVER including during the day too!  Since living here a month an a half I've ordered 4 times already. Thank you so much <3

Old post, Ordered uber eats because they lured me in by a promotion.  The rolls are good, the spicy salmon sashimi wasn't for me, it wasn't spicy but swimming in a real sweet sauce. The shrimp tempura was huge though 😳 next time I'll order directly as they offer delivery !!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMjUvep40VRPc7pWnsPQQJH25vlbOKxX4FG9J2j&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2022-5-12"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"There was something off with the sushi when I ate it. It turns out it wasnt the fish but the rice had a weird seasoning.

The size of the sushi was good and it was a good price for the portion.

The biggest bang for your buck is the chicken karaage. Really good deal!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOhgzsEqY0a4daH0Nf8QA9I77i9n9Vagalgjoe1&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2023-5-27"},{"Name":"lai Lai","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZhn1RF4oQ88AJoOZD2TNabiwCO_Sz-MclW8GplPkuuyxKcqiN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Update: lately I feel like the food quality has been going down, paid $25 (sushi fu, volcano roll) for two special rolls but they taste awful. The salmon/tuna tasted like canned I couldn’t even tell what fish it was.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP5ESPt0RcnNVba9w1Uf1G_MndytPQ5Q_PbbrNZ&fid=0x0:0x15f7f24083cf2842"],"When":"2024-10-25"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Trina Whitsitt","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzPXgI6R8ydiXU8rLTfBo8AtaNVUjLUFgDXd1vE_leiLYPO6A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I was there on a Monday night, and it was not busy at all. The server was super nice but really slow. It took a long time to get our drinks and put a food order in. The food was okay. The chicken sandwich was over deep fried, it was a bit dry. The place itself had a cool vibe and it was playing football.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"TS OS","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIrxJ8Fjd3bGSI8mWbF186RbFWyg_DW73VTS3OIkFaxPfXFBEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This pub is outside the residential area but is conveniently located near highway with plenty of parking spots.  Our server was very pleasant and nice.  She makes your experience better.  Food are quite alright, very reasonably priced too even to consider this inflation era.  Taco Tuesday was neat and tasty and we also tried their golden Brussels sprouts which were also pretty good.  There are many kinds of wings to choose from, and special deal on Wednesday.  This now is one of our go to pubs as children are also allowed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN87lH3GXT1p4K4IxHWDfUQl7qY9BczmGifIZII&fid=0x0:0x463038a64e1c3b06"],"When":"2023-6-21"},{"Name":"Kelvin Chung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUK7ZMdBlhvlFPiSySdxIgCJsO71IZXbDpx391sCwTkzkHaCpIv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10 out of 10.  Went there without any expectation and it was better than many popular restaurants.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNf6lbWLIzN9KUR-RyKssqq9_fs3Wk7_g9MJxZK&fid=0x0:0x463038a64e1c3b06"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Jordan Hsieh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbyRrh7UlWzOsyT41qQtxTb1m2bLd_4-Pusobxgdazm1EeUfU04g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went to checkout Golden Parrots with a buddy during their happy hour to catch the basketball game and we had a fun time. Guinness tastes great as well as their Fat Tug IPA which didn't taste that bitter so I loved it.

We got their deep fried pickles which came with a bit of fries. They were so good so we decided to get the poutine as well.

The owners came around to check on everybody and they were super friendly. We had a chat with them and they are absolutely awesome people.

Would definitely come back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPxUYzcPv1Z4heht31dXjvvjvPPInzWeM1C03GF&fid=0x0:0x463038a64e1c3b06"],"When":"2023-5-17"},{"Name":"Sabrina Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsuNoq0NjIZsw7Q0s08xv-ogcv0ajmV0Oo0HaZ5E_raW8Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a few times and always enjoyed the food. They allow children in the "restaurant" part of the pub, which we appreciate since we bring our 6 yr old. Tonight, we had exceptional service by Iona - friendly and fast. There was all day HH drinks (Thurs) and a $18.50 steak special that my child devoured. We also ordered the chicken pesto penne which was tasty. Only downside was the cigarette smoke that comes in, every time the doors open.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jennifer Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJErGKqO7BCzy2XzklkyTf07vqCBU_uYCQXwxZNuIKr42BWbg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Consistent food with lots of menu items, daily food and drink specials and friendly staff. Hit and miss on timely service. Sometimes really quick and attentive and sometimes not but not really tied to business. Noticed a fair amount of take out on this weeknight dinner hour which maybe made the kitchen slow.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fred Rivers","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgSCi2q2xQIo8etBfYKiAM7XcBCTUa-DDDdV9iPxCRjF4O86trZA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were greeted quickly and friendly.  Found a seat and the server had a menu for us right away. Took our drink order and was quick to return with our frosty beverages and took our food order. Chicken burger was tasty and wings were moist. Servers were all attentive and friendly.  Would highly recommend this place and will definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Doug P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLx6YpxAAaIZ7Cj9PSMphfRQfkkw46YLaNdEeYIQOo495lpxg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Unfortunately we must have visited on an off day. We used to come here quite regularly about 30 years ago. At that time the food was always good. This time the fries were delicious, but both our entrees were sub standard. The prime rib sandwich was bland. The meat was overcooked. The cod was soggy.
Service was fine. We were greeted immediately at the entrance. There is renovations in the dining area, but that didn't affect the pub section. Multiple TV's had a ballgame on and others had CBC French news??? Very entertaining 🙄
The prime rib sandwich order was related to their Saturday prime rib special, starting at 4pm. I was hoping to revisited soon, but that won't be happening now.
Other diners seemed to be enjoying themselves.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Andrey Chen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKwhJXymx4ikQdTAhsJOOp0lgaLExVaRz3y5Z-kbkLtfAAYfg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love the snowing cheese and soy garlic! Boneless family size is perfect for friends gathering, I also like the pickled radish, so refreshing. The staff is friendly and welcoming, definitely will come back again soon!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOeGiNPgCyO9a8o4I9I5OQWfgjP3LsM8WldnH4-\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"E Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXSf46GoVDYA6DwVd9VW9_YDSbB2ZybZwD8Gjg5Qpn6bN0v14Wr=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Was sad to see Chicko Chicken closed down, but Nene Chicken sure filled the void. Not too many tables to dine in, but place was clean and staff was friendly. Boneless fried chicken was well seasoned, crispy and juicy. And love that they offer something different too. Their tteokbokki was pretty good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMxgWzuQc44UNRao2JPdEQ9C8t9mdzLNubzqwvW\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"Jimmy Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVmaQe2WLp7herqsSS6Qbb3TdkPTjO2rKeO4tgMEL6Gag0kIT7k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is welcoming. The server was kind to me, and he even offered pickled radish to me when I got my meal. The [snowing cheese] flavour was great in my opinion. Chicken was delicious, and I’m also delighted to have a plate for me to eat on, rather than just the basket. Nene Chicken puts their customers first. Thank you!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMcoSTiUrNZr3nlUx_MEOVaqbqQHjRjZ0Svw7Gq\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-7-25"},{"Name":"Nicole Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdAow82J4tPwMSY2ca6JgSF68bASnvtD-62FnrDIFUIVzacw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had their inflation buster meal which is such a good deal! Loved their fried chicken that is so crispy and juicy!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMggdu1BlzjrNcq8uSBk3pTzWyRbfp5gxw-Obo5\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-11-12"},{"Name":"Tina Y","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT4KjeoR7tlMjngsTy79qR3JWymfd2lKKa_2mDLkpqpo47VStX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wanted to try this shop out since it opened up in Poco and wow it’s so good! Ordered half-half bone-in original/soy garlic and both flavours tasted so fresh and yums. My fav part about this place is you actually get to choose and mix and match ur flavours for half half which I find lacking in other K-chicken places. Overall I would definitely reorder!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgVIDkQa1tIJ1fOk99n4OpY7bdKZzKL5KnNZYs\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Karan Verma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWihmhxBivvzIZnhihtWNCltuvgnwqnp8QHTn_L10JQlGd3LQbhA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I was at my friend's place, and we ordered the original boneless chicken. It completely exceeded my expectations! The chicken was incredibly flavorful and perfectly crispy without being overly greasy. Although the pricing is a bit on the higher side, the portion sizes are decent, making it worth the cost. I will definitely be returning to try their other flavors. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPRLlROytHAfmCGrhIp2vaAm3C5s8-tZD6swGg_\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-7-2"},{"Name":"Emily Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKk46JDhlxnek_wdOEWflzBvw7SakHZeCODizhzx7cmRukVCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I recently had the worst Korean fried chicken. Even though I ordered through Uber, the batter was so soggy, the seasoning was bland, and the portion size was ridiculously small. The box it came in was almost empty, and they only gave one small container of pickled radish when they usually give two. Adding an extra one costs $3… Many other chicken places offer similar combos, so I don’t see a reason to stick with Nene. I even paid extra for fries, but the portion was still tiny. I used to only order Nene Chicken in Korea, but I don’t think I’ll order from them here anymore. Really disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhZDFyMPoiwk71PMkN8vBaelBhMIPW2h3HRGxh\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Dara Huang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6iGsUXTS2Mjbi1dia5sQbE8z1Fp1XOYaWVCW-tak5h0yzuvVR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"One of my favorite places to have Korean fired chicken and cheese balls!!!! Staffs are so kind and welcoming, highly recommend!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXDUllrje1emUZG02jIS46Z8W_SSb2bI3-TkJi\u0026fid=0x0:0xc4d8b5d63d567358"],"When":"2024-8-17"}]

[{"Name":"chetan goswami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXzRi1yCYkk_RFSyNhEMyhA52vQ0okMr-Ry7zuv5e-JEXxxe0ul=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Worst manchurian ever, there was no gravy in the manchurian even after Specially told them over the phone. We came from delta just for that. Pathetic experience
Manchurian was not fresh and it upset my stomach too. Pathetic food. Will never visit again and spread wrong review to everyone I know for sure.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUogJYvZln3hetSWTR9hu5CPy0GvTj-gnOwL9v&fid=0x0:0x5d31cbdd92270b80"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"ridvan t","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFnmnYRhSVOj1LDdhErDnSsnxlF_5_XoPsFmpvGmOgUuHP2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Perfect place for tasty and affordable Indian take out. We love their veggie samosas and naan breads. Butter chicken is awesome. They are pretty fast for walk ins but I would recommend phoning in to order to make sure you’ll have your stuff on time. Highly recommended","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ton V","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWb4h6oZDMjakZ7o0kpJmjp_i41AvhfJ62KCrl6wCnDvytBpv4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had no idea it existed until an Indian friend mentioned and recommended this take-out. Very tasty food and competitively priced.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOFT7LoDA_g-WbbIhigvoz4Y80DNhvxlZ3Rjw&fid=0x0:0x5d31cbdd92270b80"],"When":"2024-9-23"},{"Name":"Jacob Tong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXnY0cs4wU4BO3GrJtuGsP4uKk2H9IJcja2Nfyeq_gGo82pzZni=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very clean.
My high school - Port Moody Secondary - used to always buy samosas from here for club events. Very fairly priced for solid food.

I come here for lunches and especially for the sweet milk treats they offer.

12$/lb for milk sweets
8$/lb for non milk sweets","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPH3eut0lFiR_tBqYDjXfiXPmVio9kFqCP55U1O&fid=0x0:0x5d31cbdd92270b80"],"When":"2024-5-13"},{"Name":"Nat A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWnjKr4KNFAObzj2bIvH9BRInxwKsSvEg1PM25bKfvhxtWZTWHoog=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I really love lamb and decided to try two lamb dishes here. The first was the Lamb Tika Masala. It was a tomato based sauce that is not as creamy as butter chicken. Great flavour and the perfect amount of seasonings and spice at medium level. The second was Lamb Saag (spinach). Even though I requested medium level spice for this dish maybe because of the creaminess it was more mild tasting. Still very delicious though! We got a side of garlic naan which was alright but could have had more garlic flavor. Overall, the main dishes were great and portion size of the lamb were pretty decent. Definitely worth coming back and trying more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOiQOU05W4vF1wJo7xCfTGhhMgJC7QYTQS8oBKh&fid=0x0:0x5d31cbdd92270b80"],"When":"2023-12-2"},{"Name":"Kris-ms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLP5CNUos8OaRgt_tSSSk8JWrUw_VnzRuTt2t2hd4pR6zw67Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've been here several times to buy samosa's and stopped by a couple of days ago.  Normally the taste is perfect, but this time they were much more spicier than usual!  Very disappointing and I did not like them at all.   Please do not change your recipe and make the samosas more spicy!  Change it back, or you'll be loosing customers.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"BH","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLoQcExJC-gAj69t8nkA5gMPaR2A-cbRDvdES3FXuxNSerHFw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good portion. Competitive pricing. I tried the lamb saag and it was really good. Lots of lamb for the price too. Big tender chunks of lamb that wasn't overly dry. Large menu of authentic items.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G Saini","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVonTjGdvZW4cpWakhcX-rmFM7WH-H4bECeQFhxQ1_pGD59uRjy=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing food and amazing people. We have ordered multiple times from here and every time the food tastes better and better. I'm happy we found this little food corner 😊","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Preethi Nair","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUz8cCAzlnay_PFhvv7Ji00tvlRLoqJA-MhaglfwwGMG6P16JkGug=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Nice place to hangout. Tried sopes and nachos. Food is tasty and service is quick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyJ7EhJfGVDa8ttfSssK_OboVJcjDcZn5LhFh_&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2024-7-18"},{"Name":"Elena Malkova","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW602f3KiOlmq-3RVv1uCfJgeL2LrWPFJevDjC7s8eC3p665BY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Good food, worth to visit. Nacho chips are not house made (packaged). Tacos are really good, a bit dry for me, I like sauce and lime juice on top. As you can see they put only small piece of lime... I like using more with my Mexican food. Also, not enough cilantro taste, again that’s my own preference.
Overall, decent place and nice service, I won’t be back as it’s a bit overpriced and I like more “Californian style” if you know what I mean.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh3aep59fmlAqp_qkRsELKUJHtgxPnQki7mNeV&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2020-9-20"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a true gem in poco. The food was authentic, and you can tell that it was made by someone who grew up eating the food.

The price was affordable and the service was also quite fast and pleasant. They don’t skimp on portions so one of their burritos should definitely fill you up!

It’s a shame that I couldn’t try their churros but we’ll be back, for sure!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNEjdJ4DF6V0d94iPwCKMeZ2byggZrEQ9pIuqP8&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2022-2-8"},{"Name":"Susan Rochefort","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8rVH08cPR6VwUL0HKwjObsOf9gnrVDYn2ehalr65L6-oUpQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was excellent! Fresh made guacamole was amazing. The service was excellent, they accommodated my food sensitivities by ensuring my dish had no spice and no sauces (pork enchiladas). Kind, friendly owners made this a great first visit. We will go back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0H6u5_AFImO0MYLkLrZG2Vh3F0ABe1ApUWJAH&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2020-1-3"},{"Name":"Gaurav Khatiwada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9esAjLiSzHtBZDV1WCFSvOOCrQ_8ILCJRLORIM1mavbOWu4m3cw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I went there for a quick bite of tacos, I ordered pork belly and chicken tacos with a drink. In a sunny clean weather day you can see mountains in the background in outdoor setting which is a plus. Tacos was great will definitely visit again for more.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOr0f0GhzDrmsUyDbAX3u_DER_njdU2rBZRPgA8&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2023-4-30"},{"Name":"lea “Lea” howard","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLDu1L_oe7CRcF_qC9V9eWIA_rxaPr1ucAjvHDbhI_ieW2Nkw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Stopped in for a quick bite as we’ve passed by here many times! The place was very clean and welcoming!
We had the shrimp tacos which were delicious and highly recommend! Also had the carnitas tacos which were nice and flavorful and the beef steak tacos which were on the bland side.
Will definitely go back and try some of their main dishes!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNqMAn_weO1d-KnVy0TA8k6q5_8-MmQsyjoTb01&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2018-4-22"},{"Name":"Jessica M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUHIbOqSbUDgNLlVo2Voj47_sYplTKVpv7ouP7-ReW4GfxYKW6m9w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Our favourite Mexican restaurant in poco. Huge portions, affordable prices, and amazing customer service. We came twice last week and can't wait to go back for more! Shrimp taco is a must try","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"E Ip","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgameZA5Ck3eQuBRGlA8OrqLqldpLX6AMEUMpI-oBZR5E0CU_v=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favorite was the churos! It was freshly made and the dipping sauce has perfect sweetness. We also tried the poco-burrito, tostada, and tacos. The staff checked on us a few times, very polite and friendly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMbLNcn1Nt_2n2s5TqxtRfKKInG9quZFd9kfzIx&fid=0x0:0xcf57a6141d680aaf"],"When":"2022-1-24"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Dave C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_RLl1BXZJ0Zvug65uLrkcb3D0bL53JFE9DYgpx_yi9h8dxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"What happend to this place? When it was The Tree House the food was great. Popped in on the weekend for a burger and wings and they were terrible. Soft wings almost seemed under cooked, and a lamb burger with what felt like left over unseasoned lamb with a single piece of leaf lettuce and some shredded cheddar on top. It honestly tasted like left overs I threw together in my own kitchen. Highly unsatisfied with the
Quality of food here.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Spacious and Clean atmosphere. Friendly server who was knowledgeable. Service was a little slow. The Fish and Chips was burnt and the dry ribs were too dry. The price for the fish and chips was good just wish it was made better. It was too busy to complain. We look forward to trying it again. Came back again and the spinach and artichoke dip was delicious and the drinks were amazing ❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOm9Vnk1bMv2laEQyXmok7Z-uUPZgWn9tqLXnWJ&fid=0x0:0x3588bedbf164537a"],"When":"2020-2-13"},{"Name":"Desere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm-qU_5F70OG-GJjYsCOAzBFCE_cpqYW2c235hbRYQK4IdMwUBzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We went to The Bennett last night for a quick bite.  It was really great!  My husband had the lamb chops and the lamb dinner and I had the grilled prawns.  All the food was fantastic!  The service was also very good.  The bartender even came over to see how our drinks were.  Very impressed with the food and service here!  Thanks to Jared and Kaitlynn for fantastic service!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMDbaYEL42NIvBtf2GQe-y8p_FaRazEU4DRs-rZ&fid=0x0:0x3588bedbf164537a"],"When":"2020-12-20"},{"Name":"Rick Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVNb3yqCiIHbkQ-i_o7uc_gR6AGC85UtD6RaxDRzktFUjN-eZZe=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What’s a great local place. First time coming here amazing interior.  Great selection on tap. Good pricing. The acoustics of this place would be amazing. They lost lots of great bands here apparently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPp-moYxmy5-h9h8LydG_DUDKzCobWTtOVsSczg&fid=0x0:0x3588bedbf164537a"],"When":"2022-12-3"},{"Name":"Bob Hetherington","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdZaYnjHp9gZWmRIDHNMVGYKuTE0CsH7kMPHUW2N4TIdj5EQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Clean friendly great prices daily specials great selection of beer and craft beer.Good food.  Parking is no problem.I hear that the pub has been sold. Still great service. Recommend
Not sold which is great as the owner is really friendly and looks after his staff and staff are great great food and good prices. Recommend","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1zW6xKXLEPEkUqJy_UVRGQ9xJogSDU3dDZE84&fid=0x0:0x3588bedbf164537a"],"When":"2022-2-8"},{"Name":"Sarah Little","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3UqH5QSo-vJI8KRUTr862FJroW5SyrzyTvV8Y7mAcZYP0sC5M=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The veggie burger was honestly the worst veggie burger I've ever had. It was basically mashed potatoes with frozen mixed veggies. The beef burger my partner got didn't look much better. The fries were also mediocre. I would go back for a drink if in the area, but not for food. Other dishes might be better, but wouldn't try based on this experience, and wouldn't go out of my way to go there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rosario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgGDUvVq0LHcDsGYS5Ajsq7op3PSBcKer8I_HtMpU1JHJRocg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Gave this place another try tonight and I’m amazed on how much it’s changed, the food was great, big beer selection with 30 flavours on tap , they gave out a free shot of tequila tonight which was awesome , I’d totally come back, wanting to try the build your own burger night","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPNQvP6Rh9Z09q_opHljqp3v4Ned3Rb4uLlj_ES&fid=0x0:0x3588bedbf164537a"],"When":"2019-7-13"},{"Name":"Jocelyn Mah","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKp0F2_Uhg6Aj9PDoTz5Oap6PeiLcxxDy5DNMEGRkKpoXyl0Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Laid back pub with limited selection on the menu.  Nice atmosphere, and surprised us as it was family friendly until 10 pm (our bonus since we had the 9 and 12 year olds).

Was a really good band-  Scary Lizards, but since we had got together to catch up with friends, it became difficult to converse with the band jamming. That was our bad,

I don't recommend the pasta.  They were out of the vegetarian offering.  Souvlaki meals and butter chicken looked good, as were the fries. No sours and somewhat limited beer offerings...","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Obvious Channel Name","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVpu88IRyHyxa3PZnGjys1sghK02JKQlJiFdbmxOfdr7dbvQ_rk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Awful and overpriced. Little portions. Reminiscent of highschool-esque frozen cafeteria food. Overly fried food, little seasoning, tasted like old oil. I wouldn't recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXrTYHtVmru4lcWNGzn4WoL7v3x1nmtHKfp8R_&fid=0x0:0x257beb9d26d22bd0"],"When":"2024-10-7"},{"Name":"William Jackson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKfwb9IS9PGeEzBY65quWjCieG1jmjVRB_k40LIiGHcbjiwVg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I've heard the french fries here described as "the best fries in the world", and although I wouldn't go so far as to make that claim, after chasing the kids around in the pool for several hours, the large fries (served with just the right amount of seasoning salt) is pretty delicious.

The rest of the menu is alright (although some of the prices are pretty wild).

They also serve JJ Bean coffee, which is a major bonus, and do a decent iced coffee.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPhUa-5Bk18g1jJy9DN_Sd21DYvciC_NLQ5J_Q0&fid=0x0:0x257beb9d26d22bd0"],"When":"2018-1-8"},{"Name":"OM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU33Qg1JE4YGnexw2nT6GbgjaBxZDhK0q9Dqqw_XlvAy_wSIlHW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Seriously the best food I’ve had in a while, prefect for dine in and take out. Fries have just the right crisp, Hot Dog is cooked throughout the entire thing and the popcorn chicken is nice and crispy as well.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Preet Gill","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0lGTIvtQMBlAPRcEOOPXBpF0wrJbMacSVBiBRvHgaYwF9OQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"We ordered cheese quesedillas in our online order they gave us the wrong item and sent us mozzarella sticks and they put pickles in my veggie sandwich I had to pick them out","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"J Cruz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyb9he1405oBOlRtJDZmttnXQU4EprTk-Gx3gFFwAGzAmqzAs=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kids finished all of their lunch so, you know it must be good.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Liam Sviklis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkoNgcengKW-VdsDoyD1kdCJUj6IXy8_JLCOL-JfHu0YDvM1o=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Slushy so good, but everything so overpriced","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bruce","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKj0pPLoG4A1d062uP4svTiMYzK22Nnh5J3QOR_L7O31Obw6A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great chicken","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mason Bennett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIqGEFbXpVrjBpbzVRvtBW77xpXUur3XMH_HiMFa71LdLkAQQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Attila Szamoskozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2AAt3w8V6vnjRCqXfUE0xqvAqQuLl4Zs8C3rG6vUvIyME7FzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very friendly service.  Family run establishment.  Portion sizes are large and flavors are on point.  The only suggestion I would make is for the rice to be a bit warmer.  But the flavor and texture of the rice was perfect.  Appetizer of stewed Eggplant with fried onions was very tasty and a very large portion.  Texture of meats was juicy and perfectly cooked.  Prices very reasonable.  Would definitely return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOkEt14ac299DDARyd-SgbrVvDagrTz-2sDL7kR&fid=0x0:0xfe998ac6da7bca88"],"When":"2024-11-11"},{"Name":"Melissa Cabot","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIL0zOTwNlNjn9wGw7Rzo6ydbTGCYv0cdQl9NYnK3iWj33iaQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I've been a customer since the beginning, always good, fresh food. I ordered today, after maybe a month hiatus, and the serving size seems smaller, the chicken seemed like leftovers from the day before and the lemon was old. There are way too many options for good Persian food to be lowering your quality.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLuk86eyrKzFCxN3fjC2Gh7WVgfPs4ac8RQel74iDY6fKVzQA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"amex accepted.  Decent barg/beef steak with rice and shirazi salad. The food is not particularly flavourful but acceptable.  It's a fast food place, so service is minimum. The decoration/atmostphere is better than most middle eastern fast food joint. The old lady at the counter is very friendly. Might come back and try the ground beef kebob.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNs14IYo1pHdekx1j-K9eq221uq_FRoesZnYd7a&fid=0x0:0xfe998ac6da7bca88"],"When":"2024-2-13"},{"Name":"Farid Entezari","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV35QQyx2JmA30yOGa4kCXMTDZjBP0mMYjKzM0CL9HNh-FF7LAEEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The kebob house restaurant in poco is a small nice Persian restaurant. I tried their mix kebab dish which is one skewer of ground beef (Koobideh) and one skewer of steak( barg). Taste was good, portion size was good. Lots of parking in the plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONMghztr8XUKJnLI08J656NjDz94WXClWyIBRM&fid=0x0:0xfe998ac6da7bca88"],"When":"2023-6-8"},{"Name":"Jason Shanks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXqF_09LHcLQUBwa4sJj1J-2wuuUKxQADdaKcyJX3stv4lfuueH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Go check this place out!!!
What a great little place, we will definitely be back.
1.) Food was great, especially the yogurt for the pitta bread. It was light, fluffy, and had fresh chunks of cucumbers.
2.) Great service, although there was a hockey game on the TV good relaxing music for eating was playing at a conversational level.
3.) Meal for two, we were full upon leaving... just over $35.
3.) Clean kitchen, relatively new renovation making the inside comfortable, happily the renos extended into the washroom... some time these strip mall places can have not so great bathrooms... this was nice.
4.) Strip mall parking = short walk to the restaurant","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFxEqNuD7DW3qZGM5hzj53ap4gsScn4pVQDJj2&fid=0x0:0xfe998ac6da7bca88"],"When":"2023-11-29"},{"Name":"Holly Hui","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhQD6BQlcWfE694GJOqlMhXMwIQT-rKw4jcG8DlxP8gg2emzY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My favourite persian restaurant to order from on UberEats. I've been ordering since February 2024.

I always order the Vasiri combo with Mast-O-Mooseer (yogurt with shallots), and the Shirazi Salad. The perfect meal! The portions are great, skewers are cooked perfectly and not dry, flavourful. What I appreciate is the consistency, I order quite often from here.

This recent order, the restaurant had contacted me about not having Sprite in stock so I replaced it with Ice tea. When I received my order, they had packaged 2 cans of Ice tea. I really appreciate the complimentary drink. I do want to mention when the lady had picked up the phone, she sounded very pleasant and genuine. One day if I'm in the Port Coco area, I would love to dine-in at this restaurant. Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven H.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK62iJj1ZUFGa-U3A8AjtI1ckQk60_9MMp9OhTpvv0nDBllSzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been here a couple times.

I've always enjoyed the food and experience here.

Fresh, reasonably priced and just plain good.

I live a bit far away from port coquitlum but whenever I come here, I always eat here.

I am a big fan of Persian cuisine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPpNJ3rXIwpVXFMcE37cha4yyJ0Xclp5IESBsYC&fid=0x0:0xfe998ac6da7bca88"],"When":"2022-3-9"},{"Name":"Magic Eslami","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJo_ometNe5VFxyYN9EFz4qK_PQABq10iwnM8v3Yyyw57cviA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Kebab House is a charming Persian family restaurant where I’ve been a regular for several years. The selection of kebabs is impressive, and the food is consistently delicious—all at a very reasonable price!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Brian B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJdl8yxeaJKtv8Lzu3Y1i-Dzd1ko52Qgjqx5nUkMndNNbe13w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I've been coming here for almost a year and thought it's about time I write a review. I've always been super happy with the quality of food, reasonable prices and great service. While most of the staff are always really friendly, Anita is a real standout as she's always very welcoming and so pleasant to interact with. barBurrito checks all the boxes when I'm looking for a pretty healthy and quick meal so you can consider me a regular customer.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"K Li","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWc-XdJgc6R_qSGlfJNyhgsZIVvfGJ0QbD-1jegM7d7q7rjOyU2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The flavours in this place is really good!! And not just salty like a lot of other places which I will not name.  The burrito box even came with a beef protein filled side of nachos and fries! Very delicious 😋 didn't even get to get to take a photo  and we already devoured it!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Evelyn Strand","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVewN82R64qW8_51hIS4cZJin69I9hII7TCA4RyX12wGyLywBZh=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The ladies at this location are amazing, the food was very tasty. I had the extreme fries (veggie meat).   SO good!  My first time here. I highly recommend trying “ Bar Burrito”. The ladies name : Mani &  Harpreet 🍟💖","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jess T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLSdmlrwXwsqIuxFN4IRhq3pLXSpSKj12WvEMOH0Kl_Scgu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I got the street tacos deal with a Jarritos drink and the food was very good. Anita served me and her service was very good. The atmosphere of the store was also very welcoming with the music played in the store!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMXX50XRI4d1x_CDt19K4lJm6cKC1Y4FpCzBRw&fid=0x0:0x52fdc8e4b81cb23c"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Customer service was over the top friendly. She let us try a new sauce, and listened and helped us with all of our questions as it was the first time we had been there. Everything is very clean, and well organized to read. Something we didn’t quite understand is how they measure how much to put into each burrito/ bowl. She kinda just eyeballed it . It ended up being a lot for me so I have a lot left over. The food was okay, gave me Chipotle vibes . The beef was not that good, and was pretty watery. The shrimp tacos were good though , lots of toppings to choose from","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv3DAoyCc7AbEsEv8sSPT1-pEMwSLFFzWYvn32&fid=0x0:0x52fdc8e4b81cb23c"],"When":"2023-5-13"},{"Name":"Ethan Zargo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKr14nMiH0arOiNIGBCVUJZASKmpuMReAAHWxIU0eaIBW6X4w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was fresh, and tasted really good.
Prices are on point and affordable specially considering the quality of food.

The lady that served us, was friendly and did her job nicely.

From out side seems a Mexican fast food, but inside, Surprisingly great food and service

U can modify your meal to be a keto friendly food.

Not sure in their food, and if there is, is acceptable amount.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Melanie Dixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJEt2dgS3rw3x9ZLO2754OWoBp-FwxRXEw0ZX9bvTBfCKLzkzF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I only ate half of my veggie quesadilla. Besides the half tomato/half onion non-salsa, I couldn't quite figure out why I didn't like it. The next day I took the last 2 slices out of the fridge and heated them up and figured it out. The mozzarella cheese was awful. The veggies were heavily coated in salt. This is unhealthy. Should have had some chili pepper spice in it and more than onions, tomatoes and beans. My advice is to head to Chopped Leaf nearby, as their quesadillas are good. Why? The quesadilla wraps are crunchy on the outside, just the right amount of salt and seasoning, a variety of veggies, not just 2, and the cheese tastes like real cheese.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Aspen Barker","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIM_O_wJ2-kAj73KcPl2xdRYLphhULu7JrQ4BP2S-44M6KvEg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time visiting, Anita behind the counter was so friendly and helpful!  The portions and quality were really good, along with her recommendations. I will return :) Anita, you were a bright light when we now find customer service so often lacking. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Monica Nguyen Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZBeMwSkt7l1K2HVfyeAFOoXFwnBn78IKEly42V3HGsujhC8gu=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have ordered here a few times now and the lady at the front now remembers me. She is so sweet and kind. The food here is amazing and the portions are great, four dishes for a group of four was wonderful. The spicy squid is one of my favourites and the sweet and sour pork tastes amazing. If I ever want Chinese food, I will always come here first.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNitwmRV6rfwJDN7EpwKsiCIe7pTNGZKwGGU2OS&fid=0x0:0x5089b53d0100262c"],"When":"2023-11-17"},{"Name":"The JOKER","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUQuiHl5446ZqSIBmhoQY8q4NuTHDo0F4Qr2KVa1APrDHGiVv22=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Excellent tasting food. The Calamari could have been deep fried a little longer with more salt added. The fried rice is very tasty.
Everything else is excellent. The price is right, and the lady owner is very courteous.
Poor cashier girl was saying sorry to everyone as the restaurant was backlogged with orders. Skip the dishes driver picked up 10 dishes before I got my 5. All in all, the food was fresh n tasty. I had to give the 10% off to cash sales as a tip to the cashier.  She was very courteous and apologetic to all the customers waiting for their food.
The Richmond market squid was excellent !!!!!!!!
I ordered more food 2day. The dishes were fresh, hot, and tasty.
Bought 6 dishes today.  The food did not taste fresh as there was an overnight fridge taste to the food. The Gen. Tso's spicy chicken was not good. It was not spicy at all n even worse it was made with sweet n sour sauce,  ( I hate sweet n sour sauce). The fried rice was abit hard meaning it was left over many days rice. The beef n broccoli was below average as the beef was cut into small pieces to make it look like there were many slices of beef when actually there was not. When you are very hungry, most foods will taste good. Unfortunately,  the food this day was not good at all. The cook must've had a bad day as his heart was not in it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPjZRUrWqMbNGNm1P4lhsUFKCdLr2ugTFenLboD&fid=0x0:0x5089b53d0100262c"],"When":"2022-4-21"},{"Name":"Anna","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX98PrUHxEgks1p_UHXz6OQ_Vovq-hbr6NA6018tymH019sjnz4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Depending on what you get from here is good, but small portions for what you pay for... especially for the meat dishes. Sweet and sour chicken is good, but sweet and sour pork... not at all, can't even chew it, literally. Soft chow mein is good. Beef and broccoli is good. Rice is good. I'd eat here more if the portions were better. Pay so much for so little, especially the meat.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eggo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVA2E4qPkriaAPlXZWiV1U68JcCrwz32VLQy_R-OB4nVbIK4G0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love ordering from Happy Chinese! The kindest people working and the best food. The egg fried rice and Honey Garlic Pork are my fave. The potions are massive of course, and everything is cooked so well. We’ve ordered about 10 times now and so far not a single miss. Everything has always been awesome!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjAFyC4uzW51_W5CulBHcEUtWIE8X82cV7J9Mu&fid=0x0:0x5089b53d0100262c"],"When":"2023-9-25"},{"Name":"Winston Ow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX4VK8olZKHHa7aoNtjL4Gd6F-ndnpQx6mPR5PLsRYshInbvp001w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Small family owned Chinese restaurant. Decent menu and reasonable price. Food were fresh and made to order. Lunch special is a good deal. Food was ok for that price. Friendly staff. Overall good experience. Will come back again fro take out 👍 #supportlocalbusiness","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPgXvhYBW9msBCP21WMj6WRpSiVzy0IVyc9Mrfs&fid=0x0:0x5089b53d0100262c"],"When":"2020-10-12"},{"Name":"Tara Dixon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLEYEcN6JSaRY9BfoEh1ynICuaE3-8A7bT3FkKuYmWm8pjZ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I was going to give these guys another try, after our last experience left us with a bad taste in our mouths, like literally!! My favorite Chinese Restaurant is temporarily closed and I didn't feel like cooking. So I looked at their menu. With the menu prices through the roof now, it would be cheaper to go buy a few ingredients and make my own, or hit the food court @ Coquitlam Center.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"karen boyd","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM-Czk3Y6iA2F4PseH1s0lKxESbFkRLdhCd6Rll_VRSCYx7g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Just picked up dinner for 2.. spent $45 noodles.. ok but bland and sweet and sour pork so hard .. not edible.. and so much batter..
when I called to say it’s not fresh.. they say we will remind kitchen.. no customer service.. go elsewhere","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keith Eastcott","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXk5BCUEJh42hOpsF-_OoCCbmyygcrHIJcijMiuq6slKML49qmN0g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is very good and the 1 person combo is a lot of food. I definitely will be eating here more frequently.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Food Bank (Food Bank On Wheels)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyN9UEC20D6PHlT3tIeXUdm-VMnAHMWHDsmAAY4yxajz9dV6sa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We wish to thank Maria for her on-going donations of store cakes & breads to our single parent families hampers operated by Food Bank on Wheels in Tri-Cities.
Thank you also from our clients.
Great way to support your community.
Support this great store as they support those in need in our community.
Thank You...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO0-mEXRi_tLXLQbvXvJlMA00E-SGdfakH6bvWA&fid=0x0:0x504ee82e0d9a9208"],"When":"2022-4-13"},{"Name":"Desere","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUm-qU_5F70OG-GJjYsCOAzBFCE_cpqYW2c235hbRYQK4IdMwUBzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love this place!  They have amazing homemade pierogies and a ton of great European items and some fantastic deli meats too. ....oh, I can't forget the desserts!  Everything I have gotten there has been fantastic!  ...the pierogies are worth mentioning twice....they are as close to my own homemade that I have found in a store","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Pat Miazga","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlAWIL0qN2kV6GmMillQSaZwbvio68OSOXDUirA03dVIflk2I7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very nice Polish Deli. Well appointed with a great selection of deli meats, pre made polish dishes and packaged goods. Reasonably priced. Highly recommended!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"aotm vhiam","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVlFvmPRiJUmkpz02ZHTW2VHjIc34VNQpDvWQ4wekuZ97OL0iRNqw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Their ham is what I remember from from childhood, not sweet, not salty not full of unreal flavours, just thin sliced delicious pork.   Everything else is delicious, mostly homemade, perogies, cabbage rolls etc etc etc .  Very good breads too and cakes, more to discover every time.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Steven2Sexy1","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXI0_oL3XOazp6g1ABVkKkC4RVHJiAvglMUUe4-J7OFSKm9V2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We will be coming there soon  i love euros food","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jen Somerville","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXCtYJg6i8pLN68NGMUg8PSdHnQzNcHBo2oeQP9FBK9fLzHaGY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Delicious like wow, but the service is lacking. I put in an order, and they forgot to write it down, and when it cam e to the day to pick up, they said they didn't have what I had ordered and were quite rude about it.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ioana S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJGGSy7nBKMX_ONP3_INQRyc-1xf6UcaJpGzlBsfp5aNfUt1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Been there 3-4 times but never felt welcomed. I’m not a picky customer and always have patience when stores are busy, but the ladies working here kept the Eastern European ‘customer service’. Some good finds in the store but I prefer to spend my money elsewhere. I only go to this store if I happen to be in the area","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Robert Florian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXC99wu_jojbPTpuNohgOCSJCmvEXgUntaYaPDDVMweuL-D0nL3=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"After a bad experience with an employee before this deli moved, I vowed never to return. I have given them another chance now that they have moved, but still feel a sense of unfriendliness just about everytime I deal with the older woman that work there. I think the deli itself is great, and the food is awesome, but they sure are unfriendly when asking for help. I can sense the heavy sighs if you change your mind about a deli item, or ask for a smaller amount of something. I have watched the Polish customers that speak Polish, and they get treated in a much nicer way. Definitely not a good way to treat those that keep your business alive. Hope they read this, and become happier and more pleasant with those that come in to give them business!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ginzo Milani (Monckey100)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVZJAMXcJZ4Q-fVQ1hK4TmeQ5-UBO877OkkYfk78A4TFUsqJzc=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing, the price was very competitive and affordable, possibly one of the best in Vancouver. The sushi tasted very fresh, and the rice had a sweetness to it that was very tasteful. Everything was as fresh as possible. The ginger even tasted better than any ginger I've ever had. The wasabi was also fresh and was stronger than most sushi places. This place definitely uses fresh sushi and it's obvious. This is definitely within the top 3 best sushi places in all of Vancouver from my experience of tasting different sushi places.

I had Combo C, the Salmon and Tuna combo and the Philadelphia roll, everything tasted very fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM2SVAiVQT3JSJUOGZZ8UnR3IMi8fCecDMxTW4F&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2024-12-22"},{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow! Pleasantly surprised by the great taste and quality of the food and the generous quantity of food given for the price. Amazing value! Ordered on Uber Eats and the food was so neatly and carefully packaged. We had the all day teriyaki and sashimi box which included assorted tempura, salad, fruit, miso soup, 2 large thick slices of both tuna and salmon sashimi, and a dynamite roll for $20.00. The variety for the price and the portions given were awesome and every item tasted delicious, like it was made with care.

We also ordered the toro sashimi which melted in your mouth. The spring rolls were crunchy and crispy and free for orders over $40.00. A great experience! A local gem!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPrHkKeRIqC8OXpfoW44UvkBSHLj0zQ_hEhfKNX&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Jessica Dhaliwal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXOeC5VCbc6g3HH3dxXpDS9bE993HEKMDVI3SjHX2aNdHbQOJHQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Green salad was good and service was nice and quick. I kind of wished there was avocado in it but it was interesting with the lemon and orange slices 🥑","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNRVnLG47yz7Diyyg1juF-fBExf2C99To0dgodw&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2024-10-17"},{"Name":"K Chherawala","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJcVx0YI5QWxv5FSjcoJfGooi8RpHbWCRTJocrZd9z7x4Hdag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I have been taking take out for sometime from here and the food and quantity is really good. When I order, the dishes contain food we ordered instead of overfilled with salads. Owner is always great at taking care of all the orders. Recommend.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPaVj9mTsMpy_xS9eHEQncjeC_0SeQpidiB8fbs&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2024-3-29"},{"Name":"Arms","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKUmLY8awuGp-jA_FKYnv3jp3TsFNqfWnLAcVg_QOUn9EqahA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The tuna special that I ordered was amazing! Love this this Sushi spot!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1r3cQW4yQgVWmXdaNNFO3xvkDhUrzaEUrwvOD&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"William Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVsRGoHRO0TQvEx8jL4YND48ARLLL12ZDXZgkw77pT4mPIyGZ7C=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"For a local sushi I’m very surprised how good the food is. First time ordered by doordash and I loved it. I went to dine-in today to taste some new rolls and it was good as expected . There were only one waitress and 2 sushiman but service were fast. Talking about price I think it’s fair/cheap ( wow look at drink menu) .
Highly recommended for taking out order.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOCcOrmmoTNGTQhIXsFjTvxcBgW0dIPRZaV2oDZ&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2021-9-10"},{"Name":"Bekah French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiYLh-7emQ9AthzE2N_CGxwmtRUdZguPeMRuVIWmhyOtllxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great sushi spot. We love to try new sushi restaurants and happened to walk into Poco Sushi today for lunch. Service was extremely friendly. I ordered a bento box and my husband ordered some sushi rolls. The food came out very quickly and tasted fresh and delicious.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPk20YqG6rZ9i8tMTVEtAsteIWhXaKXXq4xXbYK&fid=0x0:0x9c4f2a21b7f60250"],"When":"2022-6-18"},{"Name":"Perky perks","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLcap1SFRMaqvsRKJQWbeSsgfVCpaMsNFP1a78Q6VLRxWm1RA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I will definitely recommend this place, the lady with short hair was very nice, her vibes is superb which I haven’t seen from any place, she’s super accommodating and her customer service is top tier even though she has a lot in her hand to finish off. For the is 10/10, if you’re trying to be healthy they offer brown rice to any of their food that has rice and the serving is a lot which is very good for the price. Will go this place a lot more times surely!!!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews: [{"Name":"Sonia Walia","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLmFAKve73eZVaQvez5zAvR9bp93tHL0jxxDV96Hmz7KzptqQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently visited this restaurant, and I have to say, the food and service were excellent! Each dish was flavorful and well-prepared, making for a delightful dining experience. What really stood out was the fun atmosphere; they have games on each table, which kept everyone entertained and ensured that no one got bored while waiting for their meals. It's a great spot to enjoy good food and have some fun at the same time!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Vishal Brar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIX-lYmrpFu0BfmRu9CZkrLy04Al6Vmghk98oi4PhEuMPWQAQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Tried their wet burrito…it is delicious…will recommend everyone","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfmiCZXIfkPIIHc22OFMbMtpHWGxeAszH0x79S\u0026fid=0x0:0xb8973e310269b036"],"When":"2024-11-24"},{"Name":"Dayana Gonzálezx","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyF_NDLISgeQQbbKvPK4u0tDsgz3ACiIuzHfanpj4B69cJr2uA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Best nachos I’ve ever had! I had them with pork and it was delicious","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNo1pWWEZq_nh49aK46p7UjCeHOW_dMBjXgjO0E\u0026fid=0x0:0xb8973e310269b036"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Samir Khan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLbP1etlZa3y8RdkkfgSd6pOflGrt7k3TySl7wu9orrLxzUqA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Bad service bad atmosphere and they were so cheap. The plate was so skinny not even doing a full spoon of rice. I know other franchise stores of taco Del Mar at least do good portion never go to this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Harkirat Singh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3v8IAXTsZRjQVBhpUmIWqyCDvdPx-ZWIFP4AV1n_yG1PM1Q=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food here is absolutely amazing Every dish is full of flavor and the quality is top-notch. This place never disappoint …highly recommend it to anyone who loves great food","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Neda G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXcXBADLi2CMhn5hf9f-JdbOlYYM_LHhdjb9JmX03VjxzMph4k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"If you’re craving Mexican food, avoid this place. Honestly, you’re better off at Taco Bell than here. Ordered a wet burrito with queso and It was beyond awful. The queso tasted like chemicals and the burrito had no flavour. It was such a huge disappointment. I also got a kids quesadilla with beef for my daughter which tasted like chemicals too. $32 gone to compost. If I was close by I would go back and demand a refund. It was THAT bad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dr.Aman khokhar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV6P0K1dW3RILL_m2hYWiJmCbAZIajUqLU-5bfc3FK-_BHZ9NfX=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing service! Looking for a good mexican food place this is the stop! Amazing tacos ! Best fish tacos ever!\nWould 100% recommend this place!\nThe customer was above and beyond.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Adrian W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKkC00uJkJsFbk_OdOD9rrYTPpj8QZN9D-8L5mx-4-sXG1BIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The burrito tastes good but compared to competitors like Quesada, you're paying almost the same price but it's like 50% smaller...The burrito portion sizes are just not good compared to alternatives nearby in terms of value. I wouldn't recommend this place with so many other options. You can see in my photo that the burrito is basically the size of my hand and I don't even have big hands. This cost $20.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwpU6Nh3w2dylsyyixxeycfGT8yE25dWQsLWLf\u0026fid=0x0:0xb8973e310269b036"],"When":"2024-3-30"}]
