user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Regan Moses","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJWXdmgQOO18drHuZg6oyNK4Pgy4vcsyrzVJVjMl2RQ2P_Akg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Very cool brewery! I love the mix of industrial and restaurant vibe. The layout is spacious and there is ample outdoor seating. The food is great! They have a mix of well thought out appez and beer pairing meals. Fav is the wings. The wings are not your traditional wing cut but the whole wing…..Fantastic idea. Most of all they have really good beer. My personal fav is the dark lager. Best thing is, their prices are affordable.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLTuLWnp03j8iDvumuKX5GW_YSx1iAs3YtCppW&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Stuart Xue","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIMJR3m2m3b3A-TFm1gu2Ve7-gZIHc-nb8uoyhBCkgGuF6K=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for a cool beer after a long hike in a hot day.
Many crafted beers available and the bbq is delicious.
The fries are amazing and it was what fries supposed to be.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOuRTrUalVK76tHhL1gIuolhrviOLplI5oVcJo&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Mary Zhang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU7q3nMNLVt98vdR0lNO5wN9938S_sm6IFSYH1BhPUuDPS0jAvY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The atmosphere, beer, food and service are all 5 stars! Highly recommend the pull pork slider and the two big chicken tigh with 🧇.  Will come back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOWJeWXq2cXqVGDIluyRhQeUc3JmnKPXBYXT7RJ&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2024-6-18"},{"Name":"Brittney Cerritos Kroiss","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUzs74OWdsTEXPNevXDKt4yjRt1tvG8kz7_IZQS_xePF-HLCrj-gA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Decent place but their beer variety has decreased (no soups, no porters, no stout, out of black lager), their dishes have definitely been skrinkfated (chicken and waffles in particular got a lot smaller), and food orders were forgotten. All that said, staff are generally nice, atmosphere is good, and flavourful is decent in most dishes.

They used to be our go to but I think we're going to start considering other options before we come here again.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Before visiting the tasting room, I tried Patina brews in several places. Also, I admire their involvement in the community's life during and after the pandemic, which made the visit so much more special.
The atmosphere is excellent, and the staff is very friendly and helpful. Decent list of beers on tap, including guest collaborations. As I mentioned, I have already tried quite a few of their creations, so there are no surprises – great sought-after product. I regret that we stopped by right after lunch and weren't hungry because some items on the food menu sounded delicious. Well, which adds yet another reason to visit again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_WkjnxOH4fgfaSRnbA9YornXP5fJcyB7Yk1vn&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2022-10-21"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Super yummy food ! And Lovely atmosphere ! Our server Lily was so fantastic ! She is so welcoming and answered any questions we had. She really made our experience even more better ! They have a pretty big patio , lots of seating ! And a pretty big menu for a brewery ! The meat was very yummy and their fries I would highly recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMjkzPkAeubsOD5YfIcjFhLNwLPVqb3wegs64o&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2023-8-22"},{"Name":"Rick K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9V4XBFE6pAfU8Athi1_dl9y4vHzN7sHcxVlSWoT-0MyuFcvYE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"I'm extremely conflicted with this place. Does it deserve more stars or less stars. Let's start with some positives. Beer is good, unique, and flavorful. Food, flavors are good, sauces are good. However heading to the bad stuff. Quality of ingredients seem low, we are vegetarian/vegan but our table ate a lot of meat and the quality of cuts was very low, the brussel sprouts were tasty but low quality sprouts for sure. Just ingredients seem on the lower end. Also this comment is from my gf (give vegans a carb and they will drink more). The jackfruit vegan dish was literally nothing else but a plate of jackfruit which is pretty close to no calories (don't order this, waste of money). A bun jackfruit sandwich would suffice way better. Service was ok not great. The tofu bites were incredible through and through. Oh dishes are very small don't come hungry. This is a place I'd go to again but I do feel extremely conflicted, it's far from my usual spot visit list and it could be better without much effort, which is also the disappointing part.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCaj79_IYPrEBLyOLi8PeoirH-nw2qSKi0yPgX&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2024-4-7"},{"Name":"T U","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0fqYSgi-Oa1ZxHKMAgkTIjdzOCoN9dbq8TIyQm2_XMOry1AQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We stopped in for a quick beer before the Provincial ball hockey tournament - it was fairly busy. Great atmosphere. Next time we are here we will order food as well (looked delicious!). I ordered the Thai Lager.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPj1X_gMZWKh37ZEPBFykTw262WQeea9CbccyPO&fid=0x0:0x168a87ed0c636aaa"],"When":"2024-7-1"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ricardo Esteves","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWhLIO2qt-2RQR0_aQCihSuDY8549ydYAIf_Ebc863j0CC6irdH=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wow!🤩 Best pizza I ever ate, hands down. This place takes the cake! Not sure how they cram all those toppings on and still manage to keep such a light, airy crispy crust. I’m visiting from Ontario and I saw the flyer in my Mom’s mail. She never orders pizza any more because it always sucks. Mom had never ordered from here before, but I decided to try it any ways. We were both so pleasantly surprised at how beautiful and delicious the pizza was. I may not live here, but my mom does and she will definitely order from this place again. Try it. You won’t be disappointed! 🤤 (we had the Juliet 😋)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPfcmZDOkXuXHHfApnVXrXSE03TOb8qP-MbB4q0&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were in a time crunch and asked if we could get our pizza in a rush - they said yes and they delivered on their promise! Our pizza was tasty, hot and fresh, and we had plenty of time to make it to our next appointment. Our server was friendly and prompt. We’ve been here a few times and will be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOLly5sdKZqb1_imp4OGBRs4Dhktp9UI7we_mRH&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"Grant M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRWL_i5cZiVpXExK1H8xMkwx4_6CHC_xRkP2HoYZIVJehiW1g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's been awhile since I've had Me N Ed's Pizza, and it certainly didn't disappoint at all. It's still fantastic after all these years.

We decided to order a few pies for the NFL US Thanksgiving games on Thursday for delivery. And they arrived at a decent time, and still fairly hot still.

It's a little pricey, BUT you definitely get what you pay for. ( They definitely don't "SKIMP" on the toppings ) as you can see from the pictures provided.

We made up our own Pies two of which were the personal ones with their Gluten Free Crust. Which friends said were excellent. I myself made one up of original crust and Tomato sauce with Capicollo, Salami, Pepperoni, and Bacon. And it was outstanding and loaded with toppings. And the Capicollo was some of the best I've definitely had in a long time.

Great Pies and I/We will be definitely ordering more often from Me N Ed's Pizza Parlor...","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNZ8c0Q2gaomnnrh8SVY4SW_UCMu_Uc0GDiZvLh&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2024-11-30"},{"Name":"J wico","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKFLTpvMyLxVfHKit3ZJqPccY65Bl-YeNGA1wEu8pZSIRWpww=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Pros:
- Family and team friendly. Great family atmosphere, which is always a plus for me when dining with our toddler.
- Considering how busy it was, the food came out quick.
- Staff are friendly.

Cons:
- There are 6 other pizza places within walking distance and I'd put it towards the bottom. This doesn't mean the pizza is bad, there's just too much decent competition.
- Price. 2 smalls were $36 before tax and tip and it was today's special...

Would I go again? Maybe for a team party or a kid's bday.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO1MNiIwxPsTfI_D1Gyey22Wh_Gy-8bxTa2Weij&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2024-10-6"},{"Name":"Lord Stanley (Lifepilot)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzQPaJP0C4QgYze9YWfcg4vOQGSlA7Fi1WI2IqpyzPqwuzcItLsg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We popped in for a quick pizza 🍕 before hockey 🥅 🏒 game as we really felt like pizza. Saw a few pizza shops and then came across Me-n-Ed’s which we knew from Burnaby.  We got a table right away. Staff were friendly and restaurant was clean. We saw the Salmon & Roasted Garlic pizza with goat cheese. Seemed interesting, so we ordered it. It was absolutely delicious 😋 couldn’t fault a single thing about it. Crust was perfect and very flavorful! Yum! Pricing is also fair!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXkyEI6QptUTCf1-w_s5__bZl3WIuNYKdP0VLm&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2023-12-16"},{"Name":"Al","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJke_H51lEVtqmQ6Mwhj0R5MqDW7L2xLlIdf0sg4kPFJFF0D9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great location, very nice place with lots of room. Waitresses were welcoming and polite. The food was ok but had better Me & Ed's pizza. Chicken had a little bit of weird taste on BBQ chicken. Overall, it was ok. Place has a lot of free parking and good location. They have kids menu which comes with ice cream.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNIEpEpFb1gDy7vAh00FHxcrupgV651s-LKiH6S&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2023-8-7"},{"Name":"Victoria M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW4EhJg4Rc2VuzKf5_JHxexyjVp-afUrXeUpfgefDqByTw_eqXIfw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing meal here on Remembrance Day. The food here is always great. We tried their Mighty Caesar pizza for the first time…definitely will recommend. So many toppings which all pair ridiculously good together. Only critique I have is that I would expect quite a bit more beef to be on the nachos for the $4.50 price tag.

BUT enough about the food, I just want to point out Izzy for being the best server I’ve seen in a long while. She was beyond swamped, legit had the entire room to herself. She needed bills paid, food cleared, food delivered and to make the drinks on top of that….and she did it all. If she wasn’t doing all that she was answering multiple phone calls in between. Heck I’m surprised she wasn’t in the back cooking the pizzas herself at the rate she was going. Plus she was personable and extremely kind within all the chaos. Total superstar. 10/10 will come again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMSa86tUfJWBd2NRD4nRR1FBYS_U1NiczNltakJ&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2023-11-12"},{"Name":"Joanne Antoniak","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWTQwhPcO13h_HhVjJVUrwpHjU5MeesKhPrxV5pA1ymdZ1edFkY=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"10/10.
Such a fun place for a father's day adventure.  The restaurant is large; nicely decorated; and very clean. Service was outstanding!
The pizza was so yummy!!  Not your regular pizza "dough"; more like a thin crust flakey cracker - so tasty.  The toppings were super generous and fresh. The  Nachos were HUGE; served on a large platter so there were toppings on every chip.
Really fantastic food.  We will definitely go back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrwCYhvy5QqYykCBedXwx96v2e64SasZCSs-eB&fid=0x0:0x723248c50d21e55f"],"When":"2023-6-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXK5B0nZc7pfnZP0Dr5h_TAcTbcnwRX-0OethLznEp35ds4XQM=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I tried the Spicy Chicken Sandwich at The Chopped Leaf, and it was absolutely delicious! The portion was perfect for lunchtime, and I loved how fresh and flavorful it was. It’s refreshing to find a place that offers healthy options with fresh vegetables and chicken, especially compared to the usual fast food chains like McDonald’s or A&W.

What really stood out to me was how clean the kitchen was—you can see exactly what they’re doing, which adds to the confidence in their food quality. The service was also excellent, making the whole experience even better.

The Spicy Chicken Sandwich was amazing, and I’ll definitely be coming back for more. Thank you, Chopped Leaf, for providing such great, healthy food!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Samme Gaines","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMfskkW4naaEgz2fnFasM5px0epIhxN0Xx1coDtDkBpGSaBwmwuQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It's a great place to eat healthy on the go or a quick dine in if you have time to stop. I used to go all the time in university. I think they've added some more interesting options since I last went! Very happy with the bowl I got and my mom also very much enjoyed her salad.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0XYgviq0AHB6ZR1Q-AIvs_DzzlU2c8iAUG2XVvl-TIiMOcA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Thought I’d give this location another chance. It’s gone downhill even more! I ordered a make your own salad (romaine, tomatoes, feta, pita chips). It’s almost all romaine and this was a $12 salad. There’s about 1/8 of a tsp of feta. Not really feeling like having a bowl of romaine for dinner so I’ll probably toss. Never again at this location.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipObGGzYdE5qImFkUgWwI_8cG17jWQOH7fuq1J-B&fid=0x0:0x3d5e3c28a4e14ea9"],"When":"2023-6-14"},{"Name":"Marissa McKinnon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY68LF-WJ3XLlkLB3mmSI9NIX-eNSB4BF4a47z33JIFfXjKyxv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"we had a delightful experience both times at the poco location! most recently the employee complimented my shirt and provided us with phenomenally made wraps. i definitely recommend the new chicken cobb well as the bangkok one! Devoured!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPLPUODX_PJO5pO0tPlJ5z2csaldlBcW304VVEs&fid=0x0:0x3d5e3c28a4e14ea9"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Veronica Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJp624oPCdfpFEPQDYXZuzNXjbTfeytT4z_ZhfQ1AORB0UoBEVwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Food was alright, consider it a fast healthy food chain, we think it is slightly over priced.

Let's talk about service, I understand this is not the best job for this young lady working as a cashier and making the meals but wow I felt bad for her, because she just seems miserable working there. No one was in front of us, didn't greet us or anything when walking in, obviously she doesn't wanna be there. I don't blame her if that's not what she wants to do for her career but advice is that if you are gonna do it, just do your best, or try to do the best at it. Hopefully it was just a bad day for her.

The atmosphere was ok, the tables were slightly dirty from the previous customer but that's ok, just like any fast food chain, I understand the quality not a dine in type of restaurant. And looks like only one staff there so must be busy managing the whole place.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"T B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIGq6bHFybl3mpV2cXjlNjjPKWioxdIzQGpj5cbm4QC4xFIhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I have been a long time customer of CL and normally grab a wrap. For some time now I’ve seen their quality deteriorating and today was the icing on the cake. I ordered a Bangkok salad and could not get it with the usual dressing because they subbed a spicier version so opted for something else. This cost $23 with TIP. You have got to be kidding me. At this point you’re just stealing money. There was 51 GRAMS of chicken and a handful of veggies. The noodles used to be full noodles and not a chopped up soggy mess. Will never dine here again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO_y7vTbdOP6DO17cRC76bkZpJa9Iv-B2l1a_o_&fid=0x0:0x3d5e3c28a4e14ea9"],"When":"2023-6-23"},{"Name":"Dax Alexander","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJbwWUZS2mZsAQL6kyIe3CtQ75h5e3lUk-D6c4OGlzgpxynfw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Used to go to this location a lot before we moved away. Boy, does this place have gone way downhill since then.

Only one person working, there’s no music playing in the store, and there wasn’t even any chopped water in the dispenser! It was completely empty. How hard is it to just put water and a few slices of fruit? If you don’t want to clean the dispenser, just portion some out in your cups.

It got even worse when the food comes out. Before, it always come in these nice big white ceramic bowls, but not this time. It was packaged in the to go container! Not sure if the person working there is too lazy to do the dishes or just assumed that we will not be eating in.

We ordered the salads, and none of the salads come with the triangle pita chips like we used to get. When I complained to the staff, she said she crumbled some in my Mediterranean salad. Which she did, but before we usually got a piece of pita chips as well. My husband ordered the Cobb salad and he didn’t get any said crushed chips nor the triangle pita chips either.

And the portion! We used to be full after eating here, but not this time. The portion feels like a snack now. It was mostly romaine lettuce. The proportion of the lettuce vs toppings seemed different than before. I realize things are expensive nowadays, but this is beyond ridiculous. We thoroughly don’t enjoy eating at this restaurant anymore.

No wonder we were the only people eating during lunch time there on a weekend! We felt completely ripped off to be perfectly honest.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tom Walz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXDGM87RDU8GtFQKdYcYStlLBRI0OEjzufA8tUoarJ7R99gSCftyg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Wish we had one of these near us.  Food was better than you would think it would be.  I think I had the Bangkok wrap extra spicy.  Plenty of flavor and food.","Images":null,"When":""}]

[{"Name":"Byung Gab Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWN7CV-kMCm2w9BNLrj2pNfHwejZE1A5pRZgQwny7Y1RJNutpzL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We ordered Pho 1× Tai Gau, Rare Beef & Beef Brisket, .1 x P8 Pho Thap cam House special pho. Good  Delicious & Very good serving.
Price is medium high level.
Please refer. 5 photos","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNsAjhuaXI7fEAfnH2gjpkPP9gmI1WJsw-3J-nu&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Trudy T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWctN4hp19TBvFrO482akCkCoJ2inT_gfVVeqec3e6dYtYZ0h57=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I ordered the chicken fried rice, spring roll and some soup. The chicken fried rice could easily feed 2 adults! Or 1 person for 2 meals. Incredible flavor! The soup is delicious, light and refreshing chicken broth with some greens. Spring roll was extremely crispy and delicious as well. Would come back!

Staff was warm and friendly. Restaurant was clean and bright! Ps. I am vietnamese and am very picky with vietnamese food!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMf7sXVl2rzBpW0Pj95AG_mXuQGBxRehO4l6VL5&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"은도리","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIwyHN2jcYRdY7wtVdoWHRTWQcsSw7xRf7AByskIpJ_Q8_wnA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Best Pho ever!! And the fried rice and cheese fried wonton they are so so so good 😭😭 just place a pick up order in Crumbl cookie and eat here!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGkOB9ZhMR32Ws8_K_Q-7yFgmeilekq2K5lBP3&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"CortesJon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVxn__ZDv5WTXTAsJzCA-YAsihWX34mFr2gpi4BsgAuK2ucz1s=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Been wanting to try this place for a while and finally got to it. All these 1-3 star reviewers shouldn’t review food because they’re clearly missing taste buds. The food was very comforting. The portions were very filling as well. The service was excellent also and fast. I definitely will be coming here again!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUo7xjVaCN9jtz7d2YJyWjEIoVOMKl4SDjjqaf&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2023-10-1"},{"Name":"Henry Yim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXyAeUh2CClKb5j6bPCfm4WTuRVeJI0Sj2rgBonFkle79yB2OU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"In a small area within a small block, there used to be 3 Pho places. Now, there’re two left. And this is one of the two. Would have thought the food could be one of the reasons. But I found the soup base  of the pho was plain , not beefy rich. The beef
as you can see in the picture was also plain rough. Not beefy. The service was very courteous though. The place was also clean and pleasant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOGsKdvttEaOYZ_csFpmkeYALRsJxea8p_ELreC&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2023-6-10"},{"Name":"Chun Ho Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWeN6tyeslrX1zBXDjrKJdBmn-J6R7mrVei78Pf_EwSNa0qPEvB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came to this newly opened place. It’s been open for a week and was excited to try it out. Overall the portions are large and reasonably priced. They are generous with the meat. Flavour of the Pho was good. Minor detail the noodles for the pho was not the authentic flat type but the main thing the flavour was there. The vermicelli bowl was very good. All the meat hardly had any fat on them. So great for the health conscious people like us. The spring rolls was also good too. Some recommendations to the owners, change the layout of the menu please add some pictures as some people like to see what they are ordering. We knew what the items are however not everyone are like us. Also have some items for kids please. Some kid size portions of the main menu items would be great. Other than that I hope your business will thrive as everything we tasted was great and not overly salted. The fish sauce was abit in the sweet side but I guess you are catering for the majority of taste buds. I would aim for more flavouring towards the authenticity side for the fish sauce which is generally more saltier.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-T7huAmy6EuwEQTDDm0kZlxNEj4um5Tv0k3zH&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2022-8-16"},{"Name":"WestView North","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKRUZshw3dLZkVlmZA4Qjdu4ixPAZrCtT-Tnq_V44e8_A5v=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a great place! Not only is there pho, but there are stir-fry and noodle dishes. Every time I eat there I am pleasantly surprised by the fresh ingredients, the variety of vegetables in the dishes and the great flavour. Do yourself a favour and dine here after a hectic shopping trip at Costco!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Attila Szamoskozi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2AAt3w8V6vnjRCqXfUE0xqvAqQuLl4Zs8C3rG6vUvIyME7FzU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Was happy to finally try this Pho location since our beloved Pho Toan Thang closed here at this same location a couple of years ago.

The food here at Pho Bo Ga Ottawa was excellent.  The Pho soups we had were very flavorful with their broth.  The meat provided in the soup was of high quality and plentiful.  Even the traditional sprouts and basil leaves were fresh.  The fried rolls were excellent and had good flavor.  Portion sizes of everything was truly excellent.  Probably the best of any Pho restaurant I've been to in memory.

Service was very friendly though there was a bit of a language barrier with communicating with the gentleman serving us.

Restaurant and washrooms were clean and well maintained.

The biggest criticism I would have is that the Sriracha hot sauce was not actually the Rooster Brand (Huy Fong) that the bottles were, on the tables.  It appears they replaced the hot sauce in there with some inferior very watery (much less flavor) type of Chinese restaurant style hot sauce.  When mixed with the Housin sauce it did not result in great flavor at all.  For the love of flavor guys!  If you are a real Vietnamese Pho restaurant (with all other flavors on point) use the Huy Fong brand hot sauce in your restuarant!  I might consider bringing my own from home next time to dip the occaisonal meat item in.  :)

I would definitely come back here and would recommend Pho Bo Ga Ottawa to others.  Though not for their hot sauce!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOAi5t3swYhE2bk2r-byEQUweOTLY4jVq1lOCYJ&fid=0x0:0xfd391bff3d28a31e"],"When":"2023-9-28"}]

[{"Name":"Jayden Goh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXfxPbqGM6eAJPan1ykBxu1WdZiDSJ5H4jU_Lmw66QM6XcLJ4I0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New owner alert! And they now serve kimchi pasta and bulgogi pizza 🤌🏼🍕✨🇰🇷🇮🇹🍝🇨🇦 im so obsessed with their new menu. Had too much fun eating korean and italian fusion 😭 im going back again","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_2agRSs-ZlPpiVIEH5s7vwiImueQPzNGl6O4G&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2024-10-28"},{"Name":"Natasha Fairweather","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBwqx0HIQY8WD9R5s-_c-R2N7C-rOceCAPnELP-NaBrqdfS2Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We just had a plain cheese pizza, but it was really delicious! The thin crust was amazing - tasted like the best homemade - and it had plenty of delicious cheese. Friendly service too. I look forward to trying Korean-style pizza next time!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnEfS42hOwNtRRfZto3ZDZdFYSJ4tXNcjYRBLK&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"Jenny Suh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLt_2Ra07mjJAD6pJbfL5Kr-etMXsE2KZSbiX4kd_gnVBc3-w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

I recently ordered takeout from Hearthstone Pizza and was blown away by their unique Korean-style pizza. The flavors are incredibly distinct and delicious, featuring a wonderful blend of traditional and innovative toppings that make each bite exciting. The quality is top-notch, with fresh, vibrant ingredients that elevate the entire experience.

The customer service here also deserves a shout-out. The staff was exceptionally friendly and knowledgeable, offering great recommendations over the phone and ensuring the ordering process was smooth and easy. The pizza was ready right on time and still hot when I picked it up, which was fantastic.

If you're in the mood for something uniquely delightful and packed with flavor, I highly recommend Hearthstone Pizza for a takeout experience that goes above and beyond. Definitely a must-try for anyone looking to explore Korean-style pizza with excellent service!

서비스로 빵까지 최고✨ 친절하고 너무 맛있어요!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNvvYFF29yD7YCFLVeZp7wcZ_8yIo8NF6ha1GFx&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2024-5-10"},{"Name":"Grace Lee (uniquegracelee)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUcLOFQRKQPIL568ukRAK7Mfnl9Zlwt0OqQ-hQU3BXQpw9bmROL=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would give 10 stars for service if I could! The owners are so friendly and kind. We ordered pizza for my daughter's 2nd birthday, and she offered to customize the kids' pizzas to contain low sodium cheese, extra virgin olive oil and lots of veggies so that it would be more nutritious for the kiddos. The K-pizza with the thick dough is super delicious and the corn dogs were also a hit with guests of all ages as well! She also gave us some complimentary cream buns that were super delicious 😋 Definitely will be back and I really hope that more and more people will discover this place!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoDH-6CNBtV23AF2UcyB_shtmflqyG3G-XRZoX&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2024-5-25"},{"Name":"Xiao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIS_o-8XQcfu3J4J73uohpXess7RNYg9bt22TmDVZmInFoeZQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here I tried the Meat lovers pizza and was really good! 💎💎💎
The Korean lady was really friendly and nice

If you review Them on instagram story post
They will give you a free Korean hotdog on a stick!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOB5eneZytATo-Pxu9lh4srLlSBCs8AfyKCLblK&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2024-9-3"},{"Name":"he rodo","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI3VhOf0dHQE02Cg8rMDAZR0v3vxpLmzXJ91wNSTEhYe4yjbw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place is a hidden gem. Korean pizza contains a lot more ingredients compared to any major pizza store. Also, the pizza is heavier than those from other stores, which means the portions are good. I wish to eat at the store as it might taste better. The price might be higher, but it tastes better. But it’s a good thing they don’t deceive customers; they are an honest store.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUuLC5yvvtP-xTBqqY3Jm09xWEGeHKHiKCACwi&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2024-3-3"},{"Name":"Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUxDbc7M0Cmp2wWvWgS4lAZIaLItTtOqFqT5lVGXaY3ub9suOFV=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The new Korean owner is the most friendly and lovely person. I got a shrimp Korean style pizza with stuffed crust cheese which was very delicious. The corn dog was a perfect balance of sweet, savory and salty that had the most beautiful cheese pull.

Other than the thicker Korean style pizza,  they also do a thin crust “build your own” pizza similar to the Hearthstone before the new owners.

Thank you I can’t wait to come back again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPu9Hl1NntFWB3KM1OoTPeEqKGExl2Q1asFZJiI&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2023-4-20"},{"Name":"Holly Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL8JUvONVzomd94Off1-k_EXXhwoErw-2ELquSGN4FCIVH78w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Exceptional customer service!! My hubby told me this pizza place is under the new management and is now selling the Korean version of Pizza. (With sweet potato paste). I have been dying to try this ever since I saw it from a Korean drama.
Tastes great and love the cheese crust!! K-corndog s also tasted great. And the owner gave us extra corndogs and personalized message! How kind.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMi309tgue2qPJVKJsOzr_zUTtFAXbL5QdimJMi&fid=0x0:0x8e51eeb0ae7b37a7"],"When":"2022-6-15"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Octavia Arpanahi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKLzoK_DY_DZhKIx9bIdvhRkgRegmX-SBQD5B8PE9JT46BoWw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"We have been regular customers at this restaurant, but our last two experiences have been disappointing.

Dine-In: During our recent visit, the fish was not fresh, and our plates were dirty. We had to ask for clean ones, and even then, the waiter insisted they were fine until I wiped one with a tissue to show her the spot of dirt. The pickled ginger was inedible—very bitter—which affected the taste of the sushi pieces nearby. Surprisingly, they only addressed the ginger and not the inedible sushi! They also forgot one of the rolls we ordered, and when we inquired, the waitress claimed we hadn't asked for it.

Takeout: We called around 8:30 PM, half an hour before closing, and were informed they would only accept cash since the cashier was closed. We ordered about $55 worth of food, which was ready in 15 minutes. However, except for one roll, the rest was awful. The fish tasted off and smelled really bad, and the pickled ginger was bitter again. We ended up throwing most of the food away. The few bites we had was enough to make us both feel sick. Tribble stomachache!

The next day, I spoke with the lady behind the counter about our experience. She seemed rushed and didn’t let me finish my explanation, offering a $5 discount coupon for our next visit. When I expressed my concerns about the quality of the fish, she dismissed them, saying, "No, the fish is good here... okay, we’ll talk to the owner!" I tell you what, the owner is behind all of this to save cost!

As loyal customers who love supporting local businesses, we are disappointed. This was our favorite sushi restaurant, but we can’t return after these experiences.

0 stars for customer service and 0 stars for food quality! We won’t be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Rashid D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXXPDZt5y5bey-csUIKGxzvSokMCZ0lBO1WndBKVNtMxIQye_uzHw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Had a bad feeling about this place but my buddy insisted it was good so I took the shot.

Worst restaurant I’ve ever been to. Better off starving yourself. Lol

The woman at the counter just stares are you while you eat and gives you bad looks.

Also found hair in the rolls. Never coming back here","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Andrea Heinrichs","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJy2bdpJFNRR4tGMgfRb4p99jP7vlqwoXglYXxjxTPVp4x7_w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our favourite sushi restaurant, and we eat a LOT of sushi. You can't beat the price, and the quality and taste are consistently great. The staff are kind, hardworking and skilled. We've been eating here years and are so glad that this gem is in our neighborhood.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"M K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLM9VUGDsk2oDZAcqjl8US4O15jNrf7M2-NGLQa0E9wOlbT2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Terrible. Virtually inedible. Not fresh at all and made my stomach feel off. Will be throwing most of it away.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPoGowDckHC68rS_aaUysvaDIjZ_xnEF1cTik8u&fid=0x0:0xe12939da420ba73c"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Blake Puzon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVRm3drD_FI1z4akPCBxJtZmHqc1y27SH7yVHGcf_l8mzhsH5HoEA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Forget the poor reviews of this place. The sushi was cheap, delicious, and served quick! Staff were friendly enough and they served us promptly. All the rolls were really tasty (We tried the spicy negitoro, twin salmon and spicy smoked oyster rolls) and the fish was fresh. Ignore the bad reviews, I’ll definitely be coming back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNv6rlBCSor6XTej1qpqOumFXVrNOE-QHoMAvJp&fid=0x0:0xe12939da420ba73c"],"When":"2022-10-17"},{"Name":"Jackie Dog","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI_8r1Vdsy6qcpWStCl0tml-SlF_HbMZe9yltq-A4wBj8H8hA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This has to be the worst Sushi we've ever had. We ordered for takeout last week. Completely tasteless, the rolls all fell apart when we tried to pick them up Tempura was burnt with mostly carrot and zucchini. The beef roll tasted like deli meat. My partner could not eat it, so we ended up throwing it all away. So much for our very rarely lunch get together during the week. 👎","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"El","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL-WD7VOBR78os4KIa-xrOzSsG8AedvNjeawM6bsle4_vbkJQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Have bought sushi from for a few years, quality is honestly not the greatest, but I always thought it was ok considering the price.

This time, the quality was possibly the worst I have ever seen. To start off, the rice was not marinated at all, tasted like nothing.

Found hairs in one of the rolls… (see photo)

The avocado used in the rolls was not fresh (see photo)

And last but not least, salmon smelled, you know the smell when the fish is not fresh

Low and affordable prices is definitely a pro, but to sacrifice the quality to such extent just to keep the prices low is absolutely not acceptable","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM0O2kKY-U6u4U0imlIUADSDALauvsMMoSKaQRs&fid=0x0:0xe12939da420ba73c"],"When":"2023-3-4"},{"Name":"Kashvi Trade","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU6XlqlMx7LLCyDJi6IYhy1h3-auQiUymhsO7Fl_gBUgwyppYk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love mango cream cheese and avocado cream cheese roll. My daughter is a big fan of this restaurant.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIWly1C_tZffbb1awG_Rk8kioMTdAvey3Z0GaG_OGEkn6RO3g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Update: the owner did reach out, and addressed the issue.

Edit to respond to the restaurant’s response: After submitting my complaint I got an email confirming that my complaint was received… nonetheless, I’ll forward that email to the email you shared

(I did reach out to Mucho Burrito customer service twice before posting this review, they’re not interested in resolving issues it seems as I never heard back)

I was served completely RAW CHICKEN at this location… (pic below), and when I let them know they offered to make me a new one, which I obviously said no to. Only after insisting was I able to get a refund, and I was only able to get one for the pre-tax and pre-tip burrito price; had to keep the rest of the combo so took my drink, chips & queso and paired them with a burger from five guys next door. I’m extremely disappointed with my experience at this location as I used to really enjoy their food, but the way they dealt with this was abysmal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUb0RycOZzHH6-_RNawY8hTTXuTtqTrx98iPls&fid=0x0:0x117decb89ca6e734"],"When":"2024-10-13"},{"Name":"None","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVUg9LMmf3Y5oM-oVAiwu8Xcu9ndoZogijykYwk4ZDBa0OsjIn9=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I come here often and it has gone downholl recently. Way smaller portion sizes and staff barely knows how to wrap a burrito. Maybe your staff should learn to wrap burritos properly so it's not falling out and a soggy mess when I get it. I hardly ever go here anymore. Saboos next door is way better.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Bart Pukacz","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVwhyc1_aZKwBjY5et488IHwGY8XOIAlmX_tYjEaDjQCJ5zdp8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I grabbed the beef barbacoa bowl and it was delicious and a good size portion as well. Ended up taking some home for leftovers. The girls were great here. Def recommend any of their dishes.
Thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Daniel Jung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFE7g6vnjf23CW6mDeh4anchF8fxBs6O5Nsx0bvhepuO3MVzWa=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Update: Been back a few times and they continue to provide good service and delicious burritos and tacos! Shrimp is made to order (7min wait for me) definitely worth the wait.

Old Post: Not going to lie, I had doubts about Mucho Burrito as it seemed like another typical fast food type but my colleagues convinced me to try this place and Wow...

I was surprised with a burst of flavors and my stomach was filled with generous portions. Regular size was enough for me and it was delicious!! Lots of toppings, Vegan cheese option, variety of sauces.

Clean restaurant, Very fast service and they do not overcharge for those amazing Jarritos!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzHDhliysiN2Mmu4UKv-vw_dnAcVn8NEcYRul6&fid=0x0:0x117decb89ca6e734"],"When":"2021-10-23"},{"Name":"Renata Steele Vancouver / Kelowna area (Realtor Vancouver BC)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVY5AYokNodhccb7bLk1A7kSxqiXee9yFcQzGTeTsQYbtPKFk2s-rk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was our first time coming to the restaurant. Even though there was quite a big line they served us quickly and were very friendly. The food was delicious and they have a big menu selection. The restaurant is clean and everyone was social distancing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvoQEnhCkeIJKX0Xi2ZxDgw-lwId567zzVlh4A&fid=0x0:0x117decb89ca6e734"],"When":"2020-7-30"},{"Name":"D MC","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKpC7RrSmxTvBQnrycmHk8RaExCMfuDFwhzqbvkpLlK-dzTjg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Food at Mucho Burrito was pretty consistent with other branches. My only pet peeve is that the veggies are partially cut and you're left with giant pieces of red onion or green pepper. Other than that, food was quick and staff were helpful. I made my own bowl and got some hot sauce on the side. Hats off to whatever hot sauce they gave me because it had a lot of kick!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMLrCk-tD1FWHvAbQo72CsJKcuiL7KKyiS4f5o&fid=0x0:0x117decb89ca6e734"],"When":"2023-4-15"},{"Name":"Simarjeet Malhi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKWx9W8X639QH4turmLEJZJoln5RpcAwBhX6OSg_eeQfxdj7w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"First time having  mucho burrito! Worst customer service experienced. Being new i ordered 2 bowls and mentioned its my first time having mucho burrito. They asked what i wanted and kept filling bowls very quick.  When finished they tell me everyhing extra is going to be charge. Being knew i said if i was told this i would not have added the rest to the bowls. She told me in a rude way ( cant you read top) very frustrating, i asked for her name and manager said she cant give not allowed. Reputation of business is important. Experiencing  this i personally wont be coming back to this location. she's so rude","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Shivam Thakar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKTKQ4x5zJTOrxHk7XowjIwx3ocgRVFHDBQEM9rVpvqh7-WEw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Hiiii,
I want to share my experience with one girl who is working at this location her name is “Arshnoor”. She is working today on the closing shift. She is so nice with us, we went there at the time of closing but she is preparing our order in very polite way and her customer service is uncountable, she is speaking so politely and she is so humble, I think so she deserve very good position in this and she will be help to the company to get higher and higher customers with her customer service and skills like communication and polite nature. Thank you so much the mucho burrito to hire such this types of employees in your company. I am really really very happy with her customer service please tell her on the behalf of me Thank you to her😊.

Thank you,
Shivam","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Arjun Tyagi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWopm7CB27Brsn2nZf_ZcGMYA1rC2xZn0gFS2Ev_B4zUk8mX8MoIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Love the food here and definitely will be back but most likely grabbing take out over dine in if coming on the weekend. Came here for the first time on Sat, Oct 20th for brunch at 11:15 AM, it was packed and we (2) put our name on the waiting list, it took about 45 mins to get a seat which was the only negative but we figured it must be good considering how busy it was so we waited. The seating is a bit too close for my preference to the point there is no privacy to have a conversation while you eat but I get they are likely trying to maximize the seating, it's also a pay up front before you order type of establishment so just keep that in mind. Not my favourite since I like to tip well but based off the service so in these pre pay scenarios I unfortunately just have to go 15% because I'm hoping it's going to be good, but I don't blame them with all the shady people these days doing dine and dash and etc.

That's where the complaints end, the food was absolutely amazing and the staff are very friendly and welcoming. I will definitely be coming back and seeing if they're a bit less busy perhaps for a later brunch around 1:30-2 PM next time and if not I'll stick to take out.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM4miz5R1JAfwId5oUPDkbUvfO1VKqG9oN3FhiG&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2024-10-20"},{"Name":"Tyler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV44fpfaEhe-NUZmd0KxbQW5h4ZO24PneHP0Sgtc4_visySni_S=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I can't say enough good things about the food. The bowls are huge and though they seem pricy at first, the amount of food you get is well worth it.

Our first visit came highly recommended by a friend and we were also suggested to try the bowls. We went with the Plant Based bowl and the Brisket Bowl.

The brisket was extremely tasty and delicious. Broke apart with barely a sight of the fork. The combinations were great.

The plant based bowl was equally tasty with the chorizo style no-meat.

The server was very kind and was excited to help us out of provide information.

The problem however, is their pay-at-window system. They require you to pay prior to being served and their system pops up for a tip of 15% or more, prior to having had any service. I voiced my frustration to the server and although she was understanding, this seems to be a growing trend among many small restaurants.

I don't feel comfortable tipping without service first, and especially when ordering food first, you feel compelled to tip so the restaurant gives you good service. This "good tip first = good service" needs to stop.

If not for their tip system, I would easily rate this place above and beyond. It is STILL a must try in Coquitlam.

Don't feel compelled to tip first, tell them right at the window you'll tip after the meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMN-yo_rdnY4iXeMEJun1d0qpS8UBc72wb_7x32&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2024-2-24"},{"Name":"Amy W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUXW2kFPUz2ZEuA7b5L3P1pRYoMNSxOcfMvE3AI7nWAbheGCBAE=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Excellent food and service if you need catering for office lunch or family gatherings. The owner is easy to work with, understands your requests and accommodates well. I’d recommend providing a budget and let them create a fun surprise menu for your event. (Hint: You can order food that is off their regular restaurant menu!) Generous portion size and packaged well for take out. Best to order a few weeks in advance and pick up if you can as it is a busy restaurant!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPwxxVmyjv9uN1f9MMaxfxZM1_hfx8PLZ62oczi&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2024-3-8"},{"Name":"Neil Westlake","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUkJv3AzW4tBOSLrqh2jethB1xgQxQAL7dV6GEGf7O6ziwbP2c=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food is phenomenally good. The pan fries are perfection,  scumbled until they are floury on the outside, then cooked to a perfect golden brown.

I had the Longanisa patty inside a brioche bun. My wife had the brisket bowl.

The interior is clean and very well designed with live-edge wood accents.
Service is attentive.

Well worth a visit.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBdQidu9-LBp2UYGcCi5vlNKrzu1asCqFnSHqw&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2022-6-23"},{"Name":"Jasmine C (Jasmine)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUl_wTRZRv85CvyyDAN1cvtTS3H_ie2czWqnkRltr5-8JeM_xhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I understand why they have such high rating now. Their breakfast bowls have a super big portion and honestly taste really good. Very yummy and filling. Good value. Good food.

This was one of the restaurants attached to the bowling place so washrooms are outside to the left and close by.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNUD6OSE3IfIK4WRh44X3OqHrYzMiEXZHC-znyR&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2023-10-31"},{"Name":"Marley Mckenzie cook","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX5n4XAwgV26WrtDQFOwKexjEHrP8ok0rq2RztGWysEOnM29r4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"First time trying this place, food was decent but that’s not what I find wrong with this place. It is a busy place and I understand they don’t have much seating but to have customers sit in the back where people are constantly walking past you to go to the washroom or take their kids to the bathroom is unpleasant. The back seating is a joke, they have pest control traps on the floor and it’s where  all the recycling is. I find this pretty disgusting and shouldn’t have customers sitting in the back recycling/ trash area.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg2EmY09HpYOYp0h_X9SgkEoIzE6F1a6apmlk&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Madison G","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVtZsEld-Yz5a2Swm5LesjF83lo03ZXPGgujeQvQiLn6WLaIuGx=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I really wish I could give this place more stars, but the experience me and my friends had here was a hectic one. First, we came on a Sunday around noon for brunch. Sundays are a very busy day, so we expected a waitlist which is totally fine. We waited about an hour for our table. There was so many people leaving, after an hour of not receiving a call we came in again to check how it was going, they apologized said that it was so hectic they were behind with calling the customers. When we finally ordered and sat down, it took quite a while to get our food. I ordered the chicken sandwich, and I was really disappointed when they put pickled peppers and onions on it when it never stated on the menu that it was on the burger. I didn’t bother saying anything because you could see the staff were already really struggling to keep up with all the orders. Second my two friends ordered the acai bowl, and one was completely forgotten all together. We had to go remind them that we never received an order. I do not blame the workers that day, if anything we really felt bad for how stressful everything was. From my understanding aswell is a lot of them were very new, and being new while working a Sunday ,plus understaffed is understandably very overwhelming. We even noticed they were accidently overcharging guests, and not being able to refund them due to the new machine system. One worker really stood out though; I believe her name was Lea. She was so kind and was going above and beyond to try and fix all the problems and issues that the restaurant was having. She was really trying her best and it was lovely interacting with her. She alone made our experience a lot better. The food we received itself was really well made and very delicious. ( Besides having the pickles peppers/onions on my sandwich ) But Like I said before, I had such high hopes for this place, unfortunately due to our experience and the stress it caused us , this place would not be our first choice to come back to. Overall, they need more staff on a Sunday, and better organization","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOmqPqRoJVr9_gx0TGti-1enX-R7IWzO0rr5NXI&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2023-9-13"},{"Name":"Janet","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJLdrp4_-PzGWs8I7cbVIruptxWktGjE-_19gAKtYsnjV7T8DB=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Lovely little brunch place in Coquitlam, the staff is friendly and the place is clean, it is on the small side and at rush hour expect line ups. Food was delicious! Be prepared that while they do seat you, you order at the counter so you pay upfront.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPS52NqhoATiiFpOsVT8tFxwp_yGdQbsREFjSfm&fid=0x0:0xaafa76a6be83bd15"],"When":"2024-3-16"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Denise DeLeebeeck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWYD1zVQWXHIRamuBniuHZ29ETcvOM1QruSTCzH6JvwnuMbgaC6=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Love, love, love this fine dining restaurant in the heart of Port Moody! Menu always has lots to offer, great variety for all tastes, and the food is prepared with lots of care and love. Service is excellent, as is the ambiance. This Cookies and Cream Ice Cream is so delicious - glad we tried it on this visit! ❤️🥰❤️","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPyg_dfh8N_B-EUNkVlH-YPrrZe53QajyowRgss&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2024-8-31"},{"Name":"Franklin Sox","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUZubFWlf1jFvtyXwdLqV6pPE6fHWfAwiMm_rQYiBQLnCJ9g9Q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time eating here for a date night. This place has a traditional European look and feel to it. Excellent wine options if you’re looking to have a glass, half litre or full bottle. The dining course menu is priced on the higher end, but the quality and taste was excellent! I would definitely recommend this place if you’re looking to have a nice dinner or social with friends.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl3TS7qiqex1vAZ1oDcBgGW0FJ98ZV65gzSLWB&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Jens Linde","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWlCKrCZHlIGD7BB2ZR0TIczNdFAZenYYgISEJG2XbCwcDU1hA8=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We held our sixty year wedding anniversary at the St. Street Grill  inviting 60 friends and  family. There was a vow renewal and a music played . Every one complimented the food and service .  It was a wonderful night Thank you CHEF. Jens & Diane Linde","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPJYOmcm5Qc7Dx_IpIiV0_eUvy5eK-2H2vSxZU2&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2024-10-5"},{"Name":"Taylor Brereton","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIyyQNPJzhRIhfl2NHiE0HIvfsoHWa-XydcySe4augI2FgpDQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A great birthday had. Amazing food, wasn’t too busy even considering it was a long weekend. Service was impeccable and the restaurant was very clean. All in all a great meal, will be returning for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOKiGPxLuPrh4rMNqBcdzb7sOp-7trwQD-3YHwT&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2024-5-20"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This was the second year at Saint Street Grill for our staff Christmas party. It was a nice set menu with a good variety of choices for everyone. Quirky decor and lots of Christmas decorations were on display.

Grilled shrimp appetizer and salmon entree were great. Service was attentive until dinner was served, then we had to wave down staff to ask for dessert and later the cheque.

Overall it was a nice evening at a cute restaurant.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdmOWzrPlMMu7UVWRqEldY3lMiE_jsX3HcpRJZ&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2023-12-12"},{"Name":"Nishka Pogroszewski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKylC6STJX7BERDhnaE-cfgjaxVfbzlC_cZLIUJ-Cy5oBIgQw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We were there Dec 20th, had a reservation at 7:30pm for 6 people.  We loved everything about the night!  The food, the restaurant and our waiter!!  The waiter made the night unforgettable really!   I believe his name was Justin, let him know we can’t wait to come back hoping he’s there.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Ryan meenaghan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVvTBwQyQT2XXiz4uqyn-AlVgBL8jwKlT3l_lavCLnW36lU3qxu=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had an amazing meal. Food was delicious, service was brilliant and the patio is the perfect setting for a family meal! Will definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP8vvNKHP0kw_w3d9m4xGYq6iZYpxSaG6tXcHnC&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2024-7-20"},{"Name":"Amelia Appels","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV3Sz2CWrW8Su2EXMQGePL0sMCSobCKaiD3hSJGnDTbMccU0y7n=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Saint St Grill is an amazing place to go for high dining food, service, and atmosphere! We sat on the patio for dinner, and the view was nice, with outside lights to make you feel the summer vibe! The appetizers are absolutely delicious (I had the 3 Beet and Blue Cheese Salad). Super fresh and great during the summer.

For the main entree, I had the Free Range Chicken, and my partner had the Tammahawk Pork Chop. The meat was juicy and tender, while the mashed potatoes and pea risotto added a great flavor to the dishes!

The people are lovely. Super kind, very funny, and attentive! They even honored a gift certificate that had expired 6 months prior!

Next time, I will try sitting inside, as there are so many interesting things/trinkets to see! A 100% recommendation, and well worth the prices! Thank you Saint St Grill! We will be back! :))","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNPRGflKW1WraSy4sH91IffWwXHR0aOdjMKLioH&fid=0x0:0x6b83977d77f177b4"],"When":"2023-6-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"John Deisher","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocItcFFPYAPbtDqC1IC6ZSQUik56g3NSY_b6fEdOWjzWpOpkOw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My review is long overdue.    I discovered Sunstar about 8 months ago… and have returned many times.  Heidi… manager… is a true delight.  Always friendly, accommodating and one of the hardest workers I have ever met.  My friend.  Delivery driver Jason is incredible as well.  Their extensive menu is sure to please any cravings.    5 stars…. Come see for yourself.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tracey Nguyen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJZu7Wd-0W8AR1ietbb55MsCEMTW14qREJAaK2bKSh0mIGR3lmBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Booked a reservation here for 10 at 8pm. Service was great and the server was a great helping us figured out what to order for our group.

We ordered a combo B for 8 ppl and some extra dishes. The food was amazing ! Really loved the fried rice, ginger beef, green beans, and fried squid ! I also love that they have seasoning at every table. I am a sucker for their hot sauce.

We noticed that they had an extra room with a bar , tables, and a karaoke system. Looks like a great place to book an event/ gathering.

Would definitely come back here again for some comfort canadian chinese food. I'm also interested in trying their breakfast in the near future :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOqd9fV6wMT1TELGzoTSGTelTMfPiwt0tnUEvag&fid=0x0:0x318b3df216b4a874"],"When":"2024-3-19"},{"Name":"Truckloadofrhymes canada","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXkND8fxIF1Oqb83wPDair5hXJ85P4wpjp70bDsHPXiyojrgbkuIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This place always has good food. Definitely will compete with wherever you've been going.  All the non-asian dishes. It's not just filler. It's actually good food as well. Highly recommended been coming here for years","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPl6gwoIGVtCq4dV_NqTeIpYWkmUwSbC9aIaxdk&fid=0x0:0x318b3df216b4a874"],"When":"2024-8-24"},{"Name":"Amy Lau","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUMShEyNaVyqkg_udSZIL6AtgBldvcAt4vOmvtftAdUJi-LcA7I=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food was delicious! We ordered the beef with soy sauce noodles and spicy squid for our company’s event. Service was great! Portions were on the larger scale for our corporate events! Lady over the phone was super helpful!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Stacy Purum Jeon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXJokIsJGL-fv0gSK_iI4jQxVk_jmrb_b6s-LN0DAYOqzSpY2xQLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Combination of western and Chinese!
Servers were super friendly and food is so good. Given the fact that you cannot really find the restaurant this affordable this good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMT4_PggqssU5QpyUWU0Ylqz8PNHV91LwR0XZsh&fid=0x0:0x318b3df216b4a874"],"When":"2024-3-16"},{"Name":"kiana Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWKoxfjAHBiXenysk2Q-KlulFH1fxjGp6FrGPGGTkK41ibofwbwig=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I got food poisoning from this place and been living in the washroom for past 7 days. We ordered 3 dishes which they got 2 of them wrong. One dish we realized it’s wrong, when we asked her, she was like “what about this dish? Do you want to try this instead?”
My husband can’t have seafood and the dish had shrimps in it, that’s how I knew for sure we didn’t order that dish.
The second dish we didn’t realize until the end.
The quality of their food was really bad. We went there for all the good reviews and we were super disappointed. Will never return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO-wQu4pwQGfRKnSX8sP3y7dUGvJGajvqAJG35E&fid=0x0:0x318b3df216b4a874"],"When":"2023-8-5"},{"Name":"KA T","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVaR7ml2dkrIOrwgU_-kQ-HRh1gdXFY-Mwfz5VTGuLsK_EtLSkR=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We stopped in here for breakfast as we were staying at the attached Ramada. There was 4 of us (two young kids and two adults). The breakfast itself was ok, nothing special at all. The coffee was really good though. The service was embarrassing. The server walked away without taking one of our orders and seemed almost bothered that we would come in to have breakfast. The prices are definitely not worth the quality of food. When we received the our bill, the prices were higher than what was noted on the menu, so this was quite alarming. They need to update their menu to reflect what they charge because that was really shady. Our bill was over $80 for four simple breakfasts. Save your money and go somewhere else.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Medcalf","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU1rixyxiw07idcZpYCUo6royGxGKqfnZDSFo9vAAuERRuqgDflAA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Amazing prices. Great western classics with good portions. Also good Chinese food. Nice owners. You will not leave hungry 😋","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Does anyone remember Foodie Goodie? This Chinese buffet has similar vibes just on a smaller scale. It’s a cozy and affordable Chinese Buffet. The experience is like going to a mall food court Chinese stall but having access to all their dishes in an ayce setup with ice cream and desserts included.

Every item I tried was solid and delicious. Highlights were the meaty wontons in the wonton soup, the flavourful green beans, the saucy sesame chicken, and the sweet and sour pork. They also have ayce deep fried chicken wings!

There is one large row of hot buffet items and there is one row of cold buffet items. Other dishes offered in the buffet were spring rolls, teriyaki chicken, fried wide rice noodles, fried rice, chow mein, multiple vegetable stir frys, French fries, mapo tofu, watermelon, honeydew, jellos, self serve ice cream, Caesar salad, dessert squares, fried shrimp, and more!

They have a 10% off promotion if you show their ad until September 12th, 2024 but they don’t add this automatically and we forgot to show them ahead of time and discovered they do not automatically add this discount unless you request it during this promotion period with the ad before you pay so if you have the ad, make sure you show it at the beginning of the meal before you eat!

Would totally come back again if craving a solid affordable Chinese buffet.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_Jl_qKvqUqvMaAsN5NHZW7JJTkjwCVy-0JoDm&fid=0x0:0x2a6f92d457b46501"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"MEI YUK KWONG","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVTR5fMrt6rW0kUyae7YmyvXZGV2RDnrXvvOMq3DPQHW1PBA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It is first time to try its buffet. My kid loves its food very much specially fried chicken wings, fried lemon chicken, and spring rolls. Its fruit is very fresh and the food is delicious. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP-RPzq6FpgL-dUq93cdeX9NjPmW_v4TElYi9FI&fid=0x0:0x2a6f92d457b46501"],"When":"2024-7-21"},{"Name":"Kate Choi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIjE4MSAa0c4Uqc8iOt1LfqIkJDL1ULa2Z17gRh4YDWMExQ1A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Wow! Finally we have a chinese buffet back! The closest one were china kitchen in maple ridge and madarin garden in abbotsford.

I'd say things are pretty standard for a chinese buffet. Hot and sour soup was good. Wonton soup was tasteless. Green beans were fantastic. The sweet and sour pork early on was good when crunchy but quickly got soggy. They need to fry it longer so that it can sit in the sauce longer without getting soggy. Deep fried chicken wings were delicious and this is missing from the other chinese buffets. The chow mein and fried rice were lacking - not enough wok hei, so it was kinda soggy. Salt and hot pepper shrimp were ok.

For desserts they have the store bought mini strudels, two bite brownies, and some more, and also vanilla and chocolate ice cream. They need to work on their ice cream scoop hygiene cuz it sits in still water. They give fortune cookies with the bill but they were stale.

They have a promotion right now until Sept 12 - 10% off so original price of 23.95 becomes 21.56 which is on par with the other chinese buffets. I've attached the flyer that you need to show to get the 10% off.

I would definitely come back again while the promotion is going on.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNXTAG1aXb3xdu3Dfc3JE7jVF3A6AYbr8XbyeS9&fid=0x0:0x2a6f92d457b46501"],"When":"2024-8-9"},{"Name":"Alessandra Collins","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLhWQxGDpHYixIgGgKaD_LSXxaExyF66yy3zVZvHmmUznqeXA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sky dragon Buffet is back! Used to come in the 80’s for the buffet. It’s still pretty decent and all fir $23! Can’t get enough of their wonton soup !","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfrCjcK_2Ke0ViHI3ANB_RKdT6yi7XBWE5LIoG&fid=0x0:0x2a6f92d457b46501"],"When":"2024-8-6"},{"Name":"Capt'n “Capt'n Kim” Kim","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXZhf7NtaLs3uZUIip1Tdvd9X-1nr6TB-Wg0318fLfU_1vnaM2g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"I'm pretty picky with Chinese food but this place has really good sweet and sour pork.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOcqyW0BNQMWHzTkitHeNlVB7ixB9I7hfj6nFEP&fid=0x0:0x2a6f92d457b46501"],"When":"2024-8-11"},{"Name":"8T8","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLaHAe29LTwj-kDB4Rxp2LPyCtNn-xUw5U4xwT2905ny-JNkA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Had the all you can eat buffet.  There are a couple of dishes that I liked.   Keep your expectations low and you won't be disappointed.  The chicken wings were fried and seasoned to perfection.  The shrimp was not bad at all.  I liked the soy noodles, so overall it was a good experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Billy Klassen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbAJ4cPAN35uiTddEp3W8Fxxeke_3W0YvLb1lgQ9tUUrZhobk=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve been coming here since I was a kid for over 30 years. Now I bring my own kids. One of my favourite restaurants. Buffet is smaller than some but the quality is great. The buffet shut down during covid but was ecstatic to see it return. Sad to hear there was a fire. Hopefully it can reopen soon.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"JT","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIYi15husQBT34qYbw1VgKWUEMqukT5EDbxCs03RAANxsKngA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Egg rolls barely have any filling (and no meat)
Deep friend chicken balls don't have enough chicken in it and seasoning (did I pay $19 for batter & oil?)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNlc_0WFbwTvzFBwN2Psye0Y_mVaKG61VdthSYy&fid=0x0:0x2a6f92d457b46501"],"When":"2024-7-26"}]
