user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Sandra Tran Do","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9l6s1YZWB64Ki1thgUudvXKddmLpHe47fEzkyE5Wrayj1VfeG=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This is a great cozy mom and pops restaurant. it is Italian and Korean fusion. The service here is so good, food was comfort food, it wasn’t bad but it wasn’t the best Italian I have had. Would come back tho","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNl3P0sP9BMO8A7fcAP--OVyqDEiLIOYcwNgSXd&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-12-21"},{"Name":"Darian Yee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVa9tIQQ79AzRLuXQPjOsHXO8XmdfzgC67OKlKFj-Hw13RvVc0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I don’t give many five star reviews, and I hope no one sees this one, because I don’t want my favourite restaurant becoming too busy! The prices are LOW, all plates are around $16. Portion sizes are LARGE, and the food is delicious! We always being left overs home.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3YidPIFJjE_yahI6LsLC9tA7AzaFHQjR3lrXd&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-11-2"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly is a nostalgic joint as I used to go here during high school times. It used to be infamous for their buy two get one free pasta dishes but I believe that deal is no longer available. Regardless of which, they have some great pasta dishes, and are a Korean Italian fusion. You can also adjust spice level if available! They take reservations which is nice for a larger group. Parking is abysmal in that location, but that isn’t their fault. Usually, I just find parking in the back or on side streets. Most pasta dishes are between $16-$20 and have quite hearty portion and you also get a slice of garlic bread for free. Staff is friendly and usually run by one person but very efficiently.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO9jwHT3ikVSlmyrS_uHwj81dsEC0JrFYYYHMr-&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Kamil Chocimski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiqh1VSZRODqN-Djl6vCyrZVFOC1F520DSa-G8lhjPI6NkKSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Ordered the Caprese salad and Linguine Seoul. The Salad had no Basil, but salad instead. The Mozzarella seams to be defrosted. It falls apart and it's grainy and mush. The tomato slices were very thick and were dry. No flavor. Disappointing.
The Linguine was different. Taste was good, especially the Clams. However I asked for Parmigiano I was given the powdered stuff and not fresh. Also the dish was in a very hot pan, and not a bowl. Got burned a bit. Be careful if you have fidgety hands or nerve damage.
I also had the $5 pink lemonade, which was just pure sugar. Had to squeeze my lemon garnish wedge and dunk it. It didn't help

Service was impeccable, food arrived quick and the server lady was friendly and very helpful. She deserves a raise.

Atmosphere was fine. I love little holes in the wall like this. The booth seat was comfortable. The service and seafood makes up, and I rate it 3 stars.

Pity, because I was looking forward to checking this place for a while. I grew up in Italy and was hopeful. However it's a miss.

Maybe other dishes are better

DO NOT RECOMMEND THE CAPRESE SALAD

I wanted to rate it 2 stars because the food was so disappointing, but despite the lack of fresh ingredients","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMGWAfrDYg0ryjkUfLpTX5Rjq44jLrPAuXDilwS&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-8-30"},{"Name":"Caroline *","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8RSBvHYuwmws6j5XyqmPqw1TITZ2sRj-IIy6vhYkGJqRMUR96=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little gem! I’ve never had a restaurant provide complimentary items, but the lovely server gave me and my friend complimentary garlic bread! ☺️ fabulous service. They are very polite and respectful. Often times, I get servers from different restaurants constantly checking up on me every 10 minutes and while I appreciate the effort to ensure we are taken care of, it can get a little uncomfortable. The server here was amazing. She gave us time to enjoy our food, and checked up on us once to ensure our needs were met. I can’t wait to come back here again!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMl3LyC43s2HkW9spcy0e_cmopO2UBWWXdaJn1O&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-6-5"},{"Name":"Bianca Lok","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLQf55yrLfuQpaVH5_PAPb-xLqdrIrBA83-7_og5_ndyF7MIm4=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"They have a good selection of dishes on their menu. Each of them look equally delicious. Been there for 2-3 times for lunch, food quality and deliciousness is consistent. Garlic bread is included which is a nice bonus. Portion is sized just enough. Pricing is reasonable and affordable. Otherwise, overall a good place to go if you are looking for decent pasta in the area.
In terms of service, servers do what they need to do and check in to make sure all is good.
It's a good atmosphere as it is never really busy during lunch time, so you can be seated immediately. Also relatively quiet.
The only thing not great is the parking. There is limited street parking, which is pretty much always occupied, but there is a small lot around the corner you can park at and then walk there.

10/10 would recommend to try at least once as their menu will have you going back to try their other food items","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMvJNi4mXTsFlxlVRLuvhRyzXJNyjs0dJLYCKCl&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-2-8"},{"Name":"Scott Lee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXHpW7vGME__Zs4wKjXR04Upnw88bkVVyz-H2288JsHocq9vI3r=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"It's a great Italian place that you should check out if you want to try out some authentic pasta and risotto dishes.

My personal favourite is the linguine soul that comes piping hot and spicy. I also enjoy their seafood risotto that almost comes out like a Spanish paella. The calamari wasn't as good as their pasta dish but still quite tasty.

The garlic bread is a nice little bonus but it's not as fresh as other places. The portions in general are decent and enough to fill you up.

If you're in the area, definitely check them out!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP_9EptdbJrgFN-WlFs_67YFedfhPPA-kuow85D&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-4-23"},{"Name":"Janice Ko","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUBZdze8bHRgeZWywjB9B830YGMgauY8dm-JU7cYQGuxIUbSKzC=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"My friend brought me here for my birthday last month. The food was surprisingly fabulous. I ordered the seafood pasta, and it was delicious. The staff was very kind. I definitely will bring my family back again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOb1O18YubgKwd-WVhAWpPNuheH-vzqyQjFf9UF&fid=0x0:0xae2442bcec231118"],"When":"2024-5-28"}]

descriptions: Global fare, creative cocktails & weekly live entertainment offered in airy, contemporary surrounds.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Lyndsay Krause","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUw_d91QaVdyXJ_iD_9n4lPuhHR3K42K7S3ljCJwkny1L-l3IuysA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Mixed feelings on this one.  We went during happy hour for a friend's birthday as a table of four.  Even at the peak during our visit, the restaurant was at max, half full, but they did have a large reservation table of about twenty.  The food was good, but the service was SLOW.
They were clearly short-staffed, as the manager was working behind the bar while we were there, but we had to ask other servers to find our waitress twice and went up to the bar once to order our drinks because we had been waiting for so long.  That being said, they apologized profusely and comped us free desserts and did explain that they were short staffed. However, if you're offering a happy hour with one dollar oysters in a nice, reputable restaurant, then you should be prepared.
We ordered both off the happy hour menu and the regular menu and there was small tweaks. We would have made to each dish, but overall, a pretty satisfying meal.
We will give them another shot to see if the slow service was a one off.
If you park in the underground and register you license plate at the hotel desk, parking is free.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzq5Fru9vEfYxmcJR5xpopeyv6MziJcBBPsKfk&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Olivia Ng","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUIR4XKe445qsIhcDQSa4vWiOM9DrqY3ui4NVU5_YRxUleaadGk6w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I celebrated my husband's birthday at this restaurant during happy hour. It was great! I really liked the reservation service and the atmosphere in there. The oysters were especially affordable—only $1 each!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOdpEVhtW5DRj8LXHSixV5OtUbkSaXNC_r14vrH&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Wonder M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK3hGfH7AOg7pRCDa3Bl6Ihva2AjzSpnVzAGWxFqmscwMF13g=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is our second time visiting Wild Fig and it never changed! Still as good as before. We came back for the $1 oysters during happy hours 4-6pm. Still our favorite.
The server, Gaga, was very accommodating and fun. 5 stars for her excellent service!
We will definitely be back with our family.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPUKGUqII20gz8cBwmqEzJxiE-UcceFNmhqqtF2&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-9-30"},{"Name":"Darrin Moench","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLVTIvDThj7TkTP598AOhul-HvnJ48LyKCbcLeGyiMH4FCfSg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stumbled into the perfect happy hour!  Buck a Shuck Oysters. $4.50 Beers Nuff' said. Fatima was great.  It was very busy with a big birthday party so you could tell they were slammed. But food was great. And waitress went out her way to make rounds and make sure things kept rolling. Food was great 👍","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMYYch2lk-bCunpYV7YUh7ZvVaUV-eGh72LWsx&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-12-2"},{"Name":"Jacky Wan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLB3kh5YHFtu97zOxW9maILk0zgbp2Jc2wc2LfnIwMDfF2vFw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently had the pleasure of visiting The Wild Fig Restaurant + Bar, and it was an outstanding experience! The atmosphere is warm and inviting, perfect for a relaxing evening.

I enjoyed six cocktails over three hours, and each one was fantastic. The bartender, Heyson, truly made the night special. His service was exceptional—attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the drink menu. He made great recommendations that enhanced my experience.

If you're looking for a great place to unwind with delicious cocktails and top-notch service, I highly recommend The Wild Fig. I can't wait to return!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9SVtfhGWVywzBeZqt6IVTIHOKpPGQUSE0tYi0&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-9-24"},{"Name":"Simon Reed","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKqDrptZk5K8r7cAAASAK3dUxXTVH7GnPDIaXKpcuAnggfA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Went for happy hour and was pleasantly surprised that the music wasn’t blaring. Our server was great, kept checking in with us even as the place started to fill. For the prices the food was great. Side note, the security guard at the entrance was probably the nicest and most professional I’ve ever encountered.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOjdqhF79SAMToD3ZFc3RaKEVz1HLAFAR17piw&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-9-27"},{"Name":"Sarah E","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIa_jO-vyQRGGDK2y4e7wiYPff_fxb9XQEgCwprbq-00Y5DNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The Sunday Brunch is excellent.  Many choices of food from hot to cold, including an omelette station where you can chose your own ingredients.  Services are great as well,  friendly servers are always around to see if we need a top up on the coffee or take the plates away.  A very enjoyable experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOMRayiGdaH9mB7u_Sn0vun5pfSAHE5bERYS9Zf&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-7-7"},{"Name":"Genova “Gen” Pangan","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXEIdEux0Y6t5oht2jr_SIjM3bcTupGJn9fR2Ts_u19pLcx_Y6eIg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Highly recommend Wild fig , my friends and I had a wonderful experience . Busgirl name ALONA she amazing pretty  , friendly  and accommodating,  The place not  too crowded     , we came in for happy hour the food was great lots of choices. I will surely come back here .  Excellent restaurant I ever visited .","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOIoFtJ6YSzkBGtcxIq36M8YKi02_GiwIqAY6He&fid=0x0:0xcea729f7201067c9"],"When":"2024-10-12"}]

descriptions: Laid-back brunch & lunch spot serving pizza, pasta & burgers, some with kimchi or bulgogi beef.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This joint had been on my radar for ages, and I’m thrilled the stars finally aligned for a visit. It's a refreshing detour from your typical breakfast/brunch diner and in the best way possible. The Chicken Cobb salad was amazing. It was exactly my idea of a well-balanced meal, and I’d happily eat it any time. The Bulgogi eggs benedict was a hearty recommendation that hit the mark, though I might pair it with a side salad next time to balance things out.
The Americano was a bit watery for my taste, as I prefer a richer, more rounded brew, but the coffee they use is good, as evidenced by the delicious Affogato. Overall, it was a great experience, and I can easily recommend this place.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOBBQBsBVne7CdspMkJ7s050MLquoxqAvgVE9Z0&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-8-2"},{"Name":"James Shu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ-X1zh_92u1cTBADC3dN2MfeBqYQzw8dQmS7J28C0kZ28jdQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great brunch place! Excellent food and service. We sat on the patio on a nice sunny day which added to the experience even more.

Recommend the beef bulgogi, very delicious and they don’t skimp out on the beef!! We ordered the beef bulgogi burrito and the beef bulgogi Benedict.

We’ll definitely be back!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPDU8aoXbh_75qHSir7NAk-kiwBD-O8oLTW_1fU&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-7-6"},{"Name":"Louise Tuck","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWzJMFzeKH8Wl8xeVohNuiA2sGD_md3syY7itgjQ1C7izfji6QePA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely delicious!! We had brunch here and ordered the bulgogi Benny, the bulgogi burrito and the French toast and they were all incredible.. the flavours were perfect, we loved all of it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNOnQ_aGjXa3bnJAENGotVwmpl115v5BrumOCZY&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-9-12"},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a really good brunch at Kook’s cook. Parking is a bit limited at the front, but there is some in the back and on the side streets. I had the beef, Bulgogi Benedict and my partner had the chicken and waffles. We also ordered a fruit smoothie to share, but it tasted a bit bitter in my opinion. I like that the chicken and waffles came with fresh fruit. The potatoes were nicely done with the Benedict and my eggs were cooked perfectly. Next time I would love to try the pasta dishes! It is a smaller restaurant so services is quite attentive, but don’t come with a large party unless you’re ok sitting separately.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNeYBlhrRePVvrA0j0eg0xMCc-IzqUANFfwVGl&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-9-6"},{"Name":"Lisa koebel","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLw6QlYwmHtALujBhkwO4UyMcd7F8x7DlhGdHsr9U0G5Mtg1w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"BEST breakfast (I’m sure lunch and dinners are AMAZING too - but I’ve only ate breakfast there).  Every time we are in town… we go to Kook’s Cooks!  It’s a MUST! I order the Bulgogi Benny.  INSANELY DELICIOUS!  Fast and friendly service makes this a 5/5 EVERY TIME.  Not fancy… don’t need it… I’d eat their food on a park bench!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPCcZByvgBVPxWlvPe7jqVulpp7g_ReW9fiW8dP&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Arjun Tyagi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWopm7CB27Brsn2nZf_ZcGMYA1rC2xZn0gFS2Ev_B4zUk8mX8MoIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my 4th time here and I’ve always loved it. Haven’t had a bad dish from the chicken and waffles to the frittata and pasta. Thankful to have a wonderful breakfast and brunch spot in the neighbourhood.

Their menu is traditional Canadian brunch style with a touch of Asian (Korean) influence from the owners. Having been to South Korea many times in my life the service and fusion flavours are truly unique but give me hints of neat spots I tried on my travels but with a more North American twist. Will definitely keep coming back and continue to spread the word about this fantastic hidden gem.

They have ample parking, cute indoor diner style seating and a nice patio for sunny days outside. The staff are always friendly and attentive and our server on this visit on Tuesday, July 2nd around 1:30 PM - 2:30 PM was absolutely awesome 👏 as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPYQdhaTl4-Ll1Fxf4u7XfkHDY3RfZ0QU3OQ64e&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-7-3"},{"Name":"Juliana Bergstrom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV9z_V4_T4Kb4r0iN3AY1nc4y5c0skm3bc-4FOsN5--jOSweZ2U=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great coffee and really good food. I got the “healthy parfait” with a side of eggs and toast, my husband got the “morning plate” and their pancakes, which came with a side of fresh fruit. Nice shaded outdoor seating!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM6yy3ZdenGf8tDJae6oxPIJDqV6bA4w59k_K8D&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-7-14"},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What a delightful find on Austin street in Coquitlam. A great Asian fusion experience with comfort food, I enjoyed a delicious Sunday breakfast with fresh brewed coffee. You must try if you're in the area. Recommended","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM_4x5X2_7Aq9qOGTPgiKI0aE6Nb0fZI1RSf92V&fid=0x0:0x997a53630888a21b"],"When":"2024-7-22"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shawn Dean","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJhQHigN_Vr3WjAUcqhl57kBS0p0tQhzE-gVkEnQCJQIcTIhg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"What an amazing experience in Japanese culinary arts. Food was beyond amazing. Chef Keith hit all of the dishes out of the park. You never know what you're going to get. Menu is planned around what the chef brings in fresh. If you love metal music and sushi, this is the place to go.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNrrqB8danMCYFz_ZBHayV76VvZX7BE4kxg25aD&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-9-29"},{"Name":"Katie Wong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUD_dZl-28hfOStU-qWCDclCtIPBfQUNB_tuHCA1n-Fw92PgZHz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a really lovely experience at Sushi K. Every bite was DELICIOUS, which can be attributed to the great care taken to make it. The owners are so welcoming and clearly love what they do. I would recommend this to anyone who loves sushi, getting to know new people and looking for a special way to celebrate an occasion or just really good food.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPshYFGcPE-fqFXt9LTEhnXQAhJnS4Fx0ySORYr&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-6-21"},{"Name":"Cindy Leung","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWccKoqBV78_5pqbqSMNUcbwBWv49sw1K_gfi_jhr6uX3Zr1z5afQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi K Kamizato is truly a hidden gem! My husband and I have been there multiple times, and each visit leaves us craving for more of their perfect Japanese food experience. The owner is a true perfectionist, and it shows in every detail of the dishes served. Whether it's the impeccably fresh sushi or sashimi, you can always count on them to exceed your expectations. If you're a Japanese food lover like us, do yourself a favor and give Sushi K Kamizato a try - you won't be disappointed!"","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPn7bGPCsiGsQSRivLL7oDbR-cK9R_quJgHjjfJ&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-6-9"},{"Name":"Kwon Moonjung (Moon)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXs4Y7GxyFnQ_pFO5KYpsasux5QEeBTgXoMas1g-oYYf5BebxX2=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"It was a unique dining experience.

My companion and I were tasting exquisite fishes with explanations from the chef Keith, in a friendly atmosphere that they created.

Every piece of sushi they served had different characters and delicate recipes. It was indeed a voyage to Japanese's beloved cuisine.

I would like to visit again in a different season to taste different on-season fishes.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"jen h","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUhCIsdNpI0zn0ln1R2W8y6FEnO7Rpwo3p2N6L3S94WtNoyzHf7=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"How lucky are we to have such amazing talent and kind hospitality in a seemingly unassuming plaza housing an omakase restaurant that refuses to sacrifice quality without having to actually travel to Japan?! An absolute A+ to Chef Keith and Chika for their mastery of perfecting a great omakase experience in the tricities.

They are reservations only (and for a good reason!) and this can be done on their new online portal!! by controlling the number of seatings, Chef K and Chika are able to interact and share their craft with patrons in an intimate and personal way. There is no hustle and bustle or fakeness that would otherwise follow some restaurant vibes. There is purely passion for fish, customer service and, of course, metal music! I urge you to dine at the chefs bar and let Chef K tell you his extensive and wonderful background from catering some A list bands, to being on tour, and changing restaurant models all while being fed an amazing feast.

The fish is sourced from Japan and screams quality and flavour. He knows exactly what he’s doing with all the fish profiles and pairing them with a variety of notes like shiso, yuzu and ginger. Between the 14 unbelievably mouth watering and satisfying dishes, Chef K and Chika’s kindness shared the spotlight easily. Humble beginnings have led to an extraordinary and legendary journey for SKK. Some of the special highlights were the blue fin tuna, South American jumbo prawn, Spanish mackerel and the scallops.

I cannot wait to bring my omakase/metal loving friends and family here to join in on the greatness because sharing truly is caring and this gem is too awesome to keep to myself!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOUQxTRcdVg6w2fRGNA2rgJ11LTUVbZ-4-9zpj2&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-6-10"},{"Name":"RT Q.","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJFlx26VZcmF0Oz0NMLS20j-RG2uk3E1hU454Spnz4JmPX1cA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"🤤: finally leaving a long overdue review for this hidden-gem in the Tri-Cities area. quite affordable omakase options without sacrificing quality. we’ve been here multiple times and it never disappoints. Keith and his wife are very accommodating and super friendly (plus, a cool die-hard rock fan). they have varied budget options for first-time visitors, and you can simply call in and let them know your preferences for subsequent visits.

😰: while it’s quite a fusion experience, the nigiri pieces are on the high-quality side. also note that this is a reservation-only place, so plan ahead.

pictures are from my very first visit during winter last year, so the types of fishes will be slightly different. check out their Facebook page for a rough reference on what will be offered that week, as they import ingredients all the way from Japan. omakase price starts at $90 + tax, which includes 10 pieces of nigiri and small bites with miso soup and tuna karaage in between, as well as complimentary umeshu shot at the end.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMMXLygr4HHcwtJU920fWap8tvNod2VBO23-FQv&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-4-9"},{"Name":"Rosario","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWgGDUvVq0LHcDsGYS5Ajsq7op3PSBcKer8I_HtMpU1JHJRocg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Used to come here 13 years ago when they first opened up and they just recently switched to omakase couple year ago, went tonight give it a try and it was well worth the experience!!! Most of the fish Is imported from Japan weekly or sourced locally, thank you chef Keith for the wonderful dine in experience, looking forward to coming back","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9TiZiyc4023USo1JpvLtXY0wApF5zOoozA-be&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-5-30"},{"Name":"Sequoia Wiseman","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW2XQ92mpE01iZeW7C84Skx_Q0OWX8I2ZLE7hEkPUQ2gnHSduJfeg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Sushi Kamizato is a gem in the realm of Japanese cuisine, helmed by the masterful Executive Chef Keith Kamizato. From the moment we stepped in, we were enveloped in an atmosphere of creativity and rock-and-roll energy. Chef Kamizato's Chef's Choice menu was an enlightening journey through the world of sushi, with each dish meticulously prepared and explained with passion and expertise. The freshness of the fish was unparalleled, a testament to Chef Kamizato's commitment to sourcing only the finest ingredients from the market. Watching him work his magic in the kitchen was a spectacle in itself, adding an extra layer of appreciation to the dining experience. If you're looking for an inventive sushi experience that transcends the ordinary, Sushi Kamizato is a must-visit destination.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3za3LG2IMqsFlI8Of5sj_pjDMjGmUxt1a9wOw&fid=0x0:0x6cd92fe57d09de1d"],"When":"2024-4-22"}]

It was like one of those pubs on east Hastings. One star is for the lady who was serving everyone by herself!
We went to a restaurant to eat after listening to this guy singing 🤣","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMnMn1GcoF0dHdx4rexz7oktbeUz3moZGXCP4Jv&fid=0x0:0x29a6f19dcdc3d447"],"When":"2023-3-8"},{"Name":"awwmr moon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJQON9aUUGR04w35rVPMKXYPWClMQFCTWG93DAV0ieGnCzGmw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the lounge! The adjoining restaurant offers a food service till 8pm… but if you don’t want to order from them you can simply order take out or delivery while you drink some beverages. Complimentary snacks at your request and great crew of regulars","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jeff Faulkner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUlmWenhFFbKQItzQ6RZ2LGL2STCepQR7ckhdpdcQnU4074mJM=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"We were greeted somewhat rudely, it seemed like the Bartender on shift didn't want to have any more patrons. There was 4 or 5 ladies at the bar drinking wine and 1 other guy having dinner and drink alone. We proceeded to sit down and the Bartender came and took our order in a reasonable time, we were going to have another round but it seems we were forgotten about after the first. We finally took it upon ourselves to go to her till and pay the bill, the Bartender started the machine and proceeded to go back to converse with the ladies at the bar. We finished payment and left with no response from the Bartender.

This is unfortunate considering it was attached to the Hotel we were staying at and we figured it would be a good place to get out of the heat and indulge ourselves with a few cold drinks. We ended up walking down the street to Orrange instead.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Tara Simon","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW82vaU-kjjA9h_ssScOiBSqZk9NZYP1kmmU8zvfTx5Bqp6Rh_l=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"We went here on a Saturday night and it was dead! We got food that was served from the Ibiza bistro and it was tasty. Spicy squid (noy too spicy and a nice crunch) and perfectly cooked fish and chips.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Mike Battison","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK4m-smHIWq1E8hSdFK92_pHrNxKOtlvGnAjLp0d5PB0DEHXw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Shout out to Carol and Mai Anh for making this one stop shop. user_reviews: [{"Name":"W P","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocILxAIkDJOMkU9eiOhUr1vp_EVknYE6-JpPp2DlzYH5UXNOLQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The food at JFY is absolutely amazing! Every dish was full of flavor and beautifully presented. Highly recommend if you're looking for a great meal.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNX6Vqs_OyudkThAmeHarsQ8Us00FjV57PICm5g\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2024-8-22"},{"Name":"Cher Lin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKuJb4AXSXpx8-KCPDQBZHJ2K3rRI-J71p19_u0fIii9KOuBhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I LOVE the food here and I believe the service and atmosphere will improve once they have more dine in customers! I’ve been looking for authentic Chinese food restaurant like this in Coquitlam especially with spicy cuisine but also the typical noodles, dumplings, etc… I was told the chef is from more northern China and the lady helped us is from Guang Dong and they have been in the restaurant business for decades, I didn’t ask too much about their stories but all I know is this is their newest adventure! I am glad!!!! I see people order for take outs and some people even order everyday but from 7:15 to 9:30 on a Saturday, there were only 4 dine in tables including us, so they do not have extra servers, which is totally understandable… therefore if you are looking for services like cactus club, it’s not going to happen any time soon… nonetheless, I rate the service 10/10 for their friendliness and knowledge of the food, suggestions, the only reason why I give 4 star on google is because I want to stay true to what to expect for the next customers, atmosphere is 3/5 because it is a little dated but to some people this could be a 5/5.. nostalgic feeling! Overall, this is a must try and if you are a local, you might make this restaurant a regular thing… I am going back to try more dishes! Everything we ordered were amazing! Not overly salty or oily and packed with the right amount of spices without being too spicy, we did ask for mild spice. 10/10 for food! Please go!!!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOYRx0aAchW6Be7b-wVxwYTWSPczodN3XwfU85Q\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2024-3-10"},{"Name":"Pej Namshirin","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXt8TlEL2i2Xn40BjhRE9J4no4CShDCK1NmCQWJYbCcLJNbs-s8rQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"A little bit quiet on a Thursday night, but we came in hungry and left completely satisfied with full bellies. Excellent service: as if we were guests in their home. Everything was tasty, nice portions, good value. Get the House Special Crispy Noodles. We'll be back.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOHVvR21V2RyCPQ2Kgq5IyCxs5g1UwLpS-WTUxy\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2023-12-15"},{"Name":"Rob S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKl1FCoFebTKBGR8qu0CXJcgOpg1C_GaPiRgmFNkViRrR_-bA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Came here for dinner.  Its a small place but got seated right away. Server answered a few questions which was nice. Ordered 5 dishes but forgot to take pictures of the other 3. A lot of other customers ordered a spicy hot pot. Next time I'll have to try that.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMRkJKK6IeEaXBZ3Hd9d-c7UyLkv-kUGZORMJc6\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2024-5-12"},{"Name":"Co","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXG4naUf_X253ZW_x8qkz7Uig_hfCxvqNh5uL6iGAWHlnMotds=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We love spicy food, and this place did not disappoint! The stir-fried kidney, pickle finish and other spicy dishes were bursting with flavor and perfectly spiced. Every bite was a delight. The service was friendly, and the atmosphere was cozy. We’ll definitely be back for more!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnjHsZ7S12ig4C-lxuqyJYkSOqKSDXkdu-K0N-\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2024-6-23"},{"Name":"Adiarto Pranoto","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWGpDhMtiMDaaGt41IC1705uh4RhlaoTss7zAyJyY1-mSYu5O1azw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Truly a hidden gem! The food at JFY is absolutely delicious and they put extra care to use only the freshest ingredients. Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMfk1oM0bHeKrtwI6CwmmEd-e5vttjoJ0vgrFca\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2024-10-4"},{"Name":"james hong","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIuUy2OG4Bplbxj_Ym7mbYDtZs9FWrEHXAQ_lSJQm4W1YCgQg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the chef here is a master when I saw him. The fried rice noodle dish I had today was just like the best one you can have at Kirin or other good high quality places. This Chow-fun dish is simple, but very delicate to cook. Here, not oily, not salty, not mushy, noddle fried perfectly with all the ingredients, It's been a while to have a good take out Chinese dish. The Portions is just good for me. Prices are good on the menu and the place feels homey with warm greetings. I figured out why this chef has decades of cooking experience. Finally, good Chinese foods in the area. See you soon!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Soupie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIPo3MiiUq9w5p_rhCAyIVjl8rNLcE_4pEVJ-lVg7n0s8Q18A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"First time coming here and would definitely come again! Enjoyed the spices a lot, it really hit the spot. Awesome service as well, they explained the menu and gave us some great recommendations. Highly recommend this place, good for families and friends!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile\u0026image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMAwIGQGSCoEb0keyUr5P0DQ-aWAhr13Hb5txwr\u0026fid=0x0:0x741d98414591f8a2"],"When":"2024-6-3"}]

title: The Boathouse Restaurant
address: 2770 Esplanade Ave, Port Moody, BC V3H 0C8
descriptions: Waterfront option for local, sustainable seafood & premium steaks, plus wines from British Columbia.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Eunice Zhao","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL_m19zpDnShMlACSrl6S-cDalRdCNjiwxQ6t6OmcK7Ajk5cQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"This restaurant offers a lovely waterfront view, creating a pleasant atmosphere for dining. The ingredients are fresh, and the service is attentive. The seafood chowder was rich and flavorful, brimming with fresh seafood that complemented the creamy base perfectly. The grilled ahi tuna was cooked to perfection, with a nice sear on the outside while remaining tender and juicy inside. However, the menu selection is quite limited, which may not satisfy those seeking variety. The prices are more in line with fine dining, though the food and service quality feel average for the cost. On the plus side, we only had to wait about 10 minutes for a table around 2pm","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipODw1yHuYOaYmXeVpNvsTlV7FFk0RB7MvUz8yE&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"Rolando_ Rose","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIQBfjayv2V3eqQ6nmwU1uOEqgsWCG5VdwRxO3uXCF1EsXQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Ambiance of the restaurant is stylish with pacific northwest design. Tables are lovely with white linens, restaurant is spacious with patio seating as well. Nice views of water, mountains and the Rocky Point Park. Food was average in terms of presentation and flavour profile. Calamari was too thinly sliced with overly sweet sauce, acidity was somewhat lacking. Wedge Caesar salad was not appealing, insufficient dressing. Mixed grill seafood with zucchini and carrots: you can elevate this dish by using asparagus and baby carrots instead, and with a few microgreens garnish. Trust me, it’ll make a difference! We concluded our meal with coffee and dessert. Molten chocolate lava cake could’ve been better if there’s a garnish, just a piece of raspberry or blackberry or half strawberry, that would really make a big difference! After our lunch, we strolled at the Rocky Point Park which is just a steps away from the restaurant. Nice park with beautiful views, boardwalk, boat launch and boat rentals to name a few; with plenty of amenities for young and young at heart!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOvLXyTzdfnjl-68UsR-08GHFXy7UjA-OxCGcs&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-10-25"},{"Name":"Jeremiah Hunter","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVstOeDb0cNM2liNN27VZdumnDhp7SGpgbz_3sZFvnpsJHHzKw6Pg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Overall, positive experience with the atmosphere. Restaurant furnishings etc are nice. Waiters were good. Ordered the halibut fish and chips. I would have been impressed with the food if it was half the price. I figure that you're paying for the view, which was quite nice. And I've had worse experiences at places where I'm paying for the view. Ordered the Perfect Storm cocktail. Not recommended but was the other cocktails all looked very interesting.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO33TAVlaerPIYemOtM-cvQ6vUT3N0nsTZQxfQV&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-8-8"},{"Name":"Emily","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVnUYp6B39XV6d8C5kgeglVvQzUj0_MZRgXvwAElCXqqRYybMdL=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"It was a very disappointing dinning experience with poor food quality at a high cost.

The atmosphere there was awesome and all of us were excited at the beginning. We sat at the patio, the server kept chasing us for ordering food. She came to chase us at least 3 times in about 5mins. No patience at all.

We have spent about $190 in total. The food portion was very small, especially the seafood tower and steak. The lobster tail was spongy, no taste, not fresh at all. Oyster and mussel were tiny. What’s worst was, all food came to the table almost at the same time. The table was full and we couldn’t enjoy the food one by one. The food was cold, not enjoyable at all.

It was a birthday celebration. I remarked it when I made the reservation online and reconfirmed again with a phone call. It was expecting to have a complementary desert to surprise my loved one but turned out nothing at the end. It made me very disappointed and upset. I totally regretted to choose this restaurant.

After the dinner, I went to the disabled washroom with my little kids for more space. It was totally disgusting. The floor was wet, hand towel paper and toilet paper were on the floor. It was even worst than a public washroom at the park.

I was not willing to pay the tips at all but still paid a bit. I cried out after the dinner and tried to find out the email address to express my feelings after the dinner. I then found out the cost of the kids meal should be $0.99 during Sep 2-30. Why the server still charged me the regular price?? It was kind of cheating.

Totally not recommend to anyone.

————-

I have already sent email to the restaurant on Sep 2 but nobody follow up.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1V2FVfLLXo-n6x-sL5vigxsoYa-5GcikyCY94&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-9-4"},{"Name":"J Q","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWLFaR2htiLNLIQAXB2-FbuNystyoB794RiAm0Uo82lJgg8OdK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Everything we tried was very enjoyable, and the fries were especially delicious. Our server was attentive and friendly, enhancing our experience. Sitting on the patio offers a wonderful lake view, making the meal even more memorable. Overall, a great dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPzU5DRUh7UjMGsT8UCypHy-3Hokw2gjziQP33Q&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-11-3"},{"Name":"Cortney Reine","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJXEho0FdodYSCZpvRgaE-SfKuTQk3gaNebJTu6PShWDa0Lcw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Such a gorgeous spot on the water.     I asked for a surprise, since everything looked good.    The halibut was the best I've ever, ever, EVER tasted.     The oysters were incredible.     What a great experience!

One thing I thought was funny was the oxymoron sign out front; '$3 complementary parking'

Gave us a chuckle :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNfUInqh_blXYutlZAzIjM93JBQy65eZi_U-2d-&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-8-18"},{"Name":"Maggie Liu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV0JYUBsNfHmstgM8KPbHPNmE5htG-ybajcuzCE_0lTSNNY0R1L=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I used to come to Boathouse every now and then a few years ago, and this was my first trip back in a while.
The restaurant is better than ever.
Firstly, it’s probably amongst the prettiest restaurants around.
The oysters are fresh and cleaned well. The bread is great.
There is a wide array of share items and entrees available all day.
The servers are polite and attentive.
Highly recommended.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMaHEbbfHKWXX9P3yGwhqMq2U1OB-TogZ7Ytl8I&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Elham Shahbandy","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU8v0FqiWfwrKZlKpvymmkhzMYhJ-PBGxv_Ot_SbQhp9uNsQ3Yb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Price was reasonable but not really tasty. Shiitake fried rice was not really eatable. Steak was good but Cesar salad had a strong cheese smell and taste which was not pleasant to eat.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPd8LR5ObgHfzi-Ni6BV7AEE_V4apVi64RrMoo2&fid=0x0:0x5aa213bcccc48530"],"When":"2024-8-9"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Snoopy Kitchen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU3h-I-trbYva-Tzrs-UNhkQe4Nn1jgsblAcoQ0hPrnUWvugM3Y=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Big portion for the price and good to order a few dishes to share.  Good for friends gathering.  Love their scallops and beef carpaccio.
Local draft beer 🍺 must order","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXw1zecHQ23lGeRBHPjkfKQhwg4wkRaa4ZkaAV&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Jodine Morehouse","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWkI3ILmstAY-XeAWqv2CETEpjWiJVODW602jRpnYogrvfslqk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had a wonderful experience tonight at The One Sixty. I’m so excited to have fine dining level food available in the tri-cities. The atmosphere is lovely and the service was great. The scallops were delicious, the bruschetta was packed with flavour and the braised beef just melted in your mouth. I highly recommend for a special night. I’m looking forward to coming back to try their brunch.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPnznTdpcizO1WRUBEefyByqjg7edAYscyY7Npj&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-9-8"},{"Name":"Lorie Biscuit","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX3SaZMEozG_thkRie2w25mtZeGitWffDdS330nchcjzeVoj0Gc=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came here for the first time for a brunch date and the vibes at this place are so chill, friendly and the place looked very elegant. The food was amazing their waffles are extremely crispy. They also have a real coffee machine not one of those instant ones so the lattes are amazing. The lady who made mine even did little bunny art in mine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPXiQ2FVkzia9lseH7PpOGJeVqw6mq8yYaNRxVe&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-12-7"},{"Name":"Simon Hardy-Francis","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUB8AdQYxUYJCAE_cHqFT87JPS7eQsmUoL3mGal92dnU64RGEWt=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Finally had the chance to go here, but ended up disappointed in the end. Why? I guess it's because I entered hungry and unfortunately left hungry :-( The dinner menu was divided into smaller and larger dishes. I went for the larger pasta, but it ended up being the smallest pasta portion I've had in a long time. See photo. It probably about 4 or 5 fork fulls. I've seen other reviewers unhappy with their food portion size too.

My wife was happy with her tuna salad portion size though. I would have been too.

Other issues: We arrived about 4:40 PM and weren't sure if we just sit down ourselves or wait to be seated. We were given the happy hour menu, at first, and then they took it away, saying it's too late in the kitchen. Never experienced something like that in a restaurant before.

I don't think I will go again.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPZ-wC6IZ3ZTcRnq_JJRs_mKeXgt1wfwdd9LiIR&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-7-28"},{"Name":"Michael Tetrault","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUOblNGbdNZ4FfoMdwgRA-V8sixAEwnNyg7ZpUaoUxqov7wNyQphQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The One Sixty experience was both elegant and casual, where our party felt comfortable without getting too dressed up, but we're impressed with both the well-decorated dining area and the presentation and quality of the food. Whether it's a date night, hanging with a colleague after work, or just want to bring the family together, this place is worth checking out! Quality wine pairings and delicious appetizers rounded out our excellent dinner entrees.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO3r9Pw2Qw2a3MFYf4EQTI9Vl4-LBxxyUNNzDfV&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-6-27"},{"Name":"Elsa K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWLd8sh-s3bj5Jhs9_gPQsxuVZe4ZgkjQADi9C6BFijopOhbl73=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The One Sixty Wine Bar and Cafe offers a delightful culinary experience with its exquisite fries, delicious gnocchi, and generous portions. The fries are perfectly crispy on the outside and tender on the inside, making them an irresistible treat. Their gnocchi is cooked to perfection, with a melt-in-your-mouth texture and rich flavors that leave a lasting impression. What sets this restaurant apart is their commitment to serving sizable portions, ensuring that every diner leaves fully satisfied. Whether you're a fan of classic comfort food or gourmet delights, The One Sixty Wine Bar and Cafe delivers an unforgettable dining experience.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOzBFAJVt_f7DIftGLKL65sEhCBlWNcM1979pzB&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-3-17"},{"Name":"Paulina Pedrero Miranda","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXoiOld2vaC2Dv18bWNi8EDRiykD7MSCRsU3RK7RESh6xQghXxb=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"In general was ok, but i think that the experience could be better if the food is tastier, in general all was well ordered was fine nothing really amazing, we went for a brunch with friends, stay in the patio and the sun was intense, they only have 2 umbrellas in good conditions but both were occupied, the staff gave us one that was broken but fortunately it was enough, maybe brunch is not their forte, so maybe next time i’ll go for the wine.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipONugmowXjhT1q8E7vJFBebNwhjM1qcrc-tDRj0&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-8-19"},{"Name":"Jennifer Bee","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXFO0fgPBTIA1yxL3IXSghRJ6EmshLC1YB1a72b-xeg3kpjHx0=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"The bruschetta was amazing, but the additional price for the goat cheese was odd as it should have been included. $42 for the halibut entree and it was underwhelmingly small. The chocolate mousse was lovely. The latte seemed more like a cafe au lait so I assume it was a single shot drowning in milk.

I can appreciate if they are aspiring to fine dining - small portions with great flair and service. That’s where I think the let down was. Our appetizer plates were left on the table for at least ten minutes after we finished eating, and our entrees were placed on the table with the dirty dishes. I was asked if I wanted to keep my dirty cutlery, which was at this point on my appetizer plate in the server’s hand. I declined and asked for clean cutlery, and the server scooped a set off the table next to us. The attention to detail that their prices suggest just wasn’t there.

I’m glad we went, but I’m not sure we’ll be back. It’s a shame because I wanted to love it.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM006Luhn5MngmiJMxAN6KzVd3fmh-LvGiAbZMs&fid=0x0:0x856c38bd76a2003f"],"When":"2024-5-10"}]

descriptions: Chill restaurant & bar with elevated takes on pub fare such as burgers & pizza, plus weekend brunch.

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Champagne Kingdom","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWT9L6nbhgKeVF6uvC80gh6he8ZgVExYxBb0bRQFJovbeiruBo=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We hadn’t visited Browns in a while, we our stooped at the Port Moody location reminded us just how fabulous it is! The atmosphere was electric, with great music and an awesome staff. But the real showstopper? Their happy hour specials are to die for! We’ll be back sooner rather than later.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipM08OgiuTJ_gmAHVxi34xnNQbshx7yVFh6UhLUu&fid=0x0:0x9bb419891ac94930"],"When":"2024-11-7"},{"Name":"Zane Erickson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyuKKqkuzKUW-9qhJLQJt0mrgnRDbjpiqRvzzVywhPy_mBE3VuhQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Brown's in Newport is a great choice, the food is always consistent and delicious, the Cod bowl was kinda disappointing not that anything was wrong with the dish it just didn't pop in flavor like the rest of our choices on this wonderful family outing.

Surprisingly our son Thorne was a big fan of the food which means we have another spot approved by our little tiktok famous son with Autism

As a family with a child on the spectrum perspective the staff were super courteous and friendly and gave ample time for us to choose our dishes and enjoy the evening.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN71nFYx5aQTFkHKijpO9b7rL84O-4Wcz5LZv90&fid=0x0:0x9bb419891ac94930"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"ZuffaLtdDanaWhite","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW6gGe3NbbgwlJVAvgbTW4PyVUNZSvDx9TwIaijDSbPkD-WMrs=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Nachos were not layered. Who  enjoys 75% dry nachos after eating the properly layered nachos on top layer?

I had a dragon bowl with chicken and no rice. The chicken was surprisingly minimal & small bits, and was very dry. Told the waitress and she said she’d let the kitchen know. 30mins pass and I consume the meal. No discount offered or more chicken offered. I was told it’s portioned and precooked etc etc. When Coquitlam Grill offers better quality than browns, there’s a big issue and disconnect.

As well the restaurant was very hot. Had asked if they can turn on the A/C , and there were no changes after that. 110% will not be returning this browns anytime in the near future. Zero tip for the waitress as well who didnt take notice we’ve been sitting for more than 20minutes and wanted to leave. Stood up and requested my own bill. Poorly trained individuals regarding customer experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Maisa B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJxPIGyNNTj-i7NTQOG0RMWoi-i0VUuEDd6Ah6VVcaDHVppQUA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Absolutely amazing spot. Staff is extremely friendly and the food quality is impeccable. 10/10 recommend!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipO4cInyluIbAQu8HEsrpYNaj6z9DwHXJC0MerA4&fid=0x0:0x9bb419891ac94930"],"When":"2024-4-30"},{"Name":"Nathan Chang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjULis9x-C7u8jouJ6bmV-m7Mb2r-esn5uJaOqGwjwAA9z2MADUV=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great little spot for lunch. The burger was good and the garden salad was a nice touch versus my usual fries.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNTJMryLAfcXBI407jaP9TU9QnQwqR-h3nUsOiH&fid=0x0:0x9bb419891ac94930"],"When":"2024-9-26"},{"Name":"K","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXRwpWAz0-Yg4cI6ZsOAY9CncZqRN4a6o8nP7KlskI9G71qjLadgg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great meal with my friend here couple days ago . Was busy and baseball was on .

Service was great and food came out quickly . I had 1/2 portion of blackened chicken with fettuccine 😋 and my friend had vegetarian addition of the butter chicken which was tofu and cauliflower in the sauce with Nan bread ..

Patio was a nice addition however, we stayed inside the AC as it was hot 🔥 🥵

Definitely recommend fir socializing and having great foods and drinks 👌","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMBy0Spz_jKXP1Lpf9_813Q1HhPJkEKEqXfWP0k&fid=0x0:0x9bb419891ac94930"],"When":"2023-8-20"},{"Name":"Brendan Brow","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW-7ceZ_7XCL90JLiUO3RxwJE88N3jZDvILaa01EdZkONVmGLlcEQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Really disappointed with the experience we had, since previous times here were always fairly good here.
We were a party of 3, ordered an appy and then main dish each. Two main dishes came out while mine was forgotten. When the server finally asked the kitchen it was discovered they didn't get the order for my food. The server comes over to say she punched it in, but for some reason the system didn't send to the kitchen (?). So ended up waiting 25/30 mins more for my dish while the two other people at my table almost finished their meal...
Mistakes happen, system glitches, whatever the case. It's more important how the restaurant manages and deals with the mistake. In this case, it was a kind of blaming the system (or the kitchen?) and absolutely no suggestion or mention of anything to compensate for the hassle. Wasn't worth it","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Golnaz J N","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXwh094AvMjRiNSQoo9HjnFTPUMh8c3XSGOFZ78okUlI4KLdqnN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We dined in the patio. It was a nice space with great food. I asked for lettuce wrap burger. I did try Smokehouse burger. If you like caramelized onion and bacon with your burger, that would be a good option. We got a social red bottle, Jackson,-Triggs, as well for $30, which is a dry one, Cab-Sauv.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPbHb-OSUAjT08krqIA6Iur-FY_S4Uh1dRaEIoU&fid=0x0:0x9bb419891ac94930"],"When":"2023-5-17"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Fat Cook Papa (Fat Cook Papa)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJUpgi6nqSgMlDhQ45Yjl_gk21krVh2zgBl_CxlCp6gK1X_Jg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Coming from Toronto..

Love and enjoy great views from the patio.

Fish and Fries - both of their batter and fries were overpowdered and little salty. Also, I'm quite disappointed with the fries portion.
Unfortunately, two pieces of COD were first serving. Apparently, they looked like cooking with different preparation timing. One was great with thick cut crunchy exterior and soft interior, other piece hasn't fully fried to perfection. It's greasy and less crispy.

The Downtowner Pizza - pleasantly surprised by the amazing flavor honey drizzle on pizza. The heat of the pizza then warm the honey as it mixed with the sauce and toppings.

Wings - no impressed.  Originally ordered with Honey garlic sauce toppings style.
Unfortunately, wings were made with buffalo style and tasted like they half coated them with tobasco by mistaken.

We have to say they were by far some of the worst wings I have ever eaten. It's tasted like korean BBQ fried chicken wing.

A little bit pricey and service does need a lot of improvement.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP0be5JHmIITlNBtCmwiDVXPzfNar9iOeCiuLah&fid=0x0:0xbbadd84419ac02a9"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Amy Adams","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWyVH38TT4RWGwG_4hraWZRuXvb1BELFJJQ_LmMrQJEwE8qxzQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Salted and pepper Wings are hard and dried, only drumette, no wingette. So disappointed.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOR5_ZcPVXhC0Wp4WEPzD8P0o66YgMQsBgVyxdG&fid=0x0:0xbbadd84419ac02a9"],"When":"2024-12-15"},{"Name":"Bekah French","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJiYLh-7emQ9AthzE2N_CGxwmtRUdZguPeMRuVIWmhyOtllxQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Views and location are amazing. Would love to visit again in the summer and sit out on their big patio we ordered the soup of the day (chicken and vegetable), it was okay. And we shared a meat lovers pizza. We requested half with no cheese (for me) but the pizza came out first time incorrect (it was half cheese only, half meat). They quickly remade the pizza and the base was very yummy. I’d rate the pizza as a whole 3/5. We found the service very friendly and welcoming.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNwfumHC1VMOXhld8Vw1mT60IYGLKPdkLMIuntT&fid=0x0:0xbbadd84419ac02a9"],"When":"2022-11-16"},{"Name":"Ali Mehrizi","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXWq9cg0fjpkngwNGme387YM4kRUdnI6Pf_Z33gzbG1mkoqze49=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"Beautiful views of town (all the way to Burnaby) and good pub food. Fries were one of the best I have had. Drinks are good and beer flights are generous. A quick and good place if you’re in the more residential part of northern Coquitlam.

I just wish the service was more courteous. We had to wait quite a bit to get our server’s attention when we wanted to order extra food and drinks. When the food came (in reasonable time), she came to check on us only when we were almost done. On the bright side, I don’t think this is the service culture at Fairways; the two other persons who helped us sit and get a clean/sanitized table were very nice.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP4yxOEC8MmM2niMejhmuf8tooer3a0pejf_8Sj&fid=0x0:0xbbadd84419ac02a9"],"When":"2020-10-22"},{"Name":"Janice Robinson","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWwXAghB0kKeZJUcp8jSMN3IavGDPtUMtF57yQo1h9gD5800GlzTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"The last time I dined at this restaurant, it was called Hazards, and we lived 5 minutes away.  Having moved 10 years ago, it was nice to return to a familiar place. The service was pleasant and timely, and the 3 of us really enjoyed our meals.  I had the blackened salmon tacos, which were very flavourful and expertly prepared. I will definitely be back!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Eun R","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUtFP78dUqzbrC3sUP2EUQ7OgKF-9eTaViByIOG1MgbwrrOyEABLw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food quality is good, portion is generous, and servers are friendly and attentive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMYiB0HybsweJ0t28YswxQYL6q4xyemOS01_F9f&fid=0x0:0xbbadd84419ac02a9"],"When":"2024-7-23"},{"Name":"Ve7123","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI37Dp_jMOGKDkNZyR_8bRIASwIfCrsxmFZJBEVbUjSJ5H-kA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I am living nearby ,we're always coming here.
Today, we ordered the pizza of The downtowner, and it looks like only the dough, where the cheese and meat are.
I suggest that if there is no price increase, please cancel this item, because it is like deceive  customers, the goods are not right.
Quality has no standard

Yesterday we came again.
Because the design and atmosphere of the restaurant are good. However, we only ate for half an hour, and the waitress often came to urge and disturb the guests. Points will be deducted for this.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPFDpA3izzm0cCAL6kBKdFvDio1yiFbqIA-zvUu&fid=0x0:0xbbadd84419ac02a9"],"When":"2023-7-28"},{"Name":"Reza Abbaszadeh Hassiri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK26XcBa9A6TQLl_HXySTSrhIoetCnYiLUxzi8E55Bm8P9Z1A=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Just started hanging out there, I tried soup and fries twice already and Today I took coffee and cheesecake. Never got disappointed so far. You can put nice service and staff on top of that. Ariana is one of the best! Good atmosphere and view as well!!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Munchica","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXbQ6ACs51IPQJlRLrmnunOErED8bimOf5-y1uov4EWpuZvjQQjrA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"A nice place for dinner and events. The presentation was good and the food was decent but nothing spectacular. I would say the location and setting is the highlight with a great view of trees and the golf course.

The tiramisu was a little dry and not fine tasting. The prime rib was tough and could have been a little more rare. The crusted salmon was alright. The bocconcini salad was a little bland and could have used more balsamic vinegar. Overall, average food served on a very beautiful golf course.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNbRE55XBKL6ze_s1O4N9Hk2ZEek4D1VvPOJrvs&fid=0x0:0x249826f2155a8fa8"],"When":"2023-10-28"},{"Name":"Tram B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX-K4YVWiAzmZu_KbfJ74jgqKyQn5cvzUFXIxMXV8hDrUpzDT4x=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Great patio and huge restaurant, enjoyed the golf course view.
The parking area is huge.
Staff are friendly and attentive.
The menu has not many options.
Food decorations were very nice but quality of food was not impressed.
I had a Tandoori Salmon, the curried cauliflower and chickpea were tasty and flavorful but the salmon was dry and not really fresh.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPHUZJJgUxgXKcb5hdFYYKRtRLJvHbvt8xQrVmu&fid=0x0:0x249826f2155a8fa8"],"When":"2021-7-27"},{"Name":"Sammy Ho","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocI8G80Yu1dRNg63Kxi3nubws59q4j0obx7sgGB6zwKwn54dvw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Had a wonderful evening on Aug 4th celebrating my husband's birthday. We came at 5:30pm with our three young kids, and were offered a seating in the lower covered patio. It had a nice breeze and lots of room for our toddlers to roam around in without causing too much disruption for other guests. It also had a very nice view.

Our waitress was very friendly/kind to the kids, and provided exceptional service throughout our entire time here. Finding top notch service at restaurants is challenging these days, but we were blown away to have found it here yesterday! A solid 5 star for customer service (wish we had asked for our waitress' name)! Food tasted great as well- my husband and I enjoyed our prime ribs and even our very picky toddler finished her beef slider!

Thank you for an amazing dinner experience.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Michael W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwfiAL-e21dy1GQtPn9PDpfiV33LvPDZCh5itchuqNMs6oMQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Enjoyed the cod sliders special and calamari. New York strip steak was good.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipP9cECscghn_6Z-Dp-8VQtv2wNjPmVJpWOFkfhn&fid=0x0:0x249826f2155a8fa8"],"When":"2018-8-16"},{"Name":"Priscilla Goundar","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJwPRbGBecqujkaCmdefO3ALWX6X-wR6Jgn3UAv8M9diI8CBQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Slowest service ever.  Lunch was just basically waiting for a drink, food and then longest wait was getting the bill.  Food was fine; nothing special.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Antonio Galasso","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocL9bMosn-3cRHxD5Xo3PL0hIGXrvdmdMwRVPLHZN-dikUwsIw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Another disappointment
Our family got together for brunch last Sunday, the venue is very welcoming and pleasant however the food is mediocre to say the least, can't believe how bad a lot of restaurants have become lately.
My breakfast consisted of two pale tiny eggs, a couple of sausages with no colour and rather tastless and toast, jam was no where to be seen.
The race to the bottom continues, won't be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Sabrina","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW1x9W982LKRWOFtJbrhjQ7GUgI5v5T3R1deWBYlaXCFCGZts7HJg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great patio, enjoyed the golf course view and delicious food. Some fire table seating available as well.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOh2y7LOkEpo1cCkRDa6lJfqzZxfI7BDJwG5kwa&fid=0x0:0x249826f2155a8fa8"],"When":"2021-5-12"},{"Name":"Nicola Archibald","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXVUVAEOssWS-mqTREBrSXybu0PrMeSB8WD_g3juXdoKE2JpIlScQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We know the golf course well, we got married there. The food has always been good. The staff are friendly and management is responsive if anything is not to your liking. We wish more people would visit in the Spring and Fall so they would consider staying open year round. 😉 They have specials on certain nights. So far Prime Rib is back on Fridays. My favourite. 😁","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"serena ribecca","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJR0HYjxN3ZnC5rHnXKYGN_sW2D7X4jwGAe6uPmLdVKZVyZow=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Stopped by today for the first time with my husband. We recently moved into the area down the street. My husband and I aren’t beer drinkers so we were pleased to find out this place serves cocktails and wine.

We met Don, who was very accommodating and attentive. When he noticed our glasses were near empty, he came over and topped us off with was left  over from the near empty bottle. Extremely thoughtful and great customer service.

Pretzel was good and the margharita pizza was even better.

When we left, Don walked us to the door and left us with free beer flights for our next visit. (Even though we don’t drink beer much) it was the gesture that was much appreciated.

We will definitely be back, Thank you North Paw!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Katrina Oliva","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKenVkYC7cZGm5_yTwH3obTgfsNRF-yxo8tGwnt_TGDt774yQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I came out to see what's around the area and came in with a couple of my girlfriends after work and had such a delightful time with Don. He was very approachable and very good with entertaining us guests. His interaction made our group very engaged and had the drinks flowing! North paw is such a very inviting and community forward establishment. For sure come and visit!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"A.J. Canadian","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0mITu_1OR_MuXzhVIkPjHjZnimy2Y-mI64r72OA1Zbucah6-N=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"A nice Port Coquitlam brewery, Northpaw brewing is spacious and comfortable. Good tunes and friendly staff.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOFL1dIoo5btDtrT26Ley9NhrJY22efUlyO4raP&fid=0x0:0xb4d61557e4697c20"],"When":"2024-7-19"},{"Name":"A M","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocINYCOFLp2-95TJKd__6GTtYA0PeFGOkztNTlmAPlewiLtesQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"Went in on a July 26th ( Friday night ) couple people there but overall the place was dead. We ordered a couple drinks . Bar tender was nice enough , $10 for a 20 ounce beer seemed a bit much but regardless we got our drinks and sat outside . My beer was pretty flat and wasn’t very cold, the dollar store patio furniture and cleanliness of the entire operation made me think they might be about to close the doors soon. My advice would be to clean the place up, invest in some decent outdoor furniture and spruce up the patio experience . The beer should be ice cold and come in a chilled glass. I’ll give it a go again as it’s my neighbourhood brew pub but wasn’t impressed.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Y. Cherski","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK-7SLlKKRW0Rqcp9wRXFlvt6gbh0rtI7PMIroLgxETtGiPwQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I'm glad to see how Lower Mainland's brewing scene is growing, so visiting one of POCO's breweries was necessary. The taproom is located in a quiet place and pretty cozy itself. Once we arrived, there were only two other patrons, but the place got pretty busy by the time we left. It looks like they put a lot of time into porters and stouts, which I'm not into currently; however, I think they produce great products. I've read comments where people blame brewers for mixing unmixable, and quite honestly, I haven't tasted anything like that. I wasn't a big fan of some beers, which is absolutely normal, but I definitely can't tell that there was a bad or lousy brew. I thought Jamaican Pale Ale had a unique addition of spices, Gimme the Loot dark IPA was unexpected deliciousness, and BA Juicy Hazy was great. Also, if you have someone with you who is not into beers much, Christmas CREAM is a good choice for them. I wanted to try Solstice IPA, but unfortunately, it wasn't available on tap, so I took a 4-pack home along with 12 oz glassware, and I regret nothing.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN1MWq4Tj9hPI9L6tPxhJcqBaQJ16yFO9b54Cbe&fid=0x0:0xb4d61557e4697c20"],"When":"2020-12-31"},{"Name":"Jackson Chu","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLd5A8kAUJcCiYLLWbIOmqqUE_AHv_KTP39bCGmiGxiUMP_UA=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"New to the neighborhood and found this place while on a walk with my girlfriend. Great beer and had a great friendly conversation with Don! Cheers!..We'll definitely be back.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alberta Dunns","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVN_86ZHKcjcuS4f3vL5nCVA5cQrtOBu9pBWylw4RuP1AtckmXZTQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"West coast brewery tour continues…..todays second stop is this little gem in POCO. The cream ale was delicious 😬 on this very hot day. See ya soon NorthPaw Brewing…..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOOQ2kA3kErqy-zbf2JJ_qq7tsNAdUZnJSj4Ocj&fid=0x0:0xb4d61557e4697c20"],"When":"2023-8-27"},{"Name":"Sarah Grace","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjX0P_FT3n0HZdmLMDEJ6UcRFNPyHbE7QJ8GW3gOL-SGGTFh-sFdQw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba8-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Large comfortable industrial room, with couch, tv and beautiful wood tables, bench tables and high tops! Parking in front, clothing available to purchase along with growler fills. A variety of beer made in house on tap. Salt Spring cider and guest tap beer available as well. Beef, chicken vegan chickpea Jamaican patties available to eat made locally in Port Coquitlam! Delicious! Sour beer, IPA, nitro, porters, Altbier, large variety of beer. Try their cream series - it’s delicious!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOZbbS7W_Wqj7_WIBy77D-8z0M0roaKlwAkUuQY&fid=0x0:0xb4d61557e4697c20"],"When":"2019-2-5"}]
