user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Shaan Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWshQIjqAxxxpEZqMmq79gECNZtqo5fkP21IEuljsk1rZ61hb9I=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Very inconsistent in Coffee preparation, I had to go back and ask for the Cappuccino to be created again. The guy at the counter was arguing on how a Cappuccino is made. This is a coffee I have often and I know how it's made. We waited for long in the drive thru. Not a good outlet.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Dewei Jiang","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWWPL5fA8eG0YdiKpTDoM6d8WrzkmcmoukmYBivHyUks3L7BN3mkg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"2024/09/17 between 0900-0940.
Reducing the service rating to 3 star because the new employee, she yelled at me over the speaker this morning. Do not like her attitude, not typical Starbucks behavior
------------------------------------------------------------------
This is the bucks in my hood. Everything is great except like all other bucks in the city, they started asking customer to pay tips on the machine. However, there is no service involved other than handing out coffee at Drive Thru.

Hence, reducing from 5 star to 4 for worsen the tipping culture.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Fernandawong1 Instagram W","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXNFtqoy-cwodQwEn82tgfWyur2vGbFJj5rTY0AvCzEsWJEe71e=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"No seating area and today when I came they were not taking orders 😰😰 I always have pleasant experience with Starbucks that why u pay the premium but this is becoming 7 eleven coffe service","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPz2mC-eKB1DCl8LcIwyHj2yTA1CFiRukFVcSuA&fid=0x0:0x438b5ea0e9b11950"],"When":"2024-7-26"},{"Name":"Teresa Karun","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJkJds_rRwpc6Fq7yIBEI8NwqlWQAVu30gGsc15kefDslhJ2w=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"For over 2 months, this location was closed for renovations. Surprised that all seating has been removed. Ambiance of coffee shop experience totally gone. Also, coffee prices are higher than other locations nearby (with seating) and coffee quality lowered.

It rains a lot in B.C.. It is ridiculous that the only seating available is outside in the rain. When standing inside the store, staff look annoyed.  Starbucks used to pride themselves on outstanding customer service. Removing seating and condescending staff are driving customer base away.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Jenny A","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUJRvpNIDvr6_vjm-fMJFybg-lbSH8oM7mSKCGMGU6FC8cVuKGk=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"The Christmas holiday ornaments  are cute but expensive.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMEjkdqraRxJ1Zyl8UJSHqwmDObLw5L_MJCGyVd&fid=0x0:0x438b5ea0e9b11950"],"When":"2024-12-3"},{"Name":"Sean Romanuik","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIt02lG2s8un6F5LzMjCdvDRMuGyb-PnjauvYWyNAh5floG0w=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I used to visit this Starbucks quite frequently, as it was conveniently located near my employer at the time.

Every time I visited, I politely placed my order, patiently waited for it, and paid with a good tip. I never made any complaints, was always patient and polite, always tipped, and never said or did anything that could even remotely cause a conceivable offense to a sane person.

The last time I visited this location, I received some text messages from a friend just after I picked up my order.  Since it was raining outside, I spent approximately one minute inside the store answering those texts before I left.  I was not in anyone’s way as I did so.  In fact, I was the only customer in the store at the time.  As I was leaving, I kid you not, I overheard one of staff loudly say to his colleagues in a tone of mocking faux disappointment: “Awwww… is he leaving?”  Followed shortly thereafter by an angry “Go eat your sandwich!”  It was just bizarre and entirely unwarranted.

I’ve been to a lot of different Starbucks outlets up until that point, but this particular location has by far the rudest staff I ever had the misfortune to encounter.  Not only did I stop going to this location, I stopped going to Starbucks in general because there’s honestly a hundred reasons to visit any other café than a Starbucks.

Don’t go to this café. Go to literally any other café instead.  Preferably, one that isn't a chain.  They’ll be much more likely to appreciate your business and deserve your business as such far more than this truly awful place and their incredibly rude employees.  This place doesn't deserve to be in business and their employees don't deserve their jobs.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Alex","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIoVuF5WI-U9TjtfSOKcqTsO5Lw1SS5ttxQgnOeYapUbWYHkg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"the drinks are delicious, but in the beginning they made a mistake with the size, after pointing out the error, everything was redone and the last drink was given away for free, thank you","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Scott Gardner","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVAtcJicC0R9IQuYc_EQKkOcP-sHAeMKi4grD7YdbfSUxo3AB8k=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Friendly staff, I came in to a hustling cafe teeming with cafe goers. As I walk up to the counter three baristas turned my way and simultaneously welcomed me to Starbucks. This is easily my thousandth time so this is par for the course. The new barista was unfamiliar with my order so she over charged me but quickly corrected the error after checking with her manager. Th coffee was spot on, 10 minutes fresh. I will be back not to worry. This is one of the finer locations. Great for taking a date and sitting on the comfy leather teak chair set.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNAEtKkG5qsEoTYeqfy2Rn4hWqMA9GqLN3BRKOu&fid=0x0:0x438b5ea0e9b11950"],"When":"2018-2-3"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ping D","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV-_KBk5-yIGzGmKAkX1L-6QPRrz_RZKkgRnIY4il5exhoL_sw=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"There was only one staff in the early morning but he was extremely efficient. The cranberry turkey sandwich was surprisingly delicious. Cream inside pistachio bun was on the sweeter side but would be a good choice as dessert. Wish price can be lower, so that I can come back regularly.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNxEsqgdYQlHDlZlCYuy0cl7Drwho52YwlHjKCh&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2024-9-7"},{"Name":"Danilo Teodoro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU_rV4_xok36vIezJ6uAhpzSfyECA8ogmjA4ehyXVTr4dBqIAFv=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"First time I tried their bun with pistachio and the turkey bagel, and they were good! The cappuccino was good as well. I tried the Turkish coffee just because it's been years since the last one, and it was very strong, as usual. I'm glad I knew how this type of coffee is made and didn't stir the liquid.
The toilets needed some love..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNHVVDDLtjxI1rM7Dy_3mg1tubzrGtmjT7wNGaz&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2024-6-11"},{"Name":"Alecia Hack","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU0y1s7Bm_wrj5Zk4QFomT2h-qOh3c4CJw37lBhykQlV1HXtuw4ww=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I’ve come here a couple of times and I’m completely obsessed with this place! I had the pistachio coffee bun and a salted caramel latte last time I was in, and while I wasn’t expecting the size, it was such an incredible treat. Cant wait to go back soon, thanks for a great experience!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMyHEfOUN4bSSLdn0q7eE6t88Gu1R7qdGPR22CG&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2024-11-6"},{"Name":"Mavis Gevido","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVC-AP02ZE-ah41YCH68XbacnGEFbWfIc3R3T9FQiOBp_VcLYiP_A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Great selection of coffee buns and the ones we tried were all so good! Relaxing atmosphere, good space. Highly recommended!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMUNszxgua9dx1DrmJ42Rm939D2PVomTSIp69Fc&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2024-8-23"},{"Name":"Ray","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXGVd5s-06Fr3JDo-bYWWNiziS7uiGN7g2hEorOk1Vp-qtDK_-cTg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I love the concept of their buns. They have a lot of different flavors, and I tried the pistachio one. The bun is better than what I expected-- I expected a flavorless, chewy/tough bun but it had a great fried flavor and chew to it, made indulgent by the toppings of cream and pistachios.
I also had a toasted salmon lox bagel which had a generous amount of cream cheese, I loved every bit of it.
Very friendly and welcoming service!
It was quite busy.
I would definitely come back if I were in the area 😆","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPMEcOHD1pKqbcUepyj1ihb-fvVuAsZ3n-9iqr_&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2024-1-15"},{"Name":"Zaayer Nasib","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVkh0fpj6mvCROx8j1Ux0TdNtszR1GgFfGTRvlt6JMDCheOJwvK=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Ratings Scale 0 - 10
Variety: 8
Service or Product: 8
Customer Service: 8
Environment: 8
Cleaning: 8
Washroom: 7
Cost: 7

Tried a few of the buns, all of which were served fresh and hot! The ice cream bun was a delightful experience of warm bun and cold ice cream, but you have to be a little quick otherwise it starts melting really fast. The drinks were equally yummy. I had the hot chocolate which was perfect!
They have plenty of tables which was pretty good since there were quite a few people. There's only paid parking nearby though which was the only negative I see.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN0IOQFvGUF-_OZnnytcmsz4gQreANuw04M0Tk6&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2021-5-16"},{"Name":"La Mc","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJ3bmuxSiXCjm1iot5JpVUU_Lxxw4iPTmDpAUVL9Q9e-760ag=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Cute place with fresh buns!

Very bright location with a few tables outside.

Need to come back and try other flavours!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQryY1DW2BwXBGxMAb_y7tat0BDpJD4G0vlOCs&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2024-8-4"},{"Name":"Rochelle Barrett","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWfUfMrQqNwSQLSz_oSIsTrz93OXwAr4KrdgHWS4xUKxTxBh4cgIQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This was my first visit, despite living at the opposite end of the block!

I was there just after open and it was very quiet. I was able to stare at the menu without pressure, which I appreciated.

I got their Spanish latte. I'm not sure I have ever loved a coffee more. It was so dark and rich coffee flavours. I considered proposing to the barista, it was that good.

I hear their Turkey sandwich on cranberry sourdough, absolutely drool worthy!!! Creamy, savoury and sweet, perfect balance and the sour of the sourdough came through just enough.

Lastly, I had the gluten ginger cookie they out sourced from Wendell's. I did not love it. It was grainy but not their fault and I really appreciate they bring in options for multiple dietary requirements.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPvTAeW_Ad9YU9AOS6XyvZZ8C-blZKGBy516Jo6&fid=0x0:0xda419efba462c144"],"When":"2021-6-13"}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Makayla Marie","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVb92aiKg1qPa8eG43cOTLNjGjQjIm86IlidD6HWG4IdNO6QFAVCQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"This is my second time coming here and both times were delicious. The price is a bit higher however they go heavy on the toppings, amazing crust, and a free sauce! Small place and great location, this is my new go to pizza place for sure! They put mushrooms when I asked for no mushrooms so I would maybe double check the pizza when picking up but I’d still give it 10/10 with the amazing taste you get! Highly recommend the garlic sauce and spanakopitas!","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNg1UlbebR7fWYRrJhIbwYRCq1fHz2U3qO7LjX2&fid=0x0:0xb581fdf66b5f42e"],"When":"2024-8-3"},{"Name":"Alli L","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK7M-K_wMLVOHyWDXpjXXk3pyMIn-Cv8yGLpMXYPKQoyxLDNQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Ordered a pizza from Pomodoro after seeing all of the amazing reviews. Unfortunately I did not have a similar experience.

Firstly, one medium pizza with dipping sauce came to $37.00 after fees and taxes, which I thought was very expensive…. Then, when the pizza arrived, it was absolutely SWIMMING in ranch sauce. You could hardly even see the toppings underneath there was that much ranch on top. I tried having a couple of bites, but the bacon on the pizza tasted foul, and there was just so much ranch that I couldn’t eat more than a couple of bites. Don’t waste your money here.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOgU-VjkvILWyFZEClT1WihJnBroQz6Vlco9Cpp&fid=0x0:0xb581fdf66b5f42e"],"When":"2024-10-16"},{"Name":"Iman Abbaspour","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUyJ3zB-k1Em2nhAHMmDJvZRutGDNAngavPj68MOxrCxUs-qpAzwg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I would have given 10 if it was possible. It took me only one order to become a big fan of Pomodoro's pizzas. The pizzas are incredibly flavourful and tasty. It is fair to say I can not consider any other options when I want to order pizza.
I highly recommend everyone to try it once and
it doesn't disappoint you.
Beyond the outstanding quality of the pizzas, they have surpassed my expectations recently with a big and super nice surprise for me which I like to share with everyone. I had ordered a large chicken alfredo, but they upgraded my order to extra large at no extra fee. That was like a cherry on cake. I was a big fan already but it made me to be even more loyal to you guys.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMoETjAUxUrKRxznbE5EaKLFsm1WoluVxET5BSt&fid=0x0:0xb581fdf66b5f42e"],"When":"2024-10-1"},{"Name":"Jascha Espley","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV4qiQEqpq-v4zCyzH0rPtOokkIjjUQZAwg7HTwMN83mO_UQaokHg=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We made a simple order of 2 large pizzas.  Hawaiian and Pepperoni with Green Peppers.  The pizza was excellent.  The staff were very friendly.  The whole experience reminded me of some of the great little family owned establishments that I used to frequent as a kid.  Will definitely order from Pomodoro again!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"saghar hariri","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocKKQFF6JIPbjed2cXMbBHn_zDRv34qKJzdAkg1l1yv8bAnF=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pomodoro is a gem in Vancouver! Their pizzas are made with fresh, high-quality ingredients, and the crust is perfectly thin and crispy. The Canadian pizza is a must-try, bursting with authentic flavors. . Highly recommend!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Gaganitya Sharma","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWDXZDMbeiuX-0zBUEW2RF_3I4QSJMaSDjLuV8wMRMRdGjYaQ9E=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"Today we ordered garlic chicken pizza and wings. Both were horrible! Last time it was good. Not trying for the third time..","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMZIpmg5G-IABTGzL2SOCkBqXHww4V9Nj86ct7b&fid=0x0:0xb581fdf66b5f42e"],"When":"2024-11-23"},{"Name":"hamed etemad","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVDkzEWeB910fwqxe50wiKNL87XJ-M9lklsfGISzcb-bVxUKng=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I recently dined at Pomodoro Pizza Place, and I must say, it was an outstanding experience. The pizza was delicious—crispy crust loaded with generous portions of meat and fresh vegetables. The flavors were perfectly balanced, making each bite a delight. Additionally, the customer service was top-notch; the staff was both friendly and professional.
Highly recommend Pomodoro for anyone craving excellent pizza and great service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Armin Jooshesh","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU84ZdKpeHYTizNzhuDOJxDl09bgy3c-lDCNhrKGgMkAKTmOMYU=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Pomodoro Pizza is an absolute gem! Their pizza is incredibly delicious, with a perfect balance of flavors and a crispy, yet soft crust that is simply unmatched in town. Each bite is a delightful experience that leaves you craving more. The owner is extremely friendly and goes out of their way to make you feel welcome, adding to the memorable experience. If you're looking for the best pizza in town, look no further than Pomodoro Pizza. It's a true standout that you'll keep coming back to!","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Aisha Smith","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjV20p8rlcYqrGGTtBuKnNYWTLi6SiphmaaWphmZruMtm9JBAt6a=s120-c-rp-mo-ba2-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"The staff is always nice.
However, today the food …. Questionable.
I usually get a ranch crispy chicken wrap. But today, it smelled different. The texture was weird  after cutting into the wrap I see why.

Not cool. The chicken is still pink. Now I here hoping I don’t get sick, because I ate 1/4 of it already.
So annoyed right now. I can’t even take it back because I was passing through.
Do better before someone gets seriously sick.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipPVApbD8RMWA_KyvDNb0ZxESvdHAKQs6kr-V4Nm&fid=0x0:0x62e381af82842c5a"],"When":"2024-10-29"},{"Name":"Kyle Calen","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocK0PPUfJD8LAid2t6YMU2MA36lbJV-F9KhLVJJij5pVVEE6KA=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"The food is usually good here and the staff are very friendly and the cleanliness and appearance is very good but I am not making this message about that. Unfortunately I went through the drive-through and I ordered a BLT with a four cheese bagel and I got a BLT with a cinnamon raisin bagel wasn’t very appetizing, but I ate it anyways because I was hungry didn’t think I needed to check my food but now I always well sorry to say Tim Hortons but you need to step up your game and be more on point with what you are giving out to your customers","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNNkwNCtUAutqAVk2CrPK6FyGQCbdnrmqE1-Bzl&fid=0x0:0x62e381af82842c5a"],"When":"2024-6-26"},{"Name":"OM","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU33Qg1JE4YGnexw2nT6GbgjaBxZDhK0q9Dqqw_XlvAy_wSIlHW=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":3,"Description":"This is my go-to Tim Hortons location; overall it has a friendly feel. I wish they had kept the retro styling from about 5 years ago but since it has been modernized.

Staff is sometimes confusing and seem like they are in a rush, but overall are very friendly. I would suggest going to the Wendy's location right next to it if you are planning on getting food. For donuts, coffee or drinks then Tim's is perfect.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Keybz B","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocLIu2J8eAbjMt3x6PpEL_QFKAy_m-OtGQRvEIWRxnXP8Yrj3g=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This tim hortons is a nightmare. They  ever get the order correct. The staff is always rushing in the drive-thru.

Most importantly, always check your portion size!! They are extremely cheap and do not honor what your paying for.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipMdxSFA7FiZbVPBpjxL6ptVMqocOXPOgONKHezq&fid=0x0:0x62e381af82842c5a"],"When":"2023-9-3"},{"Name":"Shauna Laura","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWiktNWmeB3BWHElwHUYac5UAWVSD_P_UNtNZ2w7wISb4cVI93q=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"This is the most convenient location on my drive to work... It is the worst Tim Hortons I've ever been here. The team is made up of one rude white girl who is always on drive through head set (at least she understands the order) and a mix of people who don't understand listening at all. I constantly have to repeat my order. I said large for size three times and the Philippineo lady on head set today asked size again today. I prefer a tea latte (usually 2a day) but this team screws it up so badly I stopped coming in. Today was the worst of the worst. I ordered my oat milk tea latte and the last had no idea. I knew exactly which staff member it was but know two people get the order I figured it would be okay. No today they put coffee in my tea latte. It was disgusting and when I drove the ten minutes back they even offered for me to keep the awful beverage. This team is broken. And I rarely complain about it to them as I don't expect much in drive thru... But this is beyond bad service. I'm more shocked when it's actually delicious from this location.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"kid nash","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXip0ykXpgSlIF-KF9pZlmqoJU4DN1DB-MJUzJMD-hZnoY09lkguQ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba5-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"There was a real understanding issue. The lady at the till did not understand what my order was and more importantly they did not take care of the people waiting in line and all they did was take care of the people in the drive-thru I saw. Many people leave without anything and I was quite upset too because I still have to explain to her that I wanted the product and she gave me the wrong one. I feel like I wasted $10. But hey, I just don't want anybody else to go through what I went through. Let's improve the service here. Tim, you really let me down","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOrGOkcMTjZwr4XKyhxds1HyynxItaHNCy943wn&fid=0x0:0x62e381af82842c5a"],"When":"2023-10-15"},{"Name":"Yorbanz fernandez","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocJNPiaAOD7wdtJH9I-HhhtpXB2nybInPSZV89-mw85CMV8hXw=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":1,"Description":"I went there yesterday around 10pm,drove all the way from New westminster because I searched in Google it was the only one open,when I get there and I order my food they say they don't sell wraps at that time,so what's the point of Still have in the menu ?or don't advice anywhere about that. So I had to go back home with no food. Thanks Tim Hortons I'll definitely won't recommend to nobody.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Thomas F","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWrvMAYvQSxet7S3dTqclCkvtkp0d19ErSki-C_K6HK4GRH9oKl=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":2,"Description":"I order iced coffee. The coffee was burnt. You can taste it. Worst part this happened two days in a row.

Also to that I order a Honey Curler donut and I got an old fashioned?

The sitting area is really dirty and the washroom is terrible in smell.","Images":null,"When":""}]

user_reviews:
[{"Name":"Ark C","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVgkz1VW4hMMwbhNyEX48LHgsXv-SFjhkvbaCt714RWHrZqEkTz=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Food was tasty. Service was great. Actually attentive compared to other places. A tad pricy but worth the service and food. Will return.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOXrTMmz5MYtA14ffrOpqz7lAoX_61QkUeLDyO6&fid=0x0:0x136fcd8e7d93f071"],"When":"2024-12-25"},{"Name":"April Subebe","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjW0KNTbwPJ7QLg6AtspNBZWw6Gql6qfbM2ULHG09rSGY7an8ZgN=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"We had an amazing experience at Solar Pho Restaurant! We started with the grilled chicken bread with lemongrass, and it was absolutely delicious—the chicken was flavorful, and the bread was so fresh. We also ordered the grilled pork chop with a spring roll, and it was equally amazing—so tasty and perfectly cooked!

The service was top-notch. Our order came out quickly, and Ryan was on top of everything, making sure we had a great dining experience. Highly recommend this place for anyone looking for great food and excellent service!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"May Zhagro","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjU9KviWdU_UGm6yjKPv-6aFaljm1EC_ecrxYhnt_LO3duiyBNho=s120-c-rp-mo-ba7-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Family owned restaurant where the owners know the regulars who come by. Good home-made Vietnamese food at reasonable prices. The grilled pork vermicelli came with soup and spring roll. The banh mi came with pickled veggies and was also a bit spicy on the inside. Overall good taste and great service. There is plenty of parking at the plaza.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOxDpsC8D3GtfeuXnIr8JHNDEFprNdsMhwJ5zDP&fid=0x0:0x136fcd8e7d93f071"],"When":"2023-6-12"},{"Name":"Sumru Dinler","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/ACg8ocIsiS88tjwWXrld2ojVa0QAPzlZCHkwNQ7sKGU2g-LqNo3CHkQ=s120-c-rp-mo-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"amazing food amazing people. They are so welcoming and kind which is very rare in pho restaurants in here. Also soup was the tastiest. Highly recommended 🌸🌸🌸","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipN-8e_N9NUmUUnCANnCIOTrCKIgvsxAZvpjtVe5&fid=0x0:0x136fcd8e7d93f071"],"When":"2024-6-4"},{"Name":"Brishna Kamal","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjXMpWiqlkwyapIP3wajP8a0hgPStHeDIFHvwtYR9pcEWwjcTnRJ=s120-c-rp-mo-ba3-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Quick random stop during a day trip to poco! Delicious food and great service! Definitely go back and recommend if you like pho, ribs and lemongrass chicken.","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"luisa","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjVJPR_EzVk6KCzOq9zTdZGb3p68Ja0wiRgJkxMowaFZR9ft45041A=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"I received very good care here with some delicious hot spicy beef broth. Just what I needed to regain my strength. But I got told "don't forget to eat the noodles!" - took two more soups for takeaway. Thank you!","Images":null,"When":""},{"Name":"Joshua (ThickBurger_Bites)","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjUbIhhMlbxk7OIMpcaP-aSx2m75kt8-mqmXoXAJQ5K99gnxiff1zg=s120-c-rp-mo-ba6-br100","Rating":4,"Description":"Went there on impulse for a late dinner after reading the reviews.

Food:
Ordered the House Special Pho, large. Was pleasantly surprised to see a bowl that wasn't as big as Pho 99's large. Pho was good, soup was just right, neither too salty or too rich. Noodles came in a good amount. Meats in the House Special Pho left a lot to be desired though. Not as much as I'd expect, half a beef ball, about 2 slices of beef steak, 3 slices of beef flank, tiny bits of beef tendon (which was really soft and delicious to my surprise), and a few bits of tripe here and there. Kinda disappointed with the amount of meat but as it was still pretty delicious,  I'll overlook it.
It comes with tea, beansprouts, basil leaves and lime on the side.
Refer to pictures for more information!

Price:
$10.24++/person

Service:
Nothing special. The lady sounded angry but I guess it's just the way she speaks.

Would I recommend?
Yes, go with family/small groups of friends as the place is rather small. I have not tried the other dishes, but will do so in the future :)","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipOQm5L8nR0xCYWH_i_xK2j7rwq5AZRQ2MMi8XQj&fid=0x0:0x136fcd8e7d93f071"],"When":"2017-1-8"},{"Name":"Stan S","ProfilePicture":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ALV-UjWJDG5_awNL6dSqZYIF4Ack_45eiH9so1tVgUCK8vlfNcXo0LDN=s120-c-rp-mo-ba4-br100","Rating":5,"Description":"Not my First time here, busy place seems to be lots on the go even though there's only a few of us sitting down there's plenty of takeout or to go orders and the people are quite friendly and the price is reasonable. With the back door open it is quite cool in here however you do warm up when you're eating your food. I highly recommend this place the food is good the people are friendly service is excellent.","Images":["www.google.com/local/imagery/report/?cb_client=maps_sv.tactile&image_key=!1e10!2sAF1QipNVX0tlIkif75DPDxyhNi5Wvo2ID-r_1D3o98A6&fid=0x0:0x136fcd8e7d93f071"],"When":"2021-2-13"}]
